name: Intro
_source: speak;Marcus;Princess Roy! This way! I can see no more of Grado's men.|If we've made it this far, we've surely earned a moment's rest.|Please forgive my grabbing you so...brusquely earlier.
speak;Roy;Don't be foolish, Marcus.|If it weren't for you, I would never have made it out of the castle.|You are the reason I'm still alive. You have my gratitude.
speak;Roy;And whoever that man was, he was clearly after me...|It's my fault that you received such a grave wound.|Allow me to treat it, I--
speak;Marcus;Your Highness, I can't allow an injury like this to be an obstacle.|We have more important matters to attend to. We must press on to Frelia.|We must fulfill His Majesty's wishes.
speak;Roy;...|I wonder how my father fares alone in the castle. Do you think he's safe?|And what of my brother on the Grado front? We've heard nothing from him for days.

speak;Marcus;King Fado and Prince Ephraim are both valiant and brave men.|I doubt even the might of the Grado Empire can hold them in check.|More important to me, Your Highness, is that you look to your own safety.|How sad the two of them would be if something were to happen to you.|We must reach Frelia to ensure the day of your happy reunion.
speak;Roy;Yes, of course. You're right.|Until I'm reunited with my father and brother, I must not despair.|Come, Marcus. Let us go.
speak;Marcus;Once we cross that bridge, we will be in Frelia, near Border Mulan.|Let us proceed, Princess Roy.
speak;Marcus;Your highness, I won't lie to you. This will not be an easy ride.|Please, take this rapier.{br}If something should happen to me|you must continue to Frelia,{br}alone if need be.
speak;O'Neill;You there! Renais dogs! Where do you think you're going?
speak;Roy;It's all right, Marcus.|My brother has taught me something of swordplay.|I will stand with you.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;I'm fine... Fine.|...This is war, isn't it?|It's not at all like the games I used to play with my brother or Lyon.|I never thought-- I didn't know it would be this...savage.|Are words useless? Is strength all that matters? It's so sad...|Why would the Grado Empire do this? To what end would they start a war?

speak;Eirika;...Don't worry, Seth. I won't give in to sorrow.|Let's get moving.|I'm not broken, and I won't stop until I see Renais restored.|I won't stop until I'm reunited with my father and brother.

name: OnlyBoss
_source: speak;Seth;All that's left is their leader...

name: EnemyTurn2
_source: speak;O'Neill;What was that? Do you think you can take me, wretched lordling?|Come! It's time you high-and-mighty knights learned to respect a true warrior!

name: FightONeill
_source: speak;O'Neill;You will be the first to die!

name: FightSaar
_source: speak;Saar;Enemy of the empire!{br}Death's too good for you!

name: FightBreguet
_source: speak;Breguet;Bah, what a worthless lot of curs I've been assigned!

name: GilliamFranzArrive
_source: # Move Franz and Gilliam into the game
speak;Franz;Sir Gilliam, is that Mulan? Have we reached Frelia's border already?
speak;Gilliam;Aye, we have. Her Highness Princess Tana should be inside the castle.
speak;Franz;But look--the countryside is crawling with Grado soldiers!|Where's the castle guard? Has Mulan fallen? Are we too late?
speak;Gilliam;Too tough to say from here.|Princess Tana's in no danger if they want her as a bargaining tool.|We men of the Eastern Watch will see her to safety.
speak;Franz;Yes... Yes, of course.{br}We mustn't give up. We must move.|We must retake the castle. Then, we ride forth to Princess Eirika's aid.
speak;Gilliam;I've stronger armor than you do. I'll take the lead. Watch my back.

name: House1
_source: speak;Man1;The rumors are true, aren't they? The Grado army's taken over the castle|It looks like they've seized the castle gate, too.|Smart work--the gate provides defense and heals wounds to boot.|They must be fierce warriors to have taken the gate. Watch yourself.

name: House2
_source: speak;Man2;That knight encamped at the castle was wearing the finest armor I've seen.|It looked like it could turn aside alomst any blade you swing at it.|I know my armor, though. I wager a good rapier or armorslayer could get through it.

name: Intro
_source: speak;SoldierBlue;Princess Tana! Grado's forces are approaching!
speak;Tana;What? So soon? Ah, we've had no time!
speak;SoldierBlue;Milady, we lack the arms to defend this place. You must return to Castle Frelia.

speak;Tana;I can't! Not yet. We haven't found Eirika and her companions yet.|Eirika is my friend, and she needs my help. I won't abandon her.|Oh, I know! Go and ask Father--{br}I mean King Hayden for more troops.
# Green units leave castle. Mercenary stays on castle.
speak;SoldierRed;Commander Breguet, the enemy appears to be fortifying its position in the castle.
speak;Breguet;Hmph.|They're tenacious, but they have no hope of stopping our advance.
speak;Breguet;Ha! Orders? You just stand here and watch. I'll crush them myself!
# Breguet moves and attacks Green Mercenary. He crits the mercenary.
speak;Breguet;Ha! That's what happens when you face my lance!
# Units move to their final positions
speak;Tana;St-stop right there!|Call off your forces and turn back, or you'll have me to deal with!
speak;Breguet;Is that so? And who might you be?
speak;Tana;Who--? I am Tana, Princess of Frelia.|I will not permit you to abuse my country any longer.
speak;Breguet;Frelia's royal brat, huh? How convenient...
speak;Tana;Leave this castle immediately.|If you harm me, my father and brother will chase you to the earth's end.
speak;Breguet;Yes, I've heard how King Hayden dotes on his precious little daughter.|Let's see how true that is. You'll make us a fine hostage, my dear.|Seize the girl and lock her up!
speak;Seth;I see it. It seems like Grado's army has already reached Frelia.|Princess, this place is perilous.|We should bypass Mulan altogether and head straight to the castle.

speak;Eirika;But we can't just ignore this...|You were there when Renais was invaded... You saw what I saw.|You saw how the people suffered at the hands of Grado's soldiers.|Homes were destroyed, possessions stolen, women kidnapped...|Anyone who resisted was executed without question, without hesitation.
speak;Eirika;Please, Seth. I can't allow that to happen here.|I don't want to see any more people harmed by Grado's atrocities.
speak;Seth;All right, Princess. I understand. Perhaps we can retake Mulan.|But, Princess, you must act with caution. Your people need you, too.
speak;Eirika;Of course, Seth. Come on! Let's go!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Tana;Sir Gilliam...|I'm sorry. I never meant to cause you such trouble.
speak;Gilliam;It was no trouble. I live to serve, Princess.
speak;Eirika;Tana, what are you doing, so far from Castle Frelia?
# This is how you tell a character to change their expression
speak;Tana;I heard that Renais had fallen, and I was so worried...|But I'm glad to see that you're safe...{w}{clear}Wait! Where is Ephraim? Is he well?
speak;Tana;You haven't heard from him? Oh, I hope he's not been harmed...|Come, we must go to Castle Frelia. My lord father may know something.
# Let's have some fun in the overworld
# This command is necessary to load the overworld tilemap
# The next two commands are self-explanatory. You'll use these to manipulate overworld data.
# Here are examples of overworld animations and sounds.
# Notice that they are the same as the normal tilemap commands.
# Because narration is more involved than dialogue, we need some different commands
# to animate the narration window in.
narrate;Narrator;Eirika and her companions have liberated the border castle.
narrate;Narrator;Alongside Princess Tana of Frelia, they ride to the Frelian Capital.

speak;Hayden;Oh, Tana... I'm grateful to see that you're safe and home again! |You've no idea how worried when I heard you were under attack at Border Mulan. |You are not to leave again without my permission. Do you understand?
speak;Tana;Don't be mad, Father. Look, I come bearing good news. |Eirika! Come out now!
speak;Eirika;King Hayden, I am pleased to see you again, even in these sad times.
speak;Hayden;Ah, Eirika. It does my heart good to see you safe.
speak;Eirika;Thank you. I was able to escape the castle before Renais fell. |But I'm not sure if my father...
speak;Hayden;Yes. |I...have received word of your father.
speak;Eirika;Your Highness? Please tell me. Is my father well?
speak;Hayden;...My friend King Fado...did not survive the fall of Renais Castle.
speak;Hayden;Rest assured, Grado will be punished for its cowardly act. This is Frelia's promise. |Eirika, please stay here and rest. I cannot imagine how exhaused you must be.
speak;Seth;King Hayden. |You know of Prince Ephraim's disappearance, do you not?

speak;Hayden;Yes, we hear the prince and his men hound Grado at every turn. |It's said that he's led his forces into the empire itself. |Reports suggest he's crossed the border and now fights in Renvall.
speak;Eirika;My brother...{br}He fights on? Even now?

speak;Hayden;Yes. My pegasus knights brought his information at a great price. |Even though Renais has fallen, he still charges into the enemy's heart. |He is truly Fado's son...what a valiant youth. |I wish that I knew whether he remains unharmed, but I do not.
speak;Eirika;King Hayden, I thank you for your offer, but I cannot stay. |I intend to ride to my brother's side with reinforcements.

speak;Hayden;I cannot allow it. I know how you feel, but this plan is suicide. |I would be betraying Fado's memory if I allowed any harm to befall you. |Stay here. Rest and mourn. Leave this war to the warriors.

speak;Eirika;I know you mean well, Your Majesty. |However, I have lost my father, and my twin brother is in peril. |My brother, he is a part of me... |I cannot rest here in peace while he risks his life.

speak;Hayden;No. Renais has no more army. Grado's forces decimated it. |I wish that Frelia could provide you with support, with soldiers, but... |My son, Innes, is on his way to meet the empire's forces. |We cannot spare a single brigade. |Your own retinue of knights cannot possibly face Grado alone. |Are you so determined to go?
speak;Hayden;...As resolute as your father, eh? |What am I to do in the face of such foolhardy determination? |Vanessa.
speak;Hayden;You are to accompany Princess Eirika of Renais into Grado territory. |I expect each of you to provide aid and support for her brother.
speak;Moulder;Hm. Quite a grave responsibility you have given us.
speak;Vanessa;No matter the obstacles, we will perform our duty.

speak;Hayden;These are some of my most trusted and stalwart vassals. |They will, no doubt, prove themselves quite valuable on your journey. |Remember, you are venturing behind enemy lines. You will need supplies. |I will have a supply convoy readied to carry your weapons and provisions. |It will remain at your side, no matter how far afield you venture.
speak;Hayden;No, save thanks for your return... with your brother, Prince Ephraim.
speak;Tana;Eirika, you don't really intend to go through with this, do you? |I can't guess how you feel, but it's just too dangerous. |What would happen if you were captured by Grado's men?
speak;Eirika;Thank you for your concern, Tana. |But I have no choice. Don't you see, Tana? I have to go.
speak;Tana;Eirika...{br} Oh, why is this happening? What's gone wrong with the world?

speak;Tana;Why would Grado invade? |Emperor Vigarde is a man of peace. His people adore him. |And you and Ephraim are friends with Prince Lyon, are you not? |What could be behind this madness? Why is this happening...

speak;Eirika;I have no answers for you, Tana. |I don't want to believe it, but the reality is that we are at war. |If I do nothing, I may lose my brother as well as my father. |This is why I have to fight. It's the only answer I have.

name: EnemyRein
_source: speak;SoldierRed;I've found them! Stragglers from Renais! Don't let them get away.

name: SethFranzTalk
_source: speak;Seth;Is that you, Franz? I'm relieved to see you're still in one piece!
speak;Franz;Y-yes...and you as well, General.|As long as you lead us, sir, the Knights of Renais cannot lose!
speak;Seth;Franz, you and I must work together to protect Princess Eirika.|I want you to ride with us.

name: EirikaFranzTalk
_source: speak;Franz;Princess Eirika, it is good to see you're well.
speak;Eirika;Franz, you made it through unscathed...

speak;Franz;Y-yes, Your Highness!|I met up with Sir Gilliam of Frelia and explained the situation in Renais.|He told me that Princess Tana was in danger as well, here at Mulan.|We rode as swiftly as we could.
speak;Eirika;Tana is here?|Franz, we must hurry!

name: EnemyTurn1
_source: speak;Breguet;Hm? Is that the princess of Renais?|Ha ha! It really is my lucky day! Fame and fortune ride to meet me!|Move on, you slugs!{br}Bring that girl to me!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Eirika;Seth has mapped out a route for us.|We'll travel south of Renais and pass through Serafew into Grado territory.
speak;Moulder;Hmm...{br}That would seem a sensible plan.|Assuming, of course, that we can avoid any run-ins with Grado soldiers...
speak;Vanessa;Princess Eirika, may I have your leave to scout ahead?|From the sky, I'll have a better chance of spotting any nearby troops.
speak;Moulder;We're yours to command, Your Higness. Will you give your permission?
speak;Eirika;Yes, of course.|Keep an eye out for enemy bowmen though, Vanessa.
speak;Vanessa;Yes, Your Higness, I shall.|I shall prove myself worthy of the honor of your trust.
speak;Bone;Hey, boss! We've found more villages ripe for the picking.

speak;Bazba;One, two, three...{br}Ha ha ha! I love a good war!|With all those soldiers preoccupied, we're free to pillage as we please!|Right, Bone--you're in charge.|Grab everything that's not nailed down and bring it to the hideout.
# Transition to Ross and Garcia conversation
speak;Garcia;Hmmm...|I'm getting you out of here, Ross. You stay close to me!
# Transition to Bone leaving and TopBandit destroying the village
speak;Bone;Let's start with that village there! Go to it, boys! It's all yours.|Cut down anyone fool enough to get in your way.|I'm heading west around the mountains to the other villages.
speak;Garcia;Ross? What is it? What's wrong?
speak;Ross;It's nothing! It's just a scratch!|You're a warrior, Dad, and I am your son. I won't be beaten so easily.
speak;Garcia;Don't risk yourself so foolishly...{br}We need to get you some help.|Please! Someone help my son!
speak;Vanessa;Ah! This looks serious.|I must report back to Priness Eirika at once.
speak;Vanessa;I have bad news.|The village to the east is under attack by bandits.
speak;Moulder;We have arrived at our first dilemma.|We must move quickly and attract as little attention as possible, but...
speak;Eirika;But I cannot stand by and watch innocents be harmed.|Vanessa, how fare the villagers?
speak;Vanessa;I spotted one injured person.{br}He appeared to be just a child.
speak;Eirika;Father Moulder, can your staff help him?
speak;Moulder;Well, yes, I can heal his injuries with my staff, but...|I cannot do it from here. He's too far away. I must be near him.
speak;Vanessa;Princess, please leave this to me.|I shall bring the boy here.
speak;Moulder;All right, Vanessa. It's up to you.
# Add the two enemy units back

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Iron Axe

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Steel Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Steel Lance,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Iron Bow,Steel Bow

name: Village1Eirika
_source: speak;Woman1;This is terrible... What are we going to do? Those bandits are so close.|If we can't find some way to protect ourselves, the village is doomed.
speak;Eirika;People, listen to me! You must close the village gates immediately.|Hurry, before the bandits arrive!
speak;Selena;Who are you? You aren't from one of the neighboring towns, are you.|And your weapons give you away... You're no peasant.
speak;Eirika;I am Er...|My name is Erina.{br}I'm a mercenary.

speak;Selena;A mercenary named Erina, is it?|There's more to you than that, I feel. But don't worry--it's none of my affair.|I haven't told you who I am yet, have I?{br}I am Selena, a general in Grado's army.

speak;Selena;It looks like these villagers have some bandit troubles.|I would like to help, but I have orders...|I'm to leave for the capital immediately, and I cannot stay.|You're armed, and you claim to be a mercenary. Will you help them?
speak;Eirika;No! Of course I'll help them!|It's just... You're one of Grado's generals... Why...
speak;Selena;These aren't soldiers.{br}They're people.|Should they suffer because their leaders fight?|I've petitioned your aid. Take this as payment.

name: Village1
_source: speak;Selena;And who are you? You don't look like one of the local peasantry.{w}{clear}As you can see, these villagers have some bandit troubles.|I would like to help, but I have orders to follow...|I am required to quit this area at once.|I would ask you to aid them in this fight.|I will pay for your trouble, of course.

name: Village1
_source: speak;Tethys;Oh, hello.{br}Did you come to see me dance?|I'm sorry, but I just finished a few moments ago.{w}{clear}Oh, by the way...Would you be interested in one of these items?|A wealthy patron left me a small ransom in gifts after watching my performance.|You can sell one for gold if you'd like or use them to improve your skills.|I simply cannot carry all of this by myself, so please, take this one.|Wealth is useless if you can't use it to bring happiness to others, right?| Thanks for dropping by. Perhaps we'll meet again someday.

name: Village2
_source: speak;Man2;Life in Serafew's been harder since the Grado occupation force took over here.|Serafew's got Renais citizens as well as Grado, but it's been hardest on us.|They've singled out families from Renais for the most awful atrocities.{w}{clear}Please, traveler, take this sword.|It's an armorslayer. It'll cut through even the strongest armor.|Take it and strike down that blackheart, Saar.

name: Village3
_source: speak;OldMan1;In my youth, I was a knight of some renown, I'll have you know.|I've even crossed blades with one of Grado's most famous generals, I have.|Ah, but I'm an old man now...|I'm starting to worry... What if I die without passing on my techniques?|So I decided to write down what I've learned in a book. I have it here.|You seem like a strong warrior. I'd be honored if you would accept it.

name: Village4
_source: speak;Amelia;Hope everyone's well back home in Silva. Just a bit more, and I'll be in the empire.|Let's see, I've got vulneraries, antitoxins...|Oh! And I can't let myself forget torches for when it gets dark.|Yep! I'm all set!{br}Now I just need to get to the capital.|I'll be the finest soldier the Grado army's ever seen! I swear it!

name: Village1
_source: speak;Man1;Do you see that old snag to the south of here?|Bet it would make a handy bridge if you could knock it over.|Take a weapon to it and give it a few good whacks. That should do it.|Here, take this and give it a try.{br}It ought to do the trick.

name: Village2
_source: speak;Lute;Your flesh shows no sign of putrefaction.|It seems you're not a revenant.
speak;{unit};Well, I should hope not! I wanted you to know help has arrived.|Please be patient a bit longer...
speak;Lute;No, no. I insist on joining you in combat.|I've been reading up on these revenants.{br}They are, quite simply, no match for me.|I am superior after all.
speak;Lute;Your flesh shows no sign of putrefaction.|It seems you're not a revenant.
speak;{unit};No, I'm not{br}Are you from around here?|There are still monsters about, so you should stay in--

speak;Lute;No, no. I insist on joining you in combat.|My name is Lute. I'm a mage of superior wisdom and rare ability.|I've been reading up on these revenants.{br}They are, quite simply, no match for me.|I am superior after all.

speak;Lute;Your flesh shows no sign of putrefaction.|It seems you're not a revenant.|I've decided to join you in battle now.|My name is Lute. I'm a mage of superior wisdom and rare ability.|I've been reading up on these revenants.{br}They are, quite simply, no match for me.|I am superior after all.

name: EirikaRossTalk
_source: speak;Ross;Hey, listen! My village is being attacked by bandits.|My name's Ross.|Come on! You have to help me wipe those thugs out!
speak;Eirika;All right, just... Just take a deep breath and calm down, Ross.|Leave the villages to use.{br}We'll drive off the bandits.|Seth, take the boy somewhere safe.
speak;Ross;No! Wait! I'm going to fight, too!

speak;Ross;My father is out there all alone, fighting those bandits.|I've got to get back to him as quickly as possible!|I'm the son of the great Garcia!|As long as I have my axe, no bandit will ever defeat me!
speak;Eirika;All right, I can see you're not going to be swayed...|But you must promise you will stay close to us.

name: Village2
_source: speak;Woman2;The most wonderful man rescued me.|He was dressed like a mercenary, but he had an air of elegance about him...|He gave me this elixir. I'm sure it will help you on the battlefield.

name: Village3
_source: speak;Man3;Hm? What is it? What's all the ruckus?|What? B-bandits?!|Spread the word, everyone!{br}Close the village gates!|Thank you for your warning.{br}Please, accept this small token.

name: RossGarciaTalk
_source: speak;Garcia;Ross?! Boy, what did I tell you!? What are you doing here?|Don't worry about me. Hurry up and get yourself to safety!
speak;Ross;Did you really think I could just run away while you fight, Dad?|You taught me that fighters fight for what's important to them!|There's no way I'm leaving!{br}I'm fighting just like you!
speak;Garcia;Ross...|All right, listen to me. We'll cut our way out of here together!

name: NatashaJoshuaTalk
_source: speak;Natasha;You...You're that man I met...|Are you here to capture me? You've been hired to silence me, haven't you...
speak;Joshua;Yeah, Grado's paying the bill.{br}They want you dead, you know?|But don't feel bad. It's not personal.

speak;Natasha;Wait, please...|It doesn't matter what happens to me, but you must hear my words.|The emperor of Grado is changed.{br}He is not the man he once was.|The other nations must be warned before he extinguishes all light from out lands.
speak;Joshua;Hey, no offense, but I'm just a mercenary. I don't care about Grado or its emperor.|Everything you say may be true, or it may be lies. I don't care either way.
speak;Joshua;Even so...Killing a beautiful lady like you would leave a bad taste in my mouth.{w}{clear}Tell me, do you like to gamble?
speak;Joshua;Gambling's what I live for. Even when I lose, I never want to stop.|Let's have us a little wager.{br}If you win, I'll believe you.|Heads or tails, you call it.
speak;Natasha;You can't...{br}This is no time for games...
speak;Joshua;Would you rather I get on with the job I was hired for?
speak;Joshua;All right. So I'm heads, and you're tails.|Here we go.|... ... ...
speak;Joshua;What do you know?!{w}{clear}It's tails. You win. Figures. I haven't won anything all day.|Well, Lady Luck has spoken.{br}Guess I'm on your side now.
speak;Joshua;Yeah. Sure, I might cheat, but I never worm out of a bet. It's a rule of mine.
speak;Natasha;Oh, thank heaven! Thank you, blessed light, for your protection!
speak;Joshua;I got nothing against heaven, but I'm right here if you want someone to thank...|No? Well, get behind me then. I've got to take care of these fools.

name: Turn2
_source: # On enemy's second turn, they start moving

name: Outro
_source: # Just in case Garcia hasn't been recruited yet
speak;Garcia;You saved my son.{br}I owe you my thanks.
speak;Seth;...Hold on a moment...|Aren't you...the great Garcia?{br}You fought for Renais, didn't you?;low_priority
speak;Eirika;Seth, do you know this man?

speak;Seth;He was a troop commander for Renais until around ten years ago.|When I was a recruit, the soldiers used to tell so many tales about him.|They called him a daring and fearless fighter for Renais.{w}{clear}Master Garcia, you must know the peril our homeland faces right now...|Can we impose upon you to lend your strength to Renais once again?;low_priority
speak;Garcia;...I'm sorry. I'm retired now.|I'm not a soldier anymore. It's... a decision I made long ago.

speak;Garcia;...When I was a soldier, I lived my life fighting for my country's honor.|I left no time for my family.|I spent my life fighting for faceless, uncaring nobles.{w}{clear}When my wife fell ill and died, I met the child she had left behind...|At that moment, I finally     realized what my duty had cost me.
speak;Garcia;I stood at my wife's grave and promised her I would be a father to our son.|I'm done with armies. I'm done with fighting, except to protect my son.|I've no regrets. I'm the boy's father.
speak;Ross;You...you blasted fool!|Father, what's all this nonsense I'm hearing?
speak;Ross;If you're not going, then I will!|I'm a fighter!{br}I know I can do this!

speak;Ross;Dad, please! Listen to me!|I respect you more than any other man in the world.|I know you gave up being a soldier for me. I know that!|But how can you throw away such a big part of yourself?|You're a warrior at heart! You can't give that up and be happy!
speak;Ross;Look at me, Dad!{br}Have you seen me fight?|I'm not a child anymore.{br}I'm a warrior, like you.|You're free to worry, but I can survive on my own.
speak;Ross;You want to challenge me, Father?|I'm a fighter! The best in all of Ide!|I'm not going to lose to you!{br}I'm not going to lose to anyone!
speak;Garcia;...You're right.|You're a good soldier, Ross.
speak;Garcia;Sir Seth...|If these old bones of mine can still serve, I'd like to join you.

speak;Garcia;Looks like my boy grew up while I wasn't looking...|He's tougher than I thought. He doesn't need my help.|I've raised him as best I could, but he's right.|I've nothing to fear. I should fight. I will fight.
# If either die, they don't join your party
speak;Man2;Thank you so much for your help. Please stay the night and rest...
speak;Eirika;We would if we could, but we have much to do and far to travel.|Your safety is reward enough.
speak;Man2;Ah, well...|My, that is a splendid bracelet you're wearing.
speak;Eirika;Thank you. My father gave this to me.

speak;Man2;It's a wonderful gift.|But you should be careful, wearing such a valuable item so openly.|Since Renais was invaded, things have become so dangerous around here.|There are gold-hungry thieves and bandits everywhere.{w}{clear}The most wicked ae Bazba's Bandits. They are...cruel beyond words.|If you have something they want, your life is worth less than nothing.|Just the other day they assaulted some travelers and... Oh, it was awful.

speak;Man2;Oh, Renais is finished, mark my words.{br}The Grado Empire's stolen our future.|Our only hope against them was that Prince Ephraim would prevail, but...|Rumor has it that he's on the verge of being crushed by Grado's vast numbers.|These are dark days. Travel with care.
speak;EphraimSepia;It's time to start.{br}Are you ready, Eirika?
speak;EphraimSepia;Tell me, though: why do you want me to teach you to fight?|I thought you didn't care for violence...
speak;EirikaSepia;I do not like uncivilized behaviour.|I think one can solve one's problems without fighting.|And yet...
speak;EirikaSepia;I've always relied on you to protect me, Brother.|I would rather not be such a burden to you in the future.|So, I thought maybe I should learn to protect myself...
speak;EphraimSepia;I'm your brother. Brothers are supposed to protect their sisters.|It's nothing for you to worry about. It's no cause for concern.

speak;EirikaSepia;Yes, but...|I am your sister. Sisters are supposed to worry about their brothers.{w}{clear}So I would like to learn something of swordplay, if only a little.|And maybe, someday, I can protect you in your time of need...|So please, Ephraim.

speak;EphraimSepia;All right, all right. How could I say no?|Honestly, once you get an idea into your head, that's it. I might as well give in.{w}{clear}It's agreed. I'll teach you, but I won't hold back because you're my sister.|And I want no complaining once we've starting, Eirika.
speak;Eirika;Y-yes... Someone bumped into me is all. I was jarred.
speak;Seth;Hm?{br}Your Higness, where is your bracelet?
speak;Eirika;My bracelet?{br}It's...gone.|Where could it be?{br}Did that man--
speak;Eirika;Don't worry about it, Seth.|That bracelet was a gift from my father, but Ephraim needs our help.|I can't let sentimentality get in the way of my duty.
speak;Seth;No, Princess... We must retrieve your bracelet regardless of cost.|You cannot lose it. Let's go.{br}We must hurry.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Iron Axe;armory

name: Intro
_source: speak;Seth;The local villagers tell me that Bazba's Bandits keep their lair nearby.|A few of them saw a lad matching the description of our bracelet thief.|It seems a fair guess that the youth is one of these bandits.
speak;Eirika;Bandits... Here in Renais, our homeland. I had no idea...|Burning our villages... Stealing from our people with no fear of reprisal?

speak;Seth;It wasn't always like this. The knights used to protect the citizenry...|However, with Renais in ruins and her army tattered, law and order are hard to find.|It doesn't look like the Grado army is interested in maintaining order here.|If nothing changes, Renais will continue this sad plunge into savagery.
speak;Neimi;Pardon me for asking...|but are you all some sort of...mercenary troop?
speak;Neimi;P-p-please, you have to help Colm. You have to!|I told him it was too dangerous, but he wouldn't listen to me!
speak;Eirika;Please, you must calm yourself. Start at the beginning, and speak slowly.
speak;Neimi;All right...Sniff.|I'm Neimi.|I'm from... I used to be from a village named Lark...|Except the village is gone.
speak;Neimi;Bazba's Bandits burned it down.{br}Only Colm and I escaped.|The other villagers...{br}The bandits attacked them and...
speak;Seth;Neimi, what are you doing here?

speak;Neimi;Bazba's Bandits... They have a hideout here in these mountains.|That's where Colm...|Um, Colm's my...uh...We've known each other since we were kids.|He went to steal back something the bandits took from me...
speak;Eirika;He went alone? That's a very dangerous thing...
speak;Neimi;Yes, I know. Th-that's what I told him, but he wouldn't listen to me.|If I lose Colm, too, I don't know... I...I'll... sniff...
speak;Eirika;Wait, please don't cry.|Don't worry. We'll find your friend and see that he's not harmed.
speak;Neimi;Really? Really and truly?{br}Oh, thank you! Thank you!!!|I... I don't have much money, but.. I'll do anything to help.
speak;Seth;Your Highness? What will it be?

speak;Eirika;If the thief we're after has gone to the bandits' lair as well...|Well, it seems as though we share a common cause with Neimi.|She is a citizen of Renais, after all.|And isn't it our duty to defend our countrymen?|I'm only sad that we weren't here to protect her friends and neighbors...|So, yes, I feel we must help her.
speak;Seth;Very well. Neimi, I trust you can lead the way?
speak;Neimi;Um... Is there anything I can do to help? I feel so...|When I was little I used to go hunting with my grandfather.|What I mean is I can--{br}I'm not bad with a bow.
speak;Seth;I see.|You should remain behind and protect Princess Eirika.
speak;Bazba;Hm. Not sure who's out there, but it looks like we've got guests.|Let's give 'em a warm welcome, lads.{br}You see a stranger, stick an axe in him!

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Colm;And here we go!|Ha! And not a soul saw me. These bandits are easy picking.|I guess I might as well start with these chests here.

name: NeimiColmTalk
_source: speak;Colm;Neimi?!{br}What are you doing here?|I told you to wait for me, didnt I?
speak;Neimi;I couldnt... Its too dangerous.|Cmon, lets go home.
speak;Colm;We dont have a home! Dont you get it? Look, just leave everything to me.|I can take care of it in a flash, but I dont need a clumsy oaf like you tagging along.
speak;Colm;Oh, this is ridiculous.|Well talk later. Dont leave my side, Neimi.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Colm;What now? I told you not to worry.|I could've robbed these bandits blind on my own, thank you very much.
speak;Colm;H-Hold on! I'm sorry!{br}C'mon! Don't start bawling!
speak;Colm;Fine, fine. I promise.|But you have to stop crying all the time. All right?
speak;Colm;Oh, yeah. Take a look at this.

speak;Colm;I got your mirror back.|Remember how you cried when we left Lark? You thought you'd lost this.|I knew it was your mother's, and I knew those thugs had taken it.|So I went and got it back!|See what happens when you give me a job? Guaranteed results!
speak;Colm;Hey wh-why are you crying this time?|C'mon! Stop! Knock it off! Please, Neimi...
speak;Seth;...This is quite touching, but...|I think you'd best return Princess Eirika's bracelet to her now.
speak;Colm;Wh-what are you talking about?{br}Are you trying to say that I--
speak;Colm;Whoa! Whoa there! Hold it! It's right here! Take it!
speak;Seth;......|Tell me, boy, is this the path you've chosen for your life?|If this girl matters to you, you must quit this dark road.
speak;Seth;We're leaving. Do not expect to be rescued again.|Farewell.
speak;Colm;...Hey, wait!|Let us go with you. You can't just leave us here.

speak;Colm;Neimi and I... We've got no home to return to.|No matter where we go, there's just gonna be more fighting.|You're mercenaries, right?{br}Well, then take us with you.|I'm a handy guy to have around. I know I can help you out.
speak;Seth;I would prefer not, but I'll agree with Eirika's decision.|Our duty is a grave one however. We've no time to waste shepherding you.
speak;Colm;That's fine with us.|You just wait--I promise you won't regret your decision.
speak;Seth;I retrieved your bracelet from the bandit's stronghold.|Here you are, Princess.
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Seth.|You know...Father gave me this bracelet when I was a child.|It has only one match in the world, and my brother wears it.
speak;Seth;Lady Eirika, you must take care never to lose that bracelet.|It is the proof that King Fado entrusted the future of Renais to you, his children.
speak;Eirika;Seth...What is it you're not telling me?
speak;Seth;...I apologize, Your Highness.|When the time comes, I will tell you what I know. Until then, I...
speak;Eirika;I see.|If you tell me it must wait, then it can wait. I trust you.
speak;Seth;Then we should get moving again.|We're safe from bandits for now, but I can't guarantee for how long.
speak;Eirika;This... This is just the beginning, isn't it?|If we hope to free our homeland, it will take battle after battle...
speak;Seth;I'm afraid so, Your Highness.|The day you and Prince Ephraim win back the freedom and honor of Renais will come.|But I fear it lies at the end of a long and treacherous road.
speak;Eirika;I know. I must fight for that day.|In the names of all those I could not save, I'll lead us home.|Let's go. My brother awaits!
speak;Duessel;Selena. Have you been back long?|Tell me, how fares the campaign in Renais?
speak;Selena;Signs of chaos abound.|Brigands ride without fear, and the peasant's cries fill the air.
speak;Duessel;Hmm...|If Grado's troops do not enforce public order, the situation will only worsen.|And still, His Majesty has given us no orders.|Perhaps, just this once, I should take the lead...
speak;Glen;What could His Majesty be thinking?|Breaking our long-held alliance with Renais--invading without warning...|He's never been this way before. He abhors violence.;low_priority

speak;Glen;And have you noticed the recent promotions? Who are they are going to?|Certainly not to the soldiers who have Grado's best interests at heart.|I feel this invasion is the prelude to a much larger war.|I feel as though His Majesty is no longer the man we knew him to be.
speak;Selena;Glen, it doesn't matter what any of us might think of our orders.|We are his servants, and we will not question His Majesty's intentions.
speak;Glen;I know that, Selena. And yet...
speak;Duessel;That's enough. Both of you. His Majesty summons us.|Let's hope we can learn a little during our audience.
# Load the units that are necessary to display for cutscene

speak;Vigarde;...I appreciate your work in fulfilling your previous orders.|You are the hammers that drive the nails of the empire's will...|You will continue to operate{br}...without hesitation...|wherever I send you.

speak;Vigarde;...However, I know this...|You, my Imperial Three, lack the strength to conquer the remaining nations alone.|In the invasion of Renais, certain soldiers performed beyond expectation.|I have chosen them to join you as new generals in the empire's service.|...Come.
speak;Vigarde;...The performance of these men surpassed even your own.|With the addition of these three...|The empire will have six generals strong enough to conquer this land.|Do you understand?
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|I am Riev, given the name Blood Beryl by His Majesty.|I know I am a newcomer, but I pray for your favor.
speak;Caellach;I'm Caellach. I was a mercenary, fighting in the desert.|Seems I'm to be called Tiger Eye...|You're a fine lookin' lass, aren't you? Yeah, I'm gonna love working with you.
speak;Valter;So we meet again. You know me as General Valter, but you will call me the Moonstone.|I'll save you worthless dogs from your own incompetence. You'll thank me later.
speak;Vigarde;Selena. Caellach. You will bring me Frelia.
speak;Vigarde;Riev. Duessel. You are charged with the defense of the empire.|...I will speak to you individually with more details later.
speak;Vigarde;Valter, Glen...{br}I have other duties for you...
speak;Vigarde;Renais has fallen, but Princess Eirika still eludes us...|Her brother, Prince Ephraim, leads a resistance within our borders.|Bring the siblings to me.

name: FightBazba
_source: speak;Bazba;I'm the head of this bandit pack, the mighty Bazba!{w}{clear}Hope you've enjoyed your life, 'cuz it's about to end!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Seth;We're approaching Serafew, at the border of Renais and Grado.|Once we cross, we'll be in Grado...{br}Renvall won't be much farther.
speak;Eirika;That is, assuming we can cross the border without mishap...|Oh!{br}Look! Over there!
# Add the enemy army back to the map
# (Screen goes to the map, with monsters spreading everywhere)
speak;Eirika;Those strange figures...{br}What...What are they?|Are they...human?
speak;Seth;I've never seen anything like it. What could they be?
# (Screen goes to a southern village with Artur and Lute)
speak;Artur;What have we done to deserve the trials before us? What is happening to us?|How could such abominations walk our lands while the Sacred Stones protect us?
speak;Artur;Lute, please, it's dangerous outside the walls. Stay here in the village.
speak;Lute;Those are revenants, aren't they?|They were the vanguard of the Demon King in the days of darkness.|The Tome of Nazania describes them in chapter 2, section 7, paragraph 8.
speak;Lute;Duh! I'm a prodigy. I can recall almost everything I see or hear.|According to the book, revenants attack using razor-sharp claws.|Sounds painful, wouldn't you say?
speak;Artur;Yes, er, well... Be that as it may, I must go aid those travelers outside.|You should stay here within the safety of the village.
speak;Lute;Very well. I don't mind staying here. In fact, it seems the smarter choice.

speak;Lute;Magic is far more powerful than any monster's claws.|The thickest hide and the strongest armor are useless against magic's power.|Yes, I suppose I could have studied swords, but only magic is worthy of me.|Even if this village were to be assaulted by monsters, I could defend it perfectly.
# Artur runs up to Eirika's group
speak;Artur;Travelers, you must listen to me! The ancient forest of Za'ha is dangerous.|Head south and pass through this place before the fiends surround you!

speak;Artur;My name is Artur.|The temple has assigned me the task of cleansing the forest of these...things.|There are so many of the fiends, though.{br}I wonder if I stand much chance alone.|So if you would, please flee now while you have the chance.
speak;Eirika;Fiends?|You're not talking about the same fiends that served the ancient Demon King?|That can't be right... They're nothing but legends and fairy tales...
speak;Artur;Yes, I felt the same way when I heard.|And yet here they are. This place is filled with them.|I wonder how far they've spread...{br}Surely they're not in Renais alone.
speak;Artur;Please allow me to deal with this.
speak;Artur;Evil shade! May the blessed light drive you from this land!
speak;Seth;We ought to help. He can't fight them all alone. Do you have orders?
speak;Artur;One of my companions is in that village to the south.|If you can get there swiftly, I implore you to watch over her safety.

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Bandit1;Look at this. Now's our chance!|C'mon, lads!|Let's join the fights and steal our way through this pathetic town!

name: Turn3
_source: speak;L'arachel;Oh, my!|Those travelers are being besieged by the agents of evil!
speak;Dozla;Ha ha ha! Right you are, Lady L'Arachel!
speak;L'Arachel;I cannot allow this to happen!{br}Come!|We must charge down these cliffs and rush to their aid!
speak;Rennac;We charge down these cliffs, and the only thing we'll be rushing to is death.|How about we find us a nice, gentle path down, hm?
speak;L'arachel;Ah...Yes, well...Let us hurry nonetheless.|I simply cannot abide those wicked beasts running amok!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Seth;We've killed all the monsters.|Still, we'd best burn the bones to ash to be sure they don't return.;low_priority
speak;Eirika;I still can't believe what we've been fighting here...|I'd thought those fiends nothing more than myth and legend.
speak;Seth;Those revenants are said to be the least of the dark creatures.|And yet, the weakest of them could outmatch any normal man.|We cannot take this enemy lightly.;low_priority

speak;Lute;Oh, yes. There are much worse then those revenants and the entombed...|Let's see, there's the bonewalkers, mauthe doogs, gargoyles, baels... |Why, I'll bet you just about any creature of lore could be walking again.|Yes, we're in for some trouble. Even my fabulous power may not be enough.
speak;Artur;O divine light, show me... Is this a sign of dark days to come?;low_priority
speak;Eirika;By all that's holy, what is happening?
speak;Eirika;By all that's holy, what is happening?

speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, perhaps it would be wise to return to Frelia and regroup.|Pressing forward seems foolish in light of recent events.|We cannot face both Grado's forces and more of those terrible things.

speak;Eirika;Seth, I follow your point, and nothing would please me more then running for safety.|But what of my brother? He and his men are still trapped in the same situation we are.|I know full well that I may be leading us into even greater danger, but...|Please try to understand.
speak;Seth;I do, my princess, and I vow to see you through this safely.
speak;L'arachel;Aha! Foul creatures, beware!|I, L'arachel, bestow upon you the honor at banishment at my blessed hands!
speak;L'arachel;Ah, glad tidings indeed!{br}The heavens must be rejoicing!|I am...a tad disappointed however.|After all, I did rush all the way here to show you the splendor of my might.
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha! It's a real shame, innit, Lady L'Arachel?!
speak;Rennac;What's shameful is the way you drag us around the countryside.
speak;L'arachel;Me?|Since you ask, please allow me to introduce myself.|It is I, the true light and glory of the sacred realm of Rausten...
speak;Dozla;Stop! Lady L'arachel, you mustn't continue!|You cannot reveal your true identity here!
speak;L'arachel;Oh, yes, you're right. Oh, I get so careless sometimes!|Now, I must ride off in anonymity. Oh, how beautifully romantic!
speak;L'arachel;Fare thee well, strangers.{br}Perhaps our paths will cross again.|Come, Dozla! Rennac!{br}We ride!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Joshua;Well, well. There's an arena in this town.|Perfect. My pocket's feeling a bit light.
speak;Joshua;Say, is that a cleric? It is!{br}And a gorgeous one at that.
speak;Joshua;No, pardon me! I never meant to startle you.|May I offer my apologies....
speak;Natasha;No, it's not necessary...{br}It was my fault.|Excuse me, I must be going...{br}Good day to you.
speak;Joshua;...And there she goes.|Not my lucky day...{br}She was quite the beauty, too.|Ah, such is life. I think I've time still to visit the arena, though.
# (View moves north, Glen is talking to Saar)

speak;Glen;Captain Saar of the Serafew Border Guard. How fare you?|I bring orders from His Majesty.|Rumor has it that Princess Eirika of Renais is making her way to Grado.|You are to find her and to place her in custody immediately.

speak;Glen;One more thing...|A traitor to the empire has fled Castle Grado.|We've received reports she is hiding somewhere here in Serafew.|I don't care if you have to tear this town apart. Find the turncoat.
speak;Saar;Yes, sir, General Glen!|If she resists, do we have permission to execute her?
speak;Saar;Understood! Grado's will be done.|The Grado Empire will repay the debt of betrayal with blood!
speak;Glen;...His Majesty relies upon you, Captain. Be sure his trust is not misplaced.|That is all.
speak;Glen;Such loyalty to the crown.|If only I could hold such conviction in the righteousness of our emperor.
speak;Glen;No...Pay no mind to me.|Come, Cormag. Let's go.|From here, we ride northeast, back to the fort.
# (They fly off, replaces by Seth and Eirika, outside the town)

speak;Eirika;It's been so long since I last visited Serafew.|My brother and I used to pass through here en route to Grado.|I remember the harmony in which the people of both countries lived.|No walls divided our borders. No soldiers stood guard in high towers.|The border town... It was to me a symbol of the trust between Grado and Renais.
speak;Seth;...And now, it is firmly under the thumb of Grado's emperor.
speak;Eirika;The peace I remember in this city...|It seems like something from another time. It seems lost now... Forever.

speak;Seth;...The city doesn't seem to be very heavily patrolled.|They must feel it's not worth guarding with Castle Renais under their control.|We must try to not draw attention to ourselves. The west gate is undermanned....
speak;Saleh;Pardon me, may I ask you a question?
speak;Saleh;I'm looking for someone.|Have you seen a young girl with indigo hair?
speak;Eirika;There was something very odd about that man, wouldn't you say?
speak;Seth;He did seem unusual. He didn't strike me as a Grado spy, but...
speak;SoldierRed;Catch her! Don't let her escape!
speak;SoldierRed;That way! She went that way!
speak;Eirika;Let's see what the commotion is.
# (Screen goes to town, there are some soldiers surrounding Natasha)
speak;SoldierRed;Traitor Natasha!{br}Surrender peacefully.|Come quietly, and you may have the chance to explain yourself before His Majesty.
speak;Natasha;Wait, please.{br}You must listen to me!
speak;Natasha;No, you must believe me!|The emperor is not himself. You MUST be able to see that!
speak;SoldierRed;Impugn the emperor at your peril!|We've been ordered to execute you if you offer any resistance.|But your words condemn you!
speak;Eirika;That cleric is a traitor to the throne of Grado?|What madness is this?
speak;Eirika;I'm from Renais. Why are these Grado men after you?
speak;Natasha;You're from Renais... Oh!|I have something I must tell you. It's about Grado--
speak;Eirika;Wait--Grado soldiers are coming this way.|We'll have to talk later.{br}Now we must fight!
speak;Joshua;So much for my dreams of making my fortune here...|First the girl, now the gold.{br}It really isn't my lucky day.
speak;SoldierRed;You there! Mercenary! What are you doing here at the arena?|Get back to the staging area now!
speak;Joshua;C'mon, why don't we both hit the arena?{br}It'll be good training.|If you're going to risk your life anyway, you may as well try to earn some gold.
speak;SoldierRed;I'm reporting you to the captain! You'll be lucky if he just docks your pay!|Don't forget--You can be replaced in an eyeblink, you filthy sellsword!

speak;Joshua;Don't worry, little man.{br}I won't forget.|Work's work, but I don't like fighting women...|Now then, what's the rest of the day got in store for me?{w}{clear}...Tails huh? That's nothing but bad luck and more bad luck...
speak;Natasha;They may not want to hear what I have to say, but...|I must speak with one of the Grado soldiers.|Oh, if only one of them will listen to my words...|Please! Grant me strength.

name: OnLevelSelect
_source: narrate;Narrator;King Hayden apologizes for being unable to spare soldiers.

name: RoyLilinaSupportC
_source: speak;Roy;Lilina, are you all right? Do you need anything?
speak;Lilina;No, I don't need anything right now.
speak;Roy;Oh, okay. Then is there anything I could do for you...
speak;Lilina;Thanks for worrying about me, but I'll be fine.
speak;Roy;Well, in that case... But if there's anything you need, tell me. Okay?

name: RoyLilinaSupportA
_source: speak;Lilina;Roy...I'm sorry about the other day.
speak;Lilina;I was on some nostalgia trip, remember? We're in a war... Of course things won't be the same...
speak;Roy;I'll be at your side, and you'll be at mine.
speak;Roy;We can't go back to the past, but we can shape the future. Then we should work to make a future the same as, or even better than the past, right?
speak;Roy;D-Do you think so? Yeah, I was thinking that didn't sound like me myself...

name: RoyLilinaSupportB
_source: speak;Roy;What's the matter? You were looking off into space again. We're in a battle. You could get killed!
speak;Lilina;It's just that...we've come a far way
speak;Lilina;Not distance-wise... It's just that everything seems to be changing so quickly. Do you remember the time when you came to Ostia to study?
speak;Roy;Of course. Two years... Wait, was it three years ago?
speak;Lilina;At that time, your father and my father were still well. Lycia was so peaceful...no one would have imagined a war. ...It all seems as if it were already ten years ago.
speak;Lilina;I sound so foolish... There's no way we can go back there anyway...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating the dragons,{w} the humans of Elibe quickly spread their culture and civilization to the farthest reaches of the continent.{w}{clear}In the west lies the Kingdom of Etruria,{w} which is widely considered to possess the most refined culture in all of Elibe.;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narrator;The Kingdom of Bern, with its powerful military and logical, pragmatic people,{w} is located on the other side of the continent in the east.;;;narration_top;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narrator;These are the two most powerful nations in Elibe with the weaker nations{w} situated between them.|These smaller lands are...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narrator;the Lycian League,{w} whose numerous territories are independently ruled{w} by a number of marquesses that are bound by a vow of allegiance.;;;narration_top;FLAG(hold)

speak;Narrator;Ilia,{w} where the people arduously till the frozen soil{w} and many become mercenaries to earn money to survive.{w}{clear}and Sacae,{w} where various clans ride through the plains on horseback.{w}{clear}Although there were occasional clashes between these nations,{w} the majority of the people of Elibe lived in peace.|That peace, however, was not to last...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narrator;King Zephiel of Bern has commanded his forces to conquer the entirety of Elibe.;;;narration_top;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narrator;Bern's armies first attacked Sacae and Ilia, ruthlessly massacring all who opposed them.|Now, Bern is mounting a merciless invasion into Lycia.;;;narration;;FLAG(hold)

speak;Narrator;Pherae is a territory of Lycia known for its beauty and honorable lords.|{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Pherae's heir, Roy, was studying in the great territory of Ostia when the invasion began.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{br}{c:add_portrait;Eliwood;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}However, the sitting marquess and Roy's father, Eliwood, who has been ill,{w} has sent for Roy to return to lead Pherae's soldiers in defending against Bern.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Eliwood (Eliwood)}{clear}{c:add_portrait;Hector Old;Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Marquess Hector of Ostia is Eliwood's long-time friend and confidant,{w} and leads the council of lords in Lycia.|At the time Eliwood sent for Roy,{w}{c:add_portrait;Lilina (Lilina);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes} Marquess Ostia's daughter Lilina was in Pherae visiting Eliwood.{w}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Hector Old;Lilina (Lilina)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{clear}Upon receiving his father's message, Roy hurries home, taking with him his vassals{w}{c:add_portrait;Bors (Bors);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes} and Bors, a knight from Ostia who is responsible for Lilina's safety.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Bors (Bors)}{clear}The story begins when Roy reaches the outskirts of Pherae...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;GenericBandit1;Boss! They've all hidden themselves inside the castle!
speak;Damas;Heh.{w} Even Eliwood, the greatest knight in Lycia, is no match for an illness, it seems.
speak;GenericBandit1;Hee hee hee...|You were right when you said there wouldn't be many soldiers.|They're all getting ready to defend against Bern!

speak;Damas;Of course I was right. I'm always right, you fool.{w} But reinforcements could be here any minute.|All right, you curs, listen up!|Kill everyone in the castle while we still got time!{w} Then we can waltz outta here with all the loot!
speak;Scollan;Heh heh, castles ain't the only places with loot.|Let's go ransack the village and take everything they've got!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Eliwood!|We're under attack by bandits from mount Bolm!
speak;Eliwood;I understand. Thank you, Merlinus.|Blast it!{w} Were I not in this pitiful state I would take care of them all myself...
speak;Eliwood;Lilina, you must hide yourself.{w} This castle is going to become a warzone.
speak;Lilina;No, my lord. I can fight too!
speak;Eliwood;Don't be absurd. I couldn't face Hector if something happened to you in my own castle.
speak;Eliwood;It's going to be alright.|Roy should be here any moment, so we just need to hold our own until then.{w} He'll drive these dastards off.
speak;Eliwood;Merlinus! Send a messenger to Roy to let him know the current situation!{w}{clear}We need his help!
speak;Roy;Oh, it's Lance! What's the matter? Why are you in such a hurry?
speak;Lance;Lord Roy! Bandits have appeared and are attacking the castle as we speak!
speak;Lance;He's inside, defending against the bandit's attack.|But I don't know how long he can last with his illness...
speak;Bors;Excuse me. Lance, is it? Is lady Lilina safe?
speak;Lance;You must be a knight of Ostia. Lady Lilina is in the castle, she should be alright.|She's with Lord Eliwood after all, but he can't last forever.
speak;Roy;No... I shouldn't have let Lilina go to the castle before me.
speak;Wolt;Lord Roy, regret won't solve anything! We must retake the castle!
speak;Marcus;Wolt is right. We must make haste!
speak;Roy;Yes, you're right. This is no time to despair.
speak;Roy;Very well, to arms then!|Our target is the castle, we must rescue everyone!

name: FightDamas
_source: speak;Damas;You bumbling idiots! You can't take on a few pathetic knights?!

name: EnemyTurn1
_source: speak;Damas;Dammit! Reinforcements already?! But they ain't gettin' to the castle so easy!

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;Money Man;Money is important!{w} If you don't have any, you won't be able to replace your broken weapons!{w} And you can't fight without weapons!

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMan1;Listen!{w} If you wanna do well in battle you'd better use terrain wisely.{w} For example, if you're in a forest the trees will cover you!{w} That'll teach your enemies who they're dealing with.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerWoman1;We're all doomed...{w} Soldiers from Bern have crossed the border...{w} They laid an awful attack. And even if the allied lords strike back, Lord Eliwood...{w} He can't even stand anymore...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;I'm so glad to see you both! Thank goodness you're unharmed.
speak;Roy;Of course Father. How is your health?
speak;Eliwood;Well enough. I've some life in me yet.|But Roy, do you know why I called you back here?
speak;Roy;I'm to take over your role by leading the soldiers of Pherae.|We must join the rest of the Lycian army to protect our people.
speak;Eliwood;Exactly.|As you know, Bern has commenced an invasion of Lycia.|We are honourbound to follow the vows of our allegiance.|Lycia needs every lord's army and we must oblige.
speak;Eliwood;I'm truly sorry to interrupt your studies and force you into this war,|but I'm not well... I'm in no condition to lead an army.
speak;Lilina;Lord Eliwood!|I'll go with Roy!|My father leads Lycia's largest army.|And I'm certain my magic will be of help to Roy...
speak;Eliwood;No Lilina.|You must return to Ostia.

speak;Eliwood;With Hector off to battle, no one is sitting on the throne of Ostia.|The people must feel uneasy without a sitting lord.{w}{br}As the daughter of the Marquess,{w} you must take the throne until Hector returns to ease their worries.|Do you have any objections?

speak;Eliwood;Roy, I have arranged a contract with a group of mercenaries.|You are to meet at the border to Bern. Merlinus will accompany you.|He is both knowledgable and experienced, he should be of great help.
speak;Eliwood;Don't worry my son, I have absolute faith in you.|Fight bravely, and show everyone who the next Marquess of Pherae is!
speak;Lilina;Bors, I have a favor to ask of you.
speak;Bors;You needn't ask milady.{w}{clear}I will accompany Lord Roy in his travels and protect him with my very life.

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana1;Are you knights going to the castle?{w}I know this isn't much...|But please accept this money on behalf of all of us.|Use it well!

name: FightRuud
_source: speak;Ruud;Curse it all!|Just when I thought things had finally turned my way...

name: RuudDeath
_source: speak;Ruud;Oof...|Greed can only... bring you... an ill fate...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;There is a small village on the border of Pherae and Bern.|This is where Roy is to meet the mercenary band that Eliwood hired.;top;;narration;;;;FLAG(hold)

speak;Narrator;Just east of the village is a small castle occupied by Bern's forces.|At the time Roy reaches the village, the castle is in an outright panic.|Roy has yet to realize that this confusion going on in the castle will spread,|engulfing the entire continent of Elibe in chaos...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.2: The Princess of Bern
speak;Melady;All I want to know is what happened to Princess Guinivere!
speak;Ruud;Y-yes Captain Melady...|I'm certain she was in her room this morning, but she simply vanished...
speak;Melady;You told me that already, you buffoon!|I don't want excuses! Are you so incompetent that you can't understand that!

speak;Melady;Our forces are mobilizing to begin a full-scale war with Lycia.|How are we to focus on the battle when the princess is missing?!|Naturally, you will take full responsibility for her disappearance.

speak;Melady;I should have never let Her Highness come to the border to begin with.|I will return to Bern and inform the King of this matter.|I'll try not to cause a panic, but I can't promise your life if the princess isn't found.|I trust you'll take every measure to locate her as soon as possible.
speak;RedSoldier;Yes, Commander. She's under constant surveillance in the cellar.
speak;RedSoldier;But, Commander...|Are you sure this is a good idea?
speak;Ruud;Of course I'm sure!|The younger sister of King Zephiel...|We're sure to get a hefty sum turning her over to one of Bern's enemies!
speak;Ruud;Loyalty to one's King...|Bah. What a worthless notion.|The world is ruled by neither King nor Queen. It's ruled by gold!
speak;RedSoldier;Yes, indubitably Commander.|...But there has been a snag, shall we say.
speak;RedSoldier;I just received a report...|it seems that Princess Guinivere's lady-in-waiting has escaped...
speak;Ruud;What?! Why didn't you say so earlier?|Find her this instant! Don't let her get away!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, this is the location.
speak;Roy;This is where we're supposed to meet the mercenaries?
speak;Merlinus;Yes, though it seems they aren't here yet.|Wait, who's that? Someone seems to be coming this way...
speak;Elen;Oh forgive me! I'm in such a hurry...
speak;Roy;No need for apologies. Are you hurt?
speak;Elen;No, I'm fine. Thank you good sir.
speak;Elen;...Are you from Lycia by chance?
speak;Roy;I am. I am the son of Marquess Pherae.
speak;Elen;Oh, St. Elimine! Thank you for guiding me to this boy!
speak;Elen;Please, I need your help to rescue my mistress.

speak;Elen;My name is Elen. I am a cleric of the St. Elimine church.|My mistress and I came from Bern to seek an audience with the lords of Lycia.|However, Commander Ruud of the castle east of here trapped us.|We were captured, imprisoned by our own countrymen.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! We must avoid unneccesary entanglements with Bern!
speak;Roy;But we can't neglect a noble of Bern who wants to speak with the lords of Lycia.|...Then again, we can't simply charge into enemy territory either.|Wait, who's there!
speak;RedSoldier;There she is!|Over here boys! Get the girl!|Our orders say dead or alive!
speak;Roy;Well, Merlinus, they provoked hostilities.|I don't think we have any choice now.
speak;Merlinus;You wouldn't listen even if we did, I'm sure.{w}{br}But no matter. Let me witness all you've learned about tactics in Ostia.
speak;Roy;All right, everyone!|We're going to charge the castle!|Sister Elen, you should find a place to hide...
speak;Elen;No, I will come with you.|I cannot fight, but I can heal wounded allies.
speak;Elen;I'm the one that got you tangled up in this mess.|Please let me do what I can to help.
speak;Roy;OK, but just stay behind us so you aren't hurt.
speak;Elen;Certainly. Thank you for the concern.

name: DieckMercsArrive
_source: speak;Dieck;They should be around here somewhere... Shanna.
speak;Dieck;Check around and try to find the soldiers from Pherae, will you?
speak;Wade;So, big man. Who's our client this time?
speak;Dieck;House Pherae. One of the noble families of Lycia.{w} The Marquess's son is going to join the other lords of the Lycian league.
speak;Lot;We're going up against Bern then?
speak;Wade;Finally, a foe worthy of my axe!{w} Let's show 'em what we're made of!
speak;Lot;Bern, eh?{w} This won't be easy, I can tell you that.{w} We had best tread lightly.
speak;Shanna;I think I've found them!{w} But it looks like they're already caught up in a skirmish.
speak;Dieck;What? The fighting's started already?{w} Let's get a move on then. Time to earn our pay!

name: RoyDieckTalk
_source: speak;Dieck;Are you Lord Roy of house Pherae?
speak;Dieck;Name's Dieck.{w} You should have heard about me from an older man named Merlinus.
speak;Roy;So you're the leader of the mercenary band?
speak;Dieck;Just a small company really.|Sorry we're late. Didn't think the fighting would start so soon.
speak;Dieck;Don't take it the wrong way. We don't blame you.{w} Actually, quite the contrary.{w} My boys are excited for a chance to show off their skills.
speak;Roy;Brilliant.{w} It sounds like you're just the caliber of fighters we need.
speak;Dieck;Enough chitchat then. Let's wrap things up.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! There was a woman locked in the cellar!
speak;Roy;That must be Elen's mistress. Bring her here.
speak;Guinivere;Elen! I'm so relieved you're well.{w} You put yourself in such danger running off like you did...{w} I worried myself sick about you.
speak;Elen;I am sorry, Your Highness,{w} but I couldn't leave you in that dank cellar...
speak;Guinivere;Don't worry yourself Elen.{w} It's thanks to you I'm safe now.
speak;Guinivere;I am in your debt. May I ask your name...?
speak;Roy;I am Roy,{w} son of Eliwood, Marquess of Pherae.
speak;Guinivere;It's a pleasure...{w} As for myself...
speak;Elen;Your Highness... Are you certain you should?
speak;Roy;Guinivere?! That's the name of the princess of Bern!
speak;Merlinus;What?!|This was a trap wasn't it?!
speak;Merlinus;I beg your pardon, Lord Roy, but...
speak;Roy;I wish to hear her out.{w} Give her a chance, will you?
speak;Roy;You are truly Princess Guinivere from Bern?
speak;Guinivere;Yes, truly.{w} I cannot blame you for doubting me. however.

speak;Roy;Maybe you are the princess of Bern, and maybe you aren't.{w} I can see from your actions and dress that you are at least of high status.|If you are indeed Princess Guinivere, however, there is one thing I don't understand.|Elen told me you intended to meet with the lords of the Lycian League.
speak;Roy;Why, if you are the sister of the King of Bern?
speak;Guinivere;I want to find a peaceful way to end this war.{w} If I can speak to the Lycian council, I'm certain we can come to a solution.
speak;Roy;Your brother instigated this war.{w} Is it in your power to stop it?
speak;Guinivere;At the very least, I wish to do everything I can.{w} No, I MUST do everything I can.
speak;Roy;...I see.{w} For the time being, come with us to meet the Lycian League armies.|I want to see what Lord Hector thinks of this affair.
speak;Guinivere;You will allow me to accompany you?
speak;Roy;Yes, if there is any possibility to avoid further bloodshed, we must try.{w} It matters not how small the chance.
speak;Guinivere;Thank you! I truly am in your debt...

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail1;Armored knights have nearly impenetrable defenses.|But some weapons, like this sword, can pierce their armor.{w} I'm sure you can get better use of of it than us.{w} Please, take it.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;The weapon triangle...Swords, axes, and lances.{w} Remember, swords best axes, axes best lances, and lances best swords.{w} Keep this in mind and things will be much easier for you.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan1;Pegasi are useful for flying to hard-to-reach places.{w} But woe to any rider who finds herself against an archer.{w} An arrow can make short work of a pegasus!

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair1;Forts are the key to a good defense.{w} If you're in fort, you can defend and even dodge more easily.{w} On top of that, your wounds will heal slowly over time.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Just north of Pherae stands Castle Araphen.|The armies of Lycia had gathered here to make preparations to strike back at Bern.{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;Guinivere;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{br}However, when Roy and Guinivere are only a short distance from Castle Araphen,{w} a messenger brings them shocking news they can scarcely believe.|Leading Bern's army is a trio of elite commanders known as the Wyvern Generals,{w} named after the reptilian creatures native to Bern for their ferocity and cunning.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roy (Roy);Guinivere}{clear}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Brunnya (Brunnya);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;Narcian (Narcian);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;}Two of these three, Brunnya and Narcian, have attacked Castle Araphen,{w} virtually decimating the Lycian Army while it was little prepared.{w}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Brunnya (Brunnya);Narcian (Narcian)}{clear}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Morale of the group takes a blow, but Roy continues to Castle Araphen,|both to see it for himself and, hopefully, find and aid any survivors...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Brunnya;Your Majesty, we have captured the enemy commander.
speak;Hector Blood;You...You're Zephiel, the king of Bern! Black-hearted fiend...!

speak;Zephiel;Ah, Lord Hector.|You have my highest praise for lasting so long against two of my Wyvern Generals.|I suppose Ostia's reputation as the most powerful house in Lycia is well-earned.|The strongest of a bucket of worms is hardly a match for my boot, however.{w} Your end is nigh.|If you've any last words, I suggest you spit them out.
speak;Hector Blood;Bern and Lycia...|We were always on good terms with each other...|Even when you took the throne, we always paid our respects to Bern...

speak;Zephiel;Respect? Pah. Don't make me laugh.|The whole continent shall be my domain.{w} Only then can the world be liberated.|I lack the time to concern myself with such trivial matters as "respect".
speak;Hector Blood;You mean to liberate... the world?{w} What do you speak of?
speak;Zephiel;Pay it no heed. You won't live to see it anyway.{w} You there! Take him away!
speak;Zephiel;Throw this dead man into the dungeon!
speak;Brunnya;Your Majesty, I will take my leave now.{w} I must return to the plains of Sacae.
speak;Brunnya;...One matter before I leave, Your Majesty.|If you will allow my opinion, I would not place so much trust in that...{c:wait;500} woman.
speak;Brunnya;Yes, Your Majesty.|The men call her the "Dark Priestess" and find her presence disturbing.|I understand that she is a shaman of great power, but---
speak;Zephiel;Brunnya, do you doubt my judgement?
speak;Brunnya;Ah...!|No, of course not, Your Majesty! I just think---
speak;Zephiel;Your duty is not to think. Your duty is to follow orders.{w} Is that clear?
speak;Brunnya;...Yes, Your Majesty. Your will shall be done.
speak;Zephiel;"Do you doubt my judgement?"|Dear me the words that come out of my mouth sometimes...
speak;Chad;Yeah, probably. I saw some of Bern's soldiers take him into the castle.
speak;Roy;Chad, was it? Do you know the inside of Castle Araphen well?

speak;Chad;I guess so.|...Wait, are you guys going to try to save Lord Hector?{w} Sounds like a bad idea to me.|Most of Bern's forces are gone, but there are still plenty of soldiers in the castle.{w} Marching in would be suicide.
speak;Roy;Perhaps. But you said most of their army is already gone.{w} We can't afford to lose Lord Hector.{w} If we have a chance, we must take it.
speak;Chad;Really now...?|I'll come with you then. I can show you around the castle.
speak;Roy;What? You don't have to do that.{w} Please just explain what the interior of the castle is like.
speak;Chad;I've got a bone to pick with Bern.{w} Please, let me go with you!
speak;Roy;If you insist, we're happy to have you.{w} I think your skills will be an asset.
speak;Chad;Yeah, I can pick any locked doors or chests!
speak;Guinivere;...Lord Roy...|I'm sorry for my brother...|I didn't think the invasion would pick up so quickly...

speak;Roy;Princess, you're not responsible for this.|Please don't blame yourself.|Besides, Lycia is still united.{w} We just need Lord Hector to lead our army so we can fight!|We must retake Castle Araphen for all of Lycia...and for Lilina...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! We found Lord Hector in the dungeon!
speak;Roy;Lord Hector! That gaping wound...!|We must get you help! Here, lean on my shoulder...
speak;Hector Blood;Don't worry yourself... I'm done for...
speak;Hector Blood;We were taken by surprise...|We'd have never guessed that Bern had summoned dragons...
speak;Hector Blood;Yes...|The same dragons that humans fought against in the scouring...
speak;Roy;The Scouring? I learned of that in my studies.{w} Eons ago, dragon and human each had dominion of half of Elibe.{w} The Scouring was a war for total control of the continent...
speak;Hector Blood;Very good, lad...|The Eight Legends...{w} defeated the dragons and led the humans to...{w} victory...

speak;Hector Blood;I...{c:wait;500} haven't the faintest...|But...{c:wait;500} Bern was once the dragons' domain...|Hartmut, one of the Eight Legends...{c:wait;500} was the founder of Bern...|Perhaps...{c:wait;500}the reason...{c:wait;500}lies there...
speak;Hector Blood;Roy...{c:wait;500} Go to Ostia...|You must...{c:wait;500}lead what remains of the Lycian Army...{c:wait;500}in my place...
speak;Hector Blood;Fear not...{c:wait;500}in Ostia...{c:wait;500}is a weapon...{c:wait;500}that...{c:wait;500}can slay dragons...

speak;Hector Blood;Lilina can tell you more...{w} Please take care of her...|She...{c:wait;500}may act strong...{c:wait;500}but she is still a child...|Please...{c:wait;500}don't let...{c:wait;700}her...{c:wait;700}d...
speak;Hector Blood;...Lilina...{w} Let me...{c:wait;500}see you...{c:wait;500}just...{c:wait;500}once more...|Hrk...!!|{c:expression;Hector Blood;CloseEyes}...

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerWoman1;You're what's left of the Lycian army, aren't you?|Here, take this and go quickly.{w} We may be occupied by Bern, but we're still Lycians!

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;Chad;Lugh?! What are you doing here?
speak;Chad;Oh...|Where's everybody else? Are they all right?
speak;Lugh;Yeah, the St. Elimine Church is going to watch over them.
speak;Chad;What?! Lugh you're not thinking of...
speak;Lugh;I can use some magic! Remember I borrowed that fire tome from Poppa's room?
speak;Chad;Lugh, you can't. You're incapable of harming others.
speak;Chad;I'm going to avenge Poppa. You stay with the others Lugh.

speak;Lugh;I'm not going to hide anymore! I'm tired of everyone leaving me...!|Poppa, you, and even Raigh...|I want to fight to protect the people that I care for. I can't let others die for me my whole life!
speak;Chad;Lugh...|Fine! Once we finish Bern we can go back and see everyone again!
speak;Lugh;Excuse me! You're with the Lycian army right?{w} Please, let me fight with you!{w} I don't have any useful information, but I can use a bit of magic!{w} I'm sure I can help you!

name: SlaterFight
_source: speak;Slater;I-I can't fail! If I do...|...What awaits me...is a fate worse than death...!!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Respecting Hector's dying request, Roy makes his way west.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Hector Old}{c:add_portrait;Lilina (Lilina);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{br}Intent on reaching Lilina, Roy keeps a steady pace toward Ostia.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Lilina (Lilina)}{br}On his way there, Roy passes through the territory of Laus,{w} {c:add_portrait;Erik (Erik);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}governed by Lord Erik.|At a glance, Laus is a peaceful territory with vast meadows and clear streams.|Beneath this beauty, however, lies treachery and great skullduggery...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narcian;Lord Erik.|I don't think I've yet praised your wisdom in joining Bern.
speak;Erik;Thank you. My nation has never been anything but a burden to me anyway.
speak;Narcian;You, my friend, are wise beyond your years.{w} Now, where is that gift you promised me?{w} She does not seem to be here.
speak;Erik;Ah, yes! She is in her quarters.|She is exceedingly naive, you see.{w} When I told her she could meet her brother, she cooperated without question.|You there! Bring her here!
speak;Clarine;What is this hall?{w} Klein?{w} Where are you, brother?
speak;Narcian;I am Narcian, one of Bern's three Wyvern Generals.{w} My lovely little lass,{w} I think you will enjoy my company more than your brother's...
speak;Clarine;You compare yourself to my brother?{w} You think too highly of yourself?|Your hair, your garb--even your speech...|All a painfully obvious guise to hide your true lowborn face.
speak;Narcian;Lowborn?! Me!{w} You would compare ME to a peasant?!
speak;Clarine;Oh, heavens no.{w} I would sooner compare you to a filthy, disease-ridden mutt!
speak;Narcian;Y-you vermin! I'll see you suffer!
speak;RedSoldier;General Narcian,{w} we just recieved word that Castle Araphen was retaken by the enemy.
speak;RedSoldier;Err..His whereabouts are unknown, sir.|The enemy is reported to be Roy, son of Marquess Pherae.

speak;Narcian;Accursed interruptions!|Lord Erik, lock the girl in a cell.{w} I will give her the pleasure of my company when I return!|You, blockade the highroad from Ostia.{w} This Roy might just pass by. I want his head!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! The remaining soldiers from Laus are retreating.
speak;Roy;Thank you. Tell everyone to get some rest.
speak;Roy;I never would have thought that Lord Erik would turn on Lycia.|I thought the Lycian League's bond was stronger than this.|Cowardly Bern! Underhanded tactics!
speak;Roy;Oh... I'm sorry. I wasn't thinking about you...

speak;Roy;We'll now proceed west toward Ostia.{w} But now we know that even the other marquesses can't be trusted.|With Lord Hector gone, I fear there may be no peaceful end for this war.|Princess, do you plan on returning to Bern? If you need anything--
speak;Guinivere;No, please allow me to stay, if it would not be a burden.
speak;Roy;You, a burden? Never!{w} But why do you wish to stay?
speak;Guinivere;My brother is wrong.{w} He is pulling the dragons into a human war.|If he thinks this is how he can free the world, I must stop him.
speak;Guinivere;Yes, he has always been obsessed with "liberating the world."|He said that's the purpose of this war.

speak;Guinivere;I do not know...|My brother is not so power-hungry that he would attempt to conquer the world.{w} I'm sure he believes strongly in what he's done to Elibe.|Regardless, that doesn't excuse the violence he has caused...

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy1;Without a thief, you can't open doors and chests so easily.|Only thieves can use lockpicks.|But I have something called a door key, which will open any door.|Anyone can use it. You can have it.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;Money Man;We're all on your side.|We're not about to abandon the land in which we were born.|Please take this sword.{w} It was given to us generations ago. A gift from the marquess.

name: VisitVillage3
_source: speak;Money Man;I can't believe this war is happening...|We'll all suffer under Bern's iron-fisted rule.|But you just might be able to stop them.|Here is something that will help you fight a little longer.|Think carefully before using it.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan1;Bandits and pirates will attack nearby towns.|Once they loot a town, there's nothing left.|Visit the towns quickly and they might just share something good!

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMan1;There are mounted soldiers with bows in Laus' army.|They're from the nomad clans of Sacae.|Everyone wants their fighting prowess these days...

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;You know the weapon triangle, but did you know it doesn't apply to all weapons?|Some weapons completely reverse the weapon triangle.|For instance, you might find an axe that will work well against swords.

name: ErikFight
_source: speak;Erik;You fools are bound down by your allegiance!|Allow me to teach you the way of the world!

name: ErikDeath
_source: speak;Erik;Ha...ha ha... Fools... There is no future for...|those...who oppose...absolute power...

name: ClarineInPrison
_source: speak;Clarine;They will pay dearly for this treatment...
speak;Rutger;I'm a mercenary hired by Lord Erik. He wants to see you.
speak;Clarine;I will not. I refuse to meet with such churlish people.
speak;Clarine;Let go! You will regret this! Do you have any idea who I am?!

name: ClarineAppears
_source: speak;Clarine;Let go! Let go, I say!
speak;Rutger;Keep it down. You won't be able to make a clean escape making all that noise.
