speak;Rutger;I prepared a horse for you out back under a tree. Take it and go, while everyone's distracted.
speak;Rutger;I despise Bern with all my soul.
speak;Clarine;Saying that only piques my curiousity further.

speak;Clarine;I've never met such a boorish man!|This is a battlefield! A proper gentleman would escort a lady to her mansion!|Well, it's hardly of concern now.|Sigh, I only came here to see my brother, and now look at the mess I'm in...|What am I to do now?

name: PiratesAppear
condition: game.turncount==4 or game.turncount==6 or game.turncount ==8 or game.turncount ==10
_source: speak;Scollan;Heh... Foolish nobility. Always involved in some petty dispute.|'Course, you'll hear no complaints from us. Turmoil's how we make a living.|Heh heh heh...

name: RutgerandErikConvo
_source: speak;Erik;We need some backup. Take some troops and prepare for battle.
speak;Erik;Are you deaf? Go and fight!
speak;Rutger;I heard you. I'll leave when I'm ready.
speak;Erik;Tsk. Not the amiable sort, is he? If his sword arm is as skilled as the rumours say though, then it's no matter.

name: ClarineRecruitment
condition: unit.nid=="Clarine" and unit2.nid=="Roy" or (unit.nid=="Roy" and unit2.nid=="Clarine")
_source: speak;Clarine;Do you see anyone else?{w} You are the leader of this little group, are you not?
speak;Clarine;Most convenient. Very well then.{w} You will protect me.
speak;Clarine;Hard of hearing?{w} I said that you will protect me from harm.
speak;Clarine;Away with you, peasant. I was not addressing you.
speak;Roy;Calm yourself, Merlinus...|It looks like she's being pursued by the castle's soldiers.{w} That's why she wants us to guard her. Right?
speak;Merlinus;Im...Impudent child!{w} We can't simply accept any useless girl into our army!
speak;Clarine;You may call me Lady Clarine, peasant.{w} And I am not useless!{w} I can use staves to heal wounded allies.
speak;Clarine;...If that's what it takes!{w} I suppose I can't simply demand protection without some form of payment.
speak;Roy;Thanks, we appreciate it!{w} Our enemy is Bern, so we need everyone we can get.|I'm Roy. Pleased to meet you, Lady Clarine.
speak;Clarine;Ahem! Let's focus on the issue at hand.

name: RutgerRecruitment
_source: speak;Clarine;"Still here?"|You abandoned me in the middle of a battlefield!{w} How can you have the nerve to say that?!{w} I could have been killed!
speak;Rutger;I guess you're lucky you're still alive then.{w} Did you want something or can I go now?
speak;Clarine;Just a moment! I shan't allow you to abandon me twice.|A gentleman must take responsibility for his actions.
speak;Rutger;Responsibility? For what?{w} I saved you from that twisted sadist.
speak;Clarine;If a gentleman rescues a lady, he must also escort her to her mansion!{w} In what fairy tale does some barf of a man abandon his princess?
speak;Rutger;...What in the world are you on about?
speak;Clarine;Besides, you said you "despise Bern with all your soul."|If you ask me, you'd be better off joining us.{w} We'll be fighting Bern, you know.
speak;Rutger;What? Wait!{w} Is that true?{w} Is that army you're in really going to challenge Bern?
speak;Clarine;Yes... Our leader, Floyd or whatever his name is,{w} told me so himself.
speak;Clarine;Wait!|My protection is more important than fighting Bern! Come back!

name: OpenGate
_source: speak;VillagerMan1;Oh, I heard you were coming. I'll open the gate now.
speak;Dory;What? There was a gate there?|Cunning little weaklings...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Marquess Laus had been working with Bern against his allies in Lycia.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Erik (Erik)}{c:wait;400}{br}Roy realizes that the leaders of Lycia, his homeland, can no longer be trusted.|Still heading for Ostia, Roy moves through a treacherous mountain pass...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;GenericBandit1;Boss!|Our boys just got back from scouting the village.
speak;Dory;Then let's go get our tribute.
speak;GenericBandit1;But Boss, something's different today.|There's an army stationed real close to use!|They say it looks like the Lycian army.
speak;Dory;Lycia? Then there's nothing to worry about.|They were almost wiped out by Bern.|We can handle a few battered soldiers.
speak;Dory;They've probably got some valuables on them too!|Still, don't get careless.|Ready, then? Let's mop up these losers, boys!
speak;Merlinus;A villager is here to see you, Lord Roy.|Hey, you, wait just a second...
speak;Money Man;Are you Lord Roy of House Pherae?
speak;Roy;Yes. How may I help you?
speak;Money Man;Milord, I beg you!|Please, rid us of the bandits terrorizing our village!
speak;Money Man;There's a group of bandits that made their base in the castle near the cliffs.
speak;Money Man;They fled once they heard that the Lycian army was defeated by Bern...|We villagers were left on our own.|Our days are spent in fear of bandit attacks.
speak;Money Man;We have no one else we can ask. Please, help us!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, we must keep our pace towards Ostia...
speak;Roy;Yes, I know.|But we can't simply ignore people in need of help!
speak;Money Man;You will help us?! Thank you!|Please use the gate to the west.|It'll take you right to the castle.
speak;Money Man;I'll arrange for the gate to be opened when you approach.
speak;Roy;Merlinus! We're going to the castle to drive off the bandits!
speak;Merlinus;Sigh...{w} Youthful energy. Where does it come from?

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy!|A priest from the St. Elimine Church wants an audience with you...|and Princess Guinivere!
speak;Roy;He knew that Princess Guinievere was with us?
speak;Guinivere;Roy, I will be fine. I wish to meet this priest.
speak;Guinivere;Tensions between my brother and the church have worsened as of late.{w} I do not believe that they would attempt anything underhanded.
speak;Roy;I see. Merlinus, allow this priest in.
speak;Saul;Lord Roy, it is a pleasure to meet you at last.{w} I am Saul, an acolyte of the St. Elimine Church.
speak;Saul;Oh...|You must be Princess Guinivere!|You are as beautiful as the rumours say!
speak;Saul;Ahem... Forgive me.|Your Highness, I wish to know the location of the Fire Emblem.|You have it with you, do you not?
speak;Saul;Bern's head church tells us the Fire Emblem disappeared from the Shrine of Seals.|And you also went missing at exactly the same time.
speak;Saul;I was sent by the church to confirm the truth.|Why did you take the Fire Emblem?
speak;Guinivere;...I wished to stop my brother.
speak;Saul;Your brother...{w} Zephiel, the king of Bern.
speak;Saul;Do you know what the Fire Emblem is used for?

speak;Guinivere;...It's the key that awakens a sword that was used to slay the dragons long ago.{w} That was what my father told me anyway.|I am unsure how exactly the Fire Emblem or the sword work.|My brother seemed to worry about the Fire Emblem falling into enemy hands.|...Extraordinarily so.|
speak;Saul;So you took the Fire Emblem to make the king believe it fell into enemy hands?|All in an attempt to stop his conquest?
speak;Saul;And what will you do now?
speak;Guinivere;...Must I reveal my plan at this moment?
speak;Saul;Ah, so Your Highness has a plan.
speak;Guinivere;Yes.{w} I have not given up hope of settling this war without further bloodshed.
speak;Saul;I see. In that case, I will accompany you on your journey.|If Roy allows it.

name: DoryFight
_source: speak;Dory;No one's ever survived a blow from axe!| Hey, you. Wanna see why?

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail1;This whole area is really perfect for bandits. It's no wonder they appeared.|They can cross mountains and a bandit on a peak is a force to be reckoned with.|Dreadful. Just dreadful...

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan1;I was there when Araphen was taken...|The wyvern riders of Bern were terrifying enough...|But then a dragon engulfed the Lycian Army in flame...|Oh Elimine, please tell me it was a dream...

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman1;If you can, try to occupy forts!|That'll stop enemy reinforcements from showing up!

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan1;Hold on. Before you go, take this lance with you.|It was once wielded by a knight called Sir Gant.|The stories say he bested many a foe with this lance!

name: SaulAndDorothyConvo
_source: speak;Yoder;Thank you, Dorothy. Please tell Brother Saul as well.
speak;Dorothy;But where did Saul run off to now?|How am I supposed to guard him if he keeps disappearing?
speak;VillagerGirlPonytail1;Er... Brother Saul, I appreciate the offer, but not tonight...
speak;Saul;Come now, don't be like that.|We can sit by the fire in the dark of night as I soothe you with my calming sermons...
speak;Saul;Oh my... Look what you've done now, Dorothy.
speak;Saul;That expression on your face scared her away.
speak;Dorothy;This is my normal look!|Saul, you can't try to woo every girl you meet.
speak;Saul;You make it sound like a bad thing!|I simply offer my helping hand to any poor souls in need.
speak;Dorothy;Then why do you always offer to give your sermons at night?
speak;Saul;...Well, putting that aside...|Did you have some reason for interrupting my good work?
speak;Dorothy;Oh, right.|The Lycian army is apparently somewhere around here.
speak;Saul;Truly?! Is Princess Guinivere still with them?
speak;Dorothy;Yes, if the reports from the St. Elimine Church are accurate.
speak;Saul;Then we must make haste! Let us join them.
speak;Dorothy;You only want to join them because Princess Guinivere is said to be so beautiful.
speak;Saul;Don't be ridiculous... Come now, hurry along.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Sword,Iron Sword,Slim Lance,Iron Lance,Javelin,Iron Axe,Hand Axe,Iron Bow;armory

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;...You're the granddaughter of one of the chieftains of Sacae?
speak;Sue;My grandfather is the strongest warrior in Sacae.|People call him the Silver Wolf.
speak;Roy;The Silver Wolf... I've heard tales of him.|But what are you doing in Lycia? This is a long way from Sacae.
speak;Sue;Bern invaded Sacae, so the Kutolah clan decided to take up arms.|Grandfather had the women and children escape to Lycia, but...
speak;Sue;There was a traitor.|The Djute clan, who turned to Bern's side, ambushed us.
speak;Sue;We were all separated.|I found my way into this land and was rescued by Lord Orun.|But Wagner, his advisor, assassinated Lord Orun and took over the castle.
speak;Roy;And that's when you were captured...
speak;Roy;Yes. We will fight for as long as it takes.
speak;Sue;Then let me join you.|Fighting Bern may lead me to Grandfather.|Lord Orun deserves vengeance as well.
speak;Roy;We're headed for Ostia, in the west.|Sacae is in the east, the opposite direction. Is that alright?
speak;Sue;I don't mind.|No matter where we are, Mother Earth and Father Sky watch over me.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! The spy I sent to Ostia has just returned.|He says Ostia is in a state of anarchy!
speak;Merlinus;There's been a rebellion among those who want to surrender to Bern.
speak;Merlinus;The spy says that she has been taken hostage.|The rebels already took over Castle Ostia and are fighting the loyalist soldiers.
speak;Roy;We must hurry to Ostia! Lilina... Please be safe!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After taking Saul, a priest of St. Elimine, and Dorothy, his bodyguard, into their ranks,{w}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Saul (Saul);Dorothy (Dorothy)} Roy and company enter Thria, southeast of Ostia.|Thria is governed by Lord Orun, Hector's cousin.{w}{clear}Orun's home castle seems a safe place to stay.{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;}{clear}As such, Roy expects a night of quiet rest for his troops.|However, even Thria is within Bern's influence...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Cath;I snuck in here no problem, but there's nothing worth stealing!|Hmm, looks like the north hall has all the valuables, but with that security--|...Are those footsteps?
speak;Wagner;I trust everything is under control.
speak;RedSoldier;Yes, Sir Wagner, the soldiers are stationed around the castle.
speak;Wagner;Once they're inside and have their guard down, ambush them, just as with Lord Orun.
speak;Wagner;I want Princess Guinivere alive.|The rest you can do with as you wish.|Now go.
speak;Wagner;Ha ha ha ha...|First the Silver Wolf's granddaughter, and now Princess Guinivere...|With so much to offer, Bern is certain to allow us to join them.
speak;Merlinus;Finally we can get a good night's rest, Lord Roy!
speak;Roy;I wonder.|That man said he was Lord Orun's advisor...|
speak;Merlinus;Wagner? Did something seem wrong with him?
speak;Roy;He seemed to be in control of everything, as if he were the lord.|And Lord Orun is so ill he can't even meet his guests?|It all seems strange...
speak;Merlinus;Now that you mention it, you have a point.
speak;Saul;Excuse me, Lord Roy.{w} There seem to be an awful lot of soldiers patrolling the castle.
speak;Dorothy;I think they're spying on us.
speak;Cath;Aw, I'm not one to talk about myself.|I overheard that Wagner guy in the main hall though.|He said they're gonna ambush you guys.
speak;Roy;Lord Orun would never do that!
speak;Cath;Oh yeah, he's dead, I think.|Wagner assassinated him or something.
speak;Cath;He wants to capture you all and turn you over to Bern.
speak;Merlinus;Wait, Lord Roy!|We can't trust her word so easily!
speak;Cath;It's up to you whether you trust me or not.|But don't say I didn't warn ya!
speak;Guinivere;Roy... If what she says is true...
speak;Roy;Let's spring his trap. We'll pretend like we're leaving.|If Wagner is after us, he'll try to persuade us to stay.
speak;Cath;If you wanna get out, go through the North Hall!|That'll bring you to the courtyard, so you'll be outta here in no time.|Good Luck!
speak;Wagner;Oh, Lord Roy! Where are you off to?|I will escort you back into the castle.{w} Please follow me.
speak;Roy;My apologies, Sir Wagner.|I have just recieved a report of grave importance.|Please excuse us, but we must take our leave now.
speak;Wagner;Surely you would appreciate a warm bed after being in the field for so long.|Lord Orun would be furious with me if you left without accepting our hospitality.
speak;Roy;Don't worry, I shall tell Lord Orun myself that you are not to blame.{w} I ought to at least offer him a greeting anyway.|Please show us to his room.
speak;Wagner;As I said, milord, Lord Orun is ill and cannot accept guests.
speak;Roy;If we cannot see him, then we must be off.
speak;Wagner;There's nothing I can offer to make you stay?
speak;Wagner;You leave me no choice then!|Guards! Attack!|Kill them all, but leave Princess Guinivere alive!
speak;Roy;The girl was right! They were trying to ambush us!
speak;Saul;Lord Roy!|If we go this way, we'll be leaving our rear open to attack!
speak;Roy;Then we'll seize the whole castle!|Everyone, follow my lead!
#move roy and wagner+guards back to starting positions

name: SuePrison
_source: speak;Sue;All that noise...|A battle? What is going on out there?

name: CathAppears
_source: speak;Cath;Hoo-boy, they're at each other's throats now.|Time to pilfer what I can now that security's busy.

name: SueRecruitment
_source: speak;Roy;What's a girl doing in here?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. Who are you?
speak;Sue;I am Sue.{w} Are you the one causing that noise outside.
speak;Roy;Oh, I guess so.|We're fighting the castle guards.|It's a bit of a long story...
speak;Sue;I see.{w} Then I will join your side.
speak;Sue;The soldiers of this castle have wronged me.
speak;Sue;Please give me a bow.{w} I will fight with you.

name: Reinforcements1
condition: game.current_mode.nid=='Hard' and (game.turncount==5 or game.turncount==10 or game.turncount==15)

name: ThroneRoomReinforcements
condition: game.current_mode.nid=='Hard' and (game.turncount==8 or game.turncount==12 or game.turncount==16)

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair1;Look at this great bow I made.|It fires arrows much farther than a normal bow!|Very useful, don't you think? Of course you do.|You can have it. I want it to go to good use.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;Oh, this? This is a torch staff.{w} It creates light in foggy places.|If you're in fog, you can't attack anything you can't see.|This should be helpful if you ever find yourself in that situation.

name: VisitVillage3
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana1;Would you like to buy some elixir? It'll patch your wounds right up!|The recipe is top secret... Don't ask, because I'm not telling!|What's that? You don't want any?|Here, I'll give you a free sample!{w} You won't be disappointed.

name: VisitVillage4
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair1;Cavaliers, paladins... Mounted knights like those.|This lance is incredibly effective against such soldiers.|There are many horsemen in the rebel army, so use this against them!

name: VisitVillage5
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail1;Ostia is Lycia's greatest city! But now look at it...|What did you say? You're out to restore our former glory?|Then please, take this gem...|It'll fetch a high price at any store!|Just use the money to help Ostia!

name: VisitVillage6
_source: speak;VillagerLittleGirl1;Are you going to help Lady Lilina?|Here's a staff that can heal injuries from a distance!|If Lady Lilina's hurt, please heal her...

name: VisitVillage7
_source: speak;BlueSoldier;General Leygance has allied himself with Bern!|He had all who resisted him killed... I escaped, though.|Please take this. It's a Hero crest.|Give this to an experienced hero, and fight to save Ostia...

name: VisitVillage8
_source: speak;VillagerWoman1;A while back, I saw a man dying in the street.|I helped him out, and he gave me this sword.|Really strange person, but kind... Hm? This is the sword.|You can have it! Take good care of it.

name: Armory1
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Sword,Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Iron Blade,Hatchet,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Hand Axe;armory

name: Armory2
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Lance,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Javelin,Iron Bow,Steel Bow;armory

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Hearing of rebellion, Roy hurries his pace towards Ostia.{w}{c:wait;600}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;300}{c:add_portrait;Leygance (Leygance);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{c:wait;200}{clear}According to his information, General Leygance, an advisor to Hector,{w}{c:add_portrait;Debias (Debias);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)} organized a rebellion with his lieutenant, Debias, to surrender to Bern.{w}{c:wait;600}{c:remove_portrait;Debias (Debias)}{c:add_portrait;Lilina (Lilina);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{clear}Leygance keeps Lilina hostage in Castle Ostia, thinking she may be of use later.{w}{c:wait;600}{c:remove_portrait;Leygance (Leygance)}{c:wait;500}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;right;OpenEyes}{clear}Roy and company enter Ostia in an effort to rescue Lilina.{w}{clear}Ostia, the largest and most populous city in Lycia, is to become a battlefield...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Debias;Yes, General. The townspeople are no trouble.|But the Ilian mercenaries that Hector hired still refuse to join us.
speak;Legance;What more do they want? We already said we'd pay more!
speak;Debias;Ilia's mercenary knights are famously loyal.
speak;Legance;I know that you bloated imbecile!
speak;Legance;But General Narcian will arrive soon!|If we don't have Ostia under our control by then,|he'll never take us seriously!

speak;Legance;Lilina may make for a valuable bargaining chip with the mercenaries...|If her life is in danger, they should surrender.|But that must be a last resort.|First we must attempt to beat them into submission.|The wyvern riders Bern sent us should prove invaluable!|Debias, I want the mercenaries pacified and the castle gate secured.|I will be inside the castle readying our defenses.
speak;Roy;How many of Ostia's troops have joined the rebellion?
speak;Merlinus;Quite a large majority, I'm afraid.|They've forgotten their fealty to Lord Hector.|They all simply gave in to Bern because they're afraid.|It's a disgrace, I tell you.
speak;Merlinus;But it's not all bad news, Lord Roy!|There's a band of mercenaries from Ilia that wish to join us to stop the rebels.
speak;Merlinus;Oh, yes.|They signed a contract with Lord Hector to fight Bern alongside Ostia.
speak;Roy;They could be a great help.|But do they know Lord Hector has passed away?|Isn't their contract void now that he's gone?
speak;Merlinus;I would have thought so, too, Lord Roy.|They told me themselves however that they heard of Lord Hector's passing.|They're still eager to fight with us.
speak;Guinivere;They're only mercenaries.{w} Why would they go so far?

speak;Merlinus;Ilia is a frozen land with a harsh climate so the land is very infertile.|And so, mercenary contracts are a major source of income in Ilia.|Ilian mercenaries are said to never betray their employers, no matter what.{w} It seems that's true indeed.
speak;Roy;Then they should be powerful allies.

speak;Merlinus;I agree! Fortune is still with us!|But...the mercenary I spoke to also had some bad news.|He said one of the three Wyvern Generals is headed here with a legion of wyvern riders.|Should they aid the rebels, our chance of victory will be all but gone.
speak;Guinivere;Roy... What are you going to do?
speak;Roy;...The Kingdom of Etruria might help us.
speak;Roy;General Cecilia, Mage General of Etruria, was my teacher in tactics at Ostia.|I feel she may join forces with us if we ask.
speak;Merlinus;I object, Lord Roy!|If we have Etruria solve this Lycian matter, our reputation with them will never recover!
speak;Roy;That may be so...|But this is a matter of life or death for Lycia.|We must ask for help, for if we don't,{w} Lycia as we know it may become just a memory.
speak;Roy;But we must act quickly!{w} I've already penned a letter to General Cecilia.|Merlinus, I need you to send the letter to her right away.
speak;Merlinus;...Yes, Lord Roy! I trust your judgment.|I shall send it this instant.
speak;Roy;With any luck, she'll make it in time.|Get ready for combat, soldiers! We will retake Ostia!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;The city is finally under control.
speak;Roy;Now let us retake Castle Ostia and rescue Lilina!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, I understand your apprehension,{w} but please be patient!{w} We still need to break down the castle gate.
speak;Merlinus;Speaking of Lady Lilina.{w} What do you think of what Lord Hector said?
speak;Roy;You mean about the dragons?|They were real, not just myth...|Lord Hector was one of the greatest tacticians in Lycia.|And yet his army was defeated in the blink of an eye...
speak;Merlinus;Bern's army is perhaps the strongest in Elibe.|I say, those wyvern riders were indeed very formidable opponents.

speak;Roy;Of course the wyvern riders must have been difficult enough.|But the dragons...{c:wait;500} I can't even conceive how powerful they must be.|Lord Hector mentioned a weapon that is effective against dragons...|I wonder where it's hidden.
speak;Merlinus;I presume it must be one of the legendary weapons.
speak;Roy;If we can obtain those,{w} we might have a fighting chance against the dragons.|But I do wonder what a legendary weapon is doing in Ostia.
speak;Merlinus;Perhaps Lady Lilina knows the answer.{w} I'm curious as well.{w} Oh!|Lord Roy, our men have finished knocking down the gate.|We can enter now!
speak;Roy;All right! Forward charge!|Rescue Lilina, no matter the cost!

name: DebiasFight
_source: speak;Debias;You...you beat Bern's wyvern riders!?|Ergh... I'll not let you pass!

name: DebiasDeath
_source: speak;Debias;General Leygance... Please be cautious...|These people are...{c:wait;500}powerful...

name: RoyZelotConvo
_source: speak;Roy;Excuse me, are you sir Zelot of the Ilian mercenaries?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy.|I lead the army that's fighting the rebels.
speak;Roy;I'm here because Lord Hector asked me to be.
speak;Zelot;Lord Hector... We've lost a great man.|He was a true warrior.
speak;Roy;We have to retake Ostia. For Lord Hector!|And for Lilina...
speak;Zelot;I concur.|We'll offer what help we can.
speak;Zelot;Save the thanks for after we've retaken the castle.|Come! We must concentrate on the enemy now!

name: RoyRecruitsNoah
_source: speak;Roy;Are you one of the Ilian mercenaries?
speak;Noah;Sure am. Can I help you?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. I lead the Lycian army.
speak;Noah;Oh! I heard about you...|I'm supposed to take orders from you now.
speak;Roy;Are you sure that's all right?
speak;Roy;Don't you have to check in with your commander...?
speak;Noah;He told us we're joining the Lycian army.{w} That's enough for me.
speak;Roy;But did he mean like this?
speak;Noah;This is a battlefield.|There's no time to check everything with the commander.|As long as I'm following orders, and I am, I can play it by ear.
speak;Roy;I see. Thanks for the help.

name: NoahZelot
condition: (unit1.nid=='Zelot' and (unit2.nid=='Noah' and game.get_unit('Noah').team=='other')) or (unit1.nid=='Noah' and (unit2.nid=='Zelot' and game.get_unit('Zelot').team=='player'))
_source: speak;Zelot;I heard you were coaching a girl in swordplay.
speak;Noah;Yes...|She was inexperienced and naive, so I felt obligated.
speak;Noah;She left. She said she was heading to the Western Isles.
speak;Zelot;Pity. I thought she might have been of some help were she still here.|But you, a coach?{w} Since when do you care about other people?|It's very unlike you.
speak;Zelot;Oh, yes.|I even joked with Trec saying that you fancied the lass.|But THAT wouldn't be like you in the least, now would it?

name: ZelotRecruitsTreck
_source: speak;Zelot;Treck, we're now in service to the Lycian army.
speak;Zelot;Not the most enthusiastic response.{w} You don't like the idea?
speak;Zelot;Oh, well, all right then. Get to it then.
speak;Treck;Lycia, huh...?{w} Eh, it should all work out.

name: RoyRecruitsTreck
_source: speak;Roy;Are you one of the Ilian mercenaries?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. I lead the Lycian army.
speak;Treck;Oh, I'll take your orders from now on then.
speak;Roy;You don't have to check in with your commander first?
speak;Treck;Oh. Nah.|He already said we're joining the Lycian Army.
speak;Treck;Really, it's fine. This is a battle.|There's no time to check every little thing with the commander.|It's not as though I'm going against his orders anyway.

name: NoahRecruitsZelot
_source: speak;Zelot;Ah, Noah.|I heard you were at the arena.
speak;Zelot;Don't worry yourself... Things are just getting started.|I haven't even spoken with the Lycian Army's commander yet.
speak;Noah;Oh?{w} Actually, I just spoke to him.
speak;Zelot;Really?|Then we'll take any commands he gives from now on.|Noah, I leave further negotiations with the Lycian League to you.

name: TreckRecruitsZelot
_source: speak;Treck;I just met with the commander of the Lycian army.
speak;Zelot;Ah, did you?|Then we'll take any commands he gives from now on.|Treck, I leave further negotiations with the Lycian League to you.

name: DebiasHintsReinforcements
_source: speak;Debias;The reinforcements should be arriving from the south soon.|Heh heh... I want to see the look on their faces when they get hit from behind!

name: ZelotAndTreckAppear
_source: speak;Zelot;It looks like the Lycian Army has commenced a counterattack on the rebels.|Let's join them and quell this shameful little rebellion!
speak;Treck;Uhhhh, I think he went to the arena a little while ago.|He said he's coaching some girl in swordplay.
speak;Zelot;Noah, a coach?{w} That's not like him...|Has he made a little girlfriend, I wonder? Ha ha.|Well, no matter. He can catch up with us later.

name: NoahAppears
_source: speak;Noah;Looks like they've started attacking the rebels.|I need to get going Fir.
speak;Fir;Thank you for helping me, Sir Noah.
speak;Noah;Of course.|I sure was surprised when you came up to me though.|Not many people would challenge someone to a match so quickly like that.
speak;Fir;I-I'm sorry, Sir Noah.|I'd never fought in the arena before...
speak;Noah;If you'd asked anyone else, you'd be dead now.|You need to look your opponent over carefully before choosing a fight.
speak;Fir;And I must have the humility to surrender if it means I'll lose.
speak;Noah;Exactly.|You can always get your money back, but don't throw your life away.
speak;Noah;What will you do now?|Will you stay here and continue practicing the sword?
speak;Fir;No. I'm going to the Western Isles.
speak;Fir;They're constructing a new mine, so there are many new workers headed there.|Miners are strong, so it's no doubt an ideal place to find new opponents to challenge.|And besides...
speak;Fir;The Western Isles is where my mother first met my father.|She's passed on,{w} but at my age she traveled around the world training herself.
speak;Noah;So that's it...{w} You surprise me again.
speak;Noah;I thought all you wanted was to become strong.|I didn't realize you were following in your mother's footsteps.|You do have a cute side after all!
speak;Fir;...Sir Noah!{w} Please don't tease me!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Ostia's military primarily consists of soldiers in heavy armor.|With them, Castle Ostia has always been famously secure.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Hector Old}{br}For countless years, the castle has been said to be impregnable.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left}{br}However, the rumors are about to be proven wrong by Roy, who, ironically,{w} only does so for the castle's own protection...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)

speak;Leygance;The enemy has broken into the castle?!|How could Debias have failed against them?!|Were those Ilian mercenaries that skilled?|...Or was the Lycian Army larger than we expected...?|Whatever the case, they have broken into the impregnable Castle Ostia!
speak;Leygance;We must defeat them here, or we'll be a laughing stock in Bern...|You over there!
speak;Leygance;Have the troops take defensive positions throughout the castle!|Particularly around the throne room!|We must not allow the Lycian Army any further into the castle!
speak;Leygance;One other matter.|I want you to have Lilina quietly assassinated during the battle.
speak;RedSoldier;What?{w} ...I thought we were to keep her alive.
speak;Leygance;I felt she might make a valuable hostage.|But many of our rebel soldiers still swear loyalty to her.|If we openly use her as a hostage, those soldiers may turn.
speak;RedSoldier;If that's the case, General, would they not also turn if we assassinate her?
speak;Leygance;That's why I said to do it quietly, isn't it?!|Kill her discreetly,{w} and say that she was hit by a stray arrow.|We can hold the enemy responsible! Now go!
speak;Astolfo;...General Roy of Pherae, I presume?
speak;Astolfo;No, no, I'm on your side.{w} My name is Astolfo.|I used to work here in the service of the Marquess.
speak;Merlinus;What kind of work were you doing exactly?|You certainly aren't dressed like a servant...
speak;Astolfo;A bit nosy, don't you think, old man?|I'm a spy, see.|I gather information, steal things, check on people... Things like that.
speak;Astolfo;I'm not much of a spy if you can tell I work for a noble at first glance, am I?

speak;Astolfo;I've been running around Lycia gathering intelligence for about a month now.|When I heard about Araphen, I got back as quickly as my legs would allow.|And what do I find but those muttonheads Leygance and Debias inciting rebellion!|I couldn't save Lord Hector, but I won't let them take Lady Lilina.
speak;Roy;Then you'll join us?{w} Do you know where Lilina is?
speak;Astolfo;Of course.{w} Finding that stuff out is my job.|Lady Lilina is locked in a small room in the heart of the castle.|And Leygance is sitting on the throne like he owns the place.
speak;Roy;We have to hurry then.|We must defeat the rebels and save Lilina before Narcian arrives from Bern!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Bors']

name: LilinaPrison
_source: speak;Lilina;What's all that noise? Is there a battle going on?|I wish I could see outside this chamber...

name: OstiaKnightsAppear
_source: speak;Ogier;Sir Barthe, it's a dead end!
speak;Barthe;This wall has cracks in it.|We can break it down if we hit it with our weapons.
speak;Gwendolyn;I wonder where Lady Lilina is.
speak;Barthe;I have a pretty good idea of where she might be.|I've known this castle for a long time.|I do wonder what's causing all the noise, though.
speak;Gwendolyn;The Lycian army, perhaps?|My brother must be with them...
speak;Barthe;...We can't be sure he's still alive.|You had best keep your hopes low.
speak;Ogier;Sir Barthe, must you be so aloof?|Bors is Gwendolyn's only brother.
speak;Barthe;We must always stand firmly in reality.
speak;Gwendolyn;It's all right, Ogier. Sir Barthe is right.
speak;Barthe;As a knight of Ostia, you must always remain calm.|It matters not how grave the situation.|Understood, Gwendolyn?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Bors']

name: CathAppears
_source: speak;Cath;Oh baby!|Just as I thought. They're at it again.|How stupid can these nobles get?|I'll never understand what fun it is fighting all the time.|Oh well. I'll take the opportunity to swipe what I can.

name: LilinaRoyTalk
_source: speak;Lilina;You came! Thank you so much.
speak;Roy;I'm so glad you're unhurt.{w} Here, take this spell tome.|Use it to defend yourself for the time being.

name: LilinaBarthTalk
_source: speak;Barthe;Lady Lilina! I am overjoyed to see you safe.
speak;Lilina;Barthe, you were right.{w} Leygance was planning this rebellion.
speak;Lilina;I'm sorry...|If only I'd trusted your word, this would not have happened.

speak;Barthe;No...|Lady Lilina, you have nothing to apologize for.|Leygance betrayed your kindness and trust.|He is the one responsible for this.|It is your undying kindness that we soldiers respect the most, milady.

name: BorsGwendolynTalk
_source: speak;Bors;Is that you, Gwendolyn?|I'm so glad to see you in one piece.
speak;Bors;Wha...!?{w} What...{c:wait;500}what's that you're wearing?!|Did you join up with the Ostian knights?
speak;Gwendolyn;Ah... Actually, yes.{w} I was just knighted yesterday.
speak;Bors;What are you thinking...?|I told you to leave the fighting to me and live as you wish!|You didn't need to become a knight...
speak;Gwendolyn;Yes, well,{w} I thought about it, and I realized that this is what I want.
speak;Gwendolyn;I don't want to sit idly by and wait for you to return from battle.|I want to be a great knight, just like you.
speak;Bors;You've always been a stubborn one, Gwendolyn.
speak;Bors;Live as you wish.|If Mother and Father were alive, I'm certain they'd say the same...|But the life of a knight is never easy!
speak;Gwendolyn;Yes, I'm prepared! I'm ready for the challenge!

name: LilinaBorsTalk
_source: speak;Lilina;Bors, I'm sorry that I worried you.
speak;Bors;Not at all, milady! You are well...|That in itself is enough for me.
speak;Lilina;Thank you, Bors.|And you kept your promise to protect Roy.|I knew I could depend on you.

name: LeyganceFight
_source: speak;Leygance;Dogs of the Lycian Army... Come.|I shall cut you down where you stand!

name: LeyganceDeath
_source: speak;Leygance;How? You will only...{c:wait;500}be crushed by Bern...|How can you fight with such conviction...?

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;We've finally retaken the castle, Lilina.
speak;Lilina;Thank you, Roy.|I'm glad that my father didn't have to go to the trouble.
speak;Lilina;Roy, is my father still in Araphen?|I heard there was a horrible battle there, but how much longer will he be?
speak;Roy;I'm sorry...{w} By the time we arrived at Castle Araphen...|It was already under Bern's control.
speak;Lilina;It's not your fault...{w} Don't apologize.
speak;Roy;Lord Hector had been fatally wounded when we arrived.|If only we had gotten there sooner, we could have helped him...
speak;Lilina;No...{w} I...{c:wait;500}was prepared for this...|I'm the daughter of a warrior.|I've been taught to steel myself in times such as these.
speak;Lilina;Everybody kept it from me...{c:wait;500} They didn't want to hurt me...|But I'm strong...{c:wait;500} I can handle this...
speak;Roy;Lilina, you don't have to hold back.
speak;Roy;We'll get through this...{c:wait;500} I'm here for you
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! Bern's wyvern riders are in front of Castle Ostia!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Roy vowed to protect Lilina forever.|With Bern coming full force however, Roy's army is no equal.|Therefore, he decides to try and obtain a legendary weapon.|He thinks it best to obtain it before Bern manages to get their hands on it.|Lilina shows them to a cave on the outskirts of Ostia,|where a legendary weapon is hidden.|The cave, located at the foot of a volcano, will be no small obstacle for Roy...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;GenericBandit1;B-Boss! An army's in the cave!
speak;Henning;What?!|How many of them are there?
speak;GenericBandit1;Dunno, Boss. Not too many, I hope...
speak;Henning;It's strange, though...|The lords of Lycia have bigger fish to fry than bandits like us.
speak;GenericBandit1;Well? What do we do now?
speak;Henning;I don't expect they know much about this cave.|Just lure them onto the lava geysers and get rid of 'em.
speak;Lilina;Roy, this way!|The legendary weapon is on the other side of this crevice.
speak;Roy;Lilina, are you all right? Have you already come to terms with everything?
speak;Lilina;Well... maybe not just yet. But I can't afford to be in sorrow.|Ostia needs me to protect it, just as it needed my father before me.
speak;Roy;I'm just glad you're alright, Lilina.
speak;Lilina;Only because you're with me, Roy...
speak;Lilina;No, nothing.|Let me tell you what I know about the weapon.|The sword here was used by Roland himself, one of the Eight Legends.
speak;Roy;Roland... The first marquess of Ostia?
speak;Lilina;Exactly. He's my ancestor.|This sword is called Durandal, the Blazing Sword.
speak;Roy;Durandal... The name has a strange echo to it.|So Roland used Durandal to fight the dragons during the Scouring?

speak;Lilina;That's how the legend goes.|They also say that after the war ended, Roland returned to his home of Ostia.|He raised Durandal high above his head,|and the earth scorched by the flames of war suddenly blossomed with life again.
speak;Roy;Wow... That sword has quite the story to it.
speak;Lilina;It's a weapon that can defeat dragons, so it must have some exceptional powers.
speak;Roy;...Oh, yes. I heard that a group of bandits has made its base here.|Will the sword be all right? Might the bandits have taken Durandal?
speak;Lilina;Oh, no, don't worry yourself about that.|Only descendants of Roland know how to remove Durandal from its sheath.
speak;Roy;That's reassuring.|All that's left then is to rid this cave of the bandits and take Durandal.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;So this is Durandal... It's enormous.|I don't think many of us will be able to swing it.
speak;Lilina;History has it that Roland was a small man.|Any fighter skilled enough should be able to wield the sword.
speak;Roy;Then if I become better with the sword, I could use it as well?
speak;Lilina;Well... I don't know about that.
speak;Roy;Oh, come now.|Have SOME confidence in me, at least!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, we have it! It was under the altar.|It was no simple task to get it out, but it's in our possession now.
speak;Roy;This is Durandal...|But was it worth Lilina's life...?
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! Bern's wyvern riders are in front of Castle Ostia!

name: HenningFight
_source: speak;Henning;Sigh.|How did you find yourselves in here?|I'm afraid I can't let you go.

name: HenningDeath
_source: speak;Henning;Ah, blast...|I knew this would happen...

name: LyciaEndEvents
_source: #These scenes run after either ch.8 or ch.8x
speak;Narcian;Hm hm hm...|You must be Roy.|I thank you for ridding me of that cretin Legance.
speak;Narcian;Now, leave Ostia to me and we can all go home with our limbs attached.
speak;Roy;Never!|I'll never hand over Ostia to the likes of you!
speak;Narcian;Oho?|You think you can best us with that sad little group of yours?
speak;Narcian;I will cut you open, just as I did to Hector!
speak;RedSoldier;General Narcian! A legion has arrived from Etruria!
speak;Narcian;I can see that, you fool! But, why...?
speak;Perceval;I am Perceval, Knight General of Etruria. Mage General Cecilia informed me that the Lycian army had requested Etruria's aid.
speak;Cecilia;We are prepared for battle.|Can those wyvern riders of yours stand against our might?
speak;Cecilia;I am Cecilia, Mage General of Etruria!|Ostia is now under our protection.
speak;RedSoldier;General Narcian, please control your temper!|General Perceval is one of the most skilled knights in Etruria!|Combined with General Cecilia, we haven't a chance!
speak;Narcian;Cecilia, was it?|We'll see who has the last laugh!
speak;Perceval;Are you General Roy of the Lycian army?
speak;Roy;Y-yes, I am!|I lead the Lycian army in Lord Hector's place.
speak;Perceval;It's a pleasure.|You have my sympathy for the current turmoil in Lycia.|Our king also sends his condolences for Lord Hector.
speak;Roy;Thank you.|If you hadn't helped us...Ostia would be under Bern's control now.
speak;Perceval;You have no reason to thank me. I simply followed my king's orders.|You should thank Cecilia. She defied the king until he agreed to help you.
speak;Perceval;Yes, she put her neck on the line.|Well, I must be off.|Etruria calls. As one of the three Generals of Etruria, it requires my presence.|Cecilia---
speak;Perceval;---will you take care of the loose ends?
speak;Cecilia;Yes, thank you Perceval. Leave the rest to me.
speak;Roy;Wow... General Perceval...|Just his presence was intimidating.
speak;Roy;General Cecilia! It is good to see you again.
speak;Cecilia;How are you, Roy? You look a little tired.
speak;Roy;I'm fine, thanks to you. It could have been a calamity.
speak;Cecilia;I'm glad we made it in time.
speak;Roy;I'm sorry I put you through so much trouble.
speak;Cecilia;Don't be.|It will benefit Etruria for Ostia to go under our protection.

speak;Cecilia;Bern's been increasingly aggressive, as you know.|If Bern gains any further strength, the balance of power will be shattered.|Still, we haven't been attacked, so we couldn't simply declare war.
speak;Roy;So when we requested aid, it was justification to declare war on Bern?
speak;Cecilia;Precisely.|We only did what is best for our land.|You needn't feel that you're in our debt.
speak;Roy;If you insist.|Regardless, please come in and meet the rest of the army.
speak;Cecilia;...He's grown so much in the short time since I met him last.|He's maturing into a man.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After driving Narcian away from Ostia,{w}{c:remove_portrait;Narcian (Narcian)}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;;OpenEyesFLAG(mirror)}{br}Roy and company brace themselves for further attacks from Bern.|However, Bern's belligerent movements toward Lycia come to an abrupt halt,{w} as if to mock Roy and his caution.|Bern also remains unresponsive to a treaty offer from Etruria.|Bern's sudden silence and lack of activity can only be described as eerie.{w}{c:wait;500}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Eliwood;Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{clear}With Hector gone, Pherae is now the greatest power in Lycia.|Eliwood summons the council of marquesses to Pherae to discuss future actions.|It is decided that Eliwood is to lead the council of the Lycian League.|A new Lycian Army is also to be established.|This new army's purpose is not to take the offensive against Bern,{w} but rather take a defensive stance for Lycia.{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{br}Owing to his victory against Bern in Ostia, Roy is chosen leader of this new army.|Gradually, the attitude and morale in Lycia begins to improve.|People once again conduct business without fear, and they embrace a new optimism.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Eliwood (Eliwood)}{clear}At this time, Etruria calls for Lycia's assistance.|The kingdom needs help with restoring law to the Western Isles.|Many outlaws make their bases there, and anarchy is said to rule.{w}{clear}Many in Lycia are uneager to send their troops to the Isles to deal with bandits,{w} but having received Etruria's aid in Ostia, they have no choice but to oblige.|Thus, Roy and the Lycian Army pass through Etruria toward the Isles.{w}{c:wait;1000}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;1000}{clear}The Western Isles are the numerous islands off the western coast of Elibe.|Presently, they are colonies of Etruria.|The Western Isles are rich in resources, so mining is a major industry here.|However, these resources are worth a fortune.{w}{c:add_portrait;Scollan;Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{c:add_portrait;Scott;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}{br}Inevitably, varied bands of rogues traveled there hoping to loot the mines.|As such, the people of the Western Isles live in constant fear of bandit attacks.|Roy is sent to vanquish these bandits...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Scollan;Oh yeah.{w} We just saw 'em dock at that little island in the east.
speak;Scott;Good. They're probably floundering about in this thick fog.{w} Sneak up from where they can't see and finish 'em.
speak;Cecilia;Roy, I'm sorry that I couldn't stop this.
speak;Roy;It isn't your responsibility, General Cecilia.{w} Don't concern yourself.
speak;Cecilia;Even in Etruria people dislike how the high chancellor treats the Lycians as pawns.
speak;Roy;High chancellor? I thought the king made the decision to send us here.

speak;Cecilia;Actually, he didn't.|High Chancellor Roartz works closely with Lord Arcardo,{w} the noble who heads the mining operations here in the Western Isles.|They made the decision without consulting the king.
speak;Cecilia;...Did you hear of the tragedy that occured in Etruria last year?
speak;Roy;Of course.|Prince Myrddin, next in line to be king, abruptly passed away last year.
speak;Roy;I never had the honor to make his acquaintance.{w} I understand that he was a very bright individual.

speak;Cecilia;Yes...{w} Were the prince alive,{w} Etruria would surely not be in this sad shape.|King Mordred was overcome with sorrow when his son departed.{w} The shock was so great that he has yet to recover.|Of late, it seems he's always detached from reality.|He pays no mind to anything happening around him or in the kingdom.|Roartz is exploiting the king's condition for his own benefit.{w} Now, he's essentially in charge of the goings-on in the palace.|He keeps the three Etrurian Generals,{w} Perceval, Douglas, and myself,{w} away from the king except in times of great urgency.
speak;Roy;But what about when you came to our aid in Ostia?
speak;Cecilia;That was an exception because I had Perceval behind me.{w} But I'm sorry, I didn't have the clout to prevent this...
speak;Roy;I don't blame you.{w} We will return to Lycia as soon as we complete our mission here.|But please, I only ask that you take care of Lycia in our absence.
speak;Cecilia;You needn't ask.{w} The Lycian League is in safe hands, as is Princess Guinivere.
speak;Guinivere;Roy... May I not go with you?
speak;Roy;The battles on these islands are likely to be ugly.{w} I can't predict what might happen.|You should stay in hiding in Etruria with Cecilia's protection.
speak;Cecilia;You can trust me, Your Highness.|I know you want a truce to end this war.{w} I will defend you no matter the cost.
speak;Guinivere;...I understand.{w} I'm truly sorry to trouble you.{w} Roy, I pray for your safety.
speak;Roy;Thank you, Your Highness.{w} I will pray for yours as well.

name: FirAndShinAppear
_source: speak;Scott;Oh, Fir. Sorry to call you in.
speak;Scott;The island is under attack by pirates.{w} They've come to kill the people living here.
speak;Scott;I sent guys over to try and stop them,{w} but the pirates are really skilled. The outlook isn't good.
speak;Scott;I'd like to fight them myself, but I can't leave this castle.{w} Fir, I'm sorry, but can you go in my place?
speak;Fir;Yes. I will go and purge the people of these pirates.
speak;Fir;Leave them to my blade!|Anyone who attacks innocent villagers will get no mercy from me!
speak;Scott;I have someone you can work with too.
speak;Scott;Yeah. He's a nomad named Shin.{w} He's a little skinny, but he's a decent shot with his bow.
speak;Scollan;Boss, you sure?{w} I mean, that girl won't stand any chance...
speak;Scott;I know what I'm doing.{w} Once she's killed, we can take that sword she's carrying.
speak;Scollan;The sword? That weird one she has?
speak;Scott;It's not just any weird sword.{w} It's a Wo Dao, a famous blade from the east.{w} It's worth a fortune. Heh heh...
speak;Scollan;Ohhh, I get it now.{w} That's why you were so hospitable to her.
speak;Scott;I couldn't do anything before, but now's our chance.{w} I want you to follow her. Once she's finished,{w} take the sword from her lifeless hands!
speak;Shin;Yes.{w} I heard everything from Scott. Let's go.
speak;Fir;Uh,{w} are you here to protect the villagers like me?
speak;Shin;No...{w} I have no interest in such things.
speak;Shin;I'm paid to fight......{w} That is all.
speak;Fir;...I need to keep the conversation going.
speak;Fir;What brings you all the way out here?
speak;Shin;Nothing special. You appear to be from Sacae yourself.
speak;Fir;As for me, I'm travelling around Elibe to train myself, and...|Oh, you didn't ask about me, did you...?
speak;Shin;...My clan was crushed by Bern when they invaded Sacae.
speak;Shin;Our chieftain had me escape and told me to find and protect his granddaughter.{w} I'm still in search of her.
speak;Fir;I see...{w} Well, I hope you find her.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Noah' or u.nid=='Sue']

name: RecruitFir
_source: speak;Fir;Sir Noah?!{w} What are you doing here?!
speak;Noah;I joined this army back in Ostia...{w} Whoa!
speak;Noah;What are you doing?!{w} Sheathe your sword!
speak;Fir;Sir Noah! You aren't the noble man I thought you were!
speak;Fir;I know you're a mercenary...{w} But lending your services to pirates?!{w} You should be ashamed!
speak;Fir;Don't act like you don't know!{w} You're working with pirates to attack the people living here!{w} And you call yourself a knight?!
speak;Noah;Hold on, I think there's been some kind of misunderstanding...
speak;Fir;Misunderstanding?! You still have the nerve--
speak;Noah;We're trying to help the villagers.{w} Our goal is to defeat the head of the pirate group here.{w} His name is Scott, I think.
speak;Fir;What? Scott is the head of the pirates?
speak;Noah;Sure is.{w} If you don't believe me why don't you ask the pirate over there?{w} The one behind you, hiding in the bushes.
speak;Scollan;The plan failed! I gotta go tell the boss!
speak;Noah;...You didn't expect them at all?
speak;Fir;No! Scott was very kind to me...
speak;Noah;Really? The rumors say that he's a brute of a man...
speak;Fir;My mother always said that you shouldn't judge a person by their looks...
speak;Fir;...I was fighting for pirates this whole time...{w} What should I do now?
speak;Noah;Do you want to come with us?
speak;Noah;We're always looking for new recruits to bolster our strength.{w} I'll talk to Roy for you.

name: RecruitShin
_source: speak;Sue;Shin...{w} What are you doing here?
speak;Sue;...What happened to the clan after I left.
speak;Shin;We were no equal for Bern...
speak;Shin;He still continues the resistance against Bern.
speak;Shin;I was told by the chieftain to find and protect you.
speak;Sue;Then will you fight alongside us?
speak;Sue;This army is fighting against Bern, like my grandfather.{w} They also saved my life.
speak;Shin;Then of course.{w} If that is what you desire, I am at your disposal.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman2;The resistance is faring quite well.{w} In the north and in the west, they're always engaged in battle.{w} Which way will you go?

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana1;There's so much mist here...{w} In these conditions, you can never know if someone's waiting to pounce!{w} Torches can be very useful,{w} even if you have an eagle-eyed thief with you.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman2;The nearby villagers...{w} They're all deserting the Isles for the mainland. It's very sad, really.|If you want to visit, you'd best do it quickly.{w} You won't have time to go to both, so you'll have to decide.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan2;Among the pirates is a very skilled nomad...{w} You can't see him through all this fog,{w} but he also has a girl with him...

name: VisitVillageA
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail2;The only people here are women and children.{w} All the workers have been taken north to the mines.{w} They aren't even allowed to rest.{w} They're forced to work until they die...{w} My brother escaped, but he was reduced to skin and bone.|That day he came back, he was already too weak,{w} and he drew his last breath...|Now that I've told you this...can you...|Er, sorry... I've said too much.{w} Please forget all of this. We'll leave the Isles now.

name: VisitVillageB
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan2;You saved us! Are you with the resistance?{w} No? Then you just did it out of the goodness of your heart?|As I'm sure you've seen, these islands are swarming with pirates and bandits!{w} There's nothing we can do out here,{w} but word is the resistance is waging battle in the western part of the Isles.|Tell them we'll all move to the mainland.{w} They don't have to worry about us...

name: ScottFight
_source: speak;Scott;Maybe the fog didn't stop you... But you must be in rough shape at least! I'll finish you off!

name: ScottDeath
_source: speak;Scott;Who... are you?|You're no ordinary army...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Steel Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Blade,Iron Axe,Hatchet,Steel Axe,Hand Axe,Hammer;armory

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;Merlinus, it appeared the enemy was trying to ambush us...
speak;Merlinus;They must have known we were coming.
speak;Roy;I think there's more to this than we realize...
speak;Merlinus;You're right. Clearing out the bandits may be more difficult than expected.|Ever since Bern's aggressive behavior started, Elibe has changed.

speak;Roy;I don't even know what to expect...|Dragons appearing,{w} Bern's sudden invasion,{w} the collapse of the Lycian League...|Everything happened so suddenly.|In the end I suppose all we can do is take it one problem at a time.
speak;Merlinus;Now...{w} Where do we go from here?
speak;Roy;Let's move north along the coast.
speak;Roy;Yes. I hear the people living on the islands are being forced into slave labor there.
speak;Merlinus;So you think we should rescue them.
speak;Roy;If we do, we might be able to find out who's behind all of this.
speak;Roy;Then let's not waste time...{w} Let's head north.
speak;Merlinus;Now...{w} Where do we go from here?
speak;Roy;I heard there's a resistance group based there.{w} They're fighting the bandits to protect the villagers.
speak;Merlinus;They may have information on what's going on in the isles.
speak;Merlinus;It seems like a sound idea, Lord Roy.
speak;Roy;Then let's not waste time. Let's move west.
speak;Merlinus;Now...{w} Where do we go from here? We must choose a direction.
speak;Merlinus;If we follow the coast north, we will reach the largest mine on the Isles.{w} The bandits may be based around there.
speak;Merlinus;We have an assignment, and it's to get rid of the bandits.{w} We mustn't wander about aimlessly wasting time.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;and Dia.|All of these islands are rich in minerals, and mining is the economic backbone.|The largest mine is located in Eburacum, in north Fibernia.|Roy leads his forces towards Eburacum hoping to learn more about the bandits.{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}To get to Eburacum, one must pass a nearby castle.|{c:wait;300}{c:add_portrait;Nord (Nord);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Roy sends a messenger to Sir Nord, lord of the castle,{w} to request permission to pass through his lands.|Because Roy and company are in the Isles on Etruria's request,{w} they don't anticipate trouble in gaining Nord's support.|But not everything is as simple as it appears...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Nord;What can you tell me about that spy from the resistance?
speak;RedSoldier;You mean the dancer called Larum?{w} We threw her in the dungeon, milord.
speak;RedSoldier;No. She keeps insisting that she's not affiliated with the resistance.
speak;Nord;A liar, is she?{w} Perhaps I should interrogate her myself...
speak;RedSoldier;There is a messenger here from the Lycian army.
speak;Nord;Ah, the army that was sent to clean up the bandits here on the isles.
speak;RedSoldier;It seems that they want permission to pass through to Eburacum.
speak;Nord;...Lord Arcardo told us to get rid of the Lycian Army in their time here.|Heh heh heh...{w} If we impress Lord Arcardo he may see fit to reward us.|Deploy the troops and finish them here!
speak;Nord;Be sure to deploy the ballista.{w} Use it to defeat the Lycian Army before they even reach you!
speak;Nord;Just make sure the enemy doesn't get a hold of it!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, soldiers are flowing out from the castle.
speak;Merlinus;No, they seem to be heading toward us, actually.
speak;Merlinus;He hasn't returned...{w} Which may mean the worst...
speak;Roy;He hasn't returned.{w} Why is Sir Nord attacking us?
speak;Merlinus;The enemy draws near...{w} Lord Roy, what are your orders?
speak;Roy;...I guess we have no choice but to fight.|We might learn something if we can reach the castle.
speak;Roy;All right, storm the castle!{w} But have mercy!{w} Some of their soldiers may be willing to listen!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy... We couldn't find any evidence explaining Sir Nord's aggression.
speak;Roy;But now we know for certain that somebody wants our heads.
speak;Merlinus;I think we should send word to the mainland about this.
speak;Roy;Yes, I'll send a message to General Cecilia.
speak;BlueSoldier;Excuse me, Lord Roy.{w} We found a girl imprisoned in the dungeon.{w} She wishes to speak with you.
speak;Larum;You're Roy? The one who's here to clear out the bandits?
speak;Larum;I beg you, Roy!{w} Please rescue my friends!
speak;Roy;C-calm down and tell me everything.{w} You say your friends are in danger?
speak;Larum;My name is Larum.{w} I'm part of the resistance force on the Isles.
speak;Roy;The force that's fighting against the bandits?
speak;Larum;That's part of it, but the real enemy is Etruria!{w} They work with the bandits to squeeze every bit they can out of the people here!
speak;Larum;The lords living here take people into the mines and work them to death!!{w} They're allowed no rest, even if they're sick or injured.
speak;Larum;We're fighting Etruria to stop this abuse!{w} Our next plan was to attack the mine at Eburacum and rescue the people there!{w} But...but...!
speak;Roy;Calm down! You can tell me.
speak;Larum;A villager here leaked the details of the plan!{w} He was probably tortured...
speak;Larum;I have to go to the mines before the resistance is ambushed!
speak;Roy;Then there's no time to spare!{w} We'll help the resistance force and rescue the people being forced into labor!
speak;Larum;Truly, you will?! Thank you, Roy!
speak;Merlinus;Hey! I said get off of him!

speak;Larum;It's called a wyrmslayer.{w} It's effective against wyvern riders,{w} and it's said it was used against dragons, too.{w} Who can say, though? It might come in handy.{w} It belongs to Echidna, the leader of the resistance.{w} You're helping us though, so you can have it for now.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Roy can hardly believe Larum's account.|{c:remove_portrait;Larum (Larum)}{c:add_portrait;Cecilia (Cecilia);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}He quickly pens a letter to Cecilia to let her know of the horrors on the Isles.|He also tells her of the actions he plans to take from this point.|{c:remove_portrait;Cecilia (Cecilia)}After sending the letter, Roy moves towards the Eburacum mine.{w}{c:wait;500}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{clear}His goal is to rescue the people suffering from forced labor.|{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Orlo (Orlo);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Etruria has assigned Bishop Orlo of the St. Elimine Church to supervise the mine.|It was already a fruitful endeavor, but the nobles' greed is unsatiable.{w}{c:wait;500}{clear}Eburacum... Known now as the Mine of Death.|The wails of the people forced into labor echo through the mines, like the howling of ghosts, never sleeping...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.11: Hero of the West
speak;Melady;So Princess Guinivere isn't in the Western Isles?
speak;Orlo;We searched every inch of the Isles,{w} and our intelligence has learned nothing from the Lycian Army.|The princess is nowhere to be found. I apologize.
speak;Melady;I understand. I will continue my search elsewhere.|Bern thanks you for your cooperation, Father Orlo.
speak;Orlo;I pray that you find Princess Guinivere soon.
speak;Orlo;Captain Melady.{w} A wyvern rider from Bern who serves Princess Guinivere.{w} She's searching for the princess.
speak;RedSoldier;Did you tell her where the princess is?

speak;Orlo;Of course not. Princess Guinivere is far too valuable.|High Chancellor Roartz was ecstatic when he learned the princess was in Aquileia.|He had the same evil glint in his eye when Prince Myrddin was assassinated.
speak;RedSoldier;Father Orlo! You must never speak of the assassination...
speak;Orlo;Oh, yes, I must watch my tongue.|Regardless, the princess is secure.
speak;Orlo;So, why have you come before me? Surely not just for court gossip?
speak;RedSoldier;No, milord.|It's regarding the village where the leader of the resistance hides.|We are prepared to attack, so I am here for instructions.
speak;Orlo;Well done.|Commence the attack immediately, before any unpleasant interruptions arrive...
speak;Roy;The resistance hideout is in this village?
speak;Larum;Yes, but the castle's troops may have attacked already.
speak;Merlinus;I must say, that Orlo sounds like a despicable wretch of a man.|A bishop should preach the words of the gods to help the people.{w} But what he's doing is nothing more than torture!
speak;Roy;It would be best to wait for General Cecilia's reply, but...
speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy! The castle troops are attacking the village.
speak;Merlinus;Oh dear, no! Lord Roy, should we attack?
speak;Roy;I suppose there's no time to await the reply...|The people here need our help,{w} even if doing so means souring our relationship with Etruria...
speak;Roy;We fight!!{w} Make Lycia proud of our actions here today!

name: NordFight
_source: speak;Nord;You made it all the way here. But I shall take your pathetic lives...

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerWoman2;I'm worried about Larum. I hope she's all right.|She smuggled us weapons so we could defend ourselves.{w} Even when we begged her to hide, she refused and kept helping us.|Here's an axe that she brought us.{w} It's a strange one...|It's strong against swords, but weak against lances.{w} I'd gladly trade it for her safety, though, so please, take it...

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman2;Brigands and pirates...{w} They were all just as innocent as anyone when they were young.{w} Maybe if you spoke to some of them, you could make them understand.

name: GeeseAppears
_source: speak;Geese;The lord of that castle killed my mates.{w} I won't let their deaths go unavenged.
speak;VillagerWoman2;You mean that crew that was always with you...
speak;Geese;Yeah...{w} They were taken to the mines and told that they would be given work.{w} But they were all worked like slaves until they... died.
speak;Geese;Maybe they weren't the brightest bunch,{w} but they were good people...{w} And then they were killed...{w} just like that...!!
speak;VillagerWoman2;Do you intend to avenge them on your own?
speak;Geese;Is there something wrong with that?
speak;VillagerWoman2;No...{w} But I thought you were going to go back to your merchant business.
speak;Geese;Yeah, well, I've got bigger problems now...{w} Once my mates get their revenge,{w} and once the war subsides,{w} maybe I will.
speak;VillagerWoman2;...We won't forget you, Geese.{w} You and your crew risked your lives to get us food and supplies.{w} If you ever need anything, we'll be here.
speak;Geese;Maybe I'll take you up on that,{w} if I'm still alive.{w} ...Thanks.

name: GeeseRecruitment
_source: speak;Geese;Yeah? What? You got something to say to me?
speak;Roy;I want to ask why you're fighting against the soldiers.
speak;Roy;Roy, leader of the Lycian army.{w} We're here on behalf of Etruria...
speak;Geese;You're with Etruria?!{w} Then you're with the enemy.{w} Get ready to die!
speak;Roy;Slow down! We're fighting the castle's troops too.
speak;Geese;And yet Etruria sent you?{w} I don't understand.
speak;Roy;I don't either.{w} We were sent by Etruria to get rid of the bandits here,{w} but something's strange.
speak;Geese;...You say you're fighting the castle's troops.{w} I'm for hire, if you'll take me.
speak;Geese;I'm a seafaring man, so I know both the land and sea around the Isles.{w} You look a bit lost, so I could be a good guide for you.

speak;Geese;I want to help with your mission.{w} To be honest, I'm a pirate,{w} so I'm probably the type you were sent to get rid of.{w} But I only go after the rich.{w} They have more than their fair share anyway.
speak;Roy;Well then, if you'll join us,{w} we're pleased to have you.{w} We don't know this area at all, so it's been difficult thus far.
speak;Geese;Sounds like we have a deal! Leave it to me!
speak;Geese;...This is it, lads.{w} Can you taste it?{w} You'll have your vengeance.{w} And after you do,{w} I might just tag along with this Roy fellow for a while...

name: GonzalezAppears
_source: speak;Nord;There's a village to the north, right along the mountain.{w} Do you understand?
speak;Nord;It may be a resistance base.{w} I want you to go and burn it to the ground, village and all.
speak;Nord;Good. You understand.{w} This is the only use I have for a lump such as you.{w} Now get going, you halfwit, before you forget your orders.
speak;Nord;Forget how to speak? Are you trying to say something?
speak;Nord;Such a monstrous face,{w} and yet such a needlessly compassionate heart.{w} He will learn the value of destroying a village firsthand!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: GonzalezRecruitment
_source: speak;Gonzalez;W-what are you doing?! I am enemy!
speak;Lilina;I know...|But there's such a look of sorrow in your eyes.
speak;Gonzalez;...There is village near mountain.{w} You know?
speak;Gonzalez;Tell people escape.{w} I have order.{w} Destroy village. I...
speak;Lilina;What? Don't!{w} The villagers are innocent...
speak;Lilina;It sounds to me like you should leave the person who gave you that order.
speak;Lilina;Yes! You can fight with us.{w} We're protecting the villagers.
speak;Gonzalez;...No...{w} I monster... People mean to me...{w} People throw stones...{w} People say, "Go away!"...{w} "You a monster!"...{w} Not human...
speak;Lilina;That's horrible! Of course you're human!{w} You're a very kind-hearted man. I can tell.{w} Please, come with us. Don't be afraid.
speak;Gonzalez;Me afraid? I never afraid!{w} Everyone afraid of ME!{w} I not afraid!
speak;Lilina;No. You ARE afraid.{w} You're afraid that people will throw stones and call you a monster.
speak;Lilina;But you don't have to be afraid of us.{w} Everyone in our army is nice. They won't do that to you.{w} Be brave...{w} Take that first step,{w} and you'll never have to be afraid again.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, there is a young man claiming to be with the resistance here.
speak;Roy;I'll see him. Let him pass.
speak;Elffin;I am pleased to meet you. My name is Elffin.{w} I am a member of the resistance force.
speak;Roy;I am Roy of the Lycian army.
speak;Elffin;You have my thanks for saving our village here.
speak;Roy;We simply did what we believe is right.
speak;Elffin;But now you stand against Etruria.

speak;Roy;Even so, I have no regrets.|We may have opposed Etruria's immediate interests,{w} but once the truth about the Isles is out, I'm certain they will understand.|I sent a letter to a trustworthy Etrurian noble.{w} If she takes appropriate measures, they will send us aid.
speak;Elffin;I would not be so sure...
speak;Elffin;Don't you find it odd that Etruria requested your help here at all?
speak;Elffin;If I may be so bold as to guess...{w} Was it High Chancellor Roartz and Lord Arcardo who requested your help?
speak;Elffin;There may have been ulterior motives for sending your army away.{w} Perhaps your presence in Lycia was undesirable to them.
speak;Elffin;There are rumors...that Roartz and Arcardo are working with Bern.
speak;Roy;What?! Then Lycia is in danger!
speak;Elffin;Your country may be in peril.{w} Are you free to waste your time on the Isles as you are.
speak;Merlinus;He's right! Bern wanted us out of Lycia so they could launch an invasion!{w} We must head back at once!

speak;Roy;It's difficult to judge what may be hearsay and what may be truth.{w} We can't simply jump on this rumor and run back to Lycia.{w} I am certainly concerned, but my father and General Cecilia are there.|The people on the Isles have only us to rely on.
speak;Roy;If we leave without finishing our mission,{w} then all we've done here was for naught.
speak;Elffin;...Your army is blessed with a level-headed leader.
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy, I am sorry for testing you so.
speak;Merlinus;Testing us? So that was a lie?!
speak;Elffin;It was the truth.{w} However, I presented the rumor in a way that you might take rash action.{w} Your leader is a prudent individual.{w} I would join you if you allow it.
speak;Roy;...I don't like that you tested us.{w} But if you can help, I welcome you.{w} Now, back to the concern we face here.|What can we do to help the people of the Isles?
speak;Elffin;We must go to the capital. To Juteaux.{w} The people will only be liberated if the corruption is overthrown.
speak;Roy;Then it's settled!{w} We head for Juteaux! We fight for the people!{w} We will defeat the true enemy!
speak;Money Man 4;You saved our village.{w} We owe you our livelihoods. Please, take this as a token of our gratitude.
speak;GreenSoldier;Commander Klein, we will stay and help with reconstruction as directed.
speak;GreenSoldier;Would that we could fight at your side.{w} Here is the bolt we were holding for you. You may need it more than we do.{w} Farewell and good luck, Commander Klein.
speak;Klein;Thank you. Good luck to you as well.
speak;PegKnight;Captain! We will return to Ilia to make our report.
speak;Thea;Very good. Thank you for your service.
speak;PegKnight;Oh, and take this...{w} Your sister gave it to me before we left. Please be careful...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Lance,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Javelin,Hatchet,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Killer Axe,Hand Axe,Hammer,Iron Bow,Steel Bow;armory

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana1;I have staves for sale if you want any!|Wait a second. Have I met you before...?{w} Ah, probably just my imagination...|Anyway, how many staves do you want? They work really well.{w} They cure conditions instead of health.{w} You don't want any?! Darn!{w} I'll give you a sample, so buy one next time!

name: VisitHouse5
_source: speak;VillagerMan2;I'm supposed to give this staff to Orlo...|He buys things like this with the money he takes from us.{w} But I'll give it to you instead!{w} Please end his rule... We're counting on you.

name: VisitHouse7
_source: speak;VillagerLittleGirl2;Take this!{w} I want to help in any way I can.{w} It's a speedwing!|Use it and you'll become a little faster!

name: VisitHouse8
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman2;It's so difficult under Orlo's rule...{w} He takes everything from us, even our hopes and dreams...|Please, take this. I hope it helps.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;Money Man 4;Oh! You're the resistance force, aren't you?|What? No?|Ahhh, that explains it...{w} This is quite a situation you're in, though...|Here, take this. We believe in you.

name: VisitHouse6
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy2;My job is to take the village's tribute to the castle.{w} If we don't, the village will be burnt down.{w} I'll give the money to you guys instead!{w} I'm tired of being stepped on by this oppressive lord. I can tell you're different.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair2;Good luck to you! We can't even touch these guys.|Some people in your army can use bows, can't they?|This should be helpful.{w} I know it's not much... but I want you to have it.

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail2;This dusty old lance? I'll give it to you to use against the villains here.{w} My foolish brother wielded this before he died.|He was a terrible fighter, but he believed his cause was just.|That's what got him killed...|He was so very foolish...

name: GaleMiledyTalk
_source: speak;Gale;Melady, have you discovered where Princess Guinivere is?
speak;Melady;No...|It appears she has left the Lycian Army. I thought we were so close...
speak;Gale;It was a dead end then.
speak;Melady;Galle... I'm sorry.{w} King Zephiel wanted to keep the matter of Princess Guinivere a secret,{w} so only I was assigned to search for her.{w} I'm sorry to get you mixed up in this...
speak;Melady;But you work directly under General Murdock. Surely you have other duties.
speak;Gale;General Murdock agreed to allow me to assist you.{w} If she isn't here, then Princess Guinivere must be on the mainland.{w} I'll ask General Narcian for some additional assistance.
speak;Melady;You're going to bow to Narcian?
speak;Gale;Hm? Of course. He's one of the three Wyvern Generals.{w} He leads the offense on Lycia and Etruria.
speak;Melady;You were to be a Wyvern General.{w} But Narcian put forth that you're not a Bern native and took the title for himself.{w} And you're going to bow down to him and request his help?
speak;Gale;What he said is only the truth...{w} I wasn't born in Bern.
speak;Gale;I'm pleased with the position I have now.{w} The king and General Murdock trust me, even though I'm not of Bern by birth.{w} To ask any more would be nothing but greed.

name: EchidnaAppears
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Echidna!{w} We know you are here! You are surrounded on all sides!{w} Drop your weapons and show yourself immediately!
speak;RedSoldier;You are Echidna,{w} leader of the Resistance force?
speak;VillagerMan2;Echidna, I'm so sorry!{w} They threatened the lives of my family...
speak;Echidna;I don't blame you. I'll handle this.{w} Hurry home to your family now.
speak;RedSoldier;Surrender peacefully and Father Orlo may have mercy on you.
speak;Echidna;I've always been a stubborn wench.{w} I have no intention of going quietly.
speak;RedSoldier;You resist? Then you leave us no choice!{w} Take her head!

name: EchidnaRecruitment
_source: speak;Echidna;Larum? You're all right?{w} That puts my mind at ease...|I don't know what I'd say to Elffin if something happened to you.
speak;Larum;I'm sorry...{w} If I hadn't been caught I could have warned you...
speak;Echidna;It wasn't your fault. Cheer up.{w} And besides, I'm still in one piece, so there's that, eh?
speak;Echidna;Tell me, what is this army you're with?
speak;Larum;Roy and the Lycian army!{w} They came here to defeat the bandits.
speak;Echidna;Lycia, huh? They've come a long way to get here...|Does it look like they'll help our cause?
speak;Echidna;From the sound of it, I've no reason NOT to join them.
speak;Larum;Really? That's great! I'm sure Roy will be happy too.

name: OrloBeingADick
_source: speak;Orlo;Ha ha ha... I've a delicious idea...{w} You there!
speak;Orlo;Tell the brigands the village is in disarray.{w} Have them collect all the money and valuables.
speak;RedSoldier;Yes, milord.{w} But...are you certain of this?{w} If this becomes public--
speak;Orlo;You forget that I speak for the gods.{w} To accuse me is to oppose Saint Elimine! I am immune to persecution!{w} Hurry. Before the villagers realize what's happening.

name: KleinAppears
_source: speak;Thea;They were assigned to fight the bandits.
speak;Klein;I know. But Lord Arcardo says they're allied with the bandits now.{w} Why they're doing exactly the opposite of their assignment is beyond me...
speak;Klein;Thea, take your soldiers and attack from the north.{w} I'll commence the attack from here.
speak;Klein;I hear that you have siblings.
speak;Thea;Yes, sir.{w} I have two sisters. One older, one younger.
speak;Klein;Are they pegasus knights like you?
speak;Thea;They are, actually. Why do you ask?
speak;Klein;I have a younger sister myself...
speak;Thea;Any sister of yours must be enchanting.
speak;Klein;Yes, she is a sight.{w} I heard, however, she got tangled up in some mess and now she's missing...
speak;Klein;I have some people looking into it, but they've yet to find anything.{w} If I didn't have this mission, I would search for her myself...
speak;Klein;Thea, be careful out there.{w} For your family's sake.
speak;RedSoldier;Lord Arcardo said Ilia's pegasus knights are expendable.{w} They should be fighting on the front line, not us.{w} Surely the lives of us Etrurian soldiers are more valuable.
speak;Klein;Don't be ridiculous. They are reliable companions.{w} We will attack at the same time...or before them, if need be. Understood?
speak;Klein;...Lord Arcardo's story is curious, though...{w} The army from Lycia only arrived very recently.{w} How could they create ties with the bandits so quickly...?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']

name: KleinRoyRecruitment
_source: speak;Roy;Wait! Aren't you an Etrurian commander?{w} Why are you attacking us?!
speak;Klein;I have specific orders from Lord Arcardo to take you down.
speak;Roy;Can't you see what's happening here?{w} The people are suffering from the lords' abusive treatment!{w} And you're helping them. You should be ashamed!
speak;Klein;...Wait.{w} Are you saying that you're helping the villagers?
speak;Roy;Yes. The lord here is ransacking the village in search of the resistance.{w} We're fighting to stop him.{w} And you're apparently on his side.
speak;Klein;I had no such intention.{w} My orders stated that you were the ones working with the bandits.
speak;Roy;What?! Why would we be working with bandits?{w} We just want to clean things up here and get home to Lycia!
speak;Klein;Lord Arcardo has made a fool of me.{w} I have been so blind not to see through his thin veil of deceit.
speak;Roy;...Do you see what we see now?
speak;Klein;I am Klein of House Reglay of Etruria.{w} Forgive me for my misguided attack against you.
speak;Roy;I am General Roy of the Lycian army.
speak;Klein;General Roy, I would advise you to be cautious.{w} You are against Lord Arcardo. He will have every pawn at his disposal after your head.
speak;Klein;If you would allow it, I will join you.
speak;Klein;Yes. I wish to monitor you as an Etrurian commander.{w} I should prove useful as both a fighter and a diplomat.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']
#If Shanna talked to Thea before recruiting Klein, add new talk allowing Shanna to recruit Thea

name: KleinClarineRecruitment
_source: speak;Clarine;I'm sorry I left like I did.{w} But I wanted so badly to see you!
