speak;Klein;Oh, the trouble you get into...|Well, you're safe, and that's what matters.|...What brings you out here?{w} Did you find a trustworthy mercenary for hire?
speak;Clarine;No, I joined the Lycian army.
speak;Clarine;Yes! My healing staves have been most useful!
speak;Klein;...I see.{w} I thought your eyes looked... sharper.
speak;Clarine;I'm a lady now, I am.
speak;Klein;...Let me ask you this. What kind of individual is General Roy?
speak;Clarine;Hmm... He's a tad rough around the edges for a noble...|His hair especially is an absolute mess...
speak;Klein;...Let me rephrase that.{w} Is General Roy working with the bandits?
speak;Clarine;No, of course not!{w} We've been sent here to vanquish the bandits!
speak;Clarine;The Etrurians here are malicious people...{w} It is so embarrassing.{w} Klein... Are you working for them?
speak;Klein;I was sent here to protect the villagers.{w} I hereby join the Lycian Army to fulfill my mission.
speak;Klein;Shall we, then?{w} Will you introduce me to General Roy?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']
#If Shanna talked to Thea before recruiting Klein, add new talk allowing Shanna to recruit Thea

name: KleinClarineTalk
condition: game.level_vars['ClarineKleinTalk']==False and game.get_unit('Klein').team=='player' and ((unit1.nid=='Clarine' and unit2.nid=='Klein') or (unit1.nid=='Klein' and unit2.nid=='Clarine'))
_source: speak;Clarine;I'm sorry I left like I did.{w} But I wanted so badly to see you!
speak;Klein;Oh, the trouble you get into...|Well, you're safe, and that's what matters.|...What brings you out here?{w} Did you find a trustworthy mercenary for hire?
speak;Clarine;No, I joined the Lycian army.
speak;Klein;Well...{w}I'm sure you've been through much with them.
speak;Clarine;I'm a lady now, I am.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']

name: TheaAppears
_source: speak;Thea;Are you ready? We move southward!
speak;PegKnight;Captain... Are you sure we'll be alright?
speak;PegKnight;The Etrurian army considers us disposable.{w} They may send us to our doom...
speak;PegKnight;One of the other riders was told so by someone in the Etrurian army.
speak;Thea;Pay no mind to mere rumors.
speak;Thea;I'm certain Commander Klein would never approve of that.
speak;Thea;Commander Klein's not like that.{w} I trust him with my life.
speak;PegKnight;...Very well.|Then we'll trust him as well, for we trust you, Captain.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Shanna']

name: KleinTheaRecruitment
_source: speak;Klein;There's been a change of plans.{w} We are going to fight under General Roy of the Lycian Army.
speak;Thea;Understood, sir.{w} We shall follow you without question.
speak;Klein;I don't mind a question here or there, to be frank.
speak;Thea;We are Ilian mercenaries, sir.{w} We follow our employer's every order. And besides...
speak;Thea;I trust you to make proper judgements.

name: ShannaTheaTalk
_source: speak;Thea;...I have a contract with Commander Klein of Etruria.{w} Shanna... Are you with the Lycian Army?
speak;Thea;I see...{w} Then this was inevitable.{w} Draw your lance!
speak;Shanna;No... I don't want to fight you!
speak;Thea;...Shanna,{w} you know the code of the Illian mercenaries.
speak;Thea;Precisely. And we must follow that code,{w} even if it means we must fight our own kin.
speak;Shanna;But...one of us could be killed!
speak;Thea;I know that!{w} But we must fight!{w} Failing to do so would damage the reputation of the Ilian mercenaries.{w} Our nation can't afford to lose its mercenary contracts!
speak;Thea;...Why...|Why does it have to be like this...?
speak;Shanna;No, Commander Klein said he would join us!
speak;Thea;...That's a relief.{w} Then I will join you as well.
speak;Thea;Shanna...{w} Are you prepared to fight?
speak;Shanna;No! We don't have to fight!
speak;Thea;Of course we do. Must I repeat myself--
speak;Shanna;Commander Klein said he would join us!{w} We don't have to fight!
speak;Shanna;Yes! To fight me would be breaking the code!
speak;Thea;Thank goodness...{w} I was so scared.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Shanna']

name: GlobalArena
_source: level_var;ArenaEnemyKlassList;[k.nid for k in DB.classes if 'ArenaIgnore' not in k.tags and k.tier == game.level_vars['EntrantClass'].tier]
choice;ArenaChoice;Would you like to wager {var:ArenaWager} gold?;Yes,No;;horizontal
speak;;Good luck. Don't get yourself killed.;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)
speak;;So you won, eh? Here's your prize. {eval:2*game.level_vars['ArenaWager']} gold.;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)
speak;;Ahh, you lost? I'd hoped for better from you.;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)
speak;;Bah! What's that? Get outta here!;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)
speak;;What are you wasting my time for?;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)
speak;;What! You don't have a weapon! Get out of here!;70,8;160;noir;;;;menu_bg_clear (menu_bg_clear)

name: OrloComplains
_source: speak;Orlo;What is taking so long?!{w} Is the resistance force so powerful?!
speak;RedSoldier;It's the Lycian Army!{w} They are supporting the resistance...
speak;Orlo;What?! The Lycian League would turn against Etruria?

speak;RedSoldier;Actually, yes.{w} We've just received a missive from Juteaux!|The Lycian Army is responsible for the death of Sir Nord.|They are suspected of betraying Etruria's interests.|They may also have ties with the bandits.|Lord Arcardo now wants them dead or alive.
speak;Orlo;They killed Sir Nord, you say...?|It seems they finally have just cause to get rid of the Lycian Army.|Ties with bandits? The Lycian Army?{w} Oh, the irony...
speak;RedSoldier;Lord Arcardo has sent reinforcements to help capture the Lycian Army.{w} They should arrive shortly.
speak;Orlo;He says "capture", but I'm sure he he intends to kill them.|Let us do the job for him.{w} Eradicate them!

name: HardModeReinforcementWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Father Orlo, the reinforcements will arrive shortly.
speak;Orlo;I certainly hope it will be enough.{w} They are putting up a better fight than I expected...

name: BanditsAppear
_source: speak;Scollan;Yeah, yeah. Take half the loot to the castle, right?{w} That bishop in charge of you guys is a real piece of work, y'know that?
speak;Scollan;All right, kids! Grab your weapons! Take everything they got!

name: RoySoldierTalk
_source: speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy,{w} bandits are approaching from the mountains in the east!
speak;Roy;They aim to attack the villages in the chaos...{w} We must stop them and help the villagers!

name: OrloFightDefault
_source: speak;Orlo;Opposing me...is the equivalent of opposing the gods!{w} I shall rain divine punishment upon you!

name: OrloSaulFight
_source: speak;Saul;With all the evil you've done,{w} I dare say you've lost the right to call yourself a bishop.
speak;Orlo;Evil? I am simply living as I like.{w} All deeds are righteous if done in the name of the gods.{w} Very convenient, don't you think?
speak;Saul;You're a disgrace to the church...{w} Punishment awaits you!

name: OrloElenFight
_source: speak;Elen;Aren't you...a priest?{w} The things you've done...
speak;Orlo;What of them?{w} Anything can go unpunished...if done in the name of the gods!
speak;Elen;...There is no salvation for you.

name: KleinSoldierDies
condition: unit.nid=='122' or unit.nid=='123' or unit.nid=='124' or unit.nid=='125'

name: TheaSoldierDies
condition: unit.nid=='126' or unit.nid=='127' or unit.nid=='128' or unit.nid=='129'

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;To liberate the people of the Western Isles, Roy heads for Juteaux,{w} the Isles' largest city and its capital.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}According to Elffin, Lord Arcardo, who is in charge of overseeing the Western Isles,{w} is an Etrurian of high nobility but of little prominence in the Etrurian court.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo)}{c:wait;400}{clear}Roy, still wary of how Etruria may respond to his attack,{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes} prepares his soldiers to rid the Isles of Arcardo to rescue the people...;;;narration;;;;;;;;FLAG(hold)
speak;Flaer;Lord Arcardo. Why do you fret so?
speak;Arcardo;It's the Lycian army!{w} They come for my blood!

speak;Flaer;Yes, they have been a thorn in Bern's side for some time...|We knew it would be difficult if they became too close with Etruria.{w} That's why we had you send them here. Ending them should have been simple.{w} It seems, however, they fight even better than expected.

speak;Arcardo;You don't understand the gravity of this situation!{w} Do you realize how much I've lost thanks to their meddling?{w} All the riches I've reaped from these islands are gone!|...And on top of that, now they want my life!{w} Once they arrive, my legacy is finished!|My hands are shaking. I don't know what to do...
speak;Flaer;My, how you worry.{w} I suggest you flee to the mainland. To Etruria.
speak;Flaer;Warfare is Bern's strong suit. We also have our secret weapon ready to brandish.{w} With it we shall erase the Lycian Army once and for all.
speak;Flaer;Lord Arcardo.{w} Once Bern and Etruria join forces, we will have no reason to fear anyone.{w} Am I wrong?
speak;Arcardo;No... No!{w} You're right. I leave them to you.
speak;Flaer;Hmph, cowardly Etrurian nobles.{w} If we defeat the Lycian Army here, the Isles shall be ours...
speak;Roy;This is the capital...{w} Once we take it, we can finally go home.
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy, I have heard some troubling rumors from the people living around here.{w} They say an "unhuman" resides in the castle.
speak;Elffin;They say there is a man who changes form...{w}into a dragon.
speak;Roy;A man? Who turns into a dragon?
speak;Elffin;I can say nothing more at this point, but we must proceed with caution.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lugh' or u.nid=='Chad']

name: EinAppears
_source: speak;Flaer;I will make a report about the Lycian Army to General Narcian.{w} I want you to defend the castle while I am away.
speak;Flaer;Just the wind...?{w}{clear}Ahem.{w} I will take my leave now. I leave them to your discretion.
speak;Flaer;Ha ha...{w} The Lycian Army will hardly be able to stand against this dragon.{w} Normal weapons won't even scratch its skin.|These manaketes...{w} They certainly are terrifying beasts.
speak;Raigh;...So that's what the "unhuman" is.{w} Bern really has brought dragons into this world.|...What to do now...?|I guess I'll pose as a soldier and observe the dragon's power.

name: CathAppears
_source: speak;Cath;La la la la la, la la la la la...|All the way out here in the Isles West, folks work to death for nobles in their nest! This castle's sure to be brimming with treasure! All this loot was stolen anyway. Might as well take it off these nobles' hands.

name: ReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;The reinforcements from the south will arrive shortly!

name: RaighChadTalk
_source: speak;Chad;Raigh! What are you doing here?
speak;Raigh;My thoughts exactly, Chad.{w} What happened to the orphanage?
speak;Chad;...I knew you'd be concerned.{w} You ran off, but I knew you'd never forget us.
speak;Raigh;I was never concerned. I was just curious.
speak;Chad;Bern's troops burned it to the ground when they invaded Lycia.{w} Poppa... He couldn't...
speak;Chad;I'm going to avenge him.{w} We're stuck on these Isles now.{w} But I know we'll go back and fight Bern full force some day...!
speak;Chad;I suppose there's no point in telling you, though, is there?
speak;Raigh;Bern has a deep connection with the dragons. I want to learn more.
speak;Chad;...So that's it.{w} Fine. Just don't get in my way.
speak;Chad;Raigh! What are you doing here?
speak;Raigh;My thoughts exactly, Chad.{w} I heard from Lugh about the orphanage.
speak;Chad;...And what did you think about that?
speak;Raigh;I've joined up with your army, by the way.{w} I want to learn more about these dragons.
speak;Chad;...Of course you do.{w} Fine. But I'm here to avenge Poppa.{w} Just don't get in my way.

name: RaighLughTalk
_source: speak;Lugh;Raigh? Raigh!{w} It's so good to see you!
speak;Raigh;Lugh...!{w} What are you doing here?
speak;Lugh;I'm glad you're OK. We were all worried about you.{w} I know you wanted to train your magic skills, but you left so suddenly.
speak;Raigh;I couldn't have learned magic if I'd stayed in that orphanage.{w} It was a miracle I picked up as much as I did.
speak;Lugh;Bern came...{w} and burned it down.
speak;Lugh;Poppa was killed trying to protect us...{w} The young children are under the care of the St. Elimine Church now.
speak;Raigh;...I see.{w} It's for the best...{w} They'll be happier at the church than at that dilapidated orphanage.
speak;Lugh;You don't have to be so callous about it.
speak;Lugh;Raigh! Come with us.{w} We'll defeat Bern, and then we can go back to the children!
speak;Raigh;Then again...{w}the Lycian Army might be good company. They're sure to come across more dragons at some point.{w} All right, you got me. I suppose I'll go with you.
speak;Raigh;I just want you to know one thing.{w} I'm not joining to avenge Poppa or the orphanage!
speak;Raigh;Then stop looking at me like that!
speak;Raigh; I know. I heard from Chad just a moment ago.
speak;Raigh;Yes. In fact,{w} I've joined up with this army you're in.
speak;Raigh;I just want you to know one thing.{w} I'm not here to avenge Poppa or the orphanage!
speak;Raigh;Then stop looking at me like that!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;That was not an easy battle...{w} The dragons' power is truly... horrific.
speak;Roy;How many of these dragons does Bern have...?{w} How can we expect to be victorious against monsters like these?!
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy! Keep a level head.
speak;Elffin;...I understand your worries.{w} But if you panic, that feeling will spread to the army.{w} You must remember that.
speak;Elffin;It is a perfectly understandable reaction after a fight like that.{w} But...we also gained knowledge we did not have before.
speak;Elffin;Don't you remember?{w} I told you Arcardo was rumored to be working with Bern.
speak;Roy;Oh, that's right!{w} If Bern's dragons are in an Etrurian castle...
speak;Elffin;Arcardo has indeed made a deal with Bern.
speak;Roy;...That means Lycia is in danger...{w} We must return to the mainland.{w} We have to contact General Cecilia and conceive a plan...
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy,{w} before returning to the mainland, there is a matter to take care of.
speak;Elffin;No, thankfully.{w} A legendary weapon is hidden in a cave not far from here.{w} If we obtain it, we can fight the dragons more effectively.
speak;Roy;A legendary weapon...{w} You're right! If we can get all eight of them,{w} we might have a chance of defeating Bern!
speak;Elffin;Yes... We must find as many as we can.
speak;Roy;Then let's go to the cave and get it!
speak;BlueSoldier;R-report! I have a message from Etruria...|A revolution has broken out in Aquileia, capital of Etruria.

speak;BlueSoldier;The ones leading the revolution are High Chancellor Roartz and Lord Arcardo.{w} They have captured King Mordred.{w} They also say they plan to divide dominion of the continent between Bern and Etruria!
speak;Merlinus;The two strongest nations in Elibe joining forces...
speak;Roy;Is General Cecilia all right?!{w} And what of Princess Guinivere...

speak;BlueSoldier;We don't have any current information...|But the three Etrurian Generals have parted ways and are working separately.{w} Mage General Cecilia has fled Aquileia for the Missur Peninsula in the southwest.
speak;BlueSoldier;They're with the revolutionaries against their will because the king was taken hostage.
speak;Roy;We need to contact General Cecilia...|Princess Guinivere... Please be safe...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Following Elffin's guidance,|Roy heads for a cave near Juteaux to obtain a legendary weapon.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Elffin (Elffin)}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}But Roy and company aren't the only ones who know of the cave.|Yet another battle awaits them...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.12x: The Axe of Thunder
speak;Guerrero;This is the end of the caaave?{w} Treasuuure... Where are yooouu...?{w} Answer meee...
speak;GenericBandit1;Boss... Are you sure about this?{w} The men from Bern just told us to block the entrance.{w} If they catch us now, they'll surely have us back in chains!

speak;Guerrero;We'll do as we're told in tiiime...|They'll never know that we took the treasuuure...|If we block the entrance without taking the treasure, it's all the same anywaaay...|Do you really want that poor treasure trapped in here for all eternityyy?
speak;GenericBandit1;Well, when you put it that way... I guess you're right.
speak;Scollan;Boss! There's an army stationed outside the cave!
speak;Guerrero;Whaaat? They want to take our treasure, do theeey?{w} Have the boys near the entrance take them ooouut...{w} And grab all the treasure cheeests... We rightfully stole them fiiirst!
speak;Roy;A legendary weapon lies in this cave...?{w} It's so dark in here.
speak;Elffin;According to the scholar in Juteaux I spoke to,{w} the legendary weapon in this cave is most likely the Thunder Axe, Armads.
speak;Elffin;Armads was wielded by Durban the Berserker,{w} who was said to be a colossus of a man.{w} A single blow from his axe surely made short work of any opponent.
speak;Roy;Elffin, you seem to know a lot about the Eight Legends and their weapons.
speak;Elffin;I'm a bard. It is my job to know myths and legends.
speak;Roy;I'd like to hear some of them when we have the time.
speak;Elffin;Of course.|...Lord Roy, it seems we are not alone in this cave.
speak;Elffin;There are also noxious fumes coming from the cave walls. We must tread lightly.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Elffin;Hmm... I hear wind blowing from behind the throne.
speak;Roy;A niche...between the floor and the wall.|Oh! It opened!|...So this is the legendary weapon? This axe is enormous.
speak;Elffin;Armads...|The very axe wielded by Durban the Berserker.{w} It certainly appears fit for a warrior of his stature.
speak;BlueSolder;Lord Roy, here it is!{w} There's a large axe behind the throne!
speak;BlueSoldier;R-report! I have a message from Etruria...|A revolution has broken out in Aquileia, capital of Etruria.

speak;BlueSoldier;The ones leading the revolution are High Chancellor Roartz and Lord Arcardo.{w} They have captured King Mordred.{w} They also say they plan to divide dominion of the continent between Bern and Etruria!
speak;Merlinus;The two strongest nations in Elibe joining forces...
speak;Roy;Is General Cecilia all right?!{w} And what of Princess Guinivere...

speak;BlueSoldier;We don't have any current information...|But the three Etrurian Generals have parted ways and are working separately.{w} Mage General Cecilia has fled Aquileia for the Missur Peninsula in the southwest.
speak;BlueSoldier;They're with the revolutionaries against their will because the king was taken hostage.
speak;Roy;We need to contact General Cecilia...|Princess Guinivere... Please be safe...

name: GaidenFailed
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Did you handle the cave on the outskirts of town?
speak;DeepRedSoldier;Yes, sir. The bandits have blocked off all entrance to it.|No one will be able to get to the legendary weapon now.
speak;RedSoldier;Excellent! Now all we have to do is clean up the Lycian Army.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;The chaos caused by the coup in Aquileia quickly spreads to the rest of Etruria.{w}{c:add_portrait;Cecilia (Cecilia);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{c:add_portrait;Guinivere (Guinivere);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}Cecilia escapes with Guinivere from Aquileia.|She also forms a loyalist group to combat the revolutionaries.|{c:multi_remove_portrait;Cecilia (Cecilia);Guinivere (Guinivere)}The revolutionaries, however, have Bern on their side.|{c:add_portrait;King Mordred;CenterRight,Middle;left;OpenEyes}King Mordred has also been taken hostage, giving the revolutionaries another edge:{w}{c:remove_portrait;King Mordred}{c:add_portrait;Douglas (Douglas);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{c:add_portrait;Perceval (Perceval);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)} Great General Douglas and Knight General Perceval are forced into their service.|With so much power, the revolutionaries easily push the loyalists out of Etruria.;;;narration;FLAG(hold)

speak;Narrator;The loyalists are driven into an old castle on the Missur Peninsula.{w}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}Roy learns that Cecilia has been forced back by the revolutionaries.;top;;narration;FLAG(hold)

speak;Narrator;In response, Roy heads for Missur.{w}{clear}The loyalists are under attack by both revolutionaries and Bern's military.|With such adversity, the loyalists' forces have little time...;top;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narcian;You haven't taken the castle yet?!
speak;Flaer;The loyalists led by General Cecilia fight harder than anticipated...
speak;Narcian;Cecilia...! That woman!{w} She interferes in my work yet again!
speak;Zephiel;You seem to be having trouble, Narcian.
speak;Zephiel;Just this moment.{w} The general from Etruria fights well, I see.
speak;Narcian;Yes, Your Majesty...|But everything will soon be under our control.
speak;Zephiel;Allow me. I will squash her myself.
speak;Idunn Hood;Your Majesty, there is no need...
speak;Zephiel;These arms could use some exercise. It's no bother.
speak;Merlinus;The castle has yet to fall, Lord Roy.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Larum' or u.nid=='Elffin']

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;The important thing is that you are alive...|But how are your wounds? Are you all right?
speak;Cecilia;Yes, I'm fine. This girl treated them for me.
speak;Sophia;I am Sophia... A shaman of Arcadia...
speak;Cecilia;She foresaw your coming.{w} She also said she would explain her story once we had time.
speak;Sophia;Yes, now is fine...|Arcadia, my home, lies to the east in the Nabata desert...|We have always kept hidden...but Bern discovered our existence...and...
speak;Sophia;Yes...I...was too slow to act, so I was captured...
speak;Roy;Why would Bern attack a small village like yours?
speak;Sophia;I do not know...{w} Perhaps they learned of the dragons that live in Arcadia...
speak;Sophia;That's right...Arcadia was founded by both dragon and man ages ago...
speak;Roy;...I never knew such a place existed...
speak;Merlinus;Her story seems too fantastic to be true.
speak;Roy;Dragons or no, I believe her when she says Bern attacked her village.{w} Sophia, we are in your debt for saving General Cecilia.|We owe it to you to do what we can to save your village.
speak;Roy;Can you tell me more about this Arcadia?|And the dragons?
speak;Sophia;...Yes... I will gladly tell you all that I know...
speak;GreenSoldier;General Perceval, we will station ourselves at this castle.{w} We shall prepare for further attacks from the revolutionaries.
speak;GreenSoldier;We found this in the castle. Please take it.|General Perceval, please... Save Etruria.

name: ZephielCeciliaBattle
_source: speak;Zephiel;So you are Cecilia, Mage General of Etruria.
speak;Zephiel;You fight well. I reward you with the honor of dueling me.
speak;Zephiel;She lost consciousness...{w} How disappointing. I expected more.
speak;Zephiel;I suppose it was foolish to expect a challenge from an Etrurian.
speak;Narcian;If you would allow it, Your Majesty,{w} will you leave her to me?
speak;Narcian;She has caused me...certain difficulties.{w} I want to see that she suffers for them.
speak;Zephiel;Hmph. Very well. Do as you wish.
speak;Narcian;Thank you, Your Majesty.|You! Ready a cell in the dungeon!

name: CastleStatusUpdate
_source: speak;Merlinus;There's no report of her death, but it looks grim...
speak;Roy;There's still a possibility that she's alive.{w} We can't give up on her. We must hurry!

name: PercevalUpdate
_source: speak;Perceval;...This wasn't in the agreement.{w} They promised to leave Etrurian matters to us of Etruria.
speak;Perceval;Was it General Narcian who made the order to attack the castle?
speak;RedSoldier;No, sir. It was King Zephiel himself.
speak;Perceval;Then Bern never saw us as partners to begin with.{w} We will observe for now and fall back in time.

name: ZephielGuinivereTalk
_source: speak;Narcian;Your Majesty! We have found Princess Guinivere.
speak;Zephiel;Guinivere. So good to see you.
speak;Guinivere;Zephiel, why?{w} Why do you continue this war?{w} So many innocent people have died...
speak;Zephiel;Innocent, you say?{w} Pah. Jealousy, vanity, greed...|Men kill because of these petty emotions all across the realm.|How can you say they are innocent?
speak;Zephiel;The world must be liberated from these trivial creations of man.{w} That is the purpose of this war.
speak;Guinivere;But...so many people are being killed in the process.
speak;Zephiel;A few worthless lives are a fair trade for the change I desire.
speak;Zephiel;Guinivere, you are my only sister. My only surviving blood relative.{w} As such, I forgive you this time, but I shan't the next.{w} You would do well to remember that.
speak;Zephiel;Narcian! Is the head of Guinivere's guard present?
speak;Narcian;Yes, Your Majesty. Melady is here.
speak;Zephiel;Good. Have her take Guinivere back to Bern.|Also have her ensure the Fire Emblem is returned to the Shrine of Seals.

name: MeladyGuinivereJoin
_source: speak;Melady;Your Highness, I am pleased to see you safe.
speak;Melady;Now, let us return to Bern...
speak;Melady;W-what are you doing?!{w} Put that sword down before you hurt yourself!
speak;Melady;What?!|...And what will Your Highness do if she is freed?
speak;Guinivere;...I understand Roy and the Lycian Alliance are nearby...

speak;Guinivere;I cannot sit idly by and watch as the world is overrun by Bern's forces...|No matter the reason, it is senselessly violent conquest.{w} What kind of future will this war lead us to...?
speak;Guinivere;Melady... I ask you to let me go.
speak;Melady;There is just one thing I wish to ask, Your Highness.{w} When you left Bern, why did you not ask my opinion...?
speak;Guinivere;I thought involving you would damage your reputation.{w} I didn't want you to be branded a traitor like me.
speak;Melady;Does Your Highness honestly think I would ever pay any heed to that?{w} I serve Your Highness before I serve Bern.{w} It has been so since I was knighted.
speak;Melady;If you tell me to let you go,{w} then with pleasure, I will.|I ask only one favor of you.|Allow me to accompany you.
speak;Melady;Please lower your weapons! I am not an enemy!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, it may be a trick...
speak;Melady;My name is Melady. It is a pleasure to meet you.
speak;Guinivere;Yes, truly. She is gravely wounded, but she is alive.{w} She is locked in a cell in the castle.
speak;Roy;Thank you! We have to rescue her!

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan1;Here, take this ring.{w} It will build up your muscles when you use it.|...It might make the ladies a little less attractive, though.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerMan1;I thought I'd try to defend myself with this sword, but I don't know how to use it.{w} It's a nice sword though, isn't it? The last one to use it was a kid named Al.|He was a courageous one, and he stood up to Bern, just like you.|Here. I'll give it to you. Use it to end this war!

name: ZephielLeaves
_source: speak;Idunn Hood;Yes, the dragons are prepared to fight at your command.
speak;Zephiel;I will give you some dragons to fortify your legion.{w} I want you to go with your troops to Nabata after cleaning up here.
speak;Narcian;Nabata? The desert lands to the east of here?
speak;Zephiel;Correct. There is tell of a hidden village in the desert.{w} Dragons have supposedly been living there since the Scouring.
speak;Narcian;Ah, now I understand...{w} A legendary weapon is likely hidden there.
speak;Zephiel;Precisely. It must not fall into enemy hands.{w} I sent some men in already, but they seem to be outnumbered.
speak;Narcian;Leave it to me, Your Majesty.{w} The village shall be ours.
speak;Zephiel;...I trust that it will. Do not disappoint me.
speak;Narcian;You can rest easy, Your Majesty!|By my honor as Wyvern General, I will not fail you!

name: SophiaCeciliaTalk
_source: speak;Sophia;You're not well yet... You mustn't move.
speak;Sophia;Yes... I'm not an expert, however...{w} My work may leave something to be desired...
speak;Cecilia;No, it's fine. Thank you. We must find a way out of here...|...Ow...!
speak;Sophia;Don't move... Your wound will open...
speak;Sophia;Everything will be fine...|I see a light... It will arrive shortly...
speak;Sophia;Yes... A light that will aid us...|We must wait patiently...
speak;Sophia;I am Sophia...A shaman of Arcadia...
speak;Sophia;I will tell you more later... For now, please just trust me...

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy1;Cecilia, Perceval, and Douglas! They're the three Etrurian Generals.{w} Even the three Wyvern Generals of Bern are no match for them.|...That's what I'd like to think, anyway.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana1;General Perceval still swears loyalty to Prince Myrddin even after his passing.|Loyal and hard-working to the end. That's what I call a real man...

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerMan1;General Cecilia...She was defeated in one blow...|King Zephiel is more powerful than any of us could have imagined...

name: NarcianLeaves
_source: speak;Flaer;General Narcian! It's them! The Lycian Army!
speak;Narcian;What?! Flaer, you cad!{w} I thought you took care of them at Juteaux!
speak;Flaer;I did!|Well...I left a dragon to deal with them...|I never thought they would survive!

speak;Narcian;Disregarding your failure, my reputation is at stake!|They defeated a dragon, so they must be more hardy than I expected.|Yet if I can't defeat them here, people will doubt my ability...
speak;Flaer;General Narcian... What should we do?
speak;Narcian;There is only one thing we CAN do...|Flaer. I will return to Aquileia and prepare to face the Lycian Army.|You stay here.
speak;Narcian;Don't worry. I don't expect you to defeat them.{w} All I want is for you to hit them as hard as you can and soften them up a bit.
speak;Flaer;General Narcian! You intend to use me as fodder?!

speak;Narcian;Flaer...|In truth, your failure in the Western Isles is grounds for execution.{w} I am giving you one last chance to prove that you aren't a complete failure.|You should be thanking me, if anything.|Hm...hm...hm...
speak;Narcian;I can personally execute you now if you prefer.
speak;Narcian;Good. Then I bid you adieu.

name: FlaerFight
_source: speak;Flaer;You've made it...|But I am a knight of Bern! I will not surrender!

name: FlaerDeath
_source: speak;Flaer;I may fall, but Bern cannot be stopped...|Your defeat is inevitable...|Be sure of it...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Killing Edge,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Killer Lance,Javelin,Iron Bow,Steel Bow,Killer Bow;armory

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After Roy rescues Cecilia,{w}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Sophia (Sophia);Right;left;OpenEyes} he obliges Sophia's request and heads into the Nabata desert.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Sophia (Sophia)}{clear}According to Sophia, her village, Arcadia, is located in a hidden oasis.|The village is under attack by Bern,{w} and Roy believes their aim to be the dragons said to inhabit the village.{w}{clear}The Lycian Army moves quickly to Arcadia, but a sandstorm impedes their progress...;0,0;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Igrene;Hurry, Fae!{w} Follow this path and find a place to hide. Can you make it?
speak;Igrene;Now is no time for complaints.{w} Go, or Bern's soldiers will find us.
speak;Igrene;I don't know...|She may have been captured by Bern's troops.
speak;Fae;But if Bern catches us, then we can see the outside world!
speak;Igrene;Fae, no. The elder strictly forbids communication with the outside world.
speak;Igrene;No.|...I do wonder how Bern found out about our village, however...|Perhaps it is related to the ominous force Sophia detected in the soldiers...
speak;Igrene;Ah, sorry! Now is not the time for that!|Fae! Over here! Hurry!
speak;Fae;...I want to see the outside world, too.
speak;Randy;Zeiss! Has General Narcian arrived yet?
speak;Zeiss;He sent some sellswords and dragons, but the general himself isn't here.
speak;Randy;What on earth is he thinking? How does he expect these sparse troops to tip the odds in our favor...?
speak;Randy;King Zephiel must be notified about the dragons living here.{w} Zeiss, go to Aquileia and make a report to His Majesty.
speak;Randy;Tell him that dragons do indeed inhabit this village.{w} A captive tells us there are even divine dragons, the most powerful of all.|...Go quickly.
speak;Sophia;Yes... These sandstorms have always protected our village from intruders.
speak;Roy;I can imagine that most who wander into this mess would give up quickly.{w} I can barely see an arm's length ahead...|In which direction do we move?
speak;Sophia;There may be objects covered by the sand, blown about by the storm...|Please watch your step...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;In the hidden village of Arcadia stands an ancient temple.{w} One of the legendary weapons is said to be hidden within.|Roy and company are hot on the trail of Bern's troops, who have already made their way into the temple...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Oates;Haven't you found the legendary weapon yet?!
speak;RedSoldier;We believe it is inside this altar, but we can't get it open...
speak;Oates;Break it open if you have to! It doesn't matter!
speak;RedSoldier;The enemy has already entered the temple, so the men are all preparing for battle!{w} We don't have the manpower to break it open right now!
speak;Oates;Blasted distractions... We don't have time for this.{w} As soon as the enemy is defeated, locating the weapon is our highest priority.
speak;Roy;This is what it looks like under the desert?{w} There's so much...water.
speak;Sophia;This is close to a source of groundwater...|This is the reason plants and animals can live in our village...
speak;Roy;So this is the source of the oasis.{w} Still, how did you find such an ideal location?
speak;Roy;You mean the Athos of the Eight Legends?

speak;Sophia;Yes...{w} After the Scouring...Archsage Athos traveled all across Elibe...{w} At the end of his journey, he discovered our village of both man and dragon...|He told us it was only a matter of time until we were discovered...
speak;Roy;So he brought you into the desert where you can stay hidden...
speak;Sophia;Yes...{w} He concealed his legendary weapon within this temple...
speak;Roy;Will your village permit us to use this legendary weapon?
speak;Sophia;The Archsage said that we were to use his weapon to protect Arcadia...{w} As long as you use it...to save Elibe and to protect us...then of course...
speak;Roy;It will be invaluable. Thank you.
speak;Sophia;Some of the pathways in this temple will sink into the water without warning...|Please be careful...

name: PercevalLarumJoin
_source: speak;Larum;Sir Perceval! It is you, isn't it?{w} I've been looking for you!|I am...
speak;Larum;Wait! Wait! Stop! Listen to me!
speak;Larum;You don't remember?! We met before.
speak;Perceval;...I think I recall seeing you at Douglas's manor.
speak;Perceval;But the girl I met then was far less...garish.
speak;Larum;What's that supposed to mean?{w} Ah, never mind. My name is Larum. I'm here on the orders of Prince Myrddin.
speak;Perceval;Prince Myrddin...? Don't be daft.{w} The prince passed away in an accident over a year ago.
speak;Perceval;That emblem...!! It belonged to the prince...!
speak;Larum;Now do I have your attention?{w} Look at this letter, too. The prince told me to give it to you.
speak;Perceval;......|His Highness's handwriting... He lives!|I hesitate no more.{w} If the prince is in the Lycian Army, then I am as well.
speak;Larum;Wha--? That was quick...{w} I was hoping things would get a little more dramatic...{w} Like, "If you want my skill, you'll have to best me first!"|Oh well. This works too.

name: PercevalElffinJoin
_source: speak;Elffin;Perceval. It is good to see you.
speak;Perceval;No... I could never.{w} But it cannot be...|The prince...is dead.
speak;Elffin;...I understand your confusion.{w} A man who was declared dead stands before your very eyes.
speak;Elffin;I'm sorry to have put you through such trouble.|...It has already been over a year since the attempt on my life.
speak;Perceval;Attempt on your life?!{w} I thought Your Highness fell off his horse in an accident.
speak;Elffin;I was hit with poisoned darts.{w} One to my horse...and one to myself...

speak;Elffin;Douglas was the first to notice and made it public that I had died.{w} A look-alike corpse was placed in my coffin.{w} It was all an act to make it appear that the assassination had been successful.{w} Douglas entrusted me to his daughter and had me escape to the Western Isles.
speak;Perceval;Sir Douglas knew all this time...
speak;Elffin;Even after I escaped west, the poison had me ill for many months.{w} I drifted between life and death for so long that Douglas' daughter nearly lost hope.
speak;Elffin;The resistance force nursed me back to health.{w} Ironic, isn't it?|The resistance, enemy of the nobility, saved the life of the prince of Etruria!
speak;Elffin;My recovery...was slow.{w} I saw the crimes committed by Etrurian nobles firsthand.{w} I felt so ashamed that I had never noticed while I was on the throne.
speak;Elffin;As I aided the resistance, I waited for my chance to return to the mainland.{w} Then along came Roy, and I knew it was time.{w} That is how I ended up here.
speak;Perceval;My prince...|I am thankful beyond words that you are alive.
speak;Elffin;I am now with the Lycian Army, and my identity must remain hidden.{w} However, if I still have the loyalty you pledged to me in the past...
speak;Perceval;Until the day I die, my prince.{w} I have only one master, and it is you, Prince Myrddin.

name: PercevalLeaves
_source: speak;Perceval;Bern's actions are an insult to Etruria.{w} I cannot aid Bern any further. We must return to Aquileia.{w} I will inform General Douglas of this and plan a new course of action.|Fall back at once!

name: MaggieAndRoseAppear
_source: speak;Rose;Maggie, my sweet,{w} did you see that group heading right into the desert?
speak;Maggie;Yes, Rose,{w} I most certainly did.
speak;Rose;They must be headed for the hidden village said to be near here, Maggie.
speak;Maggie;Bless my soul, Rose.{w} I believe you may be correct.
speak;Rose;But my sweet Maggie,{w} we wouldn't want to get lost in the sandstorm, would we?
speak;Maggie;Of course not, Rose.{w} Then we wouldn't be able to find our way home.
speak;Rose;Do you think we should give up on the village then, Maggie?
speak;Maggie;My dear Rose,{w} you forget the rumors say there is great treasure in the village.
speak;Rose;Well, we certainly wouldn't want to miss out on that, would we, Maggie?
speak;Maggie;Of course not, Rose.{w} It would make us far richer than ambushing travelers has.
speak;Rose;But I don't want to get lost, Maggie.
speak;Maggie;My dear Rose, hear me out.{w} We need only follow closely behind the group we saw heading into the desert.|That will ensure they lead us right to the village.
speak;Rose;What a wonderful idea, Maggie.{w} And once we reach the village, we can thank them by mashing their heads in.
speak;Rose;Let's be off then. Shall we, Maggie?
speak;Rose;Then let's waste no time, my sweet Maggie.

name: RoseDeath
_source: speak;Rose;Dear me, Maggie... This hurts, doesn't it?

name: MaggieDeath
_source: speak;Maggie;Oh my, Rose... I've never known such pain.

name: RandyDeath
_source: speak;Randy;You're so strong... I'm impressed...|It's an honor to die by your hand...

name: RandyFight
_source: speak;Randy;My sword is unmatchable. Choose your death.|Will you die by the blade... or by its light?

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;Have you heard of the sky god, Delphi?|He is said to race through the skies and protect all living things.|They say that with his blessing, wyvern riders and pegasus knights can fly freely without danger...

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy3;There are a lot of things buried in the sand.|If you're really lucky, you might find something good.|Try looking around the bones.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Steel Sword,Steel Blade,Steel Lance,Steel Axe,Steel Bow;armory

name: StormLifts
_source: speak;Merlinus;This is our chance, Lord Roy!{w} The village is in clear sight now!
speak;Roy;But it is to the enemy, too. We must hurry!

name: GaidenFailed
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Sir Randy, we have finished searching the village.
speak;Randy;Did you find the Legendary weapon?
speak;RedSoldier;No...|But we destroyed all the passageways we suspected might lead to it.
speak;Randy;Good work. Now all that's left is to stop the Lycian Army.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;That was a difficult battle... but we won.{w} Sophia, where are the villagers?|Sophia, are you OK? What's wrong?
speak;Roy;This door...? It looks like it's been forced open.|What lies inside the temple?
speak;Sophia;Something we call a legendary weapon...|It is a spell tome...
speak;Roy;A legendary weapon?!{w} There's one here, too?!{w} ...That must be what Bern was after!|Are we too late?
speak;Sophia;It is still here... I can sense it...
speak;Roy;All right! Then let's get it!|We may still be able to stop Bern!
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Who trespasses in this place? What is your business here?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. Sophia brought me here.{w} I came to protect the village.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Sophia...? Then it was you who drove off Bern's soldiers?{w} Oh dear... Please forgive me.|I am the elder of Arcadia.
speak;Roy;The elder... Are you a dragon?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;A dragon...{w} I have been called that before. But that was a time long past.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Let me think...|Yes, the only real dragon we have now is Fae right here.
speak;Roy;This little girl is a dragon?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Yes, though she has not yet matured.
speak;Roy;Elder, do you know anything about the dragons fighting for Bern?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;What?! Bern is allied with dragons?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;I do not know...|Dragons are not supposed to exist in this world, except for in this village.
speak;Igrene;Sophia said that she could detect an evil force emanating from Bern's troops.{w} It may be related to the dragons Roy says he has seen with Bern.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Perhaps...|I am too old to detect such forces now myself.
speak;Roy;Sophia can detect an evil force? What does that mean?

speak;VillagerOldMan3;Sophia is half dragon and half human.{w} That gives her the ability to detect the auras emitted by other dragons.|She says, however, that she detects an unnaturally twisted force from Bern.
speak;Igrene;I think that it should be investigated further.{w} Elder, if you will allow it, I would like to join Roy so that I might learn more.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;I would prefer not to involve ourselves in outside matters...{w} But this is certainly a special case.|Will you take her, Roy?
speak;Igrene;I am Igrene, Guardian of Nabata.{w} I am confident in my skills with the bow.{w} I believe I can aid you in battle.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Don't be ridiculous. You may not.{w} There is no telling what may happen if the world learns of your existence!
speak;Roy;If there is nothing else, left's be off.
speak;Fae;...Fine... I will just follow them sneakily!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Sophia;It is here... Inside this altar...
speak;Sophia;Only those of the village may open the altar...|Please allow me...
speak;Sophia;......|There... This is the legendary weapon.
speak;Sophia;Yes...{w} It is the Infernal Truth. Forblaze...
speak;BlueSoldier;The tome appears to be inside the altar, Lord Roy.
speak;BlueSoldier;I sent some people to ask the villagers about it.
speak;Roy;Thank you, but let's not force the issue.{w} If they will not give us permission to use it, then we leave it here.
speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy! The villagers helped us remove the tome from the altar!|Here it is.
speak;Elffin;...If this is what Archsage Athos used,{w} it must be Forblaze, the Infernal Truth.{w} The legends say that none could escape its fiery punishment.
speak;Roy;...We must use it cautiously then.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Who trespasses in this place? What is your business here?
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. Sophia brought me here.{w} I came to protect the village.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Sophia...? Then it was you who drove off Bern's soldiers?{w} Oh dear... Please forgive me.|I am the elder of Arcadia.
speak;Roy;The elder... Are you a dragon?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;A dragon...{w} I have been called that before. But that was a time long past.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Let me think...|Yes, the only real dragon we have now is Fae right here.
speak;Roy;This little girl is a dragon?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Yes, though she has not yet matured.
speak;Roy;Elder, do you know anything about the dragons fighting for Bern?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;What?! Bern is allied with dragons?
speak;VillagerOldMan3;I do not know...|Dragons are not supposed to exist in this world, except for in this village.
speak;Igrene;Sophia said that she could detect an evil force emanating from Bern's troops.{w} It may be related to the dragons Roy says he has seen with Bern.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Perhaps...|I am too old to detect such forces now myself.
speak;Roy;Sophia can detect an evil force? What does that mean?

speak;VillagerOldMan3;Sophia is half dragon and half human.{w} That gives her the ability to detect the auras emitted by other dragons.|She says, however, that she detects an unnaturally twisted force from Bern.
speak;Igrene;I think that it should be investigated further.{w} Elder, if you will allow it, I would like to join Roy so that I might learn more.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;I would prefer not to involve ourselves in outside matters...{w} But this is certainly a special case.|Will you take her, Roy?
speak;Igrene;I am Igrene, Guardian of Nabata.{w} I am confident in my skills with the bow.{w} I believe I can aid you in battle.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Don't be ridiculous. You may not.{w} There is no telling what may happen if the world learns of your existence!
speak;Roy;If there is nothing else, left's be off.
speak;Fae;...Fine... I will just follow them sneakily!

name: OatesFight
_source: speak;Oates;I...wasn't expecting you to put up such a fight.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After saving the village of Arcadia,{w} Roy's army leaves the desert by following Igrene's lead.|{c:remove_portrait;Igrene (Igrene)}Now, they turn toward Etruria to confront the revolutionary forces.{w}{clear}However, they receive a troubling letter from the elder of Arcadia.{w}{c:add_portrait;Fae (Fae);CenterRight,Middle;right;OpenEyes}{clear}Apparently, Fae the dragon has left Arcadia in pursuit of Roy.|If she falls into the hands of the revolutionaries or Bern,{w} there is no telling what might happen to her, or to Roy's army.{w}{clear}Determined to find Fae, Roy moves to a small fort on the Etrurian border...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;RedSoldier;Commander Raith, I have an update on the girl we captured...
speak;Raith;Girl? The one that was scurrying around outside the castle?
speak;Raith;I distinctly recall telling you to throw her out!
speak;RedSoldier;But sir, she was carrying this.
speak;Raith;Do you know what this is used for?
speak;RedSoldier;I saw ones like it in the invasion of Lycia.|The manaketes that joined us carried them when they were in human form.

speak;Raith;...This one does look a tad different from the other dragonstones I've seen.|Still, the possibility that she is a dragon cannot be ignored.|We should inform King Zephiel and await further orders.|Keep the girl inside the castle!
#move to Perceval if not recruited in Ch. 13
speak;Roy;Fae has been taken to that castle?
speak;Merlinus;That's what the locals told me.
speak;Igrene;Roy, I apologize...|This is my fault for not considering what Fae might do.|We have no time for this rescue. We must hurry to Aquileia.
speak;Roy;This is nobody's fault.{w} If Bern gets their hands on her, it could be catastrophic.
speak;Igrene;She should be safe as long as she remains in human form and hides her dragonstone.

speak;Igrene;When dragons are in human form, they seal their power into dragonstones.|Dragons use vast amounts of energy to maintain their true shape,{w} so most remain in human form to minimize the stress on their bodies.
speak;Roy;That must be what the unhumans from Bern do as well.
speak;Igrene;From what you have told me, that seems most likely.|Dragons have apparently been taking human form since the end of the Scouring.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, the spy we sent to the castle has returned.
speak;Merlinus;Many soldiers are coming out of the castle.|They seem to be fortifying their defenses.
speak;Roy;They must have discovered that Fae is a dragon...
speak;Merlinus;The troops on the border seem to have noticed us.

name: PercevalAppears
_source: speak;Douglas;Perceval, you don't have to do this.
speak;Perceval;Please don't worry about me, Sir Douglas. You must return to King Mordred.
speak;Douglas;But attacking the Lycian Army...? It is pointless.
speak;Perceval;Roartz only wants me out of the capital.{w} He's worried I'll stab him in the back when he isn't looking.
speak;Douglas;That man, worrying about traitors? Hah!|Why, he was the first to betray his loyalty to the king!{w} Truly a snake if I ever met one.
speak;Perceval;No one's loyalty to Etruria can compare to yours, Sir Douglas.

speak;Perceval;...When Prince Myrddin still lived, I never hesitated to fulfill his will.{w} I believed I could dedicate my life to him and the good of Etruria.|My actions now protect the king's life, and yet...
speak;Douglas;Perceval, I want you to listen to me. Don't respond. Let it sink in.
speak;Douglas;Etruria...will fall along with the king before this war ends.

speak;Douglas;No matter what happens, I will stay by the king's side.{w} But you, Perceval, are of a different breed.{w} You must lead the Etruria of tomorrow. Despite the impending collapse, I firmly believe Etruria will prosper once more.|Perceval, you must leave Etruria for now and await your time.
speak;RedSoldier;General Perceval! The Lycian Army stands dead ahead!{w} What are your orders, sir?
speak;Douglas;Go! I will return to Aquileia.
speak;Perceval;...Move forth! Pursue the Lycian army!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Larum' or u.nid=='Elffin']

name: PercevalLarumJoin
_source: speak;Larum;Sir Perceval! It is you, isn't it? I've been looking for you!|I am...
speak;Larum;Wait! Wait! Stop! Listen to me!
speak;Larum;You don't remember?! We met before.
speak;Perceval;...I think I recall seeing you at Douglas's manor.
speak;Perceval;But the girl I met then was far less...garish.
speak;Larum;What's that supposed to mean?{w} Ah, never mind. My name is Larum. I'm here on the orders of Prince Myrddin.
speak;Perceval;Prince Myrddin...? Don't be daft.{w} The prince passed away in an accident over a year ago.
speak;Perceval;That emblem...!!{w} It belonged to the prince...!
speak;Larum;Now do I have your attention?{w} Look at this letter, too.{w} The prince told me to give it to you.
speak;Perceval;......|His Highness's handwriting... He lives!|I hesitate no more.{w} If the prince is in the Lycian Army, then I am as well.
speak;Larum;Wha--? That was quick...{w} I was hoping things would get a little more dramatic...{w} Like, "If you want my skill, you'll have to best me first!"|Oh well. This works too.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Larum']

name: PercevalElffinJoin
_source: speak;Elffin;Perceval. It is good to see you.
speak;Perceval;No... I could never.{w} But it cannot be...|The prince...is dead.
speak;Elffin;...I understand your confusion.{w} A man who was declared dead stands before your very eyes.
speak;Elffin;I'm sorry to have put you through such trouble.|...It has already been over a year since the attempt on my life.
speak;Perceval;Attempt on your life?!{w} I thought Your Highness fell off his horse in an accident.
speak;Elffin;I was hit with poisoned darts.{w} One to my horse...{w} and one to myself...

speak;Elffin;Douglas was the first to notice and made it public that I had died.{w} A look-alike corpse was placed in my coffin. It was all an act to make it appear that the assassination had been successful.{w} Douglas entrusted me to his daughter and had me escape to the Western Isles.
speak;Perceval;Sir Douglas knew all this time...
speak;Elffin;Even after I escaped west, the poison had me ill for many months.{w} I drifted between life and death for so long that Douglas' daughter nearly lost hope.
speak;Elffin;The resistance force nursed me back to health. Ironic, isn't it?|The resistance, enemy of the nobility, saved the life of the prince of Etruria!
speak;Elffin;My recovery...was slow.{w} I saw the crimes committed by Etrurian nobles firsthand.{w} I felt so ashamed that I had never noticed while I was on the throne.
speak;Elffin;As I aided the resistance, I waited for my chance to return to the mainland.{w} Then along came Roy, and I knew it was time. That is how I ended up here.
speak;Perceval;My prince...|I am thankful beyond words that you are alive.
speak;Elffin;I am now with the Lycian Army, and my identity must remain hidden.{w} However, if I still have the loyalty you pledged to me in the past...
speak;Perceval;Until the day I die, my prince.{w} I have only one master, and it is you, Prince Myrddin.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Elffin']

name: PercevalRoyTalk
_source: speak;Perceval;General Roy.|I wish to join your cause. Will you accept me?
speak;Roy;Absolutely! We're honored to have someone of your ability.{w} But why the sudden change of heart?
speak;Roy;No, I won't force you if you have reason not to tell.
speak;Perceval;Forgive me. I shall tell you when the time comes.

name: GarretAppears
_source: speak;Garret;The armies are gonna loot the villages.{w} We better get to 'em first.
speak;Garret;Just don't hurt anybody who isn't askin' for it. Got it?
speak;GenericBandit1;He's too nice for his own good...|If anything happens to the villagers, we can just say the armies did it.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: GarretJoin
_source: speak;Lilina;Why are you attacking the villages?
speak;Garret;Excuse me? Who d'you think you are?
speak;Lilina;I asked you a question.{w} Tell me why you're attacking the villages!
speak;Garret;"Why?" I guess it's yer fault, really.
speak;Garret;Yep. You idiots make war,{w} and poor folk like me resort to raidin' to survive.
speak;Lilina;We fight to help people like you.

speak;Garret;D'you know how many times I've heard that? This is reality, kid.{w} You all say yer tryin' to help, but it's all hot air and empty promises.{w} If yer gonna say somethin' like that, then prove it.|You don't even know what's goin' on. Now get outta my way.
speak;Garret;Listen, I ain't playin' games with you.{w} If ya don't get outta here,{w} I'll do somethin' we'll both regret...
speak;Lilina;I won't move. Kill me if you will.
speak;Lilina;If I let you pass, then I too have said nothing but hot air.{w} I tell the truth! We fight to help the people.
speak;Garret;Heh heh... You...|I've never met anyone so naive as you.
speak;Garret;Still, you've moved this old raider's heart.
speak;Garret;Yep. You win. I'll stop lootin'.{w} But let me fight with you.{w} Show me firsthand that yer true to yer words.
speak;Lilina;Thank you. After being with us for a while,{w} I'm positive you will understand.
speak;Garret;Well, ya certainly seem confident at least.|I'm Garret. And you are...?
speak;Garret;Lilina? It's a pleasure to make yer acquaintance, milady.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerWoman1;A little girl was taken to the castle...|Here, I'll give you this. Please rescue her. Our priest always had this tome with him.|...He was taken to the castle, too, but he never returned.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail1;This is a Hammerne staff.{w} It can repair your weapons, spell tomes, and staves. Just about the only thing it can't repair is itself.|It'll wear down every time you use it, so wield it wisely.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;The rumors say that the three Generals of Etruria have been divided...|But so have the hearts of the people.{w} I only hope they don't have to fight against each other...

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair1;I've been hearing about bandits in this area.{w} I bet they're all savage killers. They probably have no conscience at all.

name: RaithFight
_source: speak;Raith;What is your purpose here? I don't know why you would attack us.

name: RaithDeath
_source: speak;Raith;It's that girl, isn't it...?{w} She isn't human...Why...do you seek her...?|To use her power...? Gah...!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;I believe you owe Lord Roy a thank you, young lady.
speak;Fae;I just wanted to see the outside world...
speak;Merlinus;You put yourself in danger for such a trivial reason?!{w} Do you know how much trouble you've caused?
speak;Fae;I'm never, ever allowed outside!|The elder says I have to remain hidden...{w}I'm always alone...{w}locked up in my room...
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, what shall we do?
speak;Roy;...You could have been killed.|Do you understand how much worry and trouble you've caused?
speak;Roy;All things considered,{w} I think we have no choice but to take you with us.
speak;Roy;The enemy might already know about her now.|If that's true, she'll be safer with us than returning unguarded to Arcadia.
speak;Merlinus;Hush! This isn't cause for celebration.
speak;Roy;You mustn't run off alone anymore. Do you promise?
speak;GreenSoldier;General Perceval, we will station ourselves at this castle.|We shall prepare for further attacks from the revolutionaries.
speak;GreenSoldier;We found this in the castle. Please take it.|General Perceval, please... Save Etruria.

name: ReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Commander Raith, the reinforcements are ready!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After rescuing Fae, Roy heads for Aquileia.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roy (Roy);Fae (Fae)}{clear}The capital of Etruria,|Aquileia is also the largest and wealthiest city on the continent.|{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block);FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}Prepared for the Lycian Army's attack,{w} the revolutionary forces are fortified in Aquileia.|{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Arcardo (Arcardo)}{c:wait;300}{c:add_portrait;Saul (Saul);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}The St. Elimine Church supports the Lycian Army,{w} turning popular opinion against the revolutionaries, forcing them inside the castle.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Saul (Saul)}{clear}The St. Elimine Church was founded by Saint Elimine, one of the Eight Legends.|The church has legions of followers, particularly in Bern and Etruria.|{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Roy's attack on Aquileia is supported by the church.|{c:add_portrait;Narcian (Narcian);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}However, Narcian and his elite troops await Roy inside the castle...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Narcian;Curses! A thousand curses...!{w} The Lycian Army still stands! How have they come so far?!
speak;RedSoldier;G-General Narcian...|Head Wyvern General Murdock is here!
speak;Narcian;He is?! Th-then posthaste! Send an escort! Ensure he receives every hospitality...
speak;Narcian;S-Sir Murdock... What a pleasant surprise!{w} What brings you all the way from Ilia?
speak;Murdock;Enough of your squirrelly pleasantries, Narcian.{w} I want an explanation for this embarrassment.
speak;Narcian;I-I'm sorry, Sir Murdock...{w} I don't believe I understand...

speak;Murdock;Then allow me to explain.{w} Princess Guinivere has escaped yet again.|Flaer, your lieutenant, has failed in the Western Isles and is dead.|And finally, perhaps most egregious of all,{w} you have neglected your mission to capture the village in Nabata, despite specific orders directly from King Zephiel's mouth!|This is inexcusable, Narcian! Explain yourself!
speak;Narcian;Oh, th-that...|Well, you see, there have been many complications, so I took it upon myself to--
speak;Murdock;Hold your tongue. That's enough.|I've orders from the king. I am to revoke your title of Wyvern General.
speak;Murdock;You are to be replaced by Galle.
speak;Narcian;Sir Murdock! Please wait! Allow me one more chance!!
speak;Murdock;...The Lycian Army approaches fast.{w} Show your worth and stop them in their tracks.|If you succeed, perhaps the king will reconsider.
speak;Murdock;Narcian...|Don't fail the king, or me, again.

speak;Narcian;Balderdash! A demotion?!|And I'm to be replaced by Galle of all people...!|Never! I will not allow it!|B-but what is left for me to do...?{br}No...!|My status and reputation...{br}Everything is crumbling down!
speak;RedSoldier;General Narcian, the enemy draws near...

speak;Narcian;Silence! I know that already.{w}{clear}...Wait. Melady's younger brother is stationed in this castle...{w} And Melady's the one who helped the princess escape!|Ah-ha!|I can say he was leaking information to the enemy! What a flawless plan!|Hm hm hm hm...
speak;RedSoldier;I'm sorry, General Narcian... What was that?
speak;Narcian;Hm? Oh. You know Melady's younger brother, don't you?
speak;Narcian;That's him. Zeiss.{w} I have reason to suspect he's leaking information to the Lycian Army.{w} Bring him here.
speak;RedSoldier;What?! I can't believe that Sir Zeiss would ever do such a thing...
speak;Narcian;Yes, yes, it's shocking! I know!|Now shut your trap!|Do as you're told and bring him before me!
speak;Arcardo;Th-the enemy is at our doorstep!
speak;Roartz;Oh... What can we do?|If we're captured, we will be tried as traitors!
speak;Roartz;...Arcardo! This is all your fault!|If you had eliminated the Lycian Army at the Isles as you were supposed to...
speak;Arcardo;B-but Lord Roartz...!|...No!|This is neither the time nor place to argue, my lord!{w} We must make our escape quickly!
speak;Arcardo;...Let us turn to Bern!{w} This plot originated from them to begin with...
speak;Roartz;Yes, of course! We have proven ourselves useful.{w} They're sure to offer us suitable positions.
speak;Douglas;...And what do you intend to do with the King?
speak;Roartz;Er... Well, Bern will probably see that no harm comes to him.{w} King Zephiel's mother was Etrurian, after all.{w} Douglas, I suggest you flee as well...
speak;Douglas;And I suggest you shut your mouth.|I only fought alongside you because King Mordred's life was at stake.{w} I do not intend to go along with your scheme to the end.
speak;Roartz;Hmph! Unbending as always.{w} Suit yourself.|Arcardo, we escape now!

speak;Douglas;...Dirty traitors!|Fleeing with their tails between their legs...{w} I can't imagine it took much for Bern to seduce them.{w} They'll meet their end at the hands of the Lycian Army before long...|When Prince Myrddin returns... Etruria will be whole again.|But until then...I shall continue to fight for the king.{w} My loyalty and honor as Great General depend upon it!
speak;Yoder;This is Castle Aquileia, Lord Roy.{w} Our information says that the revolutionaries are stationed inside.
speak;Roy;I thank you for your help, Father Yoder.{w} Thanks to the church, we were able to avoid a battle in the city.
speak;Yoder;No, it is I who must thank you.{w} The church has been persecuted by the revolutionaries.{w} Were it not for you, we would have been forced out already.

speak;Yoder;I can only presume it is because of our investigation into Bern's dragons.{w}{clear}Before she ascended to heaven, our founder, Saint Elimine, said these words:{w} "Allow not dragons to return to this realm, for that would bring suffering to many."|That's why we must do everything we can to send the dragons back to their world.
speak;Roy;...The revolutionaries are with Bern, so that explains the persecution of the church.

speak;Yoder;Indeed. We have discovered something interesting as well.|The return of the dragons is tied to the Fire Emblem, Bern's greatest treasure.{w} We don't yet know how, so that's why I sent Saul and Dorothy to investigate.

speak;Yoder;Lord Roy, you must stop the revolutionaries.{w} If you would allow me to give you one more piece of advice, try talking to some of the troops.{w} I'm certain many of them were forced into the army against their will.
speak;Yoder;Saint Elimine's blessings upon you, Lord Roy.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Cecilia' or u.nid=='Perceval' or u.nid=='Elffin' or u.nid=='Larum' or u.nid=='Klein']

name: ZeissAppears
_source: speak;Zeiss;I'm here, Sir Galle.{w} Is something wrong? Why did you summon me?
speak;Zeiss;...What do you mean? The enemy is before us!
speak;Gale;Listen to me. General Narcian has given the order for you to be taken prisoner.
speak;Zeiss;What?! Does he think that I have betrayed Bern?!
speak;Gale;He needs a scapegoat for his failures.{w} He says that you worked with Melady to leak information to the enemy.
speak;Zeiss;With my sister? I don't even know where she is.
speak;Gale;Melady has apparently joined the Lycian Army alongside the princess.
speak;Zeiss;Melady turned to the enemy?! I don't believe it for a second...

speak;Gale;Ask her yourself. She is apparently here.{w} Would that I could go with you, but General Murdock ordered me to observe the outcome of the battle.|Zeiss, get out while you still can.{w} Talk to Melady.
speak;Gale;I will not make a move until I hear Melady's story...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Melady']

name: HughComplains
_source: speak;Hugh;The Etrurian nobles have fled? Are you kidding me?{w} What about my money? I haven't been paid yet!

name: ThiefReinforcements
_source: speak;Cath;I can hear the riches calling to me! "Cath! Take us!"|This is the most extravagant palace in Elibe...{w} I bet the treasure's nothing to sneeze at, either.{w} It was all taken from people like me anyway, so I'm just reclaiming it!

name: HughRoyTalk
_source: speak;Hugh;Hey, fella! You lead the army that's attacking the castle, right?{w} Do you have any need of an extra mage?
speak;Roy;Huh? Well, I guess we could always use more...
speak;Hugh;You don't say!{w} Then today is your lucky day.{w} Here's a mage for hire. How about it?
speak;Roy;You know a mage? Where is he?
speak;Hugh;Er, I was talking about myself, buddy!
speak;Hugh;Hey, don't look at me like that!{w} I'm no slouch with a spell tome.{w} I'm all yours for 10,000 gold!
speak;Hugh;Come on, you're breakin' my heart here!{w} I need the money for my grandmother...
speak;Roy;What? Is your grandmother sick or something?
speak;Hugh;Er... Y-yeah! That's it.{w} Sick is a good way to describe her...|Anyway, I need the cash. Come on, pal!
speak;Roy;I'm sorry, but I can't justify paying 10,000 gold for a single mage.
speak;Hugh;...W-well, I guess I can take it down to 8,000...
speak;Hugh;S-still no good?{w} Uh... Well, I guess 6,000 will do...
speak;Hugh;Please. I really need the money...
speak;Hugh;All right, all right! Now I'm desperate...|5,000! That's my final offer!
speak;Hugh;Come on, I'm begging you! Please hire me!
speak;Hugh;...Please... I swear I'll be useful...
speak;Roy;The money isn't mine to spend.{w} I can't use so much of it in one place.
speak;Hugh;Argh! I give up!{w} Fine! Have it your way!
speak;Hugh;I don't want to work for you anyway... Ha!|You're a nobody! You don't even know a steal when you see one!

name: HughJoins
_source: speak;Roy;If your grandmother's sick, then I suppose it's a worthy cause for the money...
speak;Hugh;You betcha!{w} She's so sick you don't even know.{w} She always gets these headaches on her back...
speak;Hugh;Uh, y-you know what I mean.{w} That's just one of her many symptoms, each worse than the last...|...OK, all the money seems to be here.{w} You won't regret this. I know what I'm doing!

name: DouglasCeciliaTalk
_source: speak;Cecilia;Sir Douglas...|Why is someone of your stature fighting for the revolutionaries...?
speak;Douglas;The king's safety takes priority over all.|There is nothing more to it than that.

speak;Cecilia;If this continues, Etruria will become a mere puppet of Bern!|The king must have dominion over this nation for us to serve him.|The path you are on will only lead to Etruria's destruction!
speak;Douglas;If the nation is doomed to collapse, then so be it.|But I will ensure the king's safety!
speak;Cecilia;What...?!|Our loyalty is to our people, to our nation! The Etrurian Army exists for the people.|The soldiers are not the king's personal bodyguards!
speak;Douglas;......|Perhaps you are right, but I will not waver.|Cecilia, you must follow your beliefs, as I must follow mine.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Cecilia']

name: DouglasPercevalTalk
_source: speak;Douglas;Perceval...|I see in your eyes that you have no more hesitation.
speak;Perceval;Yes, Sir Douglas. That is thanks to you.|Once I learned that you saved Prince Myrddin, I regained the will to fight.
speak;Douglas;Then you fight with the prince. I'm glad to hear it.
speak;Perceval;What are you going to do, Sir Douglas?
speak;Douglas;The king is still in the hands of Bern.|If I turn to the Lycian Army now, they will take his life.
speak;Douglas;If you indeed fight with the prince, then that means he has returned.|I have no more regrets. If the Lycian Army kills me here, so be it.
speak;Perceval;Just the answer I expected, Sir Douglas.
speak;Douglas;You will walk the same path as I, Perceval.|Please watch over the prince...and over all of Etruria.
speak;Perceval;Of course. That is what I live for.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Perceval']

name: DouglasKleinTalk
_source: speak;Douglas;Klein. I have known you since you were but a child.|I never expected to fight you like this.
speak;Klein;General Douglas, please reconsider!|You are the Great General, the highest rank in the Etrurian Army! How can you align yourself with these traitors...?!
speak;Douglas;Our king's life is at Bern's mercy.|I cannot cast away my loyalty and turn to the enemy.
speak;Douglas;...There are those who toss away their honor for riches and power.|I will not do the same. My loyalty to the king will never falter.
speak;Douglas;I am an old man, and my time has come.|The Etrurian Army belongs to your generation now.|I only ask that you lead it in a way I would be proud.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Klein']

name: DouglasElffinTalk
_source: speak;Douglas;Prince Myrddin! You have returned!|You appear to be in good health... I'm so glad you yet live.
speak;Elffin;I have you to thank for that.{w} I'm sorry to have put you through so much.
speak;Douglas;You have returned safely... Nothing else matters more to me.
speak;Elffin;Douglas. I am working with the Lycian army now.
speak;Douglas;Very good!|Then all that remains is to drive Bern's troops from the palace.
speak;Douglas;The king is still in Bern's hands...|Were I to turn to the Lycian Army now, they would surely take his head.
speak;Douglas;But now that you have returned, I have no regrets.|If the Lycian Army strikes me down, I will die in peace.
speak;Elffin;Douglas... I apologize.|You intend to sacrifice your life for my father...
speak;Douglas;My prince, if my death can serve Etruria, then I give it freely.
speak;Douglas;I am just glad that I could see you again before I pass.
speak;Elffin;You risked your life to protect me and send me away to safety.|I will never forget that. Never.
speak;Douglas;...I still have one futile hope. I wish to take you to see the king.
speak;Elffin;...Don't lose that hope just yet.|Roy...has a knack for overcoming the impossible...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Elffin']

name: DouglasLarumTalk
_source: speak;Douglas;Larum! What are you doing here?
speak;Larum;I joined the Lycian army along with Prince Myrddin...
speak;Douglas;The Prince has returned!{w} There is hope for Etruria once more...
speak;Douglas;Larum... I'm sorry I put you through so much.|I had no choice but to send you away to protect the prince.
speak;Larum;No, I wanted to. It's ok.
speak;Douglas;...I sent you right back into the harsh world I saved you from.|I just wish there had been another way.
speak;Larum;...You saved me from a terrible life of poverty...and starvation...|You raised me as one of your own blood...|I owe you my life. I'm just glad I could repay your favor.
speak;Larum;So really... I was happy to do it.
speak;Douglas;Thank you, Larum.|...I trust the prince will be safe in your care in the future as well.
speak;Larum;What are you talking about?{w} You're not coming with us?
speak;Douglas;King Mordred is still in the hands of Bern.|Were I to turn to the Lycian Army now, they would surely take his head.
speak;Douglas;Now that the prince is back, I have no regrets.|If the Lycian Army strikes me down, I will die in peace.
speak;Douglas;Now go.|If anyone sees us talking like this, you may be suspected of betrayal|No matter what happens, remember that you are my daughter. In this world, and the next...
speak;Douglas;My only hope is that you find happiness in life...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Larum']

name: NarcianFightDefault
_source: speak;Narcian;I am strong. I am wise. I am beautiful.|And most importantly, I am right! Always!|...Me! No one else!

name: NarcianDeath
_source: speak;Narcian;No... No...!!|I will not be defeated...! Not by you...miserable...|Gaahh!!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;King Mordred;So it is you... who rescued us.
speak;Roy;My name is Roy. I am leader of the Lycian army.
speak;King Mordred;My name is Mordred. Hm...
speak;King Mordred;...I must ask another favor of you.|Bern's soldiers have moved to the Saint's Tower.
speak;Roy;The Saint's Tower...|That is where Saint Elimine's altar lies...
speak;King Mordred;Yes... It is a national symbol of Etruria.|Please, recapture the tower.
speak;Roy;I will do what I can.
speak;King Mordred;I thank you.|Please take anything in the tower that you may find useful.
speak;Roy;The king... He still mourns the prince.
speak;Merlinus;He must have been an easy target for Bern.
speak;Roy;I wish I could help him...but I wouldn't know where to begin.
speak;Elffin;Father... I am truly sorry...|When the time comes, I will make my return.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere, I must speak with you.
speak;Guinivere;...The attack on Bern will begin after we finish in Etruria.
speak;Guinivere;No... I simply knew that it would come to this eventually.
speak;Roy;...We cannot leave Bern unopposed any longer.|I know it will be painful to see your homeland invaded, but...
speak;Guinivere;...Roy, I want you to have this.
speak;Guinivere;Bern's greatest treasure... the Fire Emblem.
speak;Guinivere;In southern Bern lies a temple called the Shrine of Seals.|Within it lies the sword of Hartmut, founder of Bern.

speak;Guinivere;Yes. The most powerful of them all, in fact.|It was made to slay the leader of the dragons in the Scouring.|Its power was so immense that it had to be sealed away after the war.|The Fire Emblem is the key to accessing it once more.
speak;Guinivere;My brother...is forcing the world into submission with military might.|I cannot forgive him, no matter his reasons.
speak;Guinivere;All we must do to stop him is defeat the dragons he commands.
speak;Guinivere;...I will be remembered in infamy, as a traitor to my nation.
speak;Guinivere;The people will resent me for the rest of my days.|Roy, promise me this one thing.|When we invade Bern, do not harm any civilians...
speak;Roy;I will not. I promise you.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;At the request of King Mordred, Roy heads for the Saint's Tower outside Aquileia.{w}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roy (Roy);King Mordred}{clear}The Saint's Tower was once a place of worship for Saint Elimine.|In the tower lay numerous sacred relics relating to her.{w}{c:add_portrait;Windham (Windham);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}|However, this sacred tower is now under the control of the revolutionaries.|Bishop Windham now occupies the tower after betraying the St. Elimine Church...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Windham;Lord Roartz fled?!|What of me?! I betrayed the church and took control of this tower on his order!
speak;RedSoldier;Lord Roartz's message said he leaves us to fend for ourselves.|Because we were unable to bend the church to his side, he has no more use for us.
speak;Windham;This is all Yoder's fault. If he hadn't meddled in my affairs...
speak;RedSoldier;I agree...but that's the least of our worries right now...
speak;Windham;...Very well... Then this is our last stand.|If we are to die, then the Lycian Army shall fall along with us!|Prepare the Heavenly Arrows!
speak;RedSoldier;But sir, we'll be unable to avoid hitting our own men as well!
speak;Windham;You know the consequences for dissent. You shall do as I say!
speak;Windham;...They'll regret crossing me... Heh heh heh...!
speak;Douglas;This is the Saint's Tower.{w}{clear}Saint Elimine's legendary weapon, the Aureola spell tome, lies within.
speak;Roy;Thank you, Sir Douglas. I appreciate your help.{w} Especially because we were fighting on opposite sides earlier...
speak;Douglas;You need not thank me.|I do as my king commands. There is nothing more to it.
speak;Douglas;That said, you saved Etruria. I am honored to fight alongside you.

name: NarcianFightClarine
_source: speak;Clarine;Excuse me? Have we met before?
speak;Narcian;What?! You have forgotten me?!|That...is inconceivable!

name: NarcianFightMelady
_source: speak;Narcian;You're Melady... Hah!|You betray your home and join the enemy.|You are a disgrace!
speak;Melady;My loyalty has always lied with the princess.|And so it shall remain!

name: NarcianFightZeiss
_source: speak;Zeiss;General Narcian...|I heard everything from Sir Galle!|Do you...have no sense of honor left in you at all?!
speak;Narcian;Galle...! He has always been a thorn in my side!|But no matter...|After I wipe you up here, no one will know the truth...

name: NarcianFightCecilia
_source: speak;Narcian;Cecilia... Back for more, are you?
speak;Cecilia;It was Zephiel to whom I lost. Not you.
speak;Narcian;Fair enough, but now you will know my true strength!

name: NarcianFightPerceval
_source: speak;Narcian;If it isn't General Perceval, the back-stabbing traitor!
speak;Perceval;Joining you...was the greatest mistake of my life.|I will make up for it... by defeating you!

name: LeyganceFightBors
_source: speak;Leygance;Bors! I see you yet live.
speak;Bors;I do.|And I see you took over Ostia in my absence...
speak;Leygance;Do you have any grievances with that?|Take it back yourself... if you can!

name: LeyganceFightWendy
