_source: speak;Leygance;Ah, Bors' sister, correct?|You have the courage, but can you truly stand against me?

name: LeyganceFightBarthe
_source: speak;Barthe;Leygance, you miscreant!|Have you no shame for your betrayal of Lord Hector?!
speak;Leygance;Barthe... Shut your ugly mouth.|Lord Hector was a fool. His death was his own doing.|I do not intend to fall along with him.

name: LeyganceFightLilina
_source: speak;Leygance;Lady Lilina? I see the assassination failed.
speak;Leygance;Times are changing, milady. I won't be left in the dust.|I'm not like Lord Hector. He was too foolish to accept the obvious.
speak;Lilina;Hush yourself! I will not let you insult my father!

name: DebiasFightBors
_source: speak;Bors;Causing a rebellion after Lord Hector's death?!|That is inexcusable!

name: WindhamFight
_source: speak;Windham;Perish! Every last one of you!|Everything to ash!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy, I think we found the tome.
speak;Douglas;Yes, it is.|This is the Glorious Ascension, Aureola, Saint Elimine's weapon.
speak;Roy;May we make use of it?
speak;Douglas;The king said to take anything in the tower that may be of use.|The St. Elimine Church backs us as well.|If any oppose our use of it, then I will negotiate.
speak;Roy;...This must be Aureola, the Glorious Ascension.|Merlinus,
speak;Roy;I want you to give this back to the St. Elimine church.
speak;Merlinus;Why?|The king said we could take anything we found in the tower.
speak;Roy;This is a holy relic of their order.|It would be sacrilegious to use it without their permission.
speak;Yoder;I understand you found the Aureola tome...
speak;Roy;Ah, yes.|I will return it to the church immediately.
speak;Yoder;There is no need. We want you to take it.
speak;Yoder;What Saint Elimine wished for was peace.|Use it well and bring an end to this war.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere, I must speak with you.
speak;Guinivere;...The attack on Bern will begin after we finish in Etruria.
speak;Guinivere;No... I simply knew that it would come to this eventually.
speak;Roy;...We cannot leave Bern unopposed any longer.|I know it will be painful to see your homeland invaded, but...
speak;Guinivere;...Roy, I want you to have this.
speak;Guinivere;Bern's greatest treasure... the Fire Emblem.
speak;Guinivere;In southern Bern lies a temple called the Shrine of Seals.|Within it lies the sword of Hartmut, founder of Bern.

speak;Guinivere;Yes. The most powerful of them all, in fact.|It was made to slay the leader of the dragons in the Scouring.|Its power was so immense that it had to be sealed away after the war.|The Fire Emblem is the key to accessing it once more.
speak;Guinivere;My brother...is forcing the world into submission with military might.|I cannot forgive him, no matter his reasons.
speak;Guinivere;All we must do to stop him is defeat the dragons he commands.
speak;Guinivere;...I will be remembered in infamy, as a traitor to my nation.
speak;Guinivere;The people will resent me for the rest of my days.|Roy, promise me this one thing.|When we invade Bern, do not harm any civilians...
speak;Roy;I will not. I promise you.
# Extra scene to give Roy a stronger PRF, deactivated for now

name: ZephielLeaves
_source: speak;Zephiel;What is causing all that noise?
speak;Narcian;What's left of the enemy are likely puttting up one last fight.
speak;Idunn Hood;Shall I summon the dragons, Your Majesty?
speak;Narcian;No need, my lady. We can handle them without so much breaking a sweat.
speak;Zephiel;Not now, Idunn.|Send the dragons back to Bern as planned.
speak;Idunn Hood;Yes, Your Majesty. As you will.
speak;Zephiel;I too must return to Bern.|Narcian, I leave Lycia in your hands.
speak;Narcian;...What shall I do with the remnants of the Lycian Army?
speak;Zephiel;Kill all who stand against you.
speak;Zephiel;Was I unclear? Kill all who stand against you.|Grind them to dust.|Ensure no others dare dream of opposing us.
speak;Narcian;Of course, Your Majesty.|Hm hm hm...
speak;Narcian;Hmph, what does His Majesty see in that Idunn anyway?|Well, I think it's time I left as well.|Slater, I entrust the castle to you.
speak;Slater;Might I inquire where you're going, milord?
speak;Narcian;A marquess who turned against Lycia has a special gift for me.|He says it's a girl of Etrurian nobility...|Hm hm hm...
speak;Slater;Etrurian nobility? She must be quite a catch!
speak;Narcian;Yes, the marquess tells me she's a beautiful thing.
speak;Slater;You must be looking forward to it.{w} Please be careful on your way there.
speak;Narcian;You be careful too, Slater.{w} Don't let these scattered remnants defeat you.|Should you fail, I personally will order your public evisceration.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After Roy captures Aquileia, other Etrurian forces flock to the loyalists,{w} forcing out the revolutionaries.{w}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block);FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}Roartz and Arcardo are driven out of Etruria.|{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Arcardo (Arcardo)}They flee north to Ilia, which is under Bern's control.|Ilia, the frozen highlands, is a land with short summers and long winters.{w}{clear}With so little arable land,{w} the nation's main source of income is mercenary contracts.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block);FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;King Mordred;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}The now free Kingdom of Etruria joins forces with the Lycian Army.|Now a joint force under the name of the Etrurian Army,{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;King Mordred} their first mission is to enter Ilia and finish off the revolutionaries.|After that, they plan to launch a direct attack on Bern.|Roy, nominated as leader of the Etrurian Army,{w} has the powerful support of the St. Elimine Church.|With the church's support comes also the support of the people.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{clear}However, Roy has to face not only the freezing cold of Ilia,|{c:add_portrait;Murdock (Murdock);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}but also the elite troops under Murdock, head of Bern's Wyvern Generals.|Even worse, many skilled mercenary knights of Ilia have sided with Bern.|To begin, Roy heads for Castle Remi, located on the Ilian border...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Gale;So it seems.|General Murdock, I still feel uncomfortable that we didn't go to his aid.
speak;Murdock;The king's orders explicitly said to leave him on his own.|Bern's army has no use for a man who cannot manage his own messes.
speak;Roartz;Sir Murdock... What will you have us do?
speak;Murdock;Arcardo, I leave Castle Remi to you.|Roartz, you will take Castle Edessa.|Make preparations to defend against the enemy.
speak;Arcardo;What?! Remi is right on the border!|The enemy will be here in short time!
speak;Murdock;That much is true.|But this position gives us an invaluable strategic advantage against Etruria.{w} You must ensure that this castle does not fall into enemy hands.
speak;Roartz;Edessa lies all the way in the outer tundra of Ilia...
speak;Murdock;Yes, so you will have ample time to prepare your defenses.
speak;Arcardo;...You...intend only to take the defensive?|You don't mean to take back Etruria?
speak;Murdock;We play the waiting game for now. We will take Etruria some day.|And once we do, it will be under Bern's jurisdiction.
speak;Roartz;What about us?! That's not what we agreed upon!
speak;Murdock;Then perhaps you should find a way to make yourself useful.{w} You have done nothing to deserve such renumeration.|If you'll excuse us.
speak;Gale;Those two will surely be killed. Should we really leave them?

speak;Murdock;If they fall, it is because of their own incompetence.|Our army's code states that every officer must be capable and self-sufficient.{w} Perhaps they should have considered that before joining us...|The enemy leader... Roy, was it?
speak;Murdock;I admit he has rebuilt the Lycian Army magnificently.{w} I thought it finished after we crushed it the first time...|I hope to cross blades with him before the war is over.
speak;Yoder;We will soon approach the Etrurian border.
speak;Roy;Thank you for everything, Father Yoder.|We've only made it this far thanks to the assistance of the church.
speak;Yoder;I am only repaying your favor.{w} Had you not captured Aquileia, we would suffer great persecution from Bern.|This is nothing compared to what you did for us.
speak;Roy;It was my pleasure to help the church.
speak;Yoder;If I may be so bold... Can I ask one more favor?
speak;Roy;Of course, if I am capable.
speak;Yoder;If you discover anything else about the dragons...
speak;Roy;Say no more. If I find anything new, I will report to you immediately.
speak;Yoder;You have my eternal thanks.|...Oh yes, I have some information that may be of use.|At a certain time of day, the sea level drops, exposing a crossable sandbar.
speak;Yoder;It would take much time to make your way around the bay to the castle.|However, crossing the sandbar would be a direct journey.
speak;Yoder;However you choose to proceed, please be careful.{w} Rushing forward has its dangers as well.
speak;Yoder;Not at all.|May the Etrurian army go with St. Elimine's blessing.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan3;The tide is very dramatic around here.|I remember once I was getting ready to go fishing, but by the time I had my boat ready, the tide had already gone out.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana2;Did you know that at a certain time of day, a sandbar appears in the bay?{w} It's a path right through the ocean.{w}{clear}Good luck!

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan4;Ah, are you fighting against Bern?{w} Then please take this staff.|It was once used by the noble Lady Tiena...

name: RevealSandbar
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Lord Arcardo! A path has appeared in the sea!
speak;RedSoldier;According to the locals, the tide pulls out this time of day...
speak;Arcardo;And you didn't know about this sooner?!
speak;RedSoldier;Milord, we are foreigners here! We do not know this land!
speak;Arcardo;Curses! Charge! Don't allow the enemy to cross that path!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, we have a report.
speak;Roy;Did the enemy know about it?
speak;Merlinus;Actually, no. They seem to be in a panicked state.
speak;Roy;All right, then let's now waste this opportunity!|Move forward!

name: ArcardoFight
_source: speak;Arcardo;W-why?!|What have I done to deserve such a fate?!

name: ArcardoDeath
_source: speak;Arcardo;I...am a noble...of Etruria...!|I cannot...die...in a place such as this...|Gah!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Arcardo...|What a pathetic ending for one of his stature.
speak;Roy;A year ago I myself never imagined I would be leading an army.|Fate can be unpredictable...|Perhaps we'll even be able to turn the tides against Bern.
speak;Merlinus;...?|Lord Roy, what is that in your hand?
speak;Roy;Oh, this? It's the Fire Emblem.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere wanted me to keep it.|It seemed...difficult for her to give it to me...|I think she still hoped to end the war with diplomacy...
speak;Merlinus;Hm... Perhaps she had faith in her brother, even if that seems unlikely.
speak;Merlinus;Because Zephiel is the treacherous king of Bern!|It is said that he murdered his own father. I don't expect he would be moved by family trust...
speak;Merlinus;Haven't you heard the rumors, Lord Roy?|Zephiel took the throne because his father, King Desmond, passed on. But King Desmond's death was very sudden.
speak;Roy;...Does Princess Guinivere know about this?
speak;Merlinus;I'm sure she is at least aware of the rumors.|She may even know the whole story.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating Arcardo, Roy moves east, deep into the frozen lands of Ilia.|{c:remove_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo)}He soon enters the thick forests that characterize central Ilia.|{c:add_portrait;Martel (Martel);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}However, a commander of Bern, Bishop Martel, lies in wait.|In his possession is an ancient spell said to have been lost centuries ago...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;RedSoldier;Father Martel!|We have brought the hermit Niime as you asked.
speak;Niime;What do you want from me?
speak;Martel;You must be Niime, the Mountain Hermit.
speak;Niime;I'm not aware of that nickname, but I am Niime.|I'm probably the one you seek.
speak;Martel;We found an elder spell tome within the castle. I hear that you may be capable of using it.
speak;Niime;Perhaps.|I have dedicated my life to the study of darkness and elder magic.
speak;Martel;I understand that this spell can change the weather surrounding the caster...
speak;Niime;Stranger spells are known to exist.
speak;Martel;Then I order you to use the tome to create rainfall.|Make it rain so that the rivers overflow.|Push back the advancing Etrurian Army.
speak;Niime;I can try, but frankly I can't guarantee that it will succeed.|It is also important to remember that powerful spells like this can only be cast once.|Are you certain you want to do this?
speak;Martel;No excuses, hag!{w} You will do as I say.|You said you wish to join our forces. Make yourself useful.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere...|We are approaching Bern's army.
speak;Roy;As we get closer, we will clash with soldiers of Bern more and more.|It will not be long before we are in full combat with Bern.
speak;Roy;I want to ask you something before that happens.
speak;Roy;I have heard rumors about King Zephiel...|I heard that he killed his father, the previous king.

speak;Roy;I could scarcely believe it myself.{w} You believe in him so strongly that you cast away your own country.|If King Zephiel is truly as mad as the rumors say,{w} I'm sure you would not have done all that you have.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere,|I accepted the Fire Emblem not to use it in battle,{w} but to find a way to end this war peacefully.
speak;Roy;I think I have a right to know the truth about the rumors...
speak;Guinivere;I...I'm sorry. Please...give me some time.
speak;Merlinus;...What is the matter?|Princess Guinivere looked very troubled...
speak;Roy;...It's nothing to worry over. Do you need something?
speak;Merlinus;Yes, I have learned some troubling information.|A powerful dark mage by the name of Niime fights in the enemy ranks.
speak;Roy;A dark mage... A druid, probably.
speak;Merlinus;In any case, she is apparently extremely learned in ancient sorcery.|She is said to be more knowledgable than most scholars can even imagine.
speak;Roy;We can't pull back now. We press on.
speak;Merlinus;Of course, but please exercise caution.
speak;Roy;Yes, you're right. We must tread lightly.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair3;That Martel who's guarding the castle...|He said he has some secret weapon. I'd be careful if I were you.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana2;You look strong. But I bet you couldn't beat the Sword Saint.{w} They say he's on a level all his own.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan3;Hey, are you the Etrurian Army that the old lady was talking about?|I heard she was originally planning to join you guys, but for some reason she joined up with Bern instead.|What is she thinking?

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerWoman3;When it gets colder the rivers all freeze over,{w} and we can get to the village in the east without much trouble.|But it's not quite the season, unfortunately.

name: VisitVillage3
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman3;Are you the Etrurian Army?{w}{clear}Sigh... Bern's army marched through here just the other day, too.{w} When will we have peace again?|Here, take this. Use it to end the war.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerLittleGirl3;I was playing outside and this ring fell from the sky!|...A gift from the gods?|Nah, someone on a pegasus or wyvern probably dropped it.{w} Here, take it. I prefer my dolls anyway.

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan3;I was told that this goddess icon would bring me good luck...|But I pray to it everyday, and nothing happens.{w} That con man tricked me!|Here, take it. Just looking at it is making me angry.

name: RiverFreezes
_source: speak;Niime;...I'll warn you one more time.|I can't guarantee the results will be what you want...
speak;Martel;Enough of your yammering! Cast the spell!
speak;Roy;An enemy spell caster? Watch out soldiers!
speak;Martel;What...?! What is this?!|The rivers... They've frozen over!
speak;Niime;Well, I'll be... That's not what I expected.
speak;Martel;You! You did this on purpose!
speak;Niime;Don't be absurd...|I gave you ample warning that I couldn't guarantee any results.
speak;Martel;Enough! You there! Toss her in the dungeon!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, we have a report. The rivers have apparently frozen over.
speak;Merlinus;The ice is so thick that even knights on horseback can cross them safely.
speak;Roy;Oh... Well, good.{w} We can advance more quickly now.|Charge the castle gate!

name: MartelFight
_source: speak;Martel;Blast! You made it through this snow...|Curse that useless woman!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Niime;At last, I am released from Bern's dungeon.
speak;Niime;I am Niime.|I live in the mountains where I study arcane magic.
speak;Roy;Why were you in the dungeon? Did you not join Bern of your own choice?
speak;Niime;Well, actually, I did, but it was only a guise.{w} Bern's army has something I wish to study.
speak;Niime;Well, that sure got your attention, didn't it?
speak;Roy;The dragons you speak of...{w} They're not like the wyverns that Bern's soldiers ride upon.|They're strange troops that fight alongside Bern's soldiers...
speak;Niime;I know that well. They're the same dragons that were defeated in the Scouring.
speak;Niime;At first I thought this was only a simple act of aggression by Bern.{w} But then I began to sense a strange and...evil force among their troops.|I decided to investigate.
speak;Niime;The dragons are very much shrouded in mystery.{w} I looked through many ancient books and scrolls.|I could only decipher so many of them. But...
speak;Niime;I have come to the conclusion that Bern has resurrected the Demon Dragon.
speak;Roy;The demon dragon...|The leader of the dragons that Hartmut defeated.

speak;Niime;The very same.|Dragons are a much more advanced species than us humans.|Their vitality and intellect puts that of humans to shame.{w} There is one thing, however, the dragons lack in.|They multiply at a fraction of the rate humans do.{w} But the demon dragon...|It had the power to create more dragons.{w} That is what I learned from my research.
speak;Niime;The demon dragon can create more of its kind.{w} That would explain where Bern is getting all of its dragons.
speak;Niime;Now, that being said...|I wish to learn more about the dragons.{w} I wield dark magic... Let me join your army.|I'm sure I can be of some assistance.
speak;Roy;Of course. We want to learn about the dragons as well.{w} It will be a perilous journey, but if that's acceptable to you, you're welcome to join us.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating Martel and making it through the woodlands,|{c:remove_portrait;Martel (Martel)}Roy and company face the blizzards common of Ilia's winters.|{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}Ilia's harsh weather has in the past served as a natural defense against invaders.|{c:add_portrait;Sigune (Sigune);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}In this blizzard, Sigune, captain of a pegasus knight squad working for Bern,{w} makes preparations to attack Roy and his troops...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;PegKnight;Captain!|The enemy has arrived. They are just beyond the mountains.
speak;PegKnight;The Etrurian Army says they will liberate us from Bern.{w} They say they'll give us our independence...
speak;Sigune;You can't be fool enough to believe that. No one fights a war without gain.|Once they defeat Bern, they intend to take over.{w} It will be the same.
speak;Sigune;Bern are the better allies. They are more experienced in warfare.
speak;Sigune;Come now, we have more immediate problems.{w} We must eliminate the enemy that lies before us.|Are the ballistae ready?
speak;PegKnight;Yes, the archers are all at their stations.
speak;Sigune;Good! Fire at them from a distance.|They'll be floundering around in the dark of this powerful blizzard.{w} Observe nature's wrath...
speak;Roy;Such powerful wind and hail...{w} I can barely see in front of me.
speak;Niime;Ilia's winters are always like this.{w} If you want to fight in this weather, you'll have to put up with it.
speak;Roy;We can't allow Bern time to regroup. We must attack now.
speak;Niime;You're right.|If the demon dragon is victorious, it could be the end of us all.
speak;Roy;I've been wondering... Do you think the demon dragon is in human form as well?
speak;Niime;It seems probable.|It could be that all dragons in this realm are in human form.{w} I've even heard stories of dragons in human form living with people.
speak;Niime;I've read that dragons only began to take human form after the Ending Winter.
speak;Niime;I expect you've heard of it.
speak;Roy;Yes, but only in legend.|I learned that in the Ending Winter, the laws of nature were all warped.|Day became night, and summer became winter.

speak;Niime;That's it.|The scrolls I read on the topic are so timeworn that I couldn't decipher all of them.{w} But one thing is clear.|The Ending Winter was a disaster powerful enough to bend and twist the whole planet.

speak;Niime;Nobody knows for certain...{w}{clear}Legend says the dragons caused it by releasing vast amounts of magical power,{w} but even this theory lacks evidence.|In any case, it is certain that dragons began to take human form after the Ending Winter.|I don't believe these two occurrences are coincidence.
speak;Niime;Ultimately, the truth lies in Bern.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail3;You go up against Ivory Devil Sigune.{w} I wish you luck.|The Ilian pegasus knights can fly through the blizzard. You'll be blinded by the white...{w}and then they will suddenly appear out of the swirling snow.|But when that happens it's too late... You're already dead...

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMan3;Pegasus knights and ballistae... Captain Sigune is after you.|She's hiding in the blizzard, waiting to strike...

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair3;You know about the ballista to the east, right?|We're out of its range here, but the shop over there isn't...

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerGirlBandana2;Bern's headquarters in Ilia?{w} Um, I think it was Edarza... Edetta... Edessa!{w} That's it. It's to the northeast.

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;Money Man 2;I've pondered a lot about whether I should give in to Bern...|But I've made up my mind. I'll hold strong.{w} Take this ring. It brings out your inner strength.|...Please bring peace back to this land.

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan4;You would come to such an isolated place as this...?|The prophecies were correct...|When the world is covered in darkness...|A single blade of wind will slice through the darkness, allowing the light to shine again.

name: ReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;PegKnight;Captain!|Other pegasus knight squads are on their way to assist us!

speak;Sigune;Really? They will help immensely.{w} I almost feel bad for the enemy...|They'll be in a panic when they're suddenly attacked from all directions.|They won't see them coming in this snowstorm...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;Merlinus, I need you to send this letter to Father Yoder in Etruria.
speak;Merlinus;A letter? May I ask what it says?
speak;Roy;It has the information I learned from Niime about the dragons.
speak;Roy;It would take too long to tell you.{w} I haven't sealed the letter yet, so you can look through it if you like.
speak;Merlinus;Very well, I think I will...
speak;Guinivere;...I wish to tell you about my brother.
speak;Guinivere;No...|I want you to know before we enter Bern...|I want you to know the tragedies that have occurred.|You asked before if my brother murdered our father.
speak;Roy;King Zephiel killed his own father to seize the throne...
speak;Guinivere;Our father tried to kill Zephiel first.
speak;Guinivere;He couldn't bear the abuse he took from our father. So he...
speak;Merlinus;The dragons are mysterious creatures indeed... Hm?|What is the matter?
speak;Merlinus;Did I appear at a bad time?
speak;Roy;No, it's fine. Did you send the letter?
speak;Merlinus;Yes, I sent it off after reading through it.
speak;Roy;...Why did the old king try to murder his own son...?

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating Sigune,{w}{c:remove_portrait;Sigune (Sigune)} Roy heads for Edessa, located in the northeast of Ilia.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{clear}{c:add_portrait;Zelot (Zelot);CenterLeft,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Castle Edessa, home of Zelot, leader of the Ilian mercenary knights,{w} once served as headquarters of the pegasus knight mercenaries as well.|{c:remove_portrait;Zelot (Zelot)}However, with Zelot's absence, Bern saw its chance and attacked the castle,{w} forcing the mercenaries and pegasus knights into submission.|{c:add_portrait;Murdock (Murdock);CenterLeft,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}Murdock had made the castle his base, but after he returned to Bern,|{c:remove_portrait;Murdock (Murdock)}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);CenterLeft,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}High Chancellor Roartz was put in charge.|Alarmed by the Etrurian Army's speedy advance to Edessa,{w} Roartz hurriedly contacts the various Ilian mercenary groups for aid.|Unfortunately for him, however, their replies are not promising...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.20: The Liberation of Ilia
speak;RedSoldier;Actually, milord...we've requested aid from Ilia's knights,{w} but all but those directly under Sir Murdock seem reluctant to help.
speak;Roartz;Curses! Things couldn't possibly get any worse...|Ah, but we did capture Zelot's wife.|What is the word on Zelot's troop? Have they responded?
speak;RedSoldier;No, milord...|They are traveling mercenary knights, so we do not know their location.
speak;RedSoldier;Ever since Sigune's defeat, Ilia's militia has been hesitant to attack the Etrurian Army.
speak;Roartz;Cowards! Every last one of them!|The great High Chancellor Roartz will not die in this miserable wasteland!
speak;Juno;Are you all right? Here, take my shawl.
speak;Juno;I can handle it. I'm used to these temperatures.|This is nothing compared to flying through a blizzard.
speak;VillagerGirlPonytail3;Lady Juno... What's going to happen?
speak;Juno;...I don't know. But we must stay hopeful.{w} The enemy may retreat, or perhaps Zelot might return.|This isn't the end.
speak;Juno;His last letter said he planned to join the Lycian Army, but after that...|Well, he may be closer than we realize.
speak;Roy;Yes, we must.|Once we take this castle, it will be our new base before we enter Bern.
speak;Roy;Princess...|May I ask why your father tried to murder King Zephiel?
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel and I have different mothers.{w} In actuality, I am his half sister.
speak;Roy;I heard that Zephiel's mother was an Etrurian noblewoman.
speak;Guinivere;That's correct.|They were arranged to be wed for political reasons. However, our father was already in love with another woman.|That was my mother.
speak;Guinivere;The marriage between the king and Zephiel's mother was forced.|Our father didn't love Zephiel's mother and always resented their son.
speak;Roy;Was that the cause of all the troubles that happened?
speak;Guinivere;No...|I remember Zephiel working hard, vying for our father's affection.{w} He was a brilliant scholar and a prodigy in combat.|He grew to become a fine heir to Bern's throne.
speak;Roy;Then why did the king try to--;FLAG(no_block)
speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy! We are ready for the attack!
speak;Roy;Understood. I only need a moment!|Princess Guinivere, I am sorry, but I...
speak;Guinivere;No, I understand. Go. Please be careful.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Shanna' or u.nid=='Thea' or u.nid=='Zelot']

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After taking back Castle Edessa,{w} Roy turns his troops toward the ancient ruins on the outskirts of the town.|A legendary weapon is said to be hidden within...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;BlueSoldier;Sir Tick! The enemy is advancing!
speak;Tick;Don't panic.|The path through the ruins is blocked off.|They're not getting in here so easily.
speak;BlueSoldier;But the enemy has had so many victories against Ilia's troops!|Even many of our own men have fallen to them.|I don't see how we can expect victory...!
speak;Tick;We don't need a victory. General Murdock said that we simply must hold our ground.|We defend until the enemy gives up and leaves.
speak;Roy;The legendary weapon lies in here...
speak;Roy;{v:RoyTalkPartner}, do you know about this place?
speak;{v:RoyTalkPartner};Yes.|I believe that Maltet, the Blizzard Spear, lies in these ruins.
speak;{v:RoyTalkPartner};Barigan the Holy Knight used it during the Scouring.
speak;Roy;Barigan? He's a hero to all knights. I studied him a great deal.|He was honorable in everything he did.|...This building seems to have walls everywhere. Is there a way inside?
speak;{v:RoyTalkPartner};Bern's forces most likely blocked the pathways to cover their tracks.
speak;Roy;Then they must have been in a rush...|Maybe the walls are weak in certain areas.
speak;Roy;All right. Let's do what we can.

name: ArcardoFightKlein
_source: speak;Klein;You are the one who betrayed Etruria, Lord Arcardo!

name: ArcardoFightDouglas
_source: speak;Arcardo;D-Douglas!|You had turned to the enemy...!?

name: RoartzFightDouglas
_source: speak;Roartz;Douglas... Hmph! After all that you said, you've gone back on your honor!
speak;Douglas;Indeed it may appear that way. But I fight true.|I fight with my heart and I have confidence in our cause.
speak;Roartz;Silence!|Enough of your nonsensical rambling. Die here!

name: SiguneFightThea
_source: speak;Sigune;Thea? What are you doing here?|Oh... You've joined Etruria.
speak;Sigune;You know the code of the Ilian knights.|You will get no mercy from me.

name: SiguneFightShanna
_source: speak;Sigune;My honor as a knight of Ilia is at stake.|Don't expect me to hold back.

name: SiguneFight
_source: speak;Sigune;So...you've made it through the blizzard. Congratulations.|Unfortunately, the only prize that awaits you is death.

name: SiguneDeath
_source: speak;Sigune;...Dear me...|I didn't anticipate perishing here...|But perhaps...I was already dead...|Perhaps I died...a long...time ago...

name: ThiefReinforcements
_source: speak;Cath;Brrrr! I knew Ilia was cold, but I didn't think it was THIS cold!|And there's just snow everywhere you look!|The pure white... It's beautiful in a way...|Whoops, no time to admire the scenery. I'm here for the moolah...

name: RoartzFight
_source: speak;Roartz;S-someone! Come to my aid!|All is lost if I fall!

name: RoartzDeath
_source: speak;Roartz;W-wait... Serve me! It is not too late...|I shall...absolve you of your crimes...|Guh...!

name: GaidenFailed
_source: speak;Roy;The blizzard is picking up...|This might take longer than we expected.|We should head for Bern as soon as we take the castle.

name: ZelotJunoTalk
_source: speak;Zelot;Are you all right? You're not hurt?|If any of them laid a finger on you, I'll--
speak;Juno;Oh, Zelot, I'm not a child. I used to be a captain, you know.
speak;Juno;I'm fine. They didn't do anything to me.
speak;Juno;Why are you in the Etrurian Army?|I thought you were with Lycia.
speak;Zelot;Well, it's a long story...|What it comes down to is that this is the Etrurian Army only in name.|It's actually made up primarily of soldiers from the Lycian Army.
speak;Zelot;I'm sorry I wasn't here when you needed me most...
speak;Juno;There is no use for regret at this point.
speak;Zelot;But you were forced to fight...
speak;Juno;Oh? I thought you liked my combat uniform.
speak;Juno;Then what's the problem?|You'll be seeing a lot more of it from now on...
speak;Juno;I do.|I will fight alongside you.
speak;Zelot;No! I can't accept that. You retired years ago.|Leave the fighting to us...
speak;Juno;I may have retired, but I still had to take up arms to defend the castle.|Zelot, this world isn't safe anymore.
speak;Juno;I will fight.|I want to bring peace back to this land.
#extra dialogue to give Juno a weapon
speak;Zelot;...Alright. I know not to doubt that look.|Just...please be careful, enough comrades have died...
speak;Juno;I swear I will, as long as you promise as well.|We will fight to return peace to Ilia and then we will return home to our child, together.
speak;Zelot;Here, take my lance. Let's move out.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Zelot']

name: TheaJunoTalk
_source: speak;Juno;Thea... What are you doing here?
speak;Thea;It's a long story... But I'm with the Etrurian Army now.|I'd heard that Edessa had fallen to Bern so I was worried, but...|I'm glad to see that you're all right.
speak;Juno;...I'd heard that you were fighting against this army.|You didn't betray...?
speak;Thea;No! Never!|I never betrayed the code.|I did everything I was supposed to.|I just eventually ended up in the Etrurian Army.
speak;Juno;Of course...|You're a good and diligent soldier. I should have known better.|I'm sorry.
speak;Thea;No, it's all right...|But, um... What are you wearing?
speak;Juno;This? Why, this is my combat uniform. Don't you remember it?|What do you think?|Think I can still make a decent captain?
speak;Thea;Of course, but I thought you retired.

speak;Juno;With such dire stakes I had no choice but to come out of retirement.|On my own all I could do was defend the people in the castle, but if I join you, I can actually strike back against Bern.
speak;Thea;Then you're going to fight alongside us?
speak;Juno;Yes, that's what I'm getting at.

speak;Juno;With such dire stakes I had no choice but to come out of retirement.|On my own all I could do was defend the people in the castle, but now that I've joined you, I can actually strike back against Bern.
speak;Thea;That makes me so happy!|I never thought I'd be able to fight alongside you again.
speak;Juno;Don't get ahead of yourself.|You still have a long way to catch up to me!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Thea']

name: ShannaJunoTalk
_source: speak;Juno;Shanna? What are you doing here?
speak;Shanna;I'm with the Etrurian Army.|I was surprised when I heard Edessa was taken by Bern, but I knew you'd be OK.
speak;Juno;Oh? Why do you say that?
speak;Shanna;You were a captain of the pegasus knights!|There's no way Bern could defeat you.
speak;Juno;Well, you'll be sorry to hear that I was captured.
speak;Juno;But I don't intend to surrender to Bern.|All I could do on my own was try to keep the people in the castle safe,{w} but now that I've joined you,{w} I stand a fighting chance against Bern.
speak;Juno;But I don't intend to surrender to Bern.|All I could do on my own was try to keep the people in the castle safe,{w} but if I join you,{w} I actually stand a fighting chance against Bern.
speak;Shanna;Then are you going to fight with us?
speak;Shanna;I became a pegasus knight because I wanted to be just like you.|Fighting alongside you is like a dream come true.
speak;Juno;Really? I'm honored...|You always have tended to go overboard with things...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Shanna']

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! Many of Bern's troops have been spotted in the ruins outside Edessa!
speak;Merlinus;Reports say the ruins are home to a lance that was used in the Scouring.
speak;Merlinus;It is most probably a legendary weapon.
speak;Roy;Then we must hurry to the ruins!
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere, the attack on Bern will commence soon.|So may I ask...?
speak;Roy;You said King Zephiel was an outstanding pupil in everything he did...|It sounds like he would have been an ideal heir to the throne.
speak;Roy;But still your father never looked kindly at him.
speak;Guinivere;In truth...our father began to despise Zephiel precisely because of his talent.
speak;Roy;Why...would a father resent his son's own talent...?
speak;Guinivere;Our father was a man of unextraordinary skill and intellect.|Zephiel's outstanding talents made our father colder towards him.
speak;Guinivere;He went as far as to tell Zephiel that he would never inherit Bern.|He said that instead, the throne would go to my future husband.
speak;Roy;His own father told him that?! What a heartless man!

speak;Guinivere;But Zephiel held strong. He always said he never cared about inheriting the throne.|But the people of Bern knew of Zephiel's genius and wanted him king.|Pressured by the public, our father lost his patience at last...
speak;Roy;That's when he decided to kill Zephiel...?

speak;Guinivere;Our father gave Zephiel a goblet full of a poisoned drink at a banquet.|That was the first and last time Zephiel ever accepted a drink from our father.|After returning to his room, Zephiel began to fall dreadfully ill.{w} For ten days and nights, Zephiel lingered between life and death.{w}{clear}But Murdock, Zephiel's teacher and loyal general, saved his life.
speak;Roy;...The old king made no further attempts on his life?

speak;Guinivere;No. At least, not to completion...|I have heard that he schemed to have Murdock and Zephiel's mother killed.{w} He was scheming to murder everyone connected to Zephiel.|Upon learning of our father's intentions, Zephiel feigned death.{w} At his funeral service, our father leaned over the coffin to view Zephiel's body.|It was at that moment that Zephiel sprung from the coffin and...sword in hand...

speak;Guinivere;I was but a child then, so naturally I could not understand what was going on.|All I knew at the time is that our father died, and Zephiel never smiled again.|Before then, he was stern at times, but always a kind and loving brother.{w} But after everything that happened...
speak;Guinivere;I knew that someday I may have to act against him.
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel is so far-gone now. He will never listen to anything I say.|Roy, please... You must stop him.|Stop him from destroying Bern and from destroying Elibe.
speak;Roy;Such a feat will likely require my blade.|Can you still ask such a thing of me?
speak;Guinivere;...I trust your judgement. Do what you must.
speak;Roy;You have my word, Princess Guinivere.|I swear by the Fire Emblem that I will stop King Zephiel!
speak;VillagerGirlPonytail3;Are you the one who saved us?
speak;VillagerGirlPonytail3;Thank you!|It's only thanks to you that we're alive and have our freedom.|Please accept this token of our gratitude.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;BlueSoldier;It's here! The lance is here!
speak;Roy;......|...This is Barigan's lance Maltet...|It's beautiful, as if it were made of ice.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, Bern's troops are fleeing.
speak;Merlinus;Let them go? We must attack.
speak;Roy;No, don't. We've already won.|They don't want to fight us.
speak;Roy;They all have lives and families.|There's no need to take that away from them.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere, the attack on Bern will commence soon.|So may I ask...?
speak;Roy;You said King Zephiel was an outstanding pupil in everything he did...|It sounds like he would have been an ideal heir to the throne.
speak;Roy;But still your father never looked kindly at him.
speak;Guinivere;In truth...our father began to despise Zephiel precisely because of his talent.
speak;Roy;Why...would a father resent his son's own talent...?
speak;Guinivere;Our father was a man of unextraordinary skill and intellect.|Zephiel's outstanding talents made our father colder towards him.
speak;Guinivere;He went as far as to tell Zephiel that he would never inherit Bern.|He said that instead, the throne would go to my future husband.
speak;Roy;His own father told him that?! What a heartless man!

speak;Guinivere;But Zephiel held strong. He always said he never cared about inheriting the throne.|But the people of Bern knew of Zephiel's genius and wanted him king.|Pressured by the public, our father lost his patience at last...
speak;Roy;That's when he decided to kill Zephiel...?

speak;Guinivere;Our father gave Zephiel a goblet full of a poisoned drink at a banquet.|That was the first and last time Zephiel ever accepted a drink from our father.|After returning to his room, Zephiel began to fall dreadfully ill. For ten days and nights, Zephiel lingered between life and death.{w} But Murdock, Zephiel's teacher and loyal general, saved his life.
speak;Roy;...The old king made no further attempts on his life?

speak;Guinivere;No. At least, not to completion...|I have heard that he schemed to have Murdock and Zephiel's mother killed.{w} He was scheming to murder everyone connected to Zephiel.|Upon learning of our father's intentions, Zephiel feigned death.{w} At his funeral service, our father leaned over the coffin to view Zephiel's body.|It was at that moment that Zephiel sprung from the coffin and...sword in hand...

speak;Guinivere;I was but a child then, so naturally I could not understand what was going on.|All I knew at the time is that our father died, and Zephiel never smiled again.|Before then, he was stern at times, but always a kind and loving brother.{w} But after everything that happened...
speak;Guinivere;I knew that someday I may have to act against him.
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel is so far-gone now. He will never listen to anything I say.|Roy, please... You must stop him.|Stop him from destroying Bern and from destroying Elibe.
speak;Roy;Such a feat will likely require my blade.|Can you still ask such a thing of me?
speak;Guinivere;...I trust your judgement. Do what you must.
speak;Roy;You have my word, Princess Guinivere.|I swear by the Fire Emblem that I will stop King Zephiel!

name: TickFight
_source: speak;Tick;No... This is a nightmare.|How did you get through those walls?

name: TickDeath
_source: speak;Tick;You have bested us... You may pass...|But you will know Bern's true power soon...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After surviving many hardships, Roy finally sets foot on Bern's soil.{w}{clear}Guinivere guides Roy to the Shrine of Seals.|{c:add_portrait;Murdock (Murdock);CenterRight,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}In their way stands Murdock, the brilliant and stalwart head of the Wyvern Generals.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Murdock (Murdock)}{clear}Etruria and Bern, the two greatest forces on the continent, begin direct warfare.|The sun rises as the bloodiest day in the history of Elibe dawns...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;RedSoldier;General Murdock. All troops are at their posts and ready for battle.
speak;Murdock;Your squad will be the key to victory in this battle.|Do you understand?
speak;Gale;Of course, Sir Murdock. I won't disappoint you.
speak;Murdock;I expect not.|The enemy are but insects next to the might of Bern's army.|Even so...that Lycian general has made it far.
speak;Murdock;Yes. Roy.|I hope to be able to duel him in a fair fight, one on one.
speak;Yoder;Ah, General Roy! I have found you at last!
speak;Roy;Father Yoder!|What brings you all the way from Etruria? Is something amiss?
speak;Yoder;I did some additional research after reading your letter.|I reached the same conclusion.|Bern has resurrected the demon dragon.
speak;Roy;You think so, too?|...Hartmut defeated the demon dragon in the Scouring.|How could Bern have brought it back to life?
speak;Yoder;Apparently after defeating it, Hartmut chose to spare its life.
speak;Yoder;Instead of killing it, he sealed it away in the mountains of Bern.|The sword he used to seal it was...
speak;Roy;I learned a little bit of it in my studies...
speak;Yoder;The demon dragon's seal may have been broken, but with the Binding Blade,{w} we may be able to seal it away once more or kill it for good.
speak;Roy;Do you know where the Demon Dragon might be?

speak;Yoder;Yes, I believe so.|We know dragons change into human form,{w} and the demon dragon is most likely in such a form as well.{w} I have a suspect already.|The "Dark Priestess" that is always at King Zephiel's side.
speak;Yoder;There is no solid evidence that she is the demon dragon,{w} but she appeared shortly before the other dragons did.
speak;Yoder;The dragons seal away their power in gems called dragonstones.|Remaining in their dragon form uses too much energy otherwise.|The same is likely true for the demon dragon as well.
speak;Roy;We must see her in person and find the truth.
speak;Yoder;Allow me to go with you.
speak;Roy;You will fight alongside us? By all means!
speak;Yoder;I have also been instructed to give you these.|They are legendary weapons that the church located.
speak;Roy;Legendary weapons?! They will be invaluable!
speak;Yoder;If the demon dragon has been released,|then this is the greatest crisis mankind has faced since the Scouring.
speak;Roy;We must rise like the Eight Legends of yore to save humanity once again.
#Give Yoder the divine weapon you didn't get
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Saul' or u.nid=='Dorothy']

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;Money Man;You're the Etrurian Army, aren't you?|There are no soldiers here.|Take this. Just leave us in peace!

name: MurdockFight
_source: speak;Murdock;Hm... You have made it far.|I congratulate you. But can you defeat me?

name: YoderSaulTalk
_source: speak;Yoder;Saul, it is good to see you well.{w} And thank you.{w} You and Dorothy have done a great service to the church.
speak;Saul;...There is no greater pleasure than to know I have been of use.
speak;Yoder;Oh? I've never known you to be so serious...
speak;Saul;Father Yoder, despite all appearances, I am a priest.|The common good is my greatest concern.
speak;Yoder;I am sorry I doubted you.|From this point, we fight together.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Saul']

name: YoderDorothyTalk
_source: speak;Dorothy;Very much so.|It is good to see you, Father Yoder.
speak;Yoder;You are always so cheery and full of energy.|I'm sure Saint Elimine adores that about you.
speak;Yoder;Just being around you cleanses the heart and makes one feel pure.|I'm sure that's true even for Saul. You have much to be proud of.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Dorothy']

name: GalleAppears
_source: speak;Gale;Knights of Bern! We strike now!|Leave none alive!|Don't even leave them time to scream in fear!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Melady' or u.nid=='Zeiss']

name: MeladyGalleTalk
_source: speak;Gale;Do not speak...|You and I are both loyal knights.|We both fight in our masters' names.|That is all there is to know.

speak;Gale;Melady...|This is probably the end, so let me say this.|I am truly grateful I was fortunate enough to meet you.|We trained together, and we fought alongside each other.|Melady... The days I spent with you...|They were the happiest days of my life.
speak;Gale;...Good-bye, Melady.|My only regret is that we didn't meet in a more peaceful time.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Melady']

name: ZeissGalleTalk
_source: speak;Gale;Zeiss, you seem to be well.
speak;Zeiss;Sir Galle... Must we truly fight?
speak;Zeiss;I...I don't want to fight you!|You're the last person I ever...
speak;Gale;Did you have this little faith in your choice when you left Bern?|Do you regret your decision to fight against Bern?
speak;Zeiss;No! My mind is...set...{w} It still hurts to point my blade towards Bern, my homeland...|But the path I chose was not a mistake...!
speak;Gale;Then cast away your hesitation!|Focus on defeating those who block the path that you have chosen.|...No matter who that may be.
speak;Gale;Zeiss... Are you a knight of Bern?
speak;Gale;Good!|Then when next we meet, there will be no words.|Our blades will cross, and one will be left standing!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Zeiss']

name: GaidenFailed
_source: speak;Peres;Have you dealt with the legendary weapon?
speak;RedSoldier;Yes sir, it has been disposed of.
speak;Peres;Good.|Now we go to General Murdock's aid!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Elffin;Lord Roy. This sword in the altar...
speak;Roy;This must be the Binding Blade...
speak;Merlinus;...I can't seem to draw it from the stone.
speak;Roy;It's sealed in the altar. We must use the Fire Emblem.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere said that it goes in the socket on the hilt...
speak;Roy;Now I should be able to draw it...!|......!...
#Scene change to Idunn vision, fade to white
speak;Roy;...What...are these images...?|Are they the Binding Blade's...|No, Hartmut's memories...?
speak;Roy;!|Who was that?|I don't understand what I'm feeling. It's very...
#scene change back to castle, fade to white
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy? Are you all right?
speak;Roy;Yes... I'm fine.|So this is Hartmut's sword, the Binding Blade...|Am I really worthy to wield it...?
speak;Elffin;It is said that truly magnificent swords choose their owners.|The sword is in your hands now.{w} It has chosen you.
speak;Roy;But anyone with the Fire Emblem could have taken it...
speak;Elffin;In theory, perhaps so...|But it was you who reached it. This is fate.
speak;Merlinus;Now that we have the Binding Blade, all that's left is the king of Bern.|We mustn't tarry!
speak;Roy;...You're right! Zephiel must be stopped!
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy... There is a path leading underground here.
speak;Roy;Is the Binding Blade down that way?
speak;Elffin;I cannot say...|But a captive tells us that there are two weapons in this shrine.
speak;Roy;Wait, is that right?|Does that mean that there is another legendary weapon?
speak;Elffin;Possibly...|Perhaps we should ask those in our army who hail from Bern.
speak;Roy;Yes, I'll see if they know anything.

name: MurdockFightZeiss
_source: speak;Murdock;You were one of Narcian's troops.|I heard the story from Galle.|You have my sympathy, but you are my enemy now.|Come! We fight!

name: MurdockFightMelady
_source: speak;Murdock;Melady... I don't want to fight you.|But you are here. It seems we have no choice.|Come!

name: MurdockFightRoy
_source: speak;Murdock;At last, the great General Roy stands before me!|I have been waiting to match blades with you!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;Elffin, do you know what spell tome this is?
speak;Elffin;Yes, it is also known as the Elder Revelation.|It was used by Bramimond, the most enigmatic of the Eight Legends.
speak;Roy;Bramimond...|I've heard the name, but nothing more.
speak;Elffin;We know not if Bramimond was man or woman, young or old.|Nothing specific is written.
speak;Roy;There always seem to be traps where the Legendary weapons lie.
speak;Guinivere;...Perhaps they are meant to keep the unworthy from wielding them.
speak;Roy;Maybe so... But the traps are so intricate.|I feel there must be something more to them than that.
speak;Elffin;...I have wondered the same thing.|I shall see if there is any information on the subject.
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy. This sword in the altar...
speak;Roy;This must be the Binding Blade...
speak;Merlinus;...I can't seem to draw it from the stone.
speak;Roy;It's sealed in the altar. We must use the Fire Emblem.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere said that it goes in the socket on the hilt...
speak;Roy;Now I should be able to draw it...!|......!...
#Scene change to Idunn vision, fade to white
speak;Roy;...What...are these images...?|Are they the Binding Blade's...|No, Hartmut's memories...?
speak;Roy;!|Who was that?|I don't understand what I'm feeling. It's very...
#scene change back to castle, fade to white
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy? Are you all right?
speak;Roy;Yes... I'm fine.|So this is Hartmut's sword, the Binding Blade...|Am I really worthy to wield it...?
speak;Elffin;It is said that truly magnificent swords choose their owners.|The sword is in your hands now. It has chosen you.
speak;Roy;But anyone with the Fire Emblem could have taken it...
speak;Elffin;In theory, perhaps so...|But it was you who reached it. This is fate.
speak;Merlinus;Now that we have the Binding Blade, all that's left is the king of Bern.|We mustn't tarry!
speak;Roy;...You're right! Zephiel must be stopped!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Roy ventures into the depths of the Shrine of Seals.|Apparently, the shrine contains more than just the Binding Blade.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy);FLAG(no_block)}{clear}{c:add_portrait;Peres (Peres);CenterRight,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}However, Peres, one of Murdock's best commanders, waits for Roy within...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Peres;I wish I could have been at General Murdock's side when he fell.

speak;Peres;We carry out our final orders from General Murdock as planned.|We will defend the legendary weapon to our deaths if need be.|Apocalypse, the Elder Revelation, must not fall into enemy hands!
speak;Roy;This is where the Legendary weapon is, Princess Guinivere?
speak;Guinivere;Most likely...|All I know is that there is a tome here meant to protect the shrine from intruders.
speak;Elffin;I agree that the tome is likely a legendary weapon.|Bern's troops are present as well.
speak;Roy;We will soon fight Zephiel himself.|...We need as many legendary weapons as we can obtain before then.|We must get that tome.
speak;Guinivere;I have also heard that there are numerous traps placed about.

speak;Guinivere;Yes, and they are supposedly very well-crafted at that.|Most soldiers probably lack the dexterity to disarm them, but thieves may be able to take care of them.|In any case, do be careful.
speak;Roy;Yes, Princess. We will stay on our guard.
speak;Roy;There is a Legendary weapon in this place?
speak;Zeiss;Yes, I believe so.|All I've heard are rumors from other soldiers, but there is apparently a tome meant to protect the shrine from intruders.
speak;Elffin;I agree that the tome is likely a legendary weapon.|Bern's troops are present as well.
speak;Roy;We will soon fight Zephiel himself.|...We need as many legendary weapons as we can obtain before then.|We must get that tome.
speak;Melady;I have also heard that there are numerous traps placed about.
speak;Melady;Yes, and they are supposedly very well-crafted at that.|Most of us probably lack the dexterity to disarm them, but thieves may be able to take care of them.|In any case, do be careful.
speak;Roy;Yes, we must stay on our guard.

name: PeresFight
_source: speak;Peres;Darkness from an age long forgotten...|I will show you its power.

name: PeresDeath
_source: speak;Peres;Darkness...|I am being consumed by darkness...

name: ThievesAppear
_source: speak;Cath;Castle Bern... A worthy target for the Master Thief.|I'm sure there's mountains of gold hidden in here somewhere!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After obtaining the Binding Blade, Roy directs his troops to Bern's capital.|{c:add_portrait;Zephiel (Zephiel);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;}King Zephiel awaits within, along with his personal guard.{w}{clear}Roy prepares to charge the castle to end the war,{w} and to bring a long-awaited peace back to Elibe...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Zephiel;What you're saying, then... is that Murdock is dead...
speak;Zephiel;......|What is the Etrurian Army's next move?
speak;Brunnya;They have captured the Shrine of Seals. They march this way.
speak;Zephiel;Very well...|Then we face them in the castle.
speak;Brunnya;Yes, my king. My life is yours.
speak;Zephiel;No. You cannot die here, Brunnya.|I have a task of grave importance for you.
speak;Zephiel;I will remain here and defend the castle against the Etrurian Army.|You must escape to safety and stay hidden until the battle is over.
speak;Zephiel;Brunnya, you will guard Idunn.|Protect her as you would protect me.
speak;Brunnya;No, Your Majesty! Please!|Allow me to fight by your side!
speak;Zephiel;That is something I cannot do.|...This will be a harsh battle, and Idunn must survive.|If she is lost...this entire struggle has been for nothing.
speak;Brunnya;I must object, Your Majesty! I serve you and you alone...
speak;Zephiel;Enough, Brunnya! Your king orders you.|The punishment for defiance is execution.
speak;Zephiel;Idunn, if I fall...|The plan continues.
speak;Idunn Hood;As you will...|The world will be liberated as per Your Majesty's command.
speak;Zephiel;Good. Then my dream will be fulfilled.
speak;RedSoldier;The Etrurian Army...|I will not let you into the throne room!
speak;RedSoldier;I shall protect this switch with my life!
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, Zephiel is in the throne room in the center of the castle.|However, the entryway to the throne is blocked off by automatic defenses.
speak;Merlinus;One of the captives said that at either end of the castle,{w} there are some switches that can be manipulated to open the way.
speak;Roy;That will be a long detour...
speak;Merlinus;There is more.|After hitting the switches, one must hold the Fire Emblem in front of the throne room to make it open.
speak;Roy;I have the Fire Emblem with me.|It sounds like I should go to the throne room while others handle the switches...
speak;Merlinus;That would be the quickest way.
speak;Roy;...But would a captive leak that kind of information so easily?|Perhaps it's a trap...
speak;Merlinus;I don't believe so.|The captive said the switches are protected by Bern's ablest warriors.|Even with this information, it will be no easy feat.
speak;Roy;The enemy may be powerful, but we're not exactly slouches, either.|I know we're up for the challenge! Victory will be ours!

name: PressLeftSwitch
_source: speak;{unit};Is this the switch? Nothing's happening...

name: PressRightSwitch
_source: speak;{unit};Is this the switch? Nothing's happening...

name: OpenThroneRoom
_source: speak;Zephiel;You've come.|Hmph... It's laughable, really.{w} A mere child making it so far.
speak;Roy;Why did you start this war?
speak;Zephiel;...I wish to end the Age of Man.

speak;Zephiel;Humans...are filthy and despicable creatures.|They flock to the promise of power like hideous, hairless sheep,{w} and they stab trusted allies while their backs are turned.|I'm certain you have witnessed as much even from many who claim to serve me.

speak;Zephiel;Jealousy. Hatred. Greed.|Friends and family are driven to murder one another by these petty emotions.|Such emotions spawn fathers who would even kill their own brood.|As long as humans control,|as long as humans exist,|this madness will never end.
speak;Roy;But consider what you've done!|You've become exactly that which you despise!
speak;Zephiel;...Do you know how the Scouring ended?
speak;Roy;The demon dragon was defeated by Hartmut...

speak;Zephiel;Mistakes cannot be left uncorrected.|I will liberate the world from the grasp of man and return it to the dragons.|The slate will be wiped clean. History will be rewritten.|It is the only way to free the world from everlasting agony!
speak;Roy;Is it true that you resurrected the demon dragon?
speak;Zephiel;There is no need to answer that. You will know for yourself before long.
speak;Roy;You said you intend to give the world to the dragons.|How would rule by dragons be any different?
speak;Zephiel;The dragons you have seen are weapons for battle.|They have no self.|They lack reprehensible emotions to drive them, unlike humans.|The dragons' rule will be just and peaceful.
speak;Roy;Such a world can't be a better alternative!|Some humans may commit terrible atrocities,{w} but it has always been other humans who have stopped them!
speak;Roy;You have lost faith in humanity and in yourself.|I believe in mankind, and I know that your lunacy must be stopped!

name: ZephielFight
_source: speak;Zephiel;You shall not bar my path!

name: ZephielDeath
_source: speak;Zephiel;...I am defeated...|But remember this...|My will shall never die...|As long as humans retain control, madness will reign...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Elffin;The Dark Priestess is nowhere to be found...

if;has_item('Durandal',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Armads',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Forblaze',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Aureola',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Maltet',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Mulagir',party='Etruria') == True and has_item('Apocalypse',party='Etruria') == True
speak;Elffin;Eckesachs...|A sword that only the king of Bern can use...
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, legend says that when all the legendary weapons come together,|the Dragon Sanctuary will rise from the ground!
speak;Merlinus;It was the headquarters and lair of the dragons...|That's what the legends say, anyway.
speak;Roy;Does that mean Eckesachs is the final legendary weapon?|I thought it was the Binding Blade.
speak;Elffin;...The Binding Blade may be on an even higher level than the legendary weapons...|It may be its own entity, beyond compare to even the legendary weapons...
speak;Roy;More powerful than the legendary weapons...?{w} What power lies in this sword?
speak;Merlinus;The sword is glowing again!|The light is pointing to the south!
speak;Roy;Will the light lead us to the Dragon Sanctuary?
speak;Merlinus;That is how the stories go.
speak;Elffin;...If the Dark Priestess is the demon dragon as we suspect...|then she is most likely at the sanctuary...
speak;Roy;Very well. We follow the light!
speak;Guinivere;I'm sorry... I need some time alone.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy... You should leave her be.
speak;Roy;Elffin!|...Thank you.|Your homeland is in turmoil... yet you chose to help us.|You've been an asset to us all...
speak;Elffin;...I'm afraid I don't know what you mean by my "homeland"...|But it was my greatest pleasure to assist you.
speak;Roy;I'll never be able to repay this.
speak;Merlinus;Are you thinking of Zephiel's final words?|He may have been right... in a way.
speak;Roy;...Has the Dark Priestess been found?
speak;Merlinus;Unfortunately not...|She apparently disappeared before the battle.
speak;Roy;Is that so... Do you really think she could be the demon dragon?
speak;Merlinus;It is difficult to say without even seeing her.|It will be near impossible to locate her now.|She is always clad in a black robe and none have seen her up close.
speak;Roy;That's unfortunate... But so be it.|The battle is over. That's cause enough for celebration.
speak;Merlinus;I think not, milord! The hardest part has yet to come.|The land must be nursed back to health now that the war is over.|There are countless people in need of our assistance.

speak;Roy;You're right! We have work to do.|The real battle is only just beginning.|We must look to the future.|No matter what hardships we may face, we must never give up.|We must prove that a land of beauty and peace from human hands is possible!
speak;Merlinus;I live to serve you, Lord Roy!|Now, let us make our way home.|We must spread the word of our victory!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Bern surrenders with King Zephiel's death.|The great war that rattled the foundations of Elibe is over.|{c:remove_portrait;Zephiel (Zephiel)}Roy's battle, however, is not.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Idunn Hood;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}{clear}Roy continues his search for the Dark Priestess, believed to be the demon dragon.|{c:remove_portrait;Idunn Hood}Following the legendary weapons' light, Roy heads for the Dragon Sanctuary.|{c:add_portrait;Brunnya (Brunnya);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}However, waiting for Roy at the entrance to the sanctuary is Brunnya,{w} the last surviving Wyvern General of Bern.|With the remaining troops of Bern at her command, she awaits Roy's approach.{w}{clear}With a heavy heart, Roy prepares to fight the ghost of the now dead Bern...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.23: The Ghosts of Bern
speak;Brunnya;Sir Jahn, Idunn is here.{w} I leave her in your care.
speak;Jahn;And what about you, human? What will you do now?
speak;Brunnya;I will stay here. I will face the Etrurian Army...and my destiny.
speak;Brunnya;The wyvern riders scattered around the continent have returned to us.
speak;Jahn;Do you have any chance of victory?
speak;Brunnya;...Our chance of victory is minuscule at best.|But we are the Bern Army, the strongest force in Elibe.|If nothing else, we shall show them our unwavering will.
speak;Jahn;Your will...? You humans are incomprehensible to us at times.|Do you expect your will alone to earn you victory?|But so be it.|I leave you to your irrational pursuit.
speak;Brunnya;...Have you given the troops my message?
speak;RedSoldier;Yes, General Brunnya.|I told them they are free to leave if they so wish.
speak;RedSoldier;Nearly all of the soldiers say they still wish to fight for you.
speak;Brunnya;Nearly all of them?|Victory is unlikely. I'm sure many of the troops have family awaiting their return.|I do not want any to feel that they must fight on this day.
speak;RedSoldier;We are knights of Bern, General.|We have no intention of bowing our heads to Etruria.
speak;Brunnya;...Dismiss the injured and those with young children or elderly parents.|They are forbidden from fighting in this battle.
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy, the troops are prepared.
speak;Elffin;Yes, but as expected, the enemy refuses to surrender.
speak;Roy;Was it clear that their safety would be guaranteed if they surrender?
speak;Elffin;Yes, but even given that information, they apparently politely refused.
speak;Roy;Why do they fight? Bern's king is defeated...
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere... Do you understand why?
speak;Guinivere;I do very well.|...Bern recognizes itself as the strongest force in Elibe.|Their pride does not allow them to accept defeat without a fight.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy! The enemy is advancing!
speak;Roy;...They leave us no choice. We must fight!|Merlinus, send Princess Guinivere to the back lines...
speak;Guinivere;No. I will stay here.|I...must listen to their cries.|That is all I can do to atone for my betrayal...

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;Karel;...Fir? Is that you?|What are you doing here?
speak;Fir;I never expected to find you here, Uncle.
speak;Karel;I've traveled enough. I decided it was time to settle down.|I had hoped to train my sword without distractions in this quiet village...
speak;Fir;Uncle... I must tell you something.|Mother... She...passed on...
speak;Karel;......|So she succumbed to her illness...|I'm sorry.|I wasn't there when you needed me the most.
speak;Karel;But why are you here?|Surely you haven't been searching for me just to tell me that?

speak;Fir;I know that you dislike getting caught up in conflicts like this.|All I wanted was to help the people who have suffered from this war.|Uncle... Was I wrong? Was I mistaken in joining this fight?|Should I have found a better way to train my sword...?
speak;Karel;No, you've made no mistakes.|A path you choose on your own is never wrong.|In fact, I think I'll join you.
speak;Karel;Absolutely.|...You have grown so much.|The last time I saw you, you couldn't even walk yet.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Roy' or u.nid=='Bartre']
speak;Karel;Bartre? What are you doing here?
speak;Bartre;I fight with the Etrurian Army.|I didn't expect to see you here...
speak;Karel;I've traveled enough. I decided it was time to settle down.|I had hoped to train my sword without distractions in this quiet village...
speak;Bartre;...I have something I must apologize for...
speak;Bartre;Yes... I did all I could, but...
speak;Bartre;Forgive me! I was too weak to save her...
speak;Karel;It is not your fault. It is I who should apologize to you.|I wasn't at her side when she needed me the most...
speak;Bartre;...I wish to ask you a favor.
speak;Bartre;I want this battle to end.|I know how you despise warfare... but will you lend us your skills...?
speak;Karel;...So that's it.|Very well. You have my sword.
speak;Bartre;Thank you, my brother!|With your skills, victory is as good as ours!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Roy' or u.nid=='Fir']
speak;Karel;This village has none who wish to join your fight.|Please leave us in peace.

name: KarelFirTalk
_source: speak;Karel;Ah, Fir... Fancy meeting you here.
speak;Fir;Wh-what are you doing in a place like this?
speak;Karel;I live here.|After all my travels around the world, I decided to settle here.
speak;Fir;Uncle... I must tell you something.|Mother... She...
speak;Karel;Your father told me.|I'm sorry I couldn't be with you.|I'm sure it must have been difficult...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Fir']

name: KarelBartreTalk
_source: speak;Bartre;I fight with the Etrurian Army... What about you, Karel?
speak;Karel;I live here.|I've traveled enough. It was time to settle down.
speak;Bartre;Karel... I must tell you something.
speak;Bartre;I beg your forgiveness! I could do nothing...
speak;Karel;I don't blame you. It is I who should apologize.|If only I could have been there with you...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Bartre']

name: KarelRoyTalk
_source: speak;Karel;I am Karel.|I have decided to assist your army.
speak;Roy;You're the Sword Saint... Your skills are legendary.|We welcome you.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Roy']

name: KarelOldManScene
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan1;S-Sir Karel!|This place will be a battlefield...
speak;Karel;So I see.|I thought I could be free of war in this isolated land...
speak;Karel;Please don't fret. I will protect the village.
speak;VillagerOldMan1;Thank you, Sir Karel!|You are truly worthy of the title of Sword Saint!|We have nothing to fear with you protecting us.

speak;Karel;I am just an ordinary swordsman.|Stories grow with time, so don't trust all that you've heard...|...This war seems to be even greater than I realized.|I wonder how my sister Karla fares...
speak;VillagerOldMan1;I never knew you had a sister.
speak;Karel;I haven't seen her in years, but she fell ill some time ago.|I only hope she leads a peaceful life with her husband and daughter...

name: BrunnyaFightDefault
_source: speak;Brunnya;Bern will never die!|Even if I fall, Bern will rise once more!

name: BrunnyaFightMelady
_source: speak;Brunnya;You are a knight of Bern.|You have chosen to follow Princess Guinivere.|You have chosen your path as I have chosen mine.|If you believe in it, then fight for it!

name: BrunnyaFightZeiss
_source: speak;Brunnya;You are a knight of Bern.|You have chosen to follow Princess Guinivere.|You have chosen your path as I have chosen mine.|If you believe in it, then fight for it!

name: BrunnyaDeath
_source: speak;Brunnya;Your...Majesty...|Let me be...by your side again...like before...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;This is the Dragon Sanctuary... The Dark Priestess is in here?
speak;Elffin;Almost assuredly.{w} But...something is bothering me...
speak;Elffin;Legends of the Scouring say the Dragon Sanctuary has the power of the dragons.
speak;Elffin;The sanctuary's power is said to protect the dragons themselves.
speak;Elffin;I believe the dragons in the sanctuary may be more powerful than those outside.
speak;Roy;Do you think we still have a chance against them?
speak;Elffin;Probably, but only with the Legendary weapons.
speak;Roy;...It is better to be safe than sorry.|I'll take those of us who can wield legendary weapons into the sanctuary.
speak;Elffin;Choose wisely.{w} Once inside, we may be unable to leave freely...

name: Armory1
_source: shop;{unit};Brave Sword,Killing Edge,Light_Brand,Armorslayer,Brave Lance,Killer Lance,Horseslayer,Spear,Brave Axe,Killer Axe,Hammer,Halberd,Brave Bow,Killer Bow,Short Bow,Longbow;armory

name: Armory2
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Sword,Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Silver Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Blade,Silver_Blade,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Silver Lance,Javelin,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Silver Axe,Hand Axe,Iron Bow,Steel Bow,Silver Bow;armory

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating Bern's remaining troops, Roy enters the Dragon Sanctuary.|{c:add_portrait;Idunn Hood;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes}He searches for the Dark Priestess to prevent a repeat of the Scouring.{w}{clear}Here in the sanctuary, Roy will learn the truth of the legendary dragons.|All he knows is about to be proven wrong...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.24: The Truth of the Legend
speak;Roy;This is the Dragon Sanctuary... The air feels strange.|Did the Eight Legends fight under these conditions, too?
speak;Jahn;You humans stand against us once more.
speak;Roy;What...? Who are you?!|When did you...?
speak;Jahn;I am Jahn.|I am the last true dragon of the Dragon Sanctuary.
speak;Roy;The last true dragon?|You do seem different from the other dragons...|Are you the demon dragon?

speak;Jahn;The "dragons" you have fought thus far are war dragons.|They know nothing but battle.|The demon dragon too is quite a different being than I.|I am a pure-blooded dragon who fought you humans in the distant past.
speak;Roy;The demon dragon is a different being?|I thought the demon dragon was the leader of your kind.
speak;Jahn;The demon dragon is nothing more than a tool to rally us dragons.|It is hardly what I would call a leader.
speak;Roy;What? What exactly is the demon dragon, then?
speak;Jahn;There is much you don't know, it appears.
speak;Roy;What is the demon dragon?|I want to at least know what it is we are fighting against!
speak;Jahn;Hrmm...|I have no reason to tell you.|But then, I have no reason not to tell you, either.|What to do?
speak;Jahn;...Very well.|A test. Are you worthy of hearing the truth?|I await you deep within.|Fight through the hordes of war dragons and come to me.|Do that, and everything will be made clear.
speak;Roy;You're deep within? But you're right here!
speak;Jahn;What you see is an illusion. A projection.|Come if you wish to know the truth.|Prove yourself worthy of my time and I shall tell you all...

name: SeizeThrone1
_source: speak;Roy;Is this really you this time?|Or...
speak;Jahn;This is but the beginning.|You have quite a way ahead of you yet.|But you didn't perish immediately.|That alone speaks to your ability.
speak;Roy;We have been through many trials.|We will not die here and let it be for naught.
speak;Jahn;So you say.|Allow me to tell you a little bit about the demon dragon.|The demon dragon is not the leader of the dragons as you thought.|The demon dragon was created to bring us victory.
speak;Roy;It was created...?|So it wasn't the demon dragon who was making dragons...?

speak;Jahn;The "dragons" you speak of are in fact soulless war dragons.|As I said before, they are different from pure dragons such as myself.|The war dragons are indeed created by the demon dragon.|The demon dragon was formed from a divine dragon, the most powerful of our kind.
speak;Roy;It was formed from a divine dragon?|Did a divine dragon agree to become the demon dragon?
speak;Jahn;Agree? Ha. No.|We destroyed its very soul to extinguish its will.|It is a mindless drone intended to heed our every word.
speak;Jahn;We desperately needed the power of a divine dragon.|The survival of our entire species was at stake.
speak;Roy;You needed the power of a divine dragon...|So...you destroyed one's soul?!
speak;Jahn;Do you wish to know more?|Come further.|Show me your strength...

name: SeizeThrone2
_source: speak;Jahn;Not bad. Not bad at all.|I'm curious how far you will make it.

speak;Jahn;...No matter how many of your kind we defeated in combat,{w} you humans continued to multiply endlessly.|We were eventually overwhelmed by the sheer number of you humans.|It was then we decided to form a demon dragon capable of creating war dragons.
speak;Roy;War dragons... Soulless beings who know nothing but battle.

speak;Jahn;Correct.|The divine dragons, however, were opposed to the idea.|They said it was an affront to the laws of nature.|As we tried to persuade the divine dragons, they suddenly disappeared without a trace.
speak;Jahn;They probably chose to leave before we could take advantage of them.|We never located the majority of the divine dragon tribe,{w} but we were able to capture a single member of their kind.
speak;Roy;And that became the demon dragon?

speak;Jahn;Precisely.|The divine dragon Idunn was to become the demon dragon.|It hesitated, however, as the rift between its tribe and the rest of us widened.|Hesitation... Such folly is reserved for you humans.|It serves no end.
speak;Jahn;Idunn was immature, but of enough strength to fulfill our purpose.|Its heart, however, wasn't with us.{w} It would not follow our commands.
speak;Roy;So...that's why you destroyed her soul...?
speak;Jahn;Yes.|We destroyed its soul so that it would unquestioningly obey our every command.
speak;Jahn;That's enough for now.|Show me more of your power if you want to hear the rest!

name: SeizeThrone3
_source: speak;Jahn;You proceed at a good pace. But you have not won yet.
speak;Roy;Rest assured, we will reach you!
speak;Jahn;Your soul is strong.|What do you wish to hear next?
speak;Roy;You created the demon dragon.|The demon dragon had the ability to create endless war dragons.|Why, then, did you lose to the humans?
speak;Jahn;The demon dragon created many war dragons for use in the battlefield.|The tables were turned. Our victory was in sight.

speak;Jahn;However, the humans soon found out about the demon dragon.|They concluded that their numbers were not enough to defeat us.|They focused their efforts into forging weapons that would pierce our scales.|They are what you humans call the legendary weapons.

speak;Jahn;The strongest human warriors were chosen to wield their newly crafted weapons.|They came and attacked this sanctuary.|However, the immense power of the weapons clashing with our own power...|It caused something none of us had anticipated.
speak;Jahn;The laws of nature started to collapse.|Snow began to fall in summer.{w} Stars shone in the middle of day...
speak;Roy;You mean it caused the Ending Winter?|I thought it occurred because the dragons released vast amounts of energy...
speak;Jahn;Is that how your legends go?
speak;Roy;The power of the legendary weapons was used to restore order to nature.|That's what I learned.
speak;Jahn;So in other words, we were the cause of everything bad that happened.|How typical of you humans.|But the truth is as I said.
speak;Roy;Then the legendary weapons were sealed away to prevent another disaster...|The traps that were protecting them were meant to keep us out...
speak;Jahn;You humans sealed them away? An uncharacteristically good decision.|But you seem to be wielding them now.
speak;Jahn;I wouldn't worry.|The weapons' potency seems to have decreased since their initial forging.|I doubt they can bring about another such disaster as they are now.
speak;Jahn;Anyway, the warping of nature's laws dealt a great blow to us dragons.
speak;Jahn;That disaster was the reason we lost to the humans...|I shall continue my story when you advance a bit further...

name: SeizeThrone4
_source: speak;Jahn;You have come far. Perhaps I underestimated you.

speak;Jahn;When the order of nature collapsed, we dragons suffered the most.|With nature weakened, we could not maintain our dragon forms.|And so, we sealed our power into gemstones and took human form.
speak;Jahn;Yes.|We were utterly powerless against the humans.|In human form, we were even more feeble than the humans themselves.|The humans took the opportunity to slaughter us.
speak;Roy;Why did you choose the form of humans? Why not some other shape?
