speak;Jahn;In the new order of nature, the human form required the least energy to transform into.|The Eight Legends mercilessly crushed us as we were helpless in our human form.|I too suffered deep wounds.
speak;Roy;Do you hate the humans because of that attack?
speak;Jahn;Hate? Only humans feel such preposterous emotions.|We battled for survival and we lost.|There was nothing more to our fight.
speak;Jahn;However, we may yet be victorious.|A human named Zephiel resurrected the demon dragon.
speak;Roy;Then Zephiel really did undo the demon dragon's seal!
speak;Jahn;That is correct.|Show me if you're worthy to hear more.

name: SeizeThrone5
_source: speak;Jahn;Hm...|I should have expected this of the man who defeated Zephiel...|You may even have the chance to fight me personally.
speak;Roy;How did Zephiel know about the demon dragon?
speak;Jahn;Surely you know that Hartmut of the Eight Legends founded Bern.
speak;Jahn;Do you also know that Hartmut chose to spare the demon dragon?|Rather than killing it, he sealed it away.
speak;Roy;Yes, but I don't know why.

speak;Jahn;Hm... Let me explain.|The Eight Legends defeated our leader, and made their way into the sanctuary to find the demon dragon.|However, arriving at its chamber, all they found was a blank-eyed human girl.|That was Idunn.
speak;Jahn;The demon dragon had its soul destroyed to follow our leader's commands.|With our leader dead, there were no commands to follow.
speak;Jahn;The Eight Legends naturally hesitated.|They had expected to find the most terrible of all dragons, but instead they found a mute girl.

speak;Jahn;Knowing the demon dragon still had to be defeated, they readied their weapons.|Idunn must have reacted to their attack out of instinct.|It changed into dragon form and fought as the soulless war dragons do.|Hartmut, however, brandished a blade even more powerful than the legendary weapons.
speak;Jahn;I don't know what you humans call it, but that must be it.|When the blade cut the demon dragon's flesh, it fell unconscious rather than dying
speak;Jahn;The blade has a strange power that reflects the wielder's soul.
speak;Roy;Hartmut didn't want to kill her, so the Binding Blade reflected that feeling and spared her...
speak;Jahn;He had apparently heard how the demon dragon was formed and felt pity for it.|We dragons cannot understand that illogical feeling.
speak;Jahn;In his soul, he wished to spare Idunn.|I personally would never hesitate to eliminate a threat as he did.
speak;Roy;Hartmut's soul changed the sword itself...

speak;Jahn;After persuading the others that it should be spared,{w} Hartmut built a shrine hidden deep in what you now call Bern.|There, he bound the demon dragon away using the blade and the Fire Emblem.|After the founding of Bern, the shrine was protected by the royal family for generations.|That is, until Zephiel unbound her, of course.
speak;Roy;...How do you know all this? Did you witness it?
speak;Jahn;No. After the battle I hid myself to nurse my wounds.|All I just told you I learned from Zephiel himself,{w} who read it in ancient tomes kept by the Bern royal family.
speak;Jahn;You wish to know that now, do you?|So be it... Come further, and I will tell you.

name: SeizeThrone6
_source: speak;Jahn;You have come far. I am in the next chamber.|It has been ages since I've shown a human my true form.|I've not left this sanctuary since the end of the Scouring.

speak;Jahn;For one thousand years...|Having survived the Scouring, I waited, healing my wounds.|I waited for the resurrection of the demon dragon.|For our chance of victory.|At long last, that time came.|The demon dragon's seal was broken, and I felt power flowing through my veins again.
speak;Roy;What does the demon dragon's seal have to do with your strength?
speak;Jahn;The Dragon Sanctuary's power is intertwined with the demon dragon's.|With the demon dragon sealed, the sanctuary, and myself, were crippled.
speak;Jahn;After I recovered, I sought the person who had broken the seal.|I used my illusions to seek him out and ask his intentions.|With you humans ruling the world, I couldn't go in my true form.
speak;Roy;Wait... I thought that dragons lose most of their power in human form.|How do you have the power to create illusions like this?

speak;Jahn;This sanctuary is the only place that dragons maintain some power in human form.|I am also a relatively powerful dragon.|Even in human form, as long as I am in this sanctuary, illusions are a simple task.|I lack the power to create war dragons like the demon dragon can, however.
speak;Roy;Your search led you to Zephiel?

speak;Jahn;Yes.|I located Zephiel by following the energy emitted by the demon dragon.|I remember the exact words in the conversation we had.{w} "For what reason have you awakened a demon dragon?" I asked him.|He was a strange one.{w} With a bored look on his face, he simply asked,|"Who are you?" to which I answered,{w} "Dragon."|To that, a smile crept onto his face.|It was then he told me that he wanted to give the world to the dragons.
speak;Jahn;Frankly, I didn't trust him,{w} but I accepted him as the new leader of the demon dragon.|He ordered it to liberate the world from humans.|He wanted it to rule the world in their place.
speak;Roy;Zephiel is dead now. What is the demon dragon doing?
speak;Jahn;It is in this sanctuary, waiting for its chance to liberate the world.
speak;Roy;What?! Even with her leader gone?!|Have you taken on the role of leader now?
speak;Jahn;There is no need for that.|Zephiel ordered it to proceed even in the event of his death.|Idunn will continue until control is wrested from humans.
speak;Roy;She is nothing but a slave!|Her soul was destroyed and now she's bound to a dead man's order!

speak;Jahn;Do you pity her as Hartmut did?|...Foolish human. Your kind makes no sense.|Allow me to tell you one more thing.|No matter how you may want it, dragons and humans will never be able to live in harmony.|The differences between our two species are simply too great.
speak;Roy;That's not true!|I know of a village where dragons and humans live in peace!|I know a greater peace is possible with effort!
speak;Jahn;Humans and dragons living together?|Stop your lies.|I will not humor such an obvious falsehood.|Now, step forward. Let us see whose strength is greater!

name: JahnFight
_source: speak;Jahn;I have waited a millennium...|My strength has recovered, and it is greater than ever.|I can feel it...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;The demon dragon is here... Exercise caution, everyone.|This is our last battle!
speak;Roy;What's wrong, Fae?|You look like you're about to cry.
speak;Fae;When...|When I get older, will I be a bad dragon, too?
speak;Roy;Slow down, Fae.|Where did you get that idea?
speak;Fae;That man said that...dragons and humans can't live in peace...
speak;Roy;That wasn't true. You've lived in Nabata with humans, haven't you?
speak;Fae;But the demon dragon is a divine dragon like me!|You're going to fight the demon dragon, but what about me?|What if...when I grow up... I'm like the demon dragon...?|Then...you'd have to...
speak;Roy;Don't worry, Fae.|I know you'll never be like the demon dragon.|You'll always live with humans. With people like me.
speak;Roy;Of course!|I want to help the demon dragon, too.
speak;Roy;The demon dragon isn't acting of her own free will.|She had her soul destroyed. She is a slave.|I...I don't want to kill her if I can avoid it...
speak;Fae;...Your words are too big. I don't understand.
speak;Roy;I'm sure you'll learn what I mean once you get a little older.
speak;Roy;Hartmut posed a question when he bound the demon dragon.|And I intend to answer it!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Roy;You're the Dark Priestess... The demon dragon.
speak;Idunn Hood;...Why do you block my path?
speak;Idunn Hood;I have been instructed to lead this world.|I will bring peace. Why do you bar my path?
speak;Roy;...You're wrong.|Peace at the cost of humanity is hardly any kind of peace at all.|The man who ordered you is gone. You can stop!|You have no reason to fight!
speak;Roy;None of us have reason to fight...

speak;Idunn Hood;...I feel that eons ago...|I heard those same words.|Soft words, like a warm breeze...|......|But that was long ago...|I have slumbered for far too long.|In the darkness, I dreamed... An empty dream. Black. Colorless...|But I am awoken now. His Majesty willed it so.
speak;Idunn Hood;I am awoken. I have left the darkness of my dreams.|My path is now lit. I know what I must do.
speak;Idunn;I will lead this world...|No matter how much time must pass, that is my duty...
speak;Idunn;As long as you stand in my way.
speak;Idunn;My will is His Majesty's.|I awoke for the purpose of fulfilling his desires.
#go through all your units and say their final chapter quotes
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid != 'Roy']
speak;Roy;Now is the time of truth!|I have the blade of Hartmut, who took pity on you and spared your life!|Everyone, leave the final blow to me!!

name: UnitDeathQuotes
_source: #Roy has extra dialogue for his death
elif;((game.level>=2 and game.level<=7) or (game.level>13)) and game.check_dead('Lilina')==True

name: LughOrphanageScene
_source: speak;Lugh;Thanks for taking the children under your care, Bishop.
speak;Priest;Of course.|The St. Elimine Church will take good care of the orphans.|And what will you do, Lugh?
speak;Lugh;I'm going to stay here. I have some things to take care of.
speak;Priest;Is that so...? Please be safe.
speak;Lugh;Make sure you listen to what the priest says, OK?
speak;VillagerLittleBoy1;You're not coming with us, Lugh?
speak;Lugh;I'm going to wait for Chad.{w} We'll catch up with you later...
speak;Lugh;Yes...|If Raigh would come back we could all be together again.
speak;Lugh;I'm sorry for lying...|But I've chosen not to run away anymore.

name: BrigandsAppear
_source: speak;Scollan;There's a village to the south. With me so far?
speak;Scollan;Good. It might be a base for the resistance.|Zinque says to burn it to the ground, village and all.
speak;Scollan;Good, you understand. Now get goin'!|Don't screw this one up, you dimwit.
speak;Scollan;You got a problem? Does your head hurt from thinking too much?
speak;Scollan;Heh, he's ugly as sin, but he's got a heart of gold.|There's nothin' wrong with tearin' down a few houses.|Are we clear, wretches? No questions?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: VisitHouse7
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan2;A few months ago, my granddaughter went missing.{w} We all searched in the mountains and found her.|She was with a hulking monster of a man,{w} so we threw stones at him to drive him off...|Afterwards my granddaughter told me that he was the one who led her to the village.|...If you ever find that man, would you give him this?|It's a special axe that's effective against swords.|And...tell him I'm sorry.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;Wade;Hey, Mieu!|...Come on, can't you call me UNCLE Wade?
speak;Wade;Ah, never mind.|You look like you've gotten bigger.
speak;Wade;...It's dangerous here.{w} Go hide in the hills.
speak;Wade;My sister's still here, right? She'll take you.
speak;Wade;So she's Auntie Mary but I'm just Wade, huh?
speak;Mieu;It'll make you like a bird!
speak;Wade;Like a bird? What's that mean?
speak;Wade;No, I don't know.|But, uh, anyway, this is for me?
speak;Mieu;No, it's for Big Brother Lot.
speak;Wade;And Lot is Big Brother Lot...{w} Have you got it out for me?
speak;Mieu;Ha ha ha!{w} I'll go see Mary. Here's the wing.|Give it to Lot, OK, Uncle Wade?
speak;Wade;And NOW she calls me Uncle...|Whoa, are you OK?! Don't trip...
speak;Lot;Mieu! Have you been a good girl?
speak;Mieu;Yes, I was good!{w} I didn't even wet my bed!
speak;Mieu;Lot...{w} While you were away, Mother...
speak;Lot;Yeah, I know...{w} She went to sleep...
speak;Mieu;Here... Mother left this for you.|She said you might find a use for it.
speak;Mieu;Brother...|You won't leave me, will you?|You won't go to sleep like Mother...?
speak;Lot;Of course not!|In fact, next time you see me I'll have a whole wagon of presents.|Just listen to Mary and stay good, all right?
speak;Lot;Go hide in the hills with Mary.{w} It's dangerous here.
speak;Lot;At least, I hope I won't...

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;Wade;Sis! It's good to see you.
speak;Wade;Well, not exactly...{w} We're here on a mission.
speak;VillagerNatalie;...You're never coming back, are you?
speak;Wade;No! Of course I will!{w} ...Just not yet.|Just you wait. When I come back I'll have more money than I can carry.|Then all our problems will be a thing of the past.
speak;VillagerNatalie;I don't care about that...{w} I just want you safe.
speak;VillagerNatalie;I know how brash and hotheaded you can be, but always remember...|There are people who care about you.
speak;VillagerNatalie;It's a special weapon.|I nursed a traveler back to health, and he left it in return.|You can use it, can't you?
speak;Wade;Thanks, Sis! I've gotta go now.
speak;Lot;No...{w} We just happened to be nearby.
speak;VillagerNatalie;Oh...{w} Mieu won't be happy about that.
speak;Lot;I've made you take care of Mieu ever since our mother died.|I'm sorry to force that burden on you.
speak;Lot;Someday...I swear...{w} I swear I'll return.|...Can I leave Mieu to you until then?
speak;VillagerNatalie;Don't lie like that...{w} This is war. You don't know if you'll come back.
speak;VillagerNatalie;But I'll be waiting...{w} Until eternity.
speak;VillagerNatalie;It's a special weapon.|It will help you keep your promise.
speak;Lot;I appreciate it.{w} Now...I must be off again.
speak;VillagerNatalie;Have you seen my brother?{w} His name is Wade, and he's a mercenary...|Have you at least heard of him?|Well, take this for your trouble.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;Money Man 4;Ah, our heroes! I thank you on behalf of the village.|This is made from the scale of a dragon. It's said it will protect the one who uses it from harm.{w} Please, take it.

name: VisitHouse6
_source: speak;VillagerWoman2;I wonder how Mary's doing...|Her brother and his friend are both traveling, trying to make money.|It's too dangerous to go outside now...{w} Can you go check on her?{w} Here, I'll give you this for your trouble...

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan2;...The resistance suffered a crippling defeat here.|Here, take this. I'm going to look for other survivors.{w} There is still hope if we can find our leader.

name: VisitHouse5
_source: speak;VillagerMan2;I hate the resistance!|We civilians have to deal with the consequences of their actions.|You know we stand no chance if we try to stand up to our lord. We just want to lead a normal life.|Oh...I'm sorry. I'm just frustrated.|I have no useful skills so I can't help you...but take this...

name: GonzalezJoin
_source: speak;Gonzalez;W-what are you doing?! I am enemy!
speak;Lilina;I know...|But there's such a look of sorrow in your eyes.
speak;Gonzalez;...There is village near mountain. You know?
speak;Gonzalez;Tell people escape.{w} I have order. Destroy village.{w} I...
speak;Lilina;What? Don't! The villagers are innocent...
speak;Lilina;It sounds to me like you should leave the person who gave you that order.
speak;Lilina;Yes! You can fight with us.{w} We're protecting the villagers.
speak;Gonzalez;...No... I monster...{w} People mean to me...{w} People throw stones...{w} People say, "Go away!"...{w} "You a monster!"...{w} Not human...
speak;Lilina;That's horrible! Of course you're human!{w} You're a very kind-hearted man. I can tell.{w} Please, come with us. Don't be afraid.
speak;Gonzalez;Me afraid?{w} I never afraid!{w} Everyone afraid of ME!{w} I not afraid!
speak;Lilina;No. You ARE afraid.{w} You're afraid that people will throw stones and call you a monster.
speak;Lilina;But you don't have to be afraid of us. Everyone in our army is nice.{w} They won't do that to you. Be brave...{w} Take that first step, and you'll never have to be afraid again.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;In order to speak to the resistance force about the bandits on the Isles,{w} Roy and company move west along the coastline.|Along the way, they come across a small village caught in conflict.|The local lord oppresses the resistance and does anything he can to get rid of them...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.10: Caught in the Middle
speak;Zinc;Have you found that resistance bard yet?
speak;RedSoldier;We have a good lead, milord.
speak;Zinc;Out with it then. Where is he?
speak;RedSoldier;He's apparently hiding in the nearby village.
speak;Zinc;Removing Elffin the Bard will sever the head guiding the resistance force.|Find him. Burn the village to the ground if you have to!
speak;Zinc;I apologize for the wait, Madam Melady.
speak;Melady;You seem to have...a full plate.
speak;Zinc;Oh, worry not, our obligations to Bern take priority over all.|If you need anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
speak;Melady;Then let's get to the matter we discussed earlier...
speak;Zinc;Ah, the whereabouts of Princess Guinivere.
speak;Melady;Have you found anything, Lord Zinc?
speak;Zinc;I regret to say that I have not.|Have you been to Juteaux?

speak;Zinc;Then I suggest you pay a visit to Father Orlo.|He resides in the castle at Eburacum to the north.{w} He knows the region better than any of us, so he may have some idea.|However, if even he does not know where Princess Guinivere might be,{w} then she is most likely not in the Isles.
speak;Melady;Thank you.|I will speak with Father Orlo then.|Farewell.
speak;Roy;The resistance is supposedly very active in this area.
speak;Merlinus;Yes, that's what our sources say.|But I also hear that Etruria's military is hunting down members of the resistance.| Their numbers have apparently dwindled.
speak;Roy;...Etruria does nothing about bandits but oppresses the resistance?|Something is very wrong with this picture...
speak;Roy;Can we do anything to help the resistance?
speak;Merlinus;Our hands are tied...|To do so would directly oppose Etruria's nobility.|We are here under Etruria's orders, remember.
speak;Roy;I'll send a letter to General Cecilia and see what she has to say.|Let's not do anything too rash just yet.
speak;BlueSoldier;Lord Roy!|Etrurian troops are attacking the village to find a member of the resistance force!|They're under orders from Lord Zinc, the noble who controls this area.
speak;Roy;We haven't the time to await General Cecilia's reply...|But I want to help the people.|...Even if it means opposing an Etrurian noble.
speak;Roy;We fight!|Our purpose is just! Make Lycia proud!

name: ZincFight
_source: speak;Zinc;The people are suffering...? What concern is that to me?|They live to serve me. Their wails are meaningless.

name: ZincDeath
_source: speak;Zinc;This is my land... Mine alone...|None...shall...

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;The Lycian Army takes Elffin in as an advisor.|{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roy (Roy);Elffin (Elffin)}Following his advice, they move south toward the isle of Caldonia.|Caldonia is one of the main islands that make up the Western Isles, the other two being Fibernia and Dia.{w}{clear}Castle Eidyna is located on Caldonia. Here, men from all over the Isles are imprisoned,{w} awaiting transport to Eburacum, the Mine of Death.{w}{clear}When Roy arrives at Castle Eidyna, the situation appears dire...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;VillagerMan2;A-are you sure about this?{w} If we get caught we're--
speak;VillagerUglyFatMan2;Don't be stupid!|If we stay, we'll be worked to death!|You're just going to lie down and take that?|Don't you have a family or something back home?
speak;VillagerUglyFatMan2;There are people coming to help us from the northeast.|We just have to make it there in one piece!
speak;William;They were unconscious. Someone drugged their food...
speak;Arcardo;...Then there must be a traitor among us.
speak;Arcardo;Pursue and eliminate the escaped workers.
speak;Arcardo;I will return to Juteaux. Don't let them escape.|Send more hands to the mines as well. I can't afford to lose more workers!
speak;Roy;Elffin, is that castle to the southwest our target?

speak;Elffin;Yes, that is Castle Eidyna.|The people kidnapped on the Isles are first sent there.|They are then taken to Eburacum and forced to work in the mines.|As it happens, today is the weekly shipment of captives to the mines.|It will be difficult to rescue them once they've been sent off.
speak;Roy;Then you're saying we have to rescue them now!
speak;Elffin;Yes.|I already had some spies infiltrate the castle and help the people escape.
speak;Roy;What will the captives do once they're out?
speak;Elffin;I told them to send the captives to the northeast.|In other words, our present location.
speak;Roy;Then we must rescue those people before sieging the castle.

name: KleinAppears
_source: speak;Thea;They were assigned to fight the bandits.
speak;Klein;I know. But Lord Arcardo says they're allied with the bandits now.{w} Why they're doing exactly the opposite of their assignment is beyond me...
speak;Klein;Thea, take your soldiers and attack from the north. I'll commence the attack from here.
speak;Klein;I hear that you have siblings.
speak;Thea;Yes, sir. I have two sisters.{w} One older, one younger.
speak;Klein;Are they pegasus knights like you?
speak;Thea;They are, actually. Why do you ask?
speak;Klein;I have a younger sister myself...
speak;Thea;Any sister of yours must be enchanting.
speak;Klein;Yes, she is a sight.{w} I heard, however, she got tangled up in some mess and now she's missing...
speak;Klein;I have some people looking into it, but they've yet to find anything.{w} If I didn't have this mission, I would search for her myself...
speak;Klein;Thea, be careful out there. For your family's sake.
speak;RedSoldier;Lord Arcardo said Ilia's pegasus knights are expendable.{w} They should be fighting on the front line, not us.{w} Surely the lives of us Etrurian soldiers are more valuable.
speak;Klein;Don't be ridiculous. They are reliable companions.{w} We will attack at the same time...{w} or before them, if need be. Understood?
speak;Klein;...Lord Arcardo's story is curious, though...{w} The army from Lycia only arrived very recently.{w} How could they create ties with the bandits so quickly...?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']

name: TheaAppears
_source: speak;Thea;Are you ready? We move southward!
speak;PegKnight;Captain...{w} Are you sure we'll be alright?
speak;PegKnight;The Etrurian army considers us disposable.{w} They may send us to our doom...
speak;PegKnight;One of the other riders was told so by someone in the Etrurian army.
speak;Thea;Pay no mind to mere rumors.
speak;Thea;I'm certain Commander Klein would never approve of that.
speak;Thea;Commander Klein's not like that. I trust him with my life.
speak;PegKnight;...Very well.|Then we'll trust him as well, for we trust you, Captain.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Shanna']

name: TheaSoldierDies
condition: unit.nid=='132' or unit.nid=='133' or unit.nid=='134' or unit.nid=='135'

name: KleinSoldierDies
condition: unit.nid=='128' or unit.nid=='129' or unit.nid=='130' or unit.nid=='131'

name: ShannaTheaTalk
_source: speak;Thea;...I have a contract with Commander Klein of Etruria. Shanna...{w} Are you with the Lycian Army?
speak;Thea;I see...{w} Then this was inevitable.{w} Draw your lance!
speak;Shanna;No... I don't want to fight you!
speak;Thea;...Shanna,{w} you know the code of the Illian mercenaries.
speak;Thea;Precisely.{w} And we must follow that code, even if it means we must fight our own kin.
speak;Shanna;But...one of us could be killed!
speak;Thea;I know that!{w} But we must fight!{w} Failing to do so would damage the reputation of the Ilian mercenaries.{w} Our nation can't afford to lose its mercenary contracts!
speak;Thea;...Why...|Why does it have to be like this...?
speak;Shanna;No, Commander Klein said he would join us!
speak;Thea;...That's a relief. Then I will join you as well.
speak;Thea;Shanna...{w} Are you prepared to fight?
speak;Shanna;No! We don't have to fight!
speak;Thea;Of course we do. Must I repeat myself--
speak;Shanna;Commander Klein said he would join us!{w} We don't have to fight!
speak;Shanna;Yes! To fight me would be breaking the code!
speak;Thea;Thank goodness...{w} I was so scared.
speak;Thea;Shanna, no! I'm here to tell you that we are no longer enemies!
speak;Thea;I just spoke with Commander Klein, we are hereby switching sides and assisting the Lycian army in their mission.|For us to fight here would be breaking the code.
speak;Shanna;Really?! Oh thank goodness.|I was so scared...
speak;Thea;I know... I was too...|Shanna, from now on let's fight and go home together.
speak;Shanna;Of course, sister, we'll always be together...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Shanna']

name: KleinRoyRecruitment
_source: speak;Roy;Wait! Aren't you an Etrurian commander?{w} Why are you attacking us?!
speak;Klein;I have specific orders from Lord Arcardo to take you down.
speak;Roy;Can't you see what's happening here? The people are suffering from the lords' abusive treatment!{w} And you're helping them. You should be ashamed!
speak;Klein;...Wait. Are you saying that you're helping the villagers?
speak;Roy;Yes. The lord here is ransacking the village in search of the resistance.{w} We're fighting to stop him. And you're apparently on his side.
speak;Klein;I had no such intention.{w} My orders stated that you were the ones working with the bandits.
speak;Roy;What?! Why would we be working with bandits?{w} We just want to clean things up here and get home to Lycia!
speak;Klein;Lord Arcardo has made a fool of me.{w} I have been so blind not to see through his thin veil of deceit.
speak;Roy;...Do you see what we see now?
speak;Klein;I am Klein of House Reglay of Etruria.{w} Forgive me for my misguided attack against you.
speak;Roy;I am General Roy of the Lycian army.
speak;Klein;General Roy, I would advise you to be cautious.{w} You are against Lord Arcardo. He will have every pawn at his disposal after your head.
speak;Klein;If you would allow it, I will join you.
speak;Klein;Yes. I wish to monitor you as an Etrurian commander.{w} I should prove useful as both a fighter and a diplomat.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']
#If Shanna talked to Thea before recruiting Klein, add new talk allowing Shanna to recruit Thea

name: ClarineKleinRecruitment
_source: speak;Clarine;I'm sorry I left like I did.{w} But I wanted so badly to see you!
speak;Klein;Oh, the trouble you get into...|Well, you're safe, and that's what matters.|...What brings you out here? Did you find a trustworthy mercenary for hire?
speak;Clarine;No, I joined the Lycian army.
speak;Clarine;Yes! My healing staves have been most useful!
speak;Klein;...I see.{w} I thought your eyes looked... sharper.
speak;Clarine;I'm a lady now, I am.
speak;Klein;...Let me ask you this.{w} What kind of individual is General Roy?
speak;Clarine;Hmm... He's a tad rough around the edges for a noble...|His hair especially is an absolute mess...
speak;Klein;...Let me rephrase that.{w} Is General Roy working with the bandits?
speak;Clarine;No, of course not!{w} We've been sent here to vanquish the bandits!
speak;Clarine;The Etrurians here are malicious people...{w} It is so embarrassing.{w} Klein... Are you working for them?
speak;Klein;I was sent here to protect the villagers.{w} I hereby join the Lycian Army to fulfill my mission.
speak;Klein;Shall we, then? Will you introduce me to General Roy?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Clarine']
#If Shanna talked to Thea before recruiting Klein, add new talk allowing Shanna to recruit Thea

name: KleinClarineTalk
condition: game.get_unit('Klein').team=='Player' and ((unit1.nid=='Clarine' and unit2.nid=='Klein') or (unit1.nid=='Klein' and unit2.nid=='Clarine'))
_source: speak;Clarine;I'm sorry I left like I did.{w} But I wanted so badly to see you!
speak;Klein;Oh, the trouble you get into...|Well, you're safe, and that's what matters.|...What brings you out here? Did you find a trustworthy mercenary for hire?
speak;Clarine;No, I joined the Lycian army.
speak;Klein;Well...{w}I'm sure you've been through much with them.
speak;Clarine;I'm a lady now, I am.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Lilina']

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Lance,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Javelin,Heavy Spear,Hatchet,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Hand Axe,Hammer,Iron Bow,Steel Bow;armory

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy2;Are you the guys helping us out?|Then please, take this. I grabbed it as I escaped from the castle.|I hope everyone else made it out...

name: KleinTheaTalk
_source: speak;Klein;There's been a change of plans.{w} We are going to fight under General Roy of the Lycian Army.
speak;Thea;Understood, sir. We shall follow you without question.
speak;Klein;I don't mind a question here or there, to be frank.
speak;Thea;We are Ilian mercenaries, sir.{w} We follow our employer's every order. And besides...
speak;Thea;I trust you to make proper judgements.

name: GaleMiledyTalk
_source: speak;Gale;Melady, have you discovered where Princess Guinivere is?
speak;Melady;No...|It appears she has left the Lycian Army. I thought we were so close...
speak;Gale;It was a dead end then.
speak;Melady;Galle... I'm sorry.{w} King Zephiel wanted to keep the matter of Princess Guinivere a secret, so only I was assigned to search for her.|I'm sorry to get you mixed up in this...
speak;Melady;But you work directly under General Murdock. Surely you have other duties.
speak;Gale;General Murdock agreed to allow me to assist you.|He thinks it's vital we find the princess and the Fire Emblem.
speak;Melady;...Do you think Princess Guinivere has the Fire Emblem?
speak;Gale;That's what His Majesty the king thinks.|And I think he's correct, all things considered.
speak;Gale;Come now, don't be like that...|I'm sure Princess Guinivere went with good intentions. Let's hurry now.

name: FirstReinforcementWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Lord Zinque, reinforcements from Juteaux should arrive shortly.
speak;Zinc;Blast!|We have enough problems as it is...|The last thing I need is reinforcements stealing the credit!

name: HardModeReinforcementWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Additional reinforcements will be arriving shortly!
speak;Zinc;I only hope they will suffice...

name: ElffinInjury
_source: speak;Elffin;This wound is great... But still, I must not...
speak;Roy;You should stay off the battlefield. Leave the fighting to us.
speak;Elffin;Yes, you are right... Forgive my being a hindrance...

name: ElffinVillagerScene
_source: speak;VillagerNatalie;We found you lying at the entrance to the village, covered in wounds.|We took you home and have been taking care of you.
speak;VillagerNatalie;My name is Mary. I live in this village.
speak;Elffin;...You live here... Oh no!|My very presence endangers this village...|...It may even be too late...
speak;Elffin;I am Elffin... One of the resistance force.|The lord here is sure to send troops in to capture me.
speak;Elffin;Lady Mary, you should leave here.|The village is in danger.
speak;VillagerNatalie;I have a younger brother, but he left with his friend next door to find work.|I'm taking care of his friend's sister. I can't abandon her.
speak;Elffin;I understand...|The most I can do to protect this village is leave. I thank you again for tending to my wounds.|Please take care.

name: ZincComplains
_source: speak;Zinc;What is going on out there?|Why is it taking so long to find a single member of the resistance?!
speak;RedSoldier;It's the Lycian Army!|They've joined the battle on behalf of the villagers...
speak;Zinc;The Lycian Army? They would betray Etruria?!
speak;RedSoldier;Also, milord, we have received a missive from Juteaux.|The Lycian Army is suspected of working with the bandits.|Lord Arcardo has given us orders to take them dead or alive.
speak;Zinc;The Lycian Army has ties with bandits?{w} Hah! The irony!|That fool only wants to save face...
speak;Zinc;This is not the mainland. The Isles are ruled by might.
speak;RedSoldier;I'm not quite sure I understand...
speak;Zinc;Pay it no mind.|Was that all the message from Juteaux said?
speak;RedSoldier;There's more.|Lord Arcardo has provided us with reinforcements.
speak;Zinc;Confound it!|We won't get credit for defeating Lycia if we're aided by reinforcements!|We must wrap this up before they can join the fight...|Ah, I've an idea! Get me Scollan!
speak;Zinc;Burn down the village.{w} Kill any who resist.
speak;Zinc;Do as you wish.{w} Just do it quickly.
speak;Scollan;You can count on us, Lord Zinc. Heh heh heh...

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, there is a young man claiming to be with the resistance here.
speak;Roy;I'll see him. Let him pass.
speak;Elffin;I am pleased to meet you. My name is Elffin.{w} I am a member of the resistance force.
speak;Roy;I am Roy of the Lycian army.
speak;Elffin;You have my thanks for saving our village here.
speak;Roy;We simply did what we believe is right.
speak;Elffin;But now you stand against Etruria.

speak;Roy;Even so, I have no regrets.|We may have opposed Etruria's immediate interests,{w} but once the truth about the Isles is out, I'm certain they will understand.|I sent a letter to a trustworthy Etrurian noble.{w} If she takes appropriate measures, they will send us aid.
speak;Elffin;I would not be so sure...
speak;Elffin;Don't you find it odd that Etruria requested your help here at all?
speak;Elffin;If I may be so bold as to guess...{w} Was it High Chancellor Roartz and Lord Arcardo who requested your help?
speak;Elffin;There may have been ulterior motives for sending your army away.{w} Perhaps your presence in Lycia was undesirable to them.
speak;Elffin;There are rumors...that Roartz and Arcardo are working with Bern.
speak;Roy;What?! Then Lycia is in danger!
speak;Elffin;Your country may be in peril.{w} Are you free to waste your time on the Isles as you are.
speak;Merlinus;He's right! Bern wanted us out of Lycia so they could launch an invasion!{w} We must head back at once!

speak;Roy;It's difficult to judge what may be hearsay and what may be truth.{w} We can't simply jump on this rumor and run back to Lycia.{w} I am certainly concerned, but my father and General Cecilia are there.|The people on the Isles have only us to rely on.
speak;Roy;If we leave without finishing our mission,{w} then all we've done here was for naught.
speak;Elffin;...Your army is blessed with a level-headed leader.
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy, I am sorry for testing you so.
speak;Merlinus;Testing us? So that was a lie?!
speak;Elffin;It was the truth.{w} However, I presented the rumor in a way that you might take rash action.{w} Your leader is a prudent individual.{w} I would join you if you allow it.
speak;Roy;...I don't like that you tested us.{w} But if you can help, I welcome you.{w} Now, back to the concern we face here.|What can we do to help the people of the Isles?
speak;Elffin;Castle Eidyna is located there.|It is where workers are kept before they are sent to Eburacum.
speak;Roy;Then we must save the people there!
speak;Elffin;Lord Roy, please take this sword.
speak;Elffin;It is called a wyrmslayer.|It was created during the Scouring to use against dragons.|It is effective against wyverns as well.
speak;Roy;Wyrmslayer? Is this a legendary weapon?
speak;Elffin;No. Legendary weapons can only be used by those whose skill rivals the Eight Legends.|This weapon, however, can be wielded by anyone with experience in swordplay.
speak;VillagerNatalie;Are you the leader of this army?
speak;VillagerNatalie;I wish to thank you for protecting our village.
speak;Roy;There is no thanks necessary...{w} We did what we believe is right.
speak;VillagerNatalie;Regardless, I want you to have this as a token of our gratitude.
speak;GreenSoldier;Commander Klein, we will stay and help with reconstruction as directed.
speak;GreenSoldier;Would that we could fight at your side. Here is the bolt we were holding for you.{w} You may need it more than we do.{w} Farewell and good luck, Commander Klein.
speak;Klein;Thank you. Good luck to you as well.
speak;PegKnight;Captain! We will return to Ilia to make our report.
speak;Thea;Very good. Thank you for your service.
speak;PegKnight;Oh, and take this...{w} Your sister gave it to me before we left. Please be careful...

name: BartreAppears
_source: speak;Bartre;They're imprisoned in that castle you say?
speak;Bartre;Then we've no time to lose.{w} Let's begin this daring prison break, shall we?
speak;VillagerMan2;...I'm sorry to ask for your help like this.|I know you're looking for your daughter...
speak;Bartre;Don't be absurd!{w} Consider it payment for your hospitality.|I won't let some blood-sucking lord take advantage of his people!|I'm Bartre the Brave, and I'll smash these puny insects!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Fir']

name: GeeseAppears
_source: speak;Geese;The lord of that castle killed my mates.{w} I won't let their deaths go unavenged.
speak;VillagerWoman2;You mean that crew that was always with you...
speak;Geese;Yeah... They were taken to the mines and told that they would be given work.{w} But they were all worked like slaves until they... died.
speak;Geese;Maybe they weren't the brightest bunch, but they were good people...{w} And then they were killed... just like that...!!
speak;VillagerWoman2;Do you intend to avenge them on your own?
speak;Geese;Is there something wrong with that?
speak;VillagerWoman2;No...{w} But I thought you were going to go back to your merchant business.
speak;Geese;Yeah, well, I've got bigger problems now...{w} Once my mates get their revenge,{w} and once the war subsides, maybe I will.
speak;VillagerWoman2;...We won't forget you, Geese.{w} You and your crew risked your lives to get us food and supplies.{w} If you ever need anything, we'll be here.
speak;Geese;Maybe I'll take you up on that,{w} if I'm still alive. ...Thanks.

name: GeeseJoins
_source: speak;Geese;Yeah? What? You got something to say to me?
speak;Roy;I want to ask why you're fighting against the soldiers.
speak;Roy;Roy, leader of the Lycian army.{w} We're here on behalf of Etruria...
speak;Geese;You're with Etruria?!{w} Then you're with the enemy.{w} Get ready to die!
speak;Roy;Slow down! We're fighting the castle's troops too.
speak;Geese;And yet Etruria sent you?{w} I don't understand.
speak;Roy;I don't either.{w} We were sent by Etruria to get rid of the bandits here, but something's strange.
speak;Geese;...You say you're fighting the castle's troops.{w} I'm for hire, if you'll take me.
speak;Geese;I'm a seafaring man, so I know both the land and sea around the Isles.{w} You look a bit lost, so I could be a good guide for you.

speak;Geese;I want to help with your mission.{w} To be honest, I'm a pirate,{w} so I'm probably the type you were sent to get rid of. But I only go after the rich.{w} They have more than their fair share anyway.
speak;Roy;Well then, if you'll join us,{w} we're pleased to have you.{w} We don't know this area at all, so it's been difficult thus far.
speak;Geese;Sounds like we have a deal!{w} Leave it to me!
speak;Geese;...This is it, lads.{w} Can you taste it?{w} You'll have your vengeance.{w} And after you do,{w} I might just tag along with this Roy fellow for a while...

name: BartreFirRecruitment
_source: speak;Fir;Father? What are you doing here?
speak;Bartre;Fir! I've been looking for you.
speak;Fir;Father, I've already made up my mind.|I want to become a great master of the sword like Mother...
speak;Bartre;That is good. I don't intend to drag you home.|In fact, I want to help you in your journey.
speak;Bartre;I know well the hardships one faces in a journey of self-improvement.|I can help you out of a bind if things get rough.
speak;Fir;But Father, if you keep helping me, my training is meaningless.
speak;Bartre;Nonsense.|With your old man around, we can practice sparring any time!|Do you refuse your father's love?!
speak;Fir;No! It's nothing like that, but...
speak;Bartre;It's settled then.|But first we capture the castle.
speak;Fir;Sigh...|I guess I should tell Roy that we have another member...
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Fir']

name: MorganFight
_source: speak;Morgan;What are you doing?!|Hurry and kill the ones who escaped!|Wait, you're not one of my men... Wh-who are you?!

name: MorganDeath
_source: speak;Morgan;The resistance force has been eliminated in this area...|Who...are you people...?

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;Even though we've saved the people at Castle Eidyna,{w} there are others still suffering in the mines.
speak;Elffin;That is correct.|To liberate the Western Isles, we must take the capital.
speak;Roy;Then our next destination is Juteaux.|...Elffin, may I ask you something?
speak;Roy;Pardon me if I am mistaken,{w} but are you of high Etrurian nobility?
speak;Roy;I can't quite explain it, but...{w} The way you talk sounds very educated.|In Ostia, I learned how to study others and size them up.|Am I right?
speak;Elffin;What would you do if you are?
speak;Roy;Oh. Nothing in particular.|I'm sure you have a good reason to hide your identity.|You can tell me when you feel the time is right.
speak;Roy;Let's head for Juteaux!|To save the Isles and defeat the true enemy of the people!
speak;VillagerUglyFatMan2;Here, give this to General Roy.|Thanks to him, we can see our families again.
speak;VillagerMan2;We of the Western Isles always pay our debts of gratitude!
speak;VillagerMan2;We're all grateful from the bottom of our hearts!

name: CitizenDies
condition: unit.nid=='103' or unit.nid=='104' or unit.nid=='105' or unit.nid=='106'

name: ReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Sir Morgan, the reinforcements are ready.
speak;Morgan;Good. Deploy them immediately.|Spread them around the castle to defend us on all sides.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After Roy captures Aquileia, powers in Etruria turn against the revolution.|Driven away from the palace,{w}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;} Roartz and Arcardo flee to Sacae, which remains under Bern's control.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:multi_remove_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Arcardo (Arcardo)}{clear}Sacae lies in the center of the continent and is covered in plains.|Before Bern's invasion, it was home to numerous nomadic clans.{w}{c:wait;500}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block);FLAG(mirror)}{c:add_portrait;King Mordred;Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}{clear}The Etrurian Army joins the Lycian Army to form a unified force.|{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;King Mordred}The decision is made for this army to head for Sacae with dual purpose.|The first is to eliminate the remnants of the revolution,|and the second is to begin an offensive against Bern.|Realizing that Etrurian soldiers may not fight under the Lycian banner,|Roy formally decides to call his force the Etrurian Army.|Roy is to lead the division that will begin the offensive in Sacae.|The people of Sacae are wary of outsiders, which is challenge enough,|{c:add_portrait;Brunnya (Brunnya);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}but Brunnya, one of Bern's three Wyvern Generals, has the Djute, the largest clan in Sacae, under her control.|With the warriors of the Djute and Brunnya's elite troops in his way,|Roy knows it is unlikely he will find any respite in this foreign land...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Roartz;Lady Brunnya... What will you have us do?
speak;Brunnya;You have our protection, Lord Roartz.|You have helped us so much already. We shall not neglect you.
speak;Brunnya;Lord Arcardo, I assign you to defend this land of Talas.|Lord Roartz, your post will be the city of Bulgar.
speak;Arcardo;Talas?! Here?!|But this is so close to Aquileia. The enemy draws near!
speak;Brunnya;Then stop them in their tracks.|This region's proximity to Aquileia makes it strategically invaluable.|It would be an ideal base of operations if the enemy can be repelled.
speak;Roartz;Bulgar...lies deep within Sacae.|I hear there is great unrest among the nomads...
speak;Brunnya;Force them into submission.{w} That is your specialty, is it not?

speak;Brunnya;Rumor says that Roy, commander of the attacking army, is but a boy.|Even so, he has led his army to victory through countless skirmishes and traps.|Under his guidance, the Lycian Army has been rebuilt stronger than ever.|He has gone through greater hardships than you, yet you complain?|Do you intend to lose to a child?
speak;Brunnya;I must be off. I pray for your success.
speak;RedSoldier;...Are you certain we should leave them? They will surely fall.
speak;Brunnya;They are disgraceful cowards who cast away their homeland to save their necks.|We owe them nothing. They should be grateful to receive the few troops they have.
speak;Yoder;We will soon approach the Etrurian border.
speak;Roy;Thank you for everything, Father Yoder.|We've only made it this far thanks to the assistance of the church.
speak;Yoder;I am only repaying your favor.{w} Had you not captured Aquileia, we would suffer great persecution from Bern.|This is nothing compared to what you did for us.
speak;Roy;It was my pleasure to help the church.
speak;Yoder;If I may be so bold... Can I ask one more favor?
speak;Roy;Of course, if I am capable.
speak;Yoder;If you discover anything else about the dragons...
speak;Roy;Say no more. If I find anything new, I will report to you immediately.

speak;Yoder;You have my eternal thanks.|...Oh yes, one word of caution before you go.|The lands around here...|They are surrounded by high mountains and hills.|It is also difficult to see in the dark of the night...
speak;Roy;These are ideal conditions for an ambush...
speak;Yoder;Exactly.|Castle Talas up ahead is under Bern's control.
speak;Roy;I'll bear that in mind. Thank you for the advice.
speak;Yoder;Not at all.|May the Etrurian Army go with Saint Elimine's blessing.

name: VisitVillage1
_source: speak;SacaeanVillager;Ah, are you fighting against Bern? Then please take this staff.|It was once used by the noble Lady Tiena...

name: VisitVillage2
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan5;We don't get many visitors up here...|What?|The enemy is planning to attack our village?|I'll make sure everyone knows...|I must thank you for telling us.|Please take this.

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerMustacheWithHair4;I saw some shady-looking people in Bern's ranks. Probably thieves.|You should tell the villagers before they get ransacked.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerMan4;I hear there's a village far to the northeast.|I've never met anyone who's been that far.|I wonder if anyone still lives there.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Arcardo...|What a pathetic ending for one of his stature.
speak;Roy;A year ago I myself never imagined I would be leading an army.|Fate can be unpredictable...|Perhaps we'll even be able to turn the tides against Bern.
speak;Merlinus;...?|Lord Roy, what is that in your hand?
speak;Roy;Oh, this? It's the Fire Emblem.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere wanted me to keep it.{w} It seemed...difficult for her to give it to me...|I think she still hoped to end the war with diplomacy...
speak;Merlinus;Hm... Perhaps she had faith in her brother, even if that seems unlikely.
speak;Merlinus;Because Zephiel is the treacherous king of Bern!|It is said that he murdered his own father. I don't expect he would be moved by family trust...
speak;Merlinus;Haven't you heard the rumors, Lord Roy?|Zephiel took the throne because his father, King Desmond, passed on.{w} But King Desmond's death was very sudden.
speak;Roy;...Does Princess Guinivere know about this?
speak;Merlinus;I'm sure she is at least aware of the rumors.|She may even know the whole story.

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating Arcardo,|{c:remove_portrait;Arcardo (Arcardo)}Roy crosses the border and enters the land of Sacae.|The Djute, the most powerful clan in Sacae, serve Bern unbendingly.|All clans who have stood against these two joint forces have faced decimation.|{c:add_portrait;Dayan (Dayan);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}The chieftain of the Kutolah clan, the famed Silver Wolf Dayan, does lead a guerrilla resistance,|but to disappointingly little effect.|{c:remove_portrait;Dayan (Dayan)}With none to oppose them, Bern essentially has full control over Sacae.|{c:add_portrait;Monke (Monke);Right,Middle;left;OpenEyes;FLAG(no_block)}As Roy sets foot on the plains, the Djute wait to strike...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.18: The Law of Sacae
speak;RedSoldier;The Etrurian Army marches toward us.
#This line was changed to make it clear that theres an ambush

speak;Monke;All according to plan.|Draw them closer.{w} Once they approach the greatyurt, you are to give the signal.|All men and women within our tents are to ride out and attack the Etrurians.{w} They will rue the day they crossed our path.|Have the other clans been notified?
speak;Monke;Good.|...The Etrurian Army will be an easier foe than the Silver Wolf.|They don't know this land. They're unfamiliar with our ways.
speak;RedSoldier;The clans unite to fight against foreign invaders.
speak;Monke;Yes, such is the law of Sacae.|None aided us against the Silver Wolf because it was a clan dispute.|But this is a foreign invasion.
speak;RedSoldier;The help from the other clans will be valuable in this fight.|With such a powerful ally as Bern, however, they are expendable.
speak;Monke;Exactly.|There are some, though, who dislike the idea of involving Bern in Sacaen matters.
speak;RedSoldier;I hear some clans have even joined the Silver Wolf's guerilla force.
speak;Monke;He is a stubborn halfwit.|His clan was defeated. He should know better than to oppose us.|He knows what becomes of those who try to fight against Bern.
speak;RedSoldier;Bern has subdued even powerful cities like Bulgar with ease.
speak;Monke;Yes, and if they cannot be beaten, we have no choice but to join them.|This is our only path, and the law of Sacae is unbreakable.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere...|We are approaching Bern's army.
speak;Roy;As we get closer, we will clash with soldiers of Bern more and more.|It will not be long before we are in full combat with Bern.
speak;Roy;I want to ask you something before that happens.
speak;Roy;I have heard rumors about King Zephiel...|I heard that he killed his father, the previous king.

speak;Roy;I could scarcely believe it myself.{w} You believe in him so strongly that you cast away your own country.|If King Zephiel is truly as mad as the rumors say,{w} I'm sure you would not have done all that you have.
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere,|I accepted the Fire Emblem not to use it in battle, but to find a way to end this war peacefully.
speak;Roy;I think I have a right to know the truth about the rumors...
speak;Guinivere;I...I'm sorry. Please...give me some time.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Roy;But now we've hit our enemy in Sacae hard.|I'm sure that's not the last of them, though.
speak;Roy;Do you have any idea where they might be?
speak;Merlinus;Actually, the spy I sent out earlier should be back by now.|I will see if he's learned anything.
speak;Guinivere;...I wish to tell you about my brother.
speak;Guinivere;No...|I want you to know before we enter Bern...|I want you to know the tragedies that have occurred.|You asked before if my brother murdered our father.
speak;Roy;King Zephiel killed his own father to seize the throne...
speak;Guinivere;Our father tried to kill Zephiel first.
speak;Guinivere;He couldn't bear the abuse he took from our father. So he...
speak;Merlinus;...Lord Roy!|We've located the enemy! They're still planning their attack!|Hm? ...What is the matter?
speak;Merlinus;...Did I appear at a bad time?
speak;Roy;No, it's fine. Where are they planning?
speak;Merlinus;It's the largest city in Sacae, but it's under Bern's control now.
speak;Roy;I understand. We'll move as soon as we can.
speak;Roy;...Why did the old king try to murder his own son...?

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman4;The clans will defend against all invaders.|Such is the law of Sacae.

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerOldWoman4;Enemies will face the wrath of the united clans...|Such is the law of Sacae.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan5;The clans shall unite to repel invaders...|Such is the law of Sacae.

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan5;Pray to the sky and the earth...|Such is the law of Sacae.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Killing Edge,Iron Blade,Iron Lance,Killer Lance,Javelin,Iron Axe,Killer Axe,Hand Axe,Iron Bow,Steel Bow;armory

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Silver Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Blade,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Silver Lance,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Silver Axe,Hammer,Iron Bow,Steel Bow,Silver Bow,Short Bow,Longbow;armory

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Silver Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Blade,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Silver Lance,Heavy Spear,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Silver Axe,Hammer,Iron Bow,Steel Bow,Silver Bow,Short Bow,Longbow;armory

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After defeating the Djute,|{c:remove_portrait;Monke (Monke)}{c:wait;400}Roy moves towards Bulgar, the largest city in Sacae.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{clear}As a center of commerce between Etruria, Bern, and Ilia,{w} Bulgar has a history of being a free city without rule.|However,{w}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)} High Chancellor Roartz now holds control of Bulgar with Bern's support.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roartz (Roartz)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{clear}Roy enters Bulgar with the hopes of liberating it and learning more...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Roartz;They're here...! And so soon...|If only we had more time to prepare our defenses!
speak;Kel;We will try to stop the enemy from progressing any further.|Please retreat to the mansion and fortify your defenses there.
speak;Roartz;...Do you think you can succeed in stopping them?
speak;Kel;I cannot say, but we will try.
speak;Roartz;If you aren't confident you'll be victorious, then I'll--
speak;Kel;You'll what? Flee?|Tell me, just where do you think you can hide?
speak;Kel;General Brunnya has ordered me to protect you.|And so I shall, to the very limits of my ability.|But there may come a time when you must take up arms as well.
speak;Roartz;...V-very well...|Then I shall fortify the inside. I leave the outside to you.
speak;RedSoldier;...That coward is the high chancellor of Etruria?|Why does he deserve our protection?
speak;Kel;It's not as if General Brunnya cares for the man.|She is obligated to protect him because he turned to our side.|Wretched though he may be, we have a duty to fulfill.
speak;Kel;By the way, I understand the Silver Wolf has been lurking around here.|Keep on guard at all times and be ready for anything.
speak;Roy;Yes, we must.|I am sorry I've had no time to speak with you at length.
speak;Guinivere;It is not your fault.|...If the blame lies with anyone, it is my brother.
speak;Roy;May I ask why your father tried to murder King Zephiel?
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel and I have different mothers.{w} In actuality, I am his half sister.
speak;Roy;I heard that Zephiel's mother was an Etrurian noblewoman.
speak;Guinivere;That's correct.|They were arranged to be wed for political reasons.{w} However, our father was already in love with another woman.|That was my mother.
speak;Guinivere;The marriage between the king and Zephiel's mother was forced.|Our father didn't love Zephiel's mother and always resented their son.
speak;Roy;Was that the cause of all the troubles that happened?
speak;Guinivere;No...|I remember Zephiel working hard, vying for our father's affection. He was a brilliant scholar and a prodigy in combat.|He grew to become a fine heir to Bern's throne.
speak;Roy;Then why did the king try to--;FLAG(no_block)
speak;Soldier;Lord Roy! We are ready for the attack!
speak;Roy;Understood. I only need a moment!|Princess Guinivere, I am sorry, but I...
speak;Guinivere;No, I understand. Go. Please be careful.

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Niime;I must say, you're not half bad at all.
speak;BlueSoldier;I told you to stop!|You may not enter. Lord Roy is not accepting visitors.
speak;BlueSoldier;She was very insistent about seeing you.|But you have more important matters to attend to.
speak;Niime;Just hear me out first.|I think I have some information you might want to hear.
speak;Niime;It is about the dragons who are in human form.
speak;Roy;...I wish to speak with her in private.|Will you leave us, please?
speak;Niime;Well, that sure got your attention, didn't it?
speak;Roy;The dragons you speak of...|They're not like the wyverns that Bern's soldiers ride upon.{w} They're strange troops that fight alongside Bern's soldiers...
speak;Niime;I know that well. They're the same dragons that were defeated in the Scouring.

speak;Niime;I am Niime.|I live in the mountains where I study arcane magic. Some call me Niime the Hermit.|At first I thought this was only a simple act of aggression by Bern.{w} But then I began to sense a strange and...evil force among their troops.|I decided to investigate.
speak;Niime;The dragons are very much shrouded in mystery.{w} I looked through many ancient books and scrolls.|I could only decipher so many of them. But...
speak;Niime;I have come to the conclusion that Bern has resurrected the Demon Dragon.
speak;Roy;The demon dragon...|The leader of the dragons that Hartmut defeated.

speak;Niime;The very same.|Dragons are a much more advanced species than us humans.|Their vitality and intellect puts that of humans to shame.{w} There is one thing, however, the dragons lack in.|They multiply at a fraction of the rate humans do.{w} But the demon dragon...|It had the power to create more dragons. That is what I learned from my research.
speak;Niime;The demon dragon can create more of its kind.|That would explain where Bern is getting all of its dragons.
speak;Niime;Now, that being said...|I wish to learn more about the dragons.{w} I wield dark magic... Let me join your army.|I'm sure I can be of some assistance.
speak;Roy;Of course. We want to learn about the dragons as well.{w} It will be a perilous journey,{w} but if that's acceptable to you, you're welcome to join us.

name: KelDeath
_source: speak;Kel;This is the fate...of all swordsmen...

name: KelFight
_source: speak;Kel;I am Kel.|Behold my blade...as I swing it for the last time.

name: NiimeDayanScene
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan4;Bern's invasion finally ends, and now here comes Etruria. Will it never end?
speak;Niime;Small wonder. This is a large trading city.|Any army would want control of it.|If you'll excuse me...
speak;VillagerUglyFatMan4;H-hey, wait, where are you going?
speak;Niime;I'm going to observe the fight. Let us see how good this Roy is.
speak;Niime;Don't you worry about me. I'll be fine.
speak;VillagerUglyFatMan4;What? Stop! Don't leave me alone!

name: VisitHouse5
_source: speak;VillagerYoungMan4;This is a longbow, a favorite of the Sacaen nomads.|Here, take one.|Use it to drive Bern's soldiers out of here!

name: VisitHouse2
_source: speak;VillagerGirlPonytail4;Would you like a special ring from Etruria?|I used to sell them, but I had to close my shop because of the war.|Here, take it. No charge... No one will buy it anyway.

name: VisitHouse3
_source: speak;VillagerMan4;This goddess icon brings good luck.|...I used to con people by saying that.|I can't do business with this war, though.|Here, take one.|It won't really bring you any luck, though.

name: VisitHouse4
_source: speak;VillagerLittleBoy4;Wow... Lucky me! Finders keepers.|I bet I can sell this thing...
speak;VillagerLittleBoy4;Whoa! A-are you from Bern?|No, I didn't steal this!|See ya!

name: VisitHouse1
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan4;I was selling weapons to Bern before the war...|But now that they've taken over the city, they won't pay!|Here, take this wyrmslayer. Just do something about them.|I've been hiding it from them...I think you can guess why...

name: ReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;Kel;The reinforcements should be arriving soon...
speak;Kel;Open the front gate to let the reinforcements in when they arrive.

name: OpenMainGate
_source: speak;RedSoldier;They'll be here any moment now... Open the gate!

name: SecondReinforcementsWarning
_source: speak;Kel;Have the guerrilla forces hiding in the houses commence their attack.

name: GaidenFailed
_source: speak;Thoril;Pigs from Etruria...!|I will avenge the Djute right here, right now!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;After Roy meets Niime the Hermit, some light is shed on Bern's dragons.|With many questions still left unanswered,{w}{c:remove_portrait;Niime (Niime)}{c:add_portrait;Roy (Roy);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}|Roy directs his troops towards a large manor on the edge of Bulgar.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{c:wait;400}{c:add_portrait;Roartz (Roartz);Left,Middle;right;OpenEyes;FLAG(mirror);FLAG(no_block)}{c:wait;400}{clear}Here, High Chancellor Roartz prepares his defenses for his last stand...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
speak;Roartz;The worthless fools outside failed! The enemy is in the mansion!
speak;Roartz;Blast it!|If I die I'm taking that Roy down with me!
speak;RedSoldier;Lord Roartz!|The remnants of the Djute say they'll come to our aid after they hide Mulagir.
speak;Roartz;Mulagir? Ah, one of the legendary weapons.|Good. Then we must simply hold out until then!
speak;Niime;This mansion's framework is big enough to hide troops and ballistae.|You won't be safe with your back up against the wall.
speak;Roy;Do you know much about this place?
speak;Niime;Probably more than most, anyway.{w} That's what I'm known for.|I picked up that bit of information back in the city.
speak;Roy;...Do you know what the demon dragon looks like?
speak;Niime;I can't say that I do.|Still, I would relish the opportunity to see it with my own eyes.
speak;Roy;I've been wondering...|Do you think the demon dragon is in human form as well?
speak;Niime;It seems probable.|It could be that all dragons in this realm are in human form.|I've even heard stories of dragons in human form living with people.
speak;Niime;I've read that dragons only began to take human form after the Ending Winter.
speak;Niime;I expect you've heard of it.
speak;Roy;Yes, but only in legend.|I learned that in the Ending Winter, the laws of nature were all warped.{w} Day became night, and summer became winter.

speak;Niime;That's it.|The scrolls I read on the topic are so timeworn that I couldn't decipher all of them.{w} But one thing is clear.|The Ending Winter was a disaster powerful enough to bend and twist the whole planet.

speak;Niime;Nobody knows for certain...|Legend says the dragons caused it by releasing vast amounts of magical power,{w} but even this theory lacks evidence.|In any case, it is certain that dragons began to take human form after the Ending Winter.|I don't believe these two occurrences are coincidence.
speak;Niime;Ultimately, the truth lies in Bern.

name: RoartzFightDouglas
_source: speak;Roartz;Douglas... Hmph!{w} After all that you said, you've gone back on your honor!
speak;Douglas;Indeed it may appear that way. But I fight true.|I fight with my heart and I have confidence in our cause.
speak;Roartz;Silence!|Enough of your nonsensical rambling. Die here!

name: RoartzFight
_source: speak;Roartz;S-someone! Come to my aid!|All is lost if I fall!

name: RoartzDeath
_source: speak;Roartz;W-wait... Serve me! It is not too late...|I shall...absolve you of your crimes...|Guh...!

name: ArcardoFightDouglas
_source: speak;Arcardo;D-Douglas!|You had turned to the enemy...!?

name: ArcardoFightKlein
_source: speak;Klein;You are the one who betrayed Etruria, Lord Arcardo!

name: ArcardoFight
_source: speak;Arcardo;W-why?!|What have I done to deserve such a fate?!

name: ArcardoDeath
_source: speak;Arcardo;I...am a noble...of Etruria...!|I cannot...die...in a place such as this...|Gah!

name: CathAppears
_source: speak;Cath;Soooo...|Bulgar, huh? The biggest city in Sacae.|I heard it was sacked by Bern. Look at all the soldiers...|I'm sure there are plenty of goodies just waiting to be swiped.

name: DayanAppears
_source: speak;Dayan;The manor is in chaos. Now is my chance.|I will take down Bern's troops on my own!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Sue' or u.nid=='Shin']

name: DayanJoinsRoy
_source: speak;Dayan;Are you the general of the Etrurian Army?
speak;Roy;Dayan...? I feel I've heard the name...

speak;Dayan;First, allow me to thank you.|My clan has been fighting against Bern and their followers.|We haven't a chance against them head on, so we've resorted to guerrilla tactics.|Since your arrival, however, the odds are tipping in our favor.
speak;Roy;I am glad that I could help.
speak;Dayan;That said, I wish to ask you one thing.|Once this battle is over, I request that you withdraw.
speak;Dayan;Sacae belongs to the Sacaens.|If Bern's iron-fisted rule is only to be replaced by Etruria's,{w} then you will leave us no choice but to fight against you.
speak;Roy;I'm sorry... I cannot comply with that request.|We must base ourselves in Sacae to launch our direct attack on Bern.
speak;Roy;Even if we push Bern back now, it's only a matter of time until they strike back.|We must bring the fight to their heartland to stop this war. Do you not agree?
speak;Dayan;Yes, I do.|I see...|In that case, I shall join you.
speak;Dayan;But once Bern is defeated, you must withdraw your troops from Sacae.|Do I have your word?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Sue' or u.nid=='Shin']

name: DayanJoinsSue
_source: speak;Sue;Thanks to this army, yes.|But I was the only one of our clansmen to survive...
speak;Dayan;I see... You've been through much.
speak;Sue;Grandfather, come with us. This army will not invade Sacae.
speak;Sue;As certain as the Sky is blue and the Earth is green.
speak;Dayan;Very well. I trust your word.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Shin']
speak;Sue;Thanks to this army, yes.|But I was the only one of our clansmen to survive...
speak;Dayan;I see... You've been through much.
speak;Sue;Grandfather, do you fight with us?
speak;Dayan;Yes, I have joined this group.|I don't believe that this army will try to take Sacae from us.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Sue']

name: DayanJoinsShin
_source: speak;Dayan;Shin, you've returned! Now you can join our fight...
speak;Shin;But Chieftain...|I am currently in service to this army.
speak;Dayan;...Do you mean the Etrurian Army?
speak;Shin;This army will not invade Sacae. Will you lend us your skills?
speak;Dayan;Very well. I trust your word.|I will fight with you.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Sue']
speak;Dayan;Shin, you've returned! We fight together again...
speak;Dayan;I have indeed.|I don't believe they intend to take Sacae from us.|What do you think of them?
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid=='Shin']

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy!|We have reports that remnants of the Djute are hiding in some nearby ruins.
speak;Merlinus;Yes, and a captive tells us there's a bow there that was used in the Scouring.
speak;Merlinus;It's likely that it's a legendary weapon.
speak;Roy;We must get to those ruins! Let's go!
speak;Roy;Merlinus, I need you to send this letter to Father Yoder in Etruria.
speak;Merlinus;A letter? May I ask what it says?
speak;Roy;It has the information I learned from Niime about the dragons.
speak;Roy;It would take too long to tell you.|I haven't sealed the letter yet, so you can look through it if you like.
speak;Merlinus;Very well. I think I will...
speak;Roy;Yes, the attack on Bern will commence soon.|May I...ask the rest of the story now?
speak;Guinivere;...That is why I came to you.
speak;Roy;You said King Zephiel was an outstanding pupil in everything he did...|It sounds like he would have been an ideal heir to the throne.
speak;Roy;But still your father never looked kindly at him.
speak;Guinivere;In truth...our father began to despise Zephiel precisely because of his talent.
speak;Roy;Why...would a father resent his son's own talent...?
speak;Guinivere;Our father was a man of unextraordinary skill and intellect.|Zephiel's outstanding talents made our father colder towards him.
speak;Guinivere;He went as far as to tell Zephiel that he would never inherit Bern.|He said that instead, the throne would go to my future husband.
speak;Roy;His own father told him that?! What a heartless man!

speak;Guinivere;But Zephiel held strong. He always said he never cared about inheriting the throne.|But the people of Bern knew of Zephiel's genius and wanted him king.|Pressured by the public, our father lost his patience at last...
speak;Roy;That's when he decided to kill Zephiel...?

speak;Guinivere;Our father gave Zephiel a goblet full of a poisoned drink at a banquet.|That was the first and last time Zephiel ever accepted a drink from our father.|After returning to his room, Zephiel began to fall dreadfully ill.{w} For ten days and nights, Zephiel lingered between life and death.{w} But Murdock, Zephiel's teacher and loyal general, saved his life.
speak;Roy;...The old king made no further attempts on his life?

speak;Guinivere;No. At least, not to completion...|I have heard that he schemed to have Murdock and Zephiel's mother killed.{w} He was scheming to murder everyone connected to Zephiel.|Upon learning of our father's intentions, Zephiel feigned death.{w} At his funeral service, our father leaned over the coffin to view Zephiel's body.|It was at that moment that Zephiel sprung from the coffin and...sword in hand...

speak;Guinivere;I was but a child then, so naturally I could not understand what was going on.|All I knew at the time is that our father died, and Zephiel never smiled again.|Before then, he was stern at times, but always a kind and loving brother. But after everything that happened...
speak;Guinivere;I knew that someday I may have to act against him.
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel is so far-gone now. He will never listen to anything I say.|Roy, please... You must stop him.|Stop him from destroying Bern and from destroying Elibe.
speak;Roy;Such a feat will likely require my blade.|Can you still ask such a thing of me?
speak;Guinivere;...I trust your judgement. Do what you must.
speak;Roy;You have my word, Princess Guinivere.|I swear by the Fire Emblem that I will stop King Zephiel!

name: ChapterOutro
_source: speak;BlueSoldier;We've found it! The bow is hidden inside of the altar!
speak;Roy;......|This is Mulagir...|It looks unremarkable, but I'm sure it hides an incredible power.
speak;Merlinus;Lord Roy, Bern's troops are fleeing.
speak;Merlinus;Let them go? We must attack.
speak;Roy;No, don't. We've already won.|They don't want to fight us.
speak;Roy;They all have lives and families.|There's no need to take that away from them.
speak;Roy;Merlinus, I need you to send this letter to Father Yoder in Etruria.
speak;Merlinus;A letter? May I ask what it says?
speak;Roy;It has the information I learned from Niime about the dragons.
speak;Roy;It would take too long to tell you.{w} I haven't sealed the letter yet, so you can look through it if you like.
speak;Merlinus;Very well. I think I will...
speak;Roy;Yes, the attack on Bern will commence soon.|May I...ask the rest of the story now?
speak;Guinivere;...That is why I came to you.
speak;Roy;You said King Zephiel was an outstanding pupil in everything he did...|It sounds like he would have been an ideal heir to the throne.
speak;Roy;But still your father never looked kindly at him.
speak;Guinivere;In truth...our father began to despise Zephiel precisely because of his talent.
speak;Roy;Why...would a father resent his son's own talent...?
speak;Guinivere;Our father was a man of unextraordinary skill and intellect.|Zephiel's outstanding talents made our father colder towards him.
speak;Guinivere;He went as far as to tell Zephiel that he would never inherit Bern.|He said that instead, the throne would go to my future husband.
speak;Roy;His own father told him that?! What a heartless man!

speak;Guinivere;But Zephiel held strong. He always said he never cared about inheriting the throne.|But the people of Bern knew of Zephiel's genius and wanted him king.|Pressured by the public, our father lost his patience at last...
speak;Roy;That's when he decided to kill Zephiel...?

speak;Guinivere;Our father gave Zephiel a goblet full of a poisoned drink at a banquet.|That was the first and last time Zephiel ever accepted a drink from our father.|After returning to his room, Zephiel began to fall dreadfully ill.{w} For ten days and nights, Zephiel lingered between life and death.|But Murdock, Zephiel's teacher and loyal general, saved his life.
speak;Roy;...The old king made no further attempts on his life?

speak;Guinivere;No. At least, not to completion...|I have heard that he schemed to have Murdock and Zephiel's mother killed.{w} He was scheming to murder everyone connected to Zephiel.|Upon learning of our father's intentions, Zephiel feigned death. At his funeral service, our father leaned over the coffin to view Zephiel's body.|It was at that moment that Zephiel sprung from the coffin and...sword in hand...

speak;Guinivere;I was but a child then, so naturally I could not understand what was going on.|All I knew at the time is that our father died, and Zephiel never smiled again.|Before then, he was stern at times, but always a kind and loving brother.{w} But after everything that happened...
speak;Guinivere;I knew that someday I may have to act against him.
speak;Guinivere;...Zephiel is so far-gone now. He will never listen to anything I say.|Roy, please... You must stop him.|Stop him from destroying Bern and from destroying Elibe.
speak;Roy;Such a feat will likely require my blade.|Can you still ask such a thing of me?
speak;Guinivere;...I trust your judgement. Do what you must.
speak;Roy;You have my word, Princess Guinivere.|I swear by the Fire Emblem that I will stop King Zephiel!

name: ChapterIntro
_source: speak;Narrator;Roy heads toward the ruins in Sacae hoping to secure a legendary weapon.{w}{c:wait;400}{c:remove_portrait;Roy (Roy)}{clear}However, the remnants of the Djute wait for Roy within...;;;narration;FLAG(hold)
chapter_title;Chapter Sound;Ch.20x: The Bow of the Winds
speak;Thoril;They wish to take this place as well, do they?|We will not let them have it.|Tell our brothers that we defend to the death.|We will avenge our dead comrades!
speak;Roy;{v:TalkPartner}, what do you know about this place?
speak;{v:TalkPartner};Just that the legendary Hanon's weapon, Mulagir the Tempest Bow, is here.
speak;Roy;Hanon...|She and Saint Elimine were the only two women among the Eight Legends.
speak;{v:TalkPartner};...Be on your guard.|The Djute are out for blood. They want vengeance.
speak;Roy;Yes, we have to be careful. Let's move!

name: FindBuriedTreasure8
_source: speak;Sophia;Something...is glittering in the sand... Oh...|What a beautiful ring...

name: RoyMarcusSupportC
_source: speak;Marcus;They're not good. Not good at all.
speak;Marcus;The young recruits. Their combat skills leave much to be desired.|Granted, not all of them are disappointments, but most are soft!|What they need is a more intense training regimen...
speak;Roy;I don't know if I'd call anyone soft... Everyone's working hard.
speak;Marcus;My Lord Roy, you are far too easy on them.|I shall go and teach them how we used to do things!
speak;Roy;Just don't work yourself too hard.|You're not as...well, youthful as you used to be.
speak;Marcus;Nonsense!|I may be getting on in years, but I'm still more than a match for the youth!
speak;Roy;If you think more training is what they need, then go ahead.|Just take care not to overwork yourself. Age can be cruel.
speak;Marcus;Of course, my lord. Thank you for your concern.
speak;Marcus;Lord Roy is such a caring and thoughtful young master...|The other youths we have can't even compare... It's a disgrace!|I'm the only one who can serve our Lord Roy properly.

name: RoyMarcusSupportB
_source: speak;Marcus;Lord Roy, I believe training needs to be made more difficult.
speak;Marcus;Yes, my lord.|And those who fail to perform up to par should be discharged.
speak;Marcus;Such rules may make our numbers small, but we will be an army of elites.|That would increase our combat efficiency several times over.
speak;Roy;No, Marcus. I don't think so.
speak;Roy;Who's to judge whether someone is performing up to par?
speak;Roy;But some soldiers may excel while I'm not looking.
speak;Marcus;Ah, yes... Well, in that case...

speak;Roy;We also have people supporting us off the battlefield, and yet more who simply haven't yet had a chance to shine.|I couldn't discharge such soldiers.|Many have joined us thanks to their belief in our fight.|I can't simply tell them to leave.
speak;Roy;Marcus, try to trust them. We're all working together.
speak;Marcus;...You are right.|I was mistaken, Lord Roy. Your ideas are noble.
speak;Roy;It's strange to hear you praise me.|I'm more used to hearing you scold me.
speak;Marcus;Lord Roy... He has grown into a fine young man...|I'm certain he can make it on his own.|My work is nearly complete...

name: RoyMarcusSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;Marcus, is something wrong? You seem unwell.
speak;Marcus;I apologize, my lord.|I have been considering retirement...|Age has worn me down...
speak;Marcus;The young soldiers have grown strong. Perhaps now is the time.
speak;Marcus;I have grown old...|A feeble old man like me has no place at your side.|It is time I made way for the next generation.
speak;Roy;I'm sorry about what I said to you before.|But you don't need to retire yet.
speak;Marcus;But I'm far too old... I have no place on the battlefield.
speak;Roy;I still have much to learn from you.|If you leave...to whom can I turn for advice?
speak;Marcus;Lord Roy... I had no idea you trusted me so much...
speak;Roy;Don't retire yet... I need your help.
speak;Marcus;As you will, my lord.|I shall serve you until the day I die.

name: RoyWoltSupportC
_source: speak;Roy;...Just call me Roy. I've known you all my life.
speak;Wolt;I appreciate your kindness, but rules are rules.
speak;Roy;Do you really think so?|You suddenly feel so distant to me.
speak;Wolt;What are you saying? I'm right here in front of you.
speak;Wolt;Ha ha, I know.|But enough talk.|We haven't time to laze about here.
speak;Wolt;Let's go!|The battle awaits us, Lord Roy.

name: RoyWoltSupportB
_source: speak;Wolt;Lord Roy, the issue was settled.|More importantly, this is a battlefield.|You never know where enemies are hiding.|Keep on your guard.
speak;Roy;Wolt...|You're starting to sound like Merlinus and Marcus.
speak;Wolt;Am I?|Thank you! That is such praise.|All I desire is to be as loyal a servant as they are.
speak;Roy;No.|Leave me alone for a while, would you?

name: RoyWoltSupportA
_source: speak;Wolt;You do not look well. Is there something on your mind?
