speak;Roy;...Actually, there is.|Would you mind if we talked about it?
speak;Wolt;Of course not! I'll do my best to help.
speak;Roy;You see, I'm a bit frustrated with someone in the army.|I understand where he's coming from, but...
speak;Wolt;You understand his logic, but your feelings don't agree. Is that it?
speak;Roy;Yes, exactly.|My feelings don't align with what I know to be true.|And when I start feeling frustrated, I feel like telling him.
speak;Wolt;Then do so!|It is bad for your health to keep your feelings bottled up.|Besides, we all know you are in a stressful position.|I'm sure he will understand if you feel the need to vent.
speak;Wolt;Of course!|If you want, I can go talk to that person.|I will always support you, so don't hesitate to ask anything of me.
speak;Roy;Thanks, Wolt. I feel better now.|But enough chatter! We have to get moving!
speak;Wolt;Yes, Lord Roy!|...By the way, tell me who it is you're frustrated with.|I will sit him down and have a frank discussion...

name: RoyCeciliaSupportC
_source: speak;Cecilia;How should I move next, Roy?
speak;Roy;Nothing. It's just that...|It feels so strange giving you orders...
speak;Cecilia;Why?|You lead this army.|Who else would give me orders?
speak;Cecilia;Roy, you mustn't go soft.|If a leader gets soft, then so will the troops.|You are a general leading an army, and I am your soldier.|Be strict and assertive, as a general should be.
speak;Cecilia;Good.|Now, General Roy, what is my next move?

name: RoyCeciliaSupportB
_source: speak;Cecilia;Are you tired? Perhaps you should rest.
speak;Roy;I can't. We must keep moving.
speak;Cecilia;Rushing forward will only lead us to failure.
speak;Roy;I'm not rushing, but we must move as quickly as possible.
speak;Roy;The quicker we move, the more lives will be saved.
speak;Roy;We fight to win this war.|But how can we call it a victory with the deaths of so many innocents?
speak;Roy;Oh, I'm sorry... I didn't mean to talk back to you.|Are you cross with me?
speak;Cecilia;Not at all. I was too focused on a simple victory.|You are already becoming a worthy leader.
speak;Roy;Please, enough flattery...|But...hearing it from you is encouraging.

name: RoyCeciliaSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;What are you going to do once this war is over?
speak;Cecilia;Sorry? Do you think you've won already?
speak;Cecilia;Well...|We must rebuild Etruria, so first I will go home.|Why do you ask?
speak;Roy;I was wondering if you could teach me more after the war.
speak;Cecilia;There's no need for that now. You've become a true leader.|There is nothing left for me to teach you.
speak;Cecilia;Roy, you must have confidence.|Troops will not follow a leader who lacks confidence.

speak;Cecilia;That is my last lesson for you.|You are no longer a student.|You are a colleague and a friend.|So if there's anything I can assist you with after the war,|it would be my pleasure to help you.
speak;Cecilia;Of course.|I will always be on your side. Never forget that.

name: RoySophiaSupportC
_source: speak;Sophia;I sense something ominous... in this battle...|Please stay off the front lines...
speak;Roy;...I understand.|But I'm not sure I'll be able to pay full heed to your warning.
speak;Roy;When I go up front...it's because I trust the others.|I can't hide myself in the back in fear.|I have to fight alongside everyone else.
speak;Roy;I appreciate the warning, but...I'm sorry.

name: RoySophiaSupportB
_source: speak;Sophia;No... I just wanted to apologize...
speak;Sophia;About before...|I told you I sensed something ominous about the battle...
speak;Sophia;I'm sorry...|You already have much on your mind...|I shouldn't have burdened you so...
speak;Roy;No, it's all right.|I'm actually glad that you told me.|I was more cautious that day. Thank you.
speak;Roy;If you hadn't told me anything, I wouldn't have been so cautious.|I may have been hurt badly. So thanks.
speak;Roy;Tell me if you sense anything. It's a great help.

name: RoySophiaSupportA
_source: speak;Sophia;Lord Roy... I must tell you something...
speak;Sophia;I can see the future... but only blurry images...|I may not see...something truly powerful...
speak;Sophia;Yes...|If I fail to sense something powerful...and if you are hurt...
speak;Roy;Thanks, but I'll be fine.|We'll figure it out when the time comes.
speak;Roy;Sensing the future is an amazing ability.|We can prevent disasters before they even occur.|But I won't rely on your power too much, so don't worry.

speak;Roy;I'm more concerned about your well-being than your predictions.|I'm sure we'll face many hardships as we continue...|But keep your spirits up and there's nothing we can't overcome.|Let's go!

name: RoySueSupportC
_source: speak;Roy;Whew, I've finally finished outlining the troops' positions...
speak;Sue;What's the matter? You have a strange look on your face.
speak;Roy;I was just surprised that you spoke to me.
speak;Roy;Yes...|I never see you speaking with other people.|You don't like talking much, do you?
speak;Sue;I simply prefer communing with nature over people.
speak;Sue;The breeze, the trees, the sky, the brooks...|They all speak to us.
speak;Sue;They do. Listen and you'll hear them.|You can't hear them simply because you don't listen.|I bid you farewell for now.
speak;Roy;Wait, you didn't have anything to tell me?
speak;Sue;I did. I just told you.
speak;Sue;Listen to nature, and you'll hear all sorts of voices.|It will bring you peace of mind and soul.|You won't be able to hear them if you're tense all the time.
speak;Roy;Was she trying to help me because I look so tired...?|Thank you, Sue.

name: RoySueSupportB
_source: speak;Roy;Do you think so? I can't really tell...
speak;Sue;Hm hm hm...|Perhaps such things cannot be sensed by those who work the land.
speak;Roy;That's the first time I've heard you laugh.
speak;Roy;Yes.|Your laugh has a good aura to it, too.

name: RoySueSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;What are you going to do once this war is over?
speak;Roy;But wasn't the Kutolah clan destroyed by Bern...?
speak;Sue;We will gather everyone once more.|Perhaps the Kutolah name is no more, but our clansmen survive.
speak;Roy;That's... Well, I guess that's the right thing to do.
speak;Roy;I thought if you had no place to go that you could come to Pherae.
speak;Roy;Right...|It's not a huge area, but it's a nice and peaceful place.
speak;Sue;It would be nice...|But my heart belongs in the plains of Sacae.
speak;Roy;I understand.|But tell me if you ever change your mind.

name: RoyShannaSupportC
_source: speak;Shanna;What's the matter, Lord Roy? Do you need something?
speak;Roy;No, I just noticed that you seem so...carefree.
speak;Shanna;Hey! Are you making fun of me?
speak;Roy;Not at all. I'm envious, actually.
speak;Shanna;...I still think I'm being made fun of.

speak;Roy;Trust me, I'm not making fun of you.|You see, as the leader, I must always appear confident and optimistic.|I worry and despair like everyone else, though.|So I wanted to ask you.|How can I be as carefree as you? Can you offer me any tips?
speak;Roy;You know, things I can do or a mindset I should have, or anything really.
speak;Shanna;Hmm...|Eat well, sleep well, and laugh well.
speak;Shanna;Probably.|That's all it takes to enjoy life, isn't it?
speak;Shanna;I'm sure you feel you have to think deeply in your position...|But it's probably not as complicated as you think.

name: RoyShannaSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;Shanna, what will you do when the war is over?
speak;Shanna;Me?|Lemme think... First off, I'll probably go back to Ilia.
speak;Roy;I was just wondering if you wanted to come to Pherae.
speak;Shanna;Your home? I'd love to!|I want to see it at least once.
speak;Roy;Well, it's not as big as Ostia so you might be disappointed.
speak;Shanna;I'm sure my hometown is way smaller than yours.|Plus it snows a lot.
speak;Roy;Great. Then you should like it.
speak;Roy;Sure. You're welcome to stay as long as you like.
speak;Shanna;Lord Roy is so kind...|Inviting a simple mercenary like me to his home...|Wait... Does that mean...?|No, no, don't get any crazy ideas... But still... Hmm...

name: RoyShannaSupportB
_source: speak;Roy;You said you're a pegasus knight-in-training, right?
speak;Roy;Why are you fighting outside of Ilia?
speak;Shanna;That's the rule.|Fighting outside of Ilia gets us experience we won't get in the country.
speak;Shanna;We can see foreign fighting styles, foreign cultures...|And of course, there's the money.
speak;Roy;I see...|Then shouldn't you fight in other armies and see what they're like?
speak;Shanna;Huh? No, there's no need for that!|There's no other army that travels all over like this one.|I couldn't ask to be in a better army than this for my training.
speak;Roy;Well, all right. If you say so.

name: RoyLarumSupportC
_source: speak;Larum;I finally found you! I want to show you something.
speak;Roy;What...was it you wanted to show me?
speak;Roy;H-hold on a moment. I can hear you from over here...
speak;Larum;I want you to see the new dance I came up with.|It goes like this...|Step and twirl, step and twirl...|So? What do you think?
speak;Roy;It was very nice. I think you're an exceptionally skilled dancer.
speak;Larum;You don't...have more to say?|Like, "Beautiful!" or, "Lovely!" or, "Your hair looks nice today!"|Or something like that...

name: RoyLarumSupportB
_source: speak;Roy;L-Larum...!|I don't think you should grab on to people like that...|It might cause a misunderstanding.
speak;Larum;I don't know! But I heard a rustling in the bushes...
speak;Roy;L-Larum! Calm down...|I can't move if you're hanging off me like that...
speak;Larum;I'm going to die!|But...that's OK.|If I can die protecting you, Lord Roy, I will die in peace.|You, hiding in the bushes! Show yourself!|Our love is eternal and can never be broken!
speak;Roy;P-please, get off of me so I can fight...

name: RoyLarumSupportA
_source: speak;Larum;There you are! I have another dance to show you.
speak;Larum;You are so.|I saw you step back when I came.|You're bracing yourself so you can dodge me.
speak;Larum;Don't look away when you're talking to me.
speak;Larum;......|You don't like me...|You don't want to see my dancing at all!|That's it, isn't it?!
speak;Larum;Really?! Thanks! That makes me so happy!

name: RoyAlenSupportC
_source: speak;Roy;Oh! Alen.|Sorry, I was lost in my thoughts.
speak;Alen;You seem to be thinking a lot these days, Lord Roy.
speak;Roy;I was just thinking about how to move our troops.
speak;Roy;The enemy grows stronger all the time so strategies quickly become obsolete.|I was wondering how to effectively break through their defensive lines.
speak;Alen;That's easy, Lord Roy! Just allow me to charge in.|I will shatter their shields and pierce their armor!
speak;Roy;Thanks for the offer, but I don't want to put you in danger.|There must be another way... I'll think on it some more.

name: RoyAlenSupportB
_source: speak;Alen;Lord Roy, I have an idea of how to break through the enemy's defenses...

speak;Alen;We leave our best troops behind, and send the weaker ones to the front lines.|Once the enemies are weakened, the stronger troops will be able to finish them.|Please, allow me to be in the front lines with the other weaker soldiers!
speak;Roy;But then we would risk losing you and everyone you're with...
speak;Alen;We might suffer some casualties, but we will win the battle!
speak;Roy;...Alen, I can't use that idea.
speak;Roy;I can't use a strategy that I know will cause casualties.
speak;Alen;But Lord Roy, casualties are unavoidable in war...
speak;Roy;...I think not.|It may be naive to say so, but a victory with casualties is no victory at all.
speak;Alen;You want a complete victory... Is that possible in war?
speak;Roy;I think it is. We need another plan.

name: RoyAlenSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;Yes, I haven't thought of a good strategy yet...|But yours is out of the question, understand?
speak;Alen;Yes, Lord Roy.|But if there's anything I can do, please don't hesitate to ask.
speak;Alen;...To be honest, I'm not sure I agree that a complete victory is possible.|But if that's what you believe, then I will support you any way I can.
speak;Roy;Thank you, Alen.|I will prove to you that we can win without casualties.
speak;Alen;I look forward to the day of our glorious victory!

name: RoyLanceSupportC
_source: speak;Lance;I lost sight of you for a moment so I assumed the worst...
speak;Roy;Oh. Is that all? Don't worry so much.
speak;Lance;No, Lord Roy. You lead this army.|You must always be on your guard.
speak;Roy;Yes, you're right. I'll be more careful.

name: RoyLanceSupportB
_source: speak;Lance;Lord Roy, if I may offer a suggestion.
speak;Lance;I think you should stay behind the front lines.
speak;Lance;I know what you're thinking, but please understand.|As our leader, you are crucial to the army.|If an army's leader is lost, then so is the battle.
speak;Lance;Then please, milord, allow me to escort you this way...
speak;Roy;Wait.|I have no right to order others if I prioritize my safety above all else.
speak;Roy;I'm not exactly a genius, and I'm not especially charismatic, either.|I have to gain everyone's trust by experiencing the same hardships.
speak;Roy;I don't have that special something that makes someone a leader.|That's why I need to fight up front along with everyone else.

name: RoyLanceSupportA
_source: speak;Roy;Lance, I've been thinking about what you said, but I still think that I should stay up front.|I know you only think of keeping me safe, but...
speak;Lance;No, I may have been too forceful with my opinion.|Do what you believe to be correct.
speak;Roy;Thank you.|It puts my mind at ease to hear you say that.
speak;Lance;I still believe you were wrong about one thing, however.
speak;Lance;You said that you're not a genius and that you lack charisma.
speak;Lance;Your intelligence and charisma are exactly why people follow you.|None would give their life for someone who lacks those traits.
speak;Lance;Of course.|If you will allow me one piece of advice,|no matter what happens, stay true to your heart.|As long as you do that, your troops will follow you.
speak;Roy;I'll do my best. Thank you, Lance.

name: LilinaGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Lilina;Oh... What a pretty white flower. Thank you, Gonzalez.
speak;Gonzalez;I not smart... I not know many words...
speak;Lilina;Oh... I said "Thank you."|It's an expression of gratitude.
speak;Lilina;Um...|When someone does something for you and you feel happy, you say, "Thank you."

name: LilinaGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;No, Gonzalez, it's not for greetings.
speak;Gonzalez;This, I give you.|You pretty. Flower pretty.|Look good together...
speak;Lilina;This really is a beautiful flower...|They grow by Roy's home, too.
speak;Lilina;Roy is the leader of this army.|He's not very strong, but... he's very kind.
speak;Lilina;Hm...?|Yes... Yes, I like him very much.

name: LilinaGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Lilina;Wait! Gonzalez!|What's wrong?|Why have you been avoiding me?
speak;Gonzalez;Only hurt me if I talk to you...|I know...I ugly, you pretty...|We different.|But...I never forget. I human because of you...|I never forget.|...Thank you...
speak;Lilina;"Thank you"...is something you say when you're happy.|You don't use it when... you leave someone.
speak;Lilina;You're crying too... Why are you crying?
speak;Lilina;Don't tell me to go away... Please...|Stay with me...

name: LilinaMarcusSupportC
_source: speak;Lilina;Things grow more perilous all the time...|Marcus, do you think Roy will be OK?
speak;Marcus;Of course, milady.|Lord Roy takes after his father, the greatest knight in Lycia.
speak;Lilina;Yes... Lord Eliwood is a great knight indeed.
speak;Marcus;His wife was also a kind, gentle woman.|Much like yourself, if I may say so.
speak;Lilina;Wow... Do you really think so?
speak;Marcus;Lord Roy is becoming very much like his father.|I expect him to seek a wife much like Lord Eliwood's.
speak;Marcus;Milady, if you would allow me a suggestion.|When all is done and we return to Lycia, you and Lord Roy should w--
speak;Lilina;Marcus!|Roy and I are friends. Just friends!|It's too soon to think of marriage!

name: LilinaMarcusSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;Marcus, what kind of couple were Lord Eliwood and his wife?
speak;Marcus;Well, milady, just looking at them would fill one with cheer.|The people of Pherae were truly happy for them.

speak;Marcus;Lord Eliwood loved his wife deeply.|One night...before the two were wed, Lord Eliwood disappeared.|He returned three days later, and presented his wife a flower.|It was a beautiful white flower that grows only in the snowy highlands.|And it was the flower she loved the most.
speak;Lilina;Lord Eliwood sounds so... romantic. Sigh...|And look at Roy...

name: LilinaMarcusSupportA
_source: speak;Lilina;Marcus...|What does...what does Roy think of me?|I...I'm not so sure anymore.
speak;Marcus;Why not ask him yourself, milady?
speak;Marcus;I do not know much of these matters, but the maids in the castle say that women can no longer be passive.|I'm certain Lord Roy would fall for you if you were to advance.
speak;Lilina;......|Yes... That's what I'll do.|I've known him longer than anyone.|I won't let someone else snatch him up!

name: LilinaAstolfoSupportC
_source: speak;Astolfo;Well, if it isn't Lady Lilina. Your beauty is a sight to behold.|In fact, I think it's rubbing off on me. My wrinkles are fading. See?
speak;Lilina;Astolfo... You haven't changed at all.|My father always said you'd be better at your job if you were more serious.
speak;Astolfo;You'll hear no arguments from me, milady.
speak;Lilina;...By the way, how did you meet my father?|He never told me anything...
speak;Astolfo;It really wasn't a meeting you'd go around telling people about.
speak;Astolfo;...I was a petty thief back then.|I decided to creep into Castle Ostia to swipe some treasure, see.
speak;Astolfo;Well...|...Whoops, we really shouldn't be wasting time like this.|Forgive me, milady, but I'll tell you the story some other time.
speak;Lilina;Oh? I guess I can wait...

name: LilinaAstolfoSupportB
_source: speak;Astolfo;...It was easy getting to the treasure vault.|I'm an expert at picking locks and all that, after all.|Once I'd grabbed all the goodies and made my way out, bam!|There was a man, standing right in front of me.|And wouldn't you know, that man was--

speak;Astolfo;You got it. Lord Hector just stood there, staring at me.|He didn't seem angry or anything.|You could tell he was important just by looking at him.|Me? I was frozen on the spot, with bags of loot over my shoulders.|Would he call the guards?|Would he cut me down right then and there?|My mind was racing, trying to figure out what was coming up...

speak;Astolfo;He suddenly burst out laughing, milady.|"Quite a man to get through my security so easily," he said.|Then he asked my name. I was speechless, mouth open.|Lord Hector then offered me the job of serving him.
speak;Astolfo;I thought he was out of his mind. But I could tell he was serious.|Anyway, I wasn't up for it and ran for the door with the treasure.|And then...
speak;Astolfo;He...|Whoops, sorry, milady,|I should really get going. I'll finish the story later.

name: LilinaAstolfoSupportA
_source: speak;Astolfo;Lord Hector...|He didn't budge even when he saw me start to run.|So I made a mad dash.|I was almost at the door, but Lord Hector was still just standing there.|I was confused, so I turned and yelled at him,|"I'm getting away with your treasure! You're not going to do anything?!"|A heavy voice responded. "Flee if you wish. You have earned the treasure.|But is that what you want in life? To live in fear in the shadows?"|I ran like a madman, milady. I fled from the castle, from his booming voice.|I didn't know what to do with myself, so I wandered around aimlessly all night.|At the break of dawn...I found myself back at the front of the castle.|And Lord Hector was there waiting for me.
speak;Astolfo;I worked for him ever since, milady.|He changed my life.
speak;Astolfo;Lady Lilina, I will never be ashamed to say this.|Your father...was the most honorable man I've met.

name: LilinaGarretSupportC
_source: speak;Garret;You.|I'm gonna be frank. I don't wanna be your friend.|...Wait.
speak;Garret;You had an expensive-lookin' bracelet on your wrist before.|Where'd it go?
speak;Garret;Well, you hafta when you're a raider like me.|Didja take it off or somethin'?
speak;Lilina;I met an old blind man on the way here.|He said that he was starving, so I gave it to him...
speak;Garret;Oh, brother! You nobles are so gullible!|He obviously tricked you.|He made you pity him so you'd give him money.
speak;Lilina;But...what if he was telling the truth...?
speak;Garret;Listen kid, there's no way he was tellin' the truth.|He was laughin' at ya as soon as ya walked away.|You're soft. You don't know the real world.
speak;Garret;Er... It was your bracelet, though, so whatever...|Do what ya want with your own things...

name: LilinaGarretSupportB
_source: speak;Garret;You again?|I told you before, I ain't your friend.|There's no tellin' what'll happen to you if you stick around me.
speak;Lilina;I'll be fine. You're a good person.
speak;Garret;Ha! Wouldja listen to that!|You think you can tell good from bad?|After you were tricked so easily the other day?
speak;Garret;I'm here for the money.|If I don't get paid, I'll just go back to bein' a bandit.
speak;Lilina;...Why don't you just rob me right now, then?
speak;Lilina;I have magic tomes, jewelry... A lot of expensive items.|You can sell it for money. Nobody would see you...|Why don't you just take all my belongings and run off?
speak;Garret;...Why are you even talkin' to me if you know I can do that?|What if I really did it?
speak;Lilina;Then...I suppose I'm a fool. But I don't think you would.|I can sense that you're not a bad person.|I...trust you.
speak;Garret;...Arrgh!|How could I rob her when she looks at me like that...?

name: LilinaGarretSupportA
_source: speak;Garret;You said you gave your bracelet to some blind guy, right?|What would you do if you met him again?
speak;Garret;What's the point in even askin'? I already know what'd happen.|You'd get tricked just like before. You'd give him anything he wanted.
speak;Garret;Why do you care so much for total strangers?|What do you get from helpin' 'em?|Just ignore 'em. Who cares?
speak;Lilina;...When I see people in need, I feel I need to help them.|If I met that blind man again,|I'd probably give him something...just like before.
speak;Garret;......|...Oh well. I guess some people are just born stupid.|Oh yeah... Take this.
speak;Lilina;What is this for?|Such a beautiful bracelet...
speak;Garret;I dunno.|Some old guy came up to me the other day and said he'd met you.|He asked me to give it to you.|He said that he was really grateful for everything.
speak;Lilina;But...I met that old man way back in--
speak;Garret;N-not like I'd know!|Anyway, he wanted me to give it to you. Just take it.

name: LilinaOgierSupportC
_source: speak;Lilina;Oh, don't worry...|I just wanted to talk to someone from Ostia.
speak;Lilina;So talk to me. Let's see...|Tell me about your hometown.
speak;Ogier;My hometown?|Well...it was a pretty ordinary village.|We were poor...|The reason I came all the way to the city in the first place was to make money to feed my younger brothers...
speak;Lilina;You have brothers? How nice.|Do you have any sisters?
speak;Ogier;...I have one younger sister, too.
speak;Lilina;Really? What's she like?|Is she cute? Is she like you?
speak;Ogier;The...the last time I saw her was so long ago, so I don't really remember.|But I remember holding her hand.|Her hand... It was so small and delicate.
speak;Lilina;That's so sweet...|I've always wanted a younger sister.

name: LilinaOgierSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;Ogier, how is your sister doing?
speak;Lilina;Is she back in your village?|Or did she come to Ostia with you?|If she did, I'd like to...
speak;Lilina;Tell me, I'd love to meet her.

speak;Ogier;Lady Lilina...|Our village is very poor. ...The men work.|And girls...have no place.|We have so little food to spare...|When a girl is born in our village,|she's given pretty clothes and left in a faraway city.
speak;Ogier;...We couldn't afford her.|I don't hold it against my parents.|If they hadn't done it...we would have starved.
speak;Lilina;I'm sorry... I...didn't know anything...|I didn't know anything...but I...I was so...

name: LilinaOgierSupportA
_source: speak;Ogier;Lady Lilina, about before... I'm sorry.|I said more than I should have.
speak;Lilina;I'm sorry. I had no idea. But I can't remain ignorant as I am.|I may not know how to govern yet, but I'll learn.|I will make Ostia a land where our children can live in happiness.
speak;Ogier;...Lady Lilina, some things are impossible.|Marquess Ostia served us well. My brothers are all fine.|Not even the gods can save everyone.
speak;Ogier;But I can say this, Lady Lilina...|My sister, wherever she is...|I'm sure she would have liked you very much.

name: TreckGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Treck;I'm Treck... Nice to meet you.
speak;Treck;Ha ha, you don't need to say it so many times.
speak;Gonzalez;Quiet. I forget.|...Cret, Cret, Cret...|Ok, I remember.
speak;Treck;Ha ha, you're an odd one. Say, do you think you--|Sorry, what was your name again?

name: TreckGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Gonzalez;Who you? I see you before.
speak;Treck;Really? I must be famous.|My name is Treck.
speak;Treck;Yep... So hey, what's your name?
speak;Treck;Yeah, it has kind of a calm air to it...
speak;Treck;Hm? ...Hmm...|You know, I don't really know either.|But hey, don't worry about it.|It doesn't matter much in the grand scheme.

name: TreckGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Treck;It's so peaceful here...|I think we could make a good team, you and me.|Uh, but what's your...?
speak;Treck;Gonzalez? That's a nice name...|Oh yeah, my name is...
speak;Treck;Hm? Am I?|Oh yeah, you're right. Rec. That sounds like my name.|Well, whatever. Let's go.

name: LilinaGwendolynSupportC
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;Lady Lilina... Please stay close to me.|I shall protect you with my life.
speak;Lilina;Th-thank you...|That armor... It's quite a feat that you can wear it.|Isn't it heavy for someone of your build?
speak;Gwendolyn;No, milady.|The weight of a knight's armor is the symbol of their loyalty.
speak;Lilina;All right... Just don't strain yourself.
speak;Lilina;Why did you become a knight? Did you want to be like Bors?
speak;Gwendolyn;Yes... I want to be just like my brother.|I wish to protect you as he does.

name: LilinaGwendolynSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;Let's chat a bit. Tell me about yourself.
speak;Gwendolyn;Yes, milady.|I am a knight of Ostia and I serve--
speak;Lilina;No, I know that... I meant more interesting things.|For example, are there any men you fancy?
speak;Gwendolyn;I've always been focused on becoming strong like my brother, so...|I've never really thought about things like that...
speak;Lilina;Really...?|Let's talk about something else then.|We're in this together and we grew up in the same land.|Plus, we're both girls.|I want to get to know you better.

name: LilinaGwendolynSupportA
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;Lady Lilina, you are an odd individual.
speak;Gwendolyn;You are in a much higher position than I...|Yet you still chat lightly to me with a smile on your face.|It seems...odd.
speak;Lilina;Do you think so? I just want to be friends with you.
speak;Gwendolyn;F-friends?|I don't think that would be appropriate, milady...|You are my mistress!
speak;Lilina;That doesn't matter.|You're the only girl around my age from Ostia.|Let's not worry about positions like mistress or vassal...
speak;Gwendolyn;Lady Lilina!|You carry Ostia's future on your shoulders.|You are different from us.|You do understand that, don't you?
speak;Gwendolyn;I'm sorry, though I am very grateful for your consideration.|Perhaps we cannot be friends,|but I would enjoy chatting with you once in a while as before.

name: LilinaBorsSupportC
_source: speak;Bors;Lady Lilina...|Has something been bothering you lately?
speak;Bors;Are you sure...?|I was given special orders by Lord Hector to protect you at all costs.
speak;Bors;So if something has happened, you should tell me so I can protect you adequately...
speak;Bors;B-but normally, milady, you aren't quite this...touchy...
speak;Lilina;Someplace where I don't have to listen to you

name: LilinaBorsSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;You were just concerned for me, and I blew up at you...|I'm sorry.
speak;Lilina;...Will you hear why I'm so irritable?|I think I need someone to talk to...
speak;Bors;If I may, then of course.
speak;Lilina;It's about Roy... What do you think about him?
speak;Bors;I think he has grown splendidly into a wise and caring leader to us all.
speak;Lilina;But the Roy I know had mismatched buttons on his suit, and he couldn't do even one step of a dance...|I always thought I had to take care of him.
speak;Lilina;But Roy's suddenly changed. He's gotten so...grown up, you know?|He seems so far away now...
speak;Bors;...Milady, Lord Roy has not changed as much as you think.
speak;Bors;He has certainly matured, but his nature is still the same.|Lord Roy is still the same person you know him to be within.
speak;Lilina;Yes, you're right...|Thank you for lending me your ear, Bors.

name: LilinaBorsSupportA
_source: speak;Bors;You look much better today, milady.
speak;Lilina;Yes, I feel much better, too.
speak;Lilina;It's not as if Roy was avoiding me or anything...|It's just that he seemed to be changing, and I felt I was left behind.
speak;Lilina;I jumped to conclusions and fretted over nothing...|Once I realized that, it suddenly seemed so silly.|I'm still a child, aren't I?
speak;Lilina;Bors, will you stay by my side?
speak;Bors;...I am a knight, and my loyalty lies with you.|I shall always be at your side, ready to serve.

name: LilinaBartheSupportC
_source: speak;Lilina;Barthe, I haven't thanked you yet, have I?
speak;Barthe;Oh, that.|Such is my duty as a knight, milady.|If anything, I should apologize that we didn't arrive sooner.
speak;Lilina;Barthe... I'm sorry.|I can never repay you for that...|Oh, I know. Here, take this necklace.
speak;Barthe;Lady Lilina, please.|We do not fight for reward.
speak;Barthe;You are safe.|That in itself is reward enough.

name: LilinaBartheSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;Barthe.|Do you know what Debias and Leygance did?

speak;Barthe;All I know is that they made contact with Bern to start the rebellion.|However, I have heard many other troubling rumors about them as well.|I hear they used their positions to illegally seize money.
speak;Barthe;The rebellion was in planning before Bern even invaded.|Astolfo found proof of that.
speak;Lilina;Yes...I was foolish.|They served my father so...I didn't want to suspect them.|I wanted to trust them simply because they were our vassals.
speak;Barthe;But that trust is what put you in danger...
speak;Lilina;Yes, exactly... I'm truly sorry, Barthe...
speak;Barthe;Lady Lilina, your safety is the most important thing of all.|Without a master to whom we can pledge our loyalty, we surely cannot be called knights at all.

name: LilinaBartheSupportA
_source: speak;Lilina;Barthe...|What do you think will happen to Ostia without my father?
speak;Barthe;Someone needs to rebuild it after the war is over, or it will fall into chaos.|That someone is you, Lady Lilina.
speak;Lilina;But...I'm not sure I'm qualified.|I'll only get in the way and keep everyone from doing their jobs...|You...must think so, too.

speak;Barthe;......|I know not how those in power should act, but...|When you told me you wanted to trust your vassals, I do not think you were mistaken.|Indeed, you should have been able to trust them above all others.
speak;Barthe;No matter the path you follow, no matter how you doubt yourself,|we true knights will always swear our undying loyalty to you.

name: LilinaCeciliaSupportC
_source: speak;Lilina;Yes, I've gotten much better since you taught me the basics.
speak;Cecilia;Good. You have a special gift for magic, Lilina.|With enough practice, you could be unrivaled.
speak;Cecilia;Yes. Just make sure you keep up with your training.

name: LilinaCeciliaSupportB
_source: speak;Lilina;General Cecilia, why didn't you teach magic to Roy?
speak;Lilina;When Roy was studying in Ostia, you wouldn't teach him magic, no matter how much he asked.
speak;Lilina;Why not? You taught me so much.
speak;Cecilia;That's right.|Roy... You know how he is.|If I'd taught him magic, he would have practiced and practiced.
speak;Lilina;Yes, that sounds like him. But...

speak;Cecilia;You see, practice isn't enough to master a school of magic.|You need talent, and that can't be obtained through practice.|With another person of such talent so close to him, what would he think?|He'd work as hard--maybe even harder than her, but he would still lag far behind.|What would that do to his confidence?
speak;Lilina;That person of talent... Do you mean me?
speak;Cecilia;Everyone has things they excel at naturally.|It was clear that Roy wouldn't excel at magic, so I decided he would be better off learning the sword instead.

speak;Cecilia;Lilina, you will lead Ostia someday. You should remember this...|Assigning someone a task they do not excel at is a waste of ability.|You must never think that everyone works in the same way.

name: LilinaCeciliaSupportA
_source: speak;Lilina;General Cecilia, don't you think Roy has changed recently?
speak;Lilina;He's gotten cool-headed...|Or rather, he's more confident when he gives commands to the army.
speak;Cecilia;Anyone in charge of an army gains traits like that.|If Roy didn't grow, the army would be doomed.
speak;Lilina;General Cecilia, you said before that I would lead Ostia.
speak;Cecilia;Yes, you are Lord Hector's only heir after all.
speak;Roy;Do you think I could be like Roy? I mean...|I couldn't even recognize traitors in my own castle...
speak;Cecilia;People grow according to their potential.|Even I didn't know what to do at first when I was made Mage General.|I was taken from Ostia and brought to Aquileia. It was overwhelming.
speak;Lilina;But you succeeded because of your talent...
speak;Cecilia;That's not what I'm getting at.|I've only made it so far thanks to Perceval and General Douglas.|Don't think that you'll have to do everything on your own.
speak;Cecilia;Even Roy isn't fighting alone.|He puts his faith in everyone around him.|That is another important attribute for someone in power.|The ability to depend on others when you need them.
speak;Lilina;Can I depend on you, too?
speak;Cecilia;Of course.|I'll be glad to offer you any help when you need it.

name: CathConversation1
_source: speak;Cath;Hey, cut it out!|Let go of my arm!|Ow! That hurts!
speak;Roy;Oh, I'm sorry.|But what are you doing here?
speak;Cath;Well, uh, you know, this and that.|I'm a busy girl. Ha ha ha...
speak;Cath;Oh yes, precisely BECAUSE this is a battlefield--|Whoops, better watch my tongue...
speak;Roy;Do you have some ulterior motive?
speak;Roy;Wait, is that why you told us the escape route?
speak;Cath;Um, what?|Sorry, I'm a little deaf in this ear!
speak;Cath;Don't worry about it! Forget you saw me.|Gotta go. Cheers!

name: CathConversation2
_source: speak;Cath;Ugh, you again... Er, fancy meeting you here!|Ha ha ha...
speak;Roy;...You're a thief.|You shouldn't steal. It's not right.
speak;Cath;Nah, it's fine. I only take from the rich.|No one's going to starve or anything.
speak;Roy;That doesn't make it any better.
speak;Cath;Oh really? Then let me offer you this.|You nobles take food and money from people living in what you call your land.|How is tax collection any different than tribute to a bandit?
speak;Roy;We protect the people in return!
speak;Cath;You do not!|You kill them in wars like this!
speak;Roy;We didn't start this war.|Bern invaded, so we have to defend the people...
speak;Cath;You can't just do anything you want and say you're defending us!|How does burning down villages help us anyway?!
speak;Roy;Burning down villages?! We never--!|Wait a minute, was your...?
speak;Cath;...My village was burned to the ground by our marquess.|He said that he had to do it to prepare for Bern's attack.

speak;Cath;We always had barely enough to get by, and then we lost everything...|Our homes... Our crops...|And here you come, saying it's wrong to steal?|Ha! Look who's talking!|The nobility steals from the poor so you can live in luxury at our expense!
speak;Roy;I... I don't know what to say.
speak;Cath;Sigh. Don't get gloomy.|I really don't like talking about how pitiful we are anyway.|But you started it.
speak;Cath;Ah, to heck with this.|It's no fun stealing after a conversation like that.|I'm outta here. Ta-ta!

name: CathConversation3
_source: speak;Cath;Hm? ...You again?|You always come and mess up my plans.|Do you have it out for me or something?
speak;Roy;The last time we met, I waspretty callous.|I said you shouldn't steal, but I didn't even realize what you'd been through...
speak;Cath;Oh, that? Whatever. I don't care.
speak;Roy;But I still think what you do is wrong.
speak;Cath;You've got some nerve, you know that?
speak;Roy;Once this war is over, I promise to help rebuild your village.|I'll be sure the taxes are put to good use too.|Just please, stop looting.
speak;Roy;Whenever this war ends, I can't say when...
speak;Cath;And you expect me to wait patiently until then?
speak;Roy;No. All I want is your faith.
speak;Cath;...Why are you so kind to me?|I'm just a thief.
speak;Roy;Without you, we wouldn't have escaped Wagner's trap.|Maybe you didn't care about helping us, but the fact is that you did.|You saved our lives. You're more than just a thief.
speak;Cath;If things keep going like they have...|I guess you'll get in my way no matter where I go.
speak;Roy;As long as you appear in our path.
speak;Cath;Fine, you win. I'll stop looting the battlefields.
speak;Cath;Actions speak louder than words.|Prove to me that you'll be true to your promise.

name: HeavenlyArrows
_source: #If 1, then the region is activated, play anim and check for units
#if True, then get units and deal damage to them

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Steel Sword,Silver Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Blade,Iron Lance,Steel Lance,Silver Lance,Heavy Spear,Iron Axe,Steel Axe,Silver Axe,Hammer,Iron Bow,Steel Bow,Silver Bow;armory

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Slim Sword,Iron Sword,Killing Edge,Iron Blade,Slim Lance,Iron Lance,Killer Lance,Javelin,Hatchet,Iron Axe,Killer Axe,Hand Axe,Short Bow,Iron Bow,Killer Bow

name: MarcusWoltSupportC
_source: speak;Marcus;Ah, Wolt. What is the matter?
speak;Wolt;I have something to ask of you.
speak;Wolt;Please, could you...teach me how to use a sword?
speak;Wolt;I can only use bows.|An archer can't even defend himself at close range.|I won't be able to protect Lord Roy if something happens...
speak;Marcus;Do not belittle the bow. It has many traits that close range weapons do not.
speak;Marcus;Besides, what is the point in learning swordplay at your late age?|A mediocre skill would be nothing but a hindrance to Lord Roy.
speak;Marcus;Do not worry yourself about it any further.|You are a great help to Lord Roy as you are.

name: MarcusWoltSupportB
_source: speak;Marcus;Wolt...|I can tell by your face that you still want me to teach you swordplay.
speak;Wolt;I just don't understand.|Am I really that much help to Lord Roy?
speak;Marcus;Wolt...|Tell me what you think of the knights like me who served Lord Eliwood.
speak;Wolt;Uh...well...|You're all really strong and I look up to you.
speak;Marcus;Well, thank you for that.|But there was one problem with Lord Eliwood's knights.
speak;Marcus;None of us are even close to him in age.
speak;Marcus;Lord Eliwood's vassals...|They were all old like me or too young for him to relate to.|He couldn't speak to us on a comfortable level.|In a way, he was isolated.
speak;Wolt;I never even thought about that...

speak;Marcus;I don't want Lord Roy to suffer the same fate.|You and Lord Roy are the same age, and what's more, you were raised together.|I need you to stay by Lord Roy's side and give him moral support.
speak;Marcus;Combat prowess is important, but that is not all you can do.|Think on what I've said. You are more important than you realize.

name: MarcusWoltSupportA
_source: speak;Marcus;Ah, Wolt. You look better.|Do you still want me to teach you how to wield a sword?
speak;Wolt;No. After hearing your words, I lost any sense of hesitation.|I will perfect my skills with the bow and ensure Lord Roy can count on me!
speak;Marcus;Very good.|Then it appears I can let you take over for me.
speak;Wolt;What? B-but if you leave now...
speak;Marcus;No, no, I won't retire right at this moment.|Still, the day isn't far off.|Once I am gone, you must take care of Lord Roy.
speak;Marcus;Are you embarrassed to take over for an old man like me?
speak;Wolt;No, not at all...|It's just...do you really think I can do it...?
speak;Marcus;There's your problem. You lack confidence.|Lord Roy won't be able to turn to you if you're like that.
speak;Marcus;You can do it. All you need is confidence!

name: MarcusAlenSupportC
_source: speak;Marcus;You have been performing well, lately.
speak;Marcus;However, you tend to charge headfirst into enemy lines.|Your duty is to protect Lord Roy. You must think more.
speak;Alen;Think more...? What's there to think about?|Defeating the enemy protects Lord Roy!
speak;Marcus;What if an enemy made it past you and Lord Roy was hurt?|You wouldn't be able to make it back to save him.
speak;Marcus;But you cannot deny that it is a possibility.

name: MarcusAlenSupportB
_source: speak;Alen;You told me to take my time in battle.|Does that mean I've been fighting wrong this whole time?
speak;Marcus;Not at all.|But you only know one way of fighting.
speak;Marcus;Your courage is not a bad trait. Indeed, it is praiseworthy.|I'm simply concerned you may leave Lord Roy to fend for himself.
speak;Marcus;A knight must consider each situation and adapt accordingly.|Charging ahead is not always the correct way.

name: MarcusAlenSupportA
_source: speak;Alen;Thanks to you...|I am trying to adapt my fighting style to each situation.
speak;Marcus;Good.|Hmm. You might be ready to take over for me.
speak;Marcus;I have grown old.|I must make way for the new generation.|I trust Lord Roy will be safe in your hands.
speak;Marcus;Are you embarrassed to take the place of an old man?
speak;Alen;Of course not! It would be an honor!|I shall protect Lord Roy with my life and Pherae will prosper--
speak;Marcus;Calm yourself. Your passion is all that worries me.
speak;Marcus;Just try to control your emotions. Lord Roy is still young.|You must grow with him. As a knight, and as a person.

name: MarcusLanceSupportC
_source: speak;Marcus;Lance, have you gotten used to serving House Pherae?
speak;Lance;Yes, Sir Marcus.|Everyone has been very good to me despite the fact that I'm an outsider...
speak;Marcus;I see. That is good to hear.
speak;Lance;You have been very caring as well, Sir Marcus.
speak;Marcus;Of course. I need you especially.
speak;Marcus;You possess experiences the other knights do not.
speak;Marcus;Yes, you do.|Those traits will be of great help to Lord Roy in the future.

name: MarcusLanceSupportB
_source: speak;Lance;You said before that I had experiences that other knights do not.
speak;Lance;I cannot see what those experiences are.|I am but a young knight.|I think you see more in me than there actually is.
speak;Lance;I will use what experience I have, but I don't know that I can help especially.|I served a different lord until just recently, after all...
speak;Marcus;That is the experience the others do not have.
speak;Marcus;Lord Roy will take the throne of Pherae.|If he is surrounded by only those of Pherae, his views will lack scope.|We need someone like you. You know other parts of the world firsthand.
speak;Lance;Will that experience...really be of use?
speak;Marcus;You must make it so.|Lord Roy must grow into an individual with global views.

name: MarcusLanceSupportA
_source: speak;Marcus;Lord Roy said that you told him stories of other lands.
speak;Lance;If my experience can be of use to Lord Roy, then I will do my best to teach him.
speak;Marcus;Very good.|Then it seems that I can retire with no worries.
speak;Lance;Sir Marcus, what are you saying? We still have much to learn from you.
speak;Marcus;Not if we have you.|You can take my place once I am gone.
speak;Lance;Me? But I'm not even a native of Pherae...
speak;Marcus;Are you still worrying yourself over that? Lord Roy certainly isn't...
speak;Lance;...Very well. If you wish it, I shall take your place when the time comes.|But that won't happen for many years.|You are still well. You are an example to us all.
speak;Marcus;Perhaps. But we all must step down eventually.

name: WoltAlenSupportC
_source: speak;Wolt;You're sweating so profusely... Are you all right?
speak;Alen;Don't worry. I'm fine.|I was just doing some practice swings with my sword.|I'm still weak. I must train myself further.
speak;Wolt;But...we're in the middle of a battle.|Shouldn't you be saving your energy for an emergency, Sir Alen?
speak;Alen;...Silence! An enemy!|Let's go, Wolt! Don't lag behind!

name: WoltAlenSupportB
_source: speak;Wolt;M-must you train so hard in battle?|The enemy won't have much left to fight if you're like that!
speak;Alen;Maybe I'm crazy...but yes, I have to do it.|The continent feels bigger and bigger the more we fight.
speak;Wolt;Yes. Who knows what we may be up against next?
speak;Alen;We must break through our own limits and become stronger.|We must be able to stand against any so we can protect Lord Roy.
speak;Alen;All right... I've caught my breath.|Let's go!
speak;Wolt;He's amazing...|But I can't let him get ahead of me!

name: WoltAlenSupportA
_source: speak;Wolt;Yes, well, after seeing you, I couldn't just sit around doing nothing.|I have to become strong to protect Lord Roy as well.
speak;Alen;There you go. That's the spirit!|Become strong, and surprise even Lord Roy!

name: WoltLanceSupportC
_source: speak;Lance;Ah, Wolt.|Sorry, I was thinking some things over.
speak;Lance;No, I understand now. Everything is fine.
speak;Wolt;Yes, I want to watch you fight.|Teach me to fight like you, so I can protect Lord Roy!

name: WoltLanceSupportB
_source: speak;Wolt;Sir Lance? What are you doing?
speak;Lance;Ah, Wolt.|I am keeping a record of this battle.
speak;Lance;Oh, yes. There is a quote from one of my favorite books.|"Information is the most powerful weapon in any battle."|And so, I keep track of our allies and enemies and what goes on where.
speak;Lance;In the battles ahead, one mistake could lead to our doom.|I must pay heed to every aspect of battle for Lord Roy.
speak;Lance;...It's time. I must be off.
speak;Wolt;Amazing... I should do like him!

name: WoltLanceSupportA
_source: speak;Lance;Wolt... Are you all right?|Your eyes look rather red...
speak;Wolt;Yes! I'm fine.|I was just reading the book on tactics that you lent me.
speak;Lance;That's good. Were you up reading it all night?
speak;Lance;All right. You might be interested in another I have by the same author.|He describes his ideas in extreme detail over 24 volumes.
speak;Lance;After studying it, you should master the basics fairly easily.|After that, we can go into more advanced details...|Wolt? Are you listening?
speak;Wolt;......|Y...yes! Of course!|I'll do my best...

name: WoltSueSupportC
_source: speak;Wolt;All right, where's the next enemy?
speak;Wolt;Hm? Do you need something, Sue?
speak;Sue;Why don't you ride a horse?
speak;Wolt;I've always fought like this. On my feet.
speak;Sue;Isn't it hard to fight on the ground?
speak;Wolt;No, not really.|I mean, I think it would be harder trying to shoot from horseback.
speak;Wolt;Uh, Sue?|...What was that all about?

name: WoltSueSupportB
_source: speak;Sue;I think it's better to fight on horseback.
speak;Sue;Yes.|With a horse, it's easier to approach and retreat from your target.
speak;Wolt;Well, to each their own...|Wait, did you try getting off your horse and shooting from the ground?
speak;Sue;Yes. I wanted to try it.
speak;Wolt;You could have hurt yourself!|You can't try new ways of fighting like that during a battle!
speak;Sue;No, it wasn't in battle.|I just shot at some trees near the camp.
speak;Sue;Thank you for being so concerned about me.

name: WoltSueSupportA
_source: speak;Sue;Wolt?|What's the matter? You're out of breath.
speak;Wolt;...It sure is tough trying to keep up with a horse...|I mean, I remember you said it was easier to approach your target.|So...
speak;Wolt;I thought I may as well.
speak;Wolt;Well, a horse's speed is unbeatable.|But still, I'm more stable on foot...
speak;Sue;You said it was dangerous to try new ways of fighting in battle.
speak;Wolt;...Oh, I did, didn't I?|I only tried it for a bit. It's okay.
speak;Sue;If you want the advantage of a horse's speed, you can ride behind me.
speak;Sue;I don't think you'll be able to shoot very well, though...
speak;Wolt;Shoot? I don't think I'd be able to stay on, let alone shoot!|I think I'll stay on the ground. It feels more natural to me.
speak;Sue;Ha ha ha. That is probably for the best.

name: AlenLanceSupportC
_source: speak;Alen;Lance! How fares your sword today?
speak;Alen;...Cool and calm as always, I see.|I may have lagged behind you the other day, but not in this battle!|Watch and learn from my skill, Lance!
speak;Lance;Of course I'll watch. We can all learn from one another.|Don't expect me to lower myself to your level, though.
speak;Alen;Well, look at you!|I look forward to sparring when the battle's done.|I'll be off then. You'd better hurry along too.

name: AlenLanceSupportB
_source: speak;Lance;Alen, the battles will only get more difficult from here on.
speak;Alen;I know, but a challenge is just what I want.
speak;Lance;I have something to request of you. If we lose.
speak;Lance;Yes.|...If it ever looks like defeat is certain, I want you to take Lord Roy and retreat.|I will act as a decoy for the enemy and buy you time.
speak;Lance;If it has to be one of us, it may as well be me.|I've served House Pherae the shortest, so--
speak;Alen;If you're staying, then so will I.|I won't allow you to run headfirst into certain death alone.
speak;Lance;But you're one of a long line of knights serving House Pherae.|It's better that you take Lord Roy and flee.
speak;Alen;How long you've served means nothing! Let me ask you this.|Do you consider yourself any less loyal than the other knights?
speak;Alen;No answer? Then allow me.|You're just as valuable as any of us!|You've held to your knightly vows admirably!|I've been your partner ever since you came to House Pherae so I know that well!
speak;Alen;Don't throw your life away, Lance. Lord Roy needs you. We all do.

name: AlenLanceSupportA
_source: speak;Alen;You mean about if we lose?|Still intending to sacrifice yourself? Or something even more ludicrous?
speak;Lance;No, you're right. Your words were a slap in the face.|Perhaps I was belittling myself because I've served House Pherae the shortest.
speak;Alen;Your work is second to none.|Well, second to mine, but that's a given.
speak;Lance;Where does your confidence come from? I envy you sometimes.
speak;Alen;I'm confident simply because I know I could never lose to you.
speak;Lance;...I'll make you eat those words after I beat you today.
speak;Alen;Hah, not likely!|See you after the battle!
speak;Alen;Even if we lose, you won't be left behind! Remember that!

name: AlenTheaSupportC
_source: speak;Alen;You...|You must be a pegasus knight from Ilia.|Pleased to meet you. I am Alen, knight of Pherae.
speak;Thea;I'm Thea. But listen, do you always--
speak;Alen;So this is a pegasus? I've never seen one up close.|It's face is so cute.
speak;Thea;Wow, thank you... I mean, let me finish!|Do you always fight like that?
speak;Thea;Don't you think you're too rash?|If you fight that way you can't be sure you'll come out alive.
speak;Alen;I know my fighting style can be dangerous.|But, you see...|Oh, chatting like this will give the enemy an advantage.|I must be alert. Farewell.

name: AlenTheaSupportB
_source: speak;Thea;Please, tell me. Why do you fight like that?|Your lanceplay leaves you open...|Why do you rely on brute strength to attack?|You won't be able to retaliate properly that way.
speak;Alen;You've been watching me, haven't you?
speak;Thea;Huh? N-no... Not you in particular!|It's just that...|I can't ignore you when you fight like that.|That's all. Really.
speak;Thea;Anyway, the point is, you should fight more cautiously.
speak;Alen;I understand your concern. But I can't hold back.
speak;Thea;But if you keep fighting like that, you'll--
speak;Alen;In battle, the first to match blades with the enemy are us. The knights.|The enemy will judge the entire army by looking at how we fight.|That's why I have to show them my full power.

speak;Alen;The slightest recoil will signal to the enemy that we can be defeated.|And what's more, my fellow knights will see and may hesitate...|That's why I charge ahead.|I have to keep pushing forward. For the army. For victory.
speak;Thea;...That makes sense.|...And here I thought you were just a careless idiot...
speak;Alen;Did you say something just now?
speak;Alen;I'm sorry, but I have to fight like this.|Still, I respect your advice.|Tell me more when you have a chance.

name: AlenTheaSupportA
_source: speak;Thea;...You haven't changed your fighting style, I see.
speak;Thea;How long will you continue fighting like that?|I understand why you do...but if you perish, that's the end.
speak;Alen;I know that well.|There is only so much I can do on my own.|But I am a knight, so it is my duty...
speak;Thea;If that's the case...then will you allow me to stay by you?
speak;Thea;If...if I leave you on your own, I worry and...I can't focus!|So I want to support you by staying close.|Or...am I not good enough for you...?
speak;Alen;Of course you are!|You're strong, you can keep up with my horse, and...|With you around, it seems that I always come out unharmed.|I can trust you to guard my back.
speak;Alen;Of course! You're a strong warrior.|I couldn't ask for a better partner.
speak;Thea;I mean...the point is...we'll be together...and, I mean...
speak;Thea;...Never mind. Forget it...|Well, come on, then. Let's go. The battle awaits us.

name: AlenWadeSupportC
_source: speak;Wade;Oh, you're one of our client's knights.|Are you any good?
speak;Alen;Right to the point...|I will say that I consider myself fairly skilled.
speak;Alen;Very well.|But I'm telling you now, I won't go easy on you.
speak;Wade;I'd expect no less.|Just don't start crying if I hurt you.
speak;Wade;W...whoa... You're better than I thought...
speak;Wade;I'll beat you next time. Got that?

name: AlenWadeSupportB
_source: speak;Wade;I've been looking for you.|We didn't finish our match yet.
speak;Wade;No way. I was just getting warmed up. You haven't seen the real me yet.
speak;Alen;No?|You haven't seen what I can do, either!
speak;Alen;Let's call it a tie... Lance and I used to spar like this a lot.|It's great to have a partner to train and grow with.
speak;Wade;I haven't lost yet!|You'll see my true strength next time, you hear?!
speak;Alen;Of course. Any time you're ready!

name: AlenWadeSupportA
_source: speak;Wade;Y...you too!|You become stronger every time we meet.
speak;Alen;I'm nothing. It's just you who's weak.
speak;Wade;Heh, whatever! I'll beat you!|I'll crush all the enemies with my axe...
speak;Alen;What do you think of this war?
speak;Alen;Do you think we can win?
speak;Wade;What? Of course we'll win.|I'm on this side, after all. How could we lose?|We've also got you.|No one stands a chance against the two of us.
speak;Alen;Ha ha... You're right.|We can't lose.|Enough talk! Charge!

name: LanceClarineSupportC
_source: speak;Lance;Ah, you must be Lady Clarine of House Reglay.|I am Lance, knight of Pherae.|We are honored to have someone of your stature among us.|I apologize for any impudence you may have experienced from the men.|The soldiers are simply a bit anxious because of this war.
speak;Clarine;I don't often grant favors like this so easily.|Consider it an honor!
speak;Lance;Yes, I thank you, milady. Now, let me take your hand...
speak;Clarine;My... So civil and gentlemanly!|For a country knight, that is.
speak;Clarine;O-of course, your manners are nothing compared to our knights back home.

name: LanceClarineSupportB
_source: speak;Lance;Lady Clarine. Is there anything I can do for you?
speak;Clarine;As the daughter of House Reglay,|I order you to serve as my bodyguard henceforth.
speak;Clarine;In truth, you are a bit on the feeble side...|But I don't have many knights to choose from, so you will do.|You must stay by my side and defend me at all times.|Understood?
speak;Lance;If Lord Roy orders it, it will be done.
speak;Lance;If I may object, milady, I cannot follow your orders directly.|A knight must serve his lord, and only his lord.|One who fails in that is no longer a knight.
speak;Clarine;I...I knew that!|I was merely testing your knightly integrity!
speak;Clarine;Y-yes, well, you passed my test.|Stand proud, knight!

name: LanceClarineSupportA
_source: speak;Clarine;Even if you are not mine to order... Are we not a lady and knight?
speak;Clarine;In-indeed...|As such, I hereby permit you to kiss my hand.
speak;Clarine;Lance, I don't want you to misunderstand.|The kissing of my hand is a symbol of the difference in our status.|There is no more meaning to it than that!
speak;Clarine;N-no! Nothing!|Back to your duties, knight!

name: LanceLotSupportC
_source: speak;Lance;You are Lot the mercenary. An axe-fighter of great endurance.
speak;Lot;You... You're Lance, knight of Pherae.
speak;Lance;Is something troubling you? You have a worried look about you?
speak;Lot;Oh... I was just thinking about something.|Actually, this is perfect. Let me ask your opinion on something.
speak;Lance;If it is within my meager scope of knowledge.

speak;Lot;All right, so, axes are weak against swords.|That much is common sense.|What I'm wondering is why it's that way to begin with.|I don't understand the physics behind it.|That's what's troubling me.
speak;Lance;I see. I wondered the same thing before.|I found the answer after going through several books on tactics.
speak;Lance;Exactly.|All weapons are designed by humans.|As such, an invincible weapon with no flaws is inconceivable.
speak;Lot;You're saying a weapon will always have weaknesses.

speak;Lance;Right.|Throughout history, many kinds of weapons have been made,|and the vast majority of them have fallen out of use.|Of all of them, the sword, axe and lance remain, creating the weapon triangle.
speak;Lot;But what about weapons like the swordreaver?
speak;Lance;Well, that brings us to a whole new dimension.|What I mean is... ............
speak;Lot;...Ah, I see... Then what about... ............

name: LanceLotSupportB
_source: speak;Lot;...Do you think it was a mistake to move that ballista 6 turns ago?
speak;Lance;Yes, I think so.|Where did you learn how to play?|It's a requirement for knights, so that's how I learned it.
speak;Lot;An old war veteran who lives close to my home taught me.|I could never find anyone to play against in my mercenary groups.|It looks like I'm but a novice next to you, though.
speak;Lance;Well, you can recognize your own mistakes, so you have skill.|I played with Alen the other day, but it was over in 2 turns.

name: LanceLotSupportA
_source: speak;Lot;What do you think of this battle?
speak;Lot;Do you think we stand a chance of winning?
speak;Lance;......|I honestly don't know. We are severely outnumbered.|The enemy can afford to send in new troops all the time,|while we must be careful not to lose even a single soldier.
speak;Lot;Yeah... We're almost on completely different levels.

speak;Lance;But Lord Roy often conceives genius strategies beyond my understanding.|He has commanded us miraculously well thus far.|Under his direction, I feel that we cannot fail.|Lord Roy will surely lead us to a glorious victory.
speak;Lot;I see...|...You're not a yes man, thinking so just because he is your lord.|So if even you believe in him, he deserves my faith...|I'm certain we will succeed.

name: BorsBartheSupportC
_source: speak;Bors;Ah, Barthe. Long time no see.
speak;Barthe;Yes.|You seem to have improved a great deal.
speak;Bors;There were many tough battles in our journey from Lycia to Ostia.
speak;Barthe;Well, it's not as if I was just sitting around in Ostia, either.|I trained at the arena, preparing for battle.
speak;Bors;...I remember that arena.|I have to say, though... I don't really approve of that.|A knight, fighting for money? It's almost a contradiction...
speak;Barthe;No one has need of a weak knight.|I train myself to prevail in battle.
speak;Bors;Heh. You haven't changed at all.

name: BorsBartheSupportB
_source: speak;Bors;Barthe... Were you able to accept it?
speak;Bors;Not going into battle alongside Lord Hector.|You've always said that a knight's purpose is to fight.
speak;Barthe;...I would certainly say I was disappointed at first.|But staying and protecting the castle and Lady Lilina was its own battle.
speak;Barthe;But I allowed Lady Lilina to fall into the hands of the enemy.|That was my failure. I was naive...|Somewhere in my heart, I wanted to believe that Ostia was secure.
speak;Bors;Don't blame yourself... You always do that.
speak;Barthe;That's true. I do...|Whenever I talk to you, I always seem to reveal my true feelings.
speak;Bors;We've been friends ever since we we were knighted.|We couldn't hide something from one another even if we tried.
speak;Barthe;Ha ha ha... You're right about that.

name: BorsBartheSupportA
_source: speak;Barthe;Bors, I always wanted to ask you...
speak;Barthe;Why did you become a knight?
speak;Bors;Because I wanted to protect the ones I love.

speak;Barthe;I became a knight because they are the strongest fighters.|I don't believe any can match a knight in a one-on-one battle.|...That's why I couldn't protect Lady Lilina...|We faced a whole army of armored knights.
speak;Barthe;It only happened because I wasn't strong enough.|If I had enough power to stop the rebellion myself, I could have contained the situation.|I must become stronger still.
speak;Bors;...Then become a lance sharper than any other.|And I shall be your impervious shield.
speak;Bors;An unstoppable lance and an unbreakable shield.
speak;Barthe;That sounds like a plan, friend!

name: BorsGwendolynSupportC
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;It is good to see you well. Do you need something, Brother?
speak;Bors;No...I don't.|I was just walking around and I ran into you. Yes.
speak;Bors;Are you hurt? Your armor isn't too heavy?
speak;Gwendolyn;No, I am fine, brother. I must be off, though...
speak;Bors;Leaving already? You could rest a bit longer...
speak;Gwendolyn;Thank you for your consideration, but this is a battle.

name: BorsGwendolynSupportB
_source: speak;Bors;Oh, Gwendolyn...|Running in to you like this... Pure coincidence, yet again...
speak;Bors;Ah, no, it's nothing.|Why don't we talk a little, though?|You're not hurt? Your armor's not too heavy?
speak;Gwendolyn;No, I'm fine. Thanks for the concern.
speak;Bors;Are you taking care of your lance and helmet.
speak;Bors;Are you eating properly?|Do you have any worries that you want to talk about?
speak;Bors;Have you made any friends?|Any boyfriends I should know about...?

name: BorsGwendolynSupportA
_source: speak;Bors;G-Gwendolyn! We certainly meet a lot...
speak;Gwendolyn;Yes brother, do you need something?
speak;Gwendolyn;I am truly grateful for your concern.|But I am a knight of Ostia.|I'm training myself so I can be like you.
speak;Gwendolyn;If I'm to become strong, I can't depend upon you all the time.|I'm fine, really, so please don't worry...|...I'm grateful to have a brother like you.|But if you'll excuse me.
speak;Bors;......|...Dear me... She's grown so much.|I suppose I was being childish...|Gwendolyn, I wish you luck.

name: BorsAstolfoSupportC
_source: speak;Astolfo;Nah, it's nothing. I just wanted to say hi.|Ha ha ha...
speak;Astolfo;Maybe a little. I was bored so I decided to have a swig.
speak;Bors;Bored? This is the middle of a battle...
speak;Astolfo;Hey, all I can do is open chests and doors anyway...|Not like I can fight or do anything worthwhile.|I'll get out of your hair so you can get back to fighting...

name: BorsAstolfoSupportB
_source: speak;Astolfo;Oh, Bors. Long time no see.
speak;Bors;Astolfo...|I think you should refrain from...imbibing as you do.|The younger recruits are watching, and you're setting a bad example.
speak;Astolfo;I knew there was a traitor to the Lycian League...|If I'd done my job properly, we wouldn't be in this state...|Lord Hector wouldn't have lost...if I'd...

speak;Astolfo;And, you know... The rebellion.|It should have been obvious...|But I couldn't do anything about it...|Heh, I'm just a worthless sack...|You must really hate me...|I'm a joke of a spy...|Ha ha...ha...

name: BorsAstolfoSupportA
_source: speak;Astolfo;Huh...? Oh, Bors.|Come have a drink with me...

speak;Bors;We lost Lord Hector. The responsibility lies in all of us.|But...still...we must not dwell on the past.|We must look forward.|We must do as Lord Hector would have wanted.|We need you, Astolfo.
speak;Astolfo;......|...Why?|Why are you...defending a useless wretch like me...?
speak;Bors;Because you are a knight of Ostia.
speak;Bors;You may not have been knighted...|But you put your life on the line for Lord Hector.|That is more than enough to make you a knight.|At least, I think so.
speak;Bors;Astolfo, let us move forward...and make our master proud.

name: BorsOgierSupportC
_source: speak;Ogier;Sir Bors? You are Sir Bors, aren't you?
speak;Ogier;I'm Ogier of the Ostian knights. I heard about you from Gwendolyn.
speak;Bors;Ah, my sister... So you're our newest recruit?
speak;Ogier;Yes. I'm pleased to meet you.
speak;Bors;I wish I could say the same...but you don't look like a knight.
speak;Ogier;Yes, well, I try to fill in the gaps our squad falls short in.
speak;Bors;Ah, I see. Most admirable.|Not everyone has that ability.

name: BorsOgierSupportB
_source: speak;Ogier;I heard from Sir Barthe that you beat him once in combat.|Is that true?
speak;Bors;Yes, I did.|It was just once, in a great tournament held in Ostia.
speak;Bors;To tell the truth, I actually don't remember it very well.
speak;Ogier;What?|The battle with Sir Barthe was so boring that you forgot about it.

speak;Bors;Oh, no, nothing of that sort.|It was because I don't like to fight for the sake of fighting.|I didn't want to join so I had no interest in the tournament.|I've forgotten most of what happened.
speak;Bors;Ogier, you must always fight for a cause.|You must never fight simply for the sake of fighting.

name: BorsOgierSupportA
_source: speak;Ogier;Sir Bors, you said that one must always have a cause to fight for.
speak;Bors;Indeed I did.|You must be willing to go through any and all hardships for that cause.|Do you have such a purpose?
speak;Ogier;Unfortunately, I don't.|I only became a mercenary to feed my family.|So I don't really have a cause...
speak;Bors;Feeding your family is a noble cause.|Train yourself to become stronger, all for your family.
speak;Bors;A cause isn't limited to defending your country or saving the world.|If you understand that, then you will fight with the best.

name: DieckClarineSupportC
_source: speak;Clarine;Excuse me, would you mind sitting still?|I'm trying to heal your wounds for you...
speak;Dieck;What's a kid like you doing on the battlefield?
speak;Dieck;Are you lost? Where are your parents?
speak;Clarine;!!!|Watch your tongue!|Have you any idea who--
speak;Dieck;Yeah, you're high rank nobility, right?|That's no reason for you to be here, though.
speak;Clarine;!!!|Filthy peasant...! Listen and be dumbstruck!|I am Lady Clarine of House Reglay of Etruria!
speak;Dieck;What? Then you're Lord Pent's daughter...
speak;Dieck;Clarine, was it? Be careful out there.

name: DieckClarineSupportB
_source: speak;Clarine;...I told you to speak! Who are you?|Keeping quiet is of no benefit, but talking will put you in my good graces!
speak;Dieck;Do you ever shut your mouth? Seriously, let me be, kid...
speak;Clarine;You will address me as Lady Clarine!!
speak;Dieck;Whatever. Listen, "Lady" Clarine.|Try doing something other than tailing me everywhere.|You might actually be useful for once in your life.
speak;Dieck;I'm foul, all right. Probably best just to avoid me.
speak;Clarine;...You are manipulating me. I will not be driven away so easily.
speak;Dieck;Yikes, there's nothing attractive about you at all.|You say you're Lady Louise's daughter? I don't believe it.
speak;Clarine;That's it! My family! I want to ask you about my brother!
speak;Dieck;Dang, you saw right past the insult! You're catching on, kid...
speak;Clarine;You will address me as Lady Clarine!!

name: DieckClarineSupportA
_source: speak;Dieck;...All right, you win. I'll tell you.|Just stop following me everywhere I go...
speak;Clarine;Finally, you see reason. Please go ahead. Start at the beginning.
speak;Dieck;It's not really a long story or anything...|I just used to work for your family as an arena combatant.
speak;Dieck;Uh, yeah. You didn't even know my name?
speak;Clarine;Truly?! I always wanted to meet the noble Dieck!
speak;Clarine;Everyone! My father, my mother, my brother himself...|I grew up hearing about the great man named Dieck.
speak;Clarine;I was still in the cradle when you left...|I always regretted not being able to meet you.|But finally, here you are!
speak;Dieck;OK, yeah... So now you've seen me.|Satisfied?
speak;Dieck;Then you'll stop hovering over me wherever I go.
speak;Clarine;Oh, no. I'll follow you to the ends of the continent!
speak;Clarine;You saved my brother's life. I owe you a debt of gratitude.|I want to hear all about my brother.|Oh, you could regale me with tales for hours...
speak;Dieck;...Maybe I could, but I won't.
speak;Clarine;Oh! Wait, Dieck!|Come back! I'll never let you go!

name: DieckKleinSupportC
_source: speak;Dieck;Do you need something, Commander Klein?
speak;Dieck;...How about that. You do remember me.
speak;Klein;Of course! I recognized you at once!|You didn't seem to notice me over there...
speak;Dieck;13 years...|Young master Klein is all grown up, I see.
speak;Klein;You can stop calling me Young Master.|I'm 19 now.|I serve as a commander under the king himself.
speak;Dieck;Yeah, I know. Not bad at all.|How are Lord Pent and Lady Louise?
speak;Klein;Oh, just as laid-back as always.|This calamity doesn't seem to concern them at all.|I envy them sometimes.
speak;Dieck;Well...there's plenty to envy about you, too.

name: DieckKleinSupportB
_source: speak;Dieck;Klein! Don't come out front so much.
speak;Klein;This is a good vantage point.
speak;Dieck;You bowmen should stay in back and cover for us.|There's no need for you to come all the way up here.
speak;Klein;Dieck, I told you, I'm not a child anymore.|I often find myself up front in the squad I lead.
speak;Dieck;Sorry, but you're still Young Master Klein to me.|I couldn't face Lord Pent if you got hurt.
speak;Klein;...If you care so much, why don't you come back to the manse?|Dieck, once this war ends, come back home with me.|I'm certain Father and Mother would love to see you.
speak;Dieck;I appreciate the thought, Klein.|But if you really care about your family,|you shouldn't talk to a mercenary like me. It won't look good.
speak;Dieck;You can only talk to me like this now because this is war.|Think about it.

name: DieckKleinSupportA
_source: speak;Dieck;...Klein, you really shouldn't be talking to me right now.
speak;Klein;...I wanted to tell you a story. I want you to listen.|It was 15 years ago, at Aquileia's greatest arena.|A noble's child was attacked by a lion in the opening display.

speak;Klein;A young arena combatant was the one who saved the child.|He was a skilled swordfighter who could defeat men twice his size with ease.|But fighting a lion isn't the same. He didn't leave the fight unscathed.|He left with wounds all over his body and four deep scars on his face.

speak;Klein;The noble, impressed and moved by the swordsman's selfless act, hired him into his family's service and treated him well.|For several years, the young man served as the family's personal arena fighter.|His name became known all across the land.|But one day, he decided to give up that life and left.|The child, who looked up to the fighter as if he were a brother,|felt betrayed, and was devastated.|...But now I understand.|You were doing what you felt was best for me and my family...

speak;Dieck;You...you were much too kind to me. I was but a lowly fighter.|Lord Pent and Lady Louise treated me like family. Like a son.|Gossip and accusations spread about them.|...That's why I left.
speak;Klein;I understand that now. But you should have stayed.
speak;Klein;You always wanted what was best for us...|But did you ever consider how much we cared about you?|I can't just forget about you...
speak;Dieck;...You're right. I never considered that. I'm sorry.
speak;Klein;Then you'll come with me back to my family?
speak;Dieck;Yeah, you win, Young Master Klein.|I'll poke my head in at the manse when I can.

name: DieckRutgerSupportC
_source: speak;Dieck;...Rutger... Stop trying to kill me from behind!|I'd have a heart attack if I had to deal with you on a daily basis.
speak;Rutger;Ha...|I'll get my sword through your back one day.
speak;Dieck;OK, I get it, we hated each other when we were on different sides.|But why do you want to slice me in half now that we're in the same army?
speak;Rutger;The others bore me.|I need someone of your strength to duel.
speak;Dieck;So you're gonna kill me all because you're bored. Fantastic.
speak;Rutger;As if you've ever let my sword cut you...
speak;Dieck;I can't be on guard all the time! I don't wanna die!
speak;Rutger;Yeah. I'll get you next time.

name: DieckRutgerSupportB
_source: speak;Dieck;Hey! I told you to cut that out!|You don't know when to quit...!
speak;Dieck;Hm...? You seem to be in a bad mood.|Did something happen?
speak;Dieck;Lemme guess...|You spotted a personal enemy in Bern's ranks?
speak;Dieck;Bullseye.|Why are you taking it out on me?
speak;Rutger;...I saw the man who led the attack on my hometown of Bulgar.|But when I reached him... he was already dead.|You defeated him, Dieck.|Those sword marks... It had to be you.
speak;Dieck;...Sorry.|Had I known, I would have left him to you.
speak;Rutger;...This is a battlefield. Enemies don't belong to anybody.
speak;Dieck;Rutger... Seriously, take it easy once in a while.
speak;Dieck;You can't live life on edge all the time...

name: DieckRutgerSupportA
_source: speak;Dieck;Rutger, you all right? You don't look well.
speak;Dieck;Is it about the man who led the Bulgar attack.
speak;Rutger;...No.|Well...maybe.|Even after seeing him dead, the nightmares still persist.|In that attack...they spared me...|The reason was because I... I didn't look Sacaen.
speak;Dieck;Tough to kill someone with the same face.|But you do have Sacaen blood in you, don't you?

speak;Rutger;Yes. My father's mother and my mother's father were Sacaen.|Bulgar is near Bern's border, so many people of mixed blood lived there.|Usually the Sacaen blood shows itself more prominently.|But...|But I was different. I appear to be of Bern, so I was left alive...|The people of Bulgar...were kind to me, even though I looked different...|But they...they were all killed, and so brutally!|I must raze the entirety of the Kingdom of Bern to the ground...!|One man isn't enough to satisfy my revenge...
speak;Dieck;I always wondered if you had some story, but now it all makes sense...|Hope you don't mind me tagging along.
speak;Dieck;Come on. You know how strong I am.|If you really want to take on Bern, what better ally is there than me?|What do you say?
speak;Dieck;And I will. Let's go, partner!

name: DieckWadeSupportC
_source: speak;Dieck;Wade. Let me talk to you for a sec.
speak;Dieck;Pay more attention to what's going on around you.|The way you fight, you're just asking to be killed.
speak;Wade;Aw, c'mon, Big Man, I haven't died yet.|I can crush anything with these massive arms...
speak;Dieck;I've heard those same words from plenty of young hotshots before.|They're all dead now.|You just worry me is all.
speak;Wade;Well, all right...|You're the boss, Big Man.
speak;Dieck;Good.|I'm glad you can take some criticism.

name: DieckWadeSupportB
_source: speak;Wade;Big Man! Did you see me?!|I took down three guys with one swing...
speak;Dieck;Do you even remember what I told you?
speak;Dieck;No!|I told you to pay more attention to your surroundings.
speak;Wade;Fighting like that just doesn't sit well with me.|I'm getting even stronger, too.|I'll crush anyone who dares stand up to me.
speak;Dieck;Wade!|...That kid can't sit still, can he?

name: DieckWadeSupportA
_source: speak;Wade;Sorry. You win.|I almost got myself killed earlier, then I remembered what you told me.|Maybe I was getting carried away...
speak;Wade;Since then, I've been following your advice...
speak;Dieck;I can see that. You're still alive.|If you pay more attention, you won't die like a fool.|With your strength, you can impress people no matter how you fight.
speak;Wade;...Are you OK? You're, like...praising me.|It feels...weird.

name: DieckLotSupportC
_source: speak;Lot;Hey Big Man, what do you think about our employer?
speak;Lot;I like him.|He's an impressive commander for his age.
speak;Dieck;Yeah, he is.|But...he's young. Too young.

speak;Dieck;I understand why you like him.|He's a nice kid, and he's got brains and guts.|But...these battles are all small-time.|When we get to a real battle, and he's in a life or death situation...|That's when we'll see what kind of leader he really is...

name: DieckLotSupportB
_source: speak;Dieck;Years ago...when I first became a mercenary...|All I cared about was making a name for myself...
speak;Lot;Really...? I wouldn't have expected that.

speak;Dieck;Our squad was sent right behind enemy lines.|Our mission was to go deep into Bern and finish the enemy leader.|We waited in a cave for days... and then the time came.|When we moved out...arrows rained down on us...
speak;Dieck;Our employer...|He had put us there so he could buy time for himself and escape.|Our squad was decimated. They killed everyone.|Except for me, of course. They tortured me for information.
speak;Dieck;We mercenaries are expendable in a client's eyes.|That's the norm. You need to understand that.
speak;Dieck;Yeah...he's different. I just wish I'd met him sooner...

name: DieckLotSupportA
_source: speak;Dieck;We're mercenaries.|We shouldn't care who wins. We fight for money and self-preservation.|We're better off walking away from a tough fight than staying.|But...it's different now.|We've been through so many tough battles, and still, here I am.|Roy...makes me feel like I fight for a purpose.|Like I could die for him and have no regrets.
speak;Lot;You took the words right out of my mouth.

name: DieckShannaSupportC
_source: speak;Shanna;Why not?|Back in Ilia, we always call our leader captain.
speak;Shanna;All right, um...|OK, then I'll call you Big Man, like Lot and Ward.
speak;Dieck;Just call me Dieck. Like you always have.
speak;Shanna;No!|I always feel left out when they call you Big Man and I just call you Dieck.
speak;Dieck;Don't be ridiculous. Come on, let's go.

name: DieckShannaSupportB
_source: speak;Dieck;Shanna, I see you fighting on your own a lot.
speak;Shanna;Well, yeah. I'm on a pegasus, as you can plainly see.|I move at a different pace, so it's easier to fight by myself.
speak;Dieck;I want you to slow down to our pace from now on.
