speak;Yoder;Yes, the journey of Saint Elimine was a long one.|The next day when Saint Elimine continued on her travels...

name: DorothyShinSupportC
_source: speak;Dorothy;...Sigh...|Why am I hiding here? I want to talk to him, but...|He's a little...scary.|I want to see if we can show each other any tricks with the bow.|But how can I approach him? Well...maybe some other time...

name: DorothyShinSupportB
_source: speak;Dorothy;Hello, Shin! My name is Dorothy.|...A little too sudden?|Would you like to have an archery duel?|...But I don't want to compete with him.|What a nice bow! Where did you buy it?|...No, that doesn't sound right at all.|Hmm... This is tough.
speak;Dorothy;Oh, I know!|I can bring him some food that he likes...|Wait, but I have no idea what he likes...|I like fruit, but what about him?
speak;Dorothy;Hmm... Well... I need to think some more...

name: DorothyShinSupportA
_source: speak;Dorothy;Hmm...|...But why am I worrying so much over him?|...I can't figure that out, either.|Anyway, I have to figure out a way to talk to him.
speak;Dorothy;What kind food of do like you?|...Shoot...
speak;Shin;You're asking what kind of food I like, right? I like fruit.
speak;Dorothy;Uh...|...Did you hear me talking to myself?
speak;Shin;It was difficult not to with such a loud voice.
speak;Shin;If you wish to talk to me, don't hesitate.

name: SueDayanSupportC
_source: speak;Dayan;For not getting all of our clansmen to safety?
speak;Dayan;There was a traitor among us. There was nothing you could do.
speak;Sue;Perhaps, but I am responsible. I am the granddaughter of the Silver Wolf.|It was my duty to lead our clansmen to safety, no matter the circumstances.|But I...
speak;Dayan;It was I who gave you those orders. It was my responsibility.
speak;Dayan;Did you abandon your fellow clansmen and flee on your own?
speak;Sue;Never!|When the enemy appeared, I rushed at them to make time for our people to escape.|But it was a decoy...|The enemy's main forces were stationed exactly where everyone fled...
speak;Dayan;Then you performed admirably.|I'm sure you won't forget it so easily, but you must accept it.

name: SueDayanSupportB
_source: speak;Dayan;Sue, are you feeling better now?
speak;Dayan;I see it still torments you.|I suppose you wouldn't get over it that easily...
speak;Dayan;...Sue, let's go out for a long ride after this battle.
speak;Sue;A long ride? In a time like this?
speak;Dayan;Yes, absolutely.|You could run to your death with an occupied mind.|Do you understand?
speak;Dayan;You must listen more carefully to the voices of the Sky and the Earth.|We humans are mere ants when compared to their grandeur.|Haven't I always told you this?
speak;Sue;But I am listening to them...!
speak;Dayan;No, you listen only to your own voice.|We ride after this battle.|Understood?

name: SueDayanSupportA
_source: speak;Sue;Yes, and I feel better.|I'll never forget how I failed to rescue our clansmen, but I've decided not to dwell on the past.|I'll look towards the future.
speak;Dayan;It seems that you learned something from our ride.
speak;Sue;I was able to listen to nature's voices again.
speak;Dayan;Good!|I couldn't stand seeing you so distressed.
speak;Dayan;Perhaps the others couldn't see, but I could.|I'm your grandfather. I've known you since the moment you were born.
speak;Dayan;I was only doing my duty...as your grandfather.

name: SueShinSupportC
_source: speak;Shin;Sue, please step back.|It's not wise to linger around the front.
speak;Sue;Shin, this is a battle. I must be up front to fight.
speak;Shin;I will do the fighting. You must remain safe.
speak;Sue;My archery skills are much better than they once were.|I'm sure I can be of help to the army.
speak;Shin;I have orders from the Silver Wolf to keep you safe.|I will not allow you to put yourself in danger.
speak;Sue;...Very well. Then I will do as you say.
speak;Sue;You sound like Grandfather when you argue with me.
speak;Shin;That is the highest praise you could give me, Sue.|I respect the Silver Wolf more than any other man.

name: SueShinSupportB
_source: speak;Shin;Sue, you're still up front, aren't you?
speak;Sue;I understand your concern, but I can't sit around doing nothing, either.|I can't stand watching the others fight while I hide in safety.
speak;Shin;I know that feeling.|But Sue, don't push yourself too far.|You are the clan's last hope.
speak;Sue;That is all the more reason I should be up front and fight.

speak;Shin;That depends on the place and time.|Not everyone will follow somebody just because she fights on the front lines.|Sue, we have a clear goal we must work towards.|We must gather our people and rebuild the Kutolah.|Please do not forget that.
speak;Sue;Don't push yourself too far in an attempt to protect me.|I am not the only one working to reunite the clan.
speak;Shin;Yes, you're right. I shall remember that.
speak;Sue;Thank you. Do you promise not to overstretch yourself?

name: SueShinSupportA
_source: speak;Shin;What is the matter, Sue? You look troubled...
speak;Sue;...Shin, I want you to retreat to the back lines.|I will take over for you.
speak;Shin;What are you saying Sue? It should be you in back!
speak;Sue;No, this is an order. Step back.
speak;Sue;Retreat to the back lines Shin! Will you disobey my order?
speak;Shin;Is something wrong? You're not acting like yourself.

speak;Sue;...Everyone...everyone was killed by Bern's forces...|I failed to track down the traitor and...|they were all killed, right before my eyes...|I was helpless, Shin.|I never want to feel that again. I don't want to lose you!
speak;Sue;You must not die before I do. Understood?
speak;Shin;I was ordered to protect you, Sue. I will not die and leave you.
speak;Shin;I swear to our Father the Sky and our Mother the Earth.

name: SueFaeSupportC
_source: speak;Fae;La la laaa... Oh! It's Sue!
speak;Sue;You look like you're having lots of fun, Fae.
speak;Fae;Yes, I'm having lots and lots of fun!|I can be outside!
speak;Fae;Yeah, because I was never allowed to play outside before.
speak;Sue;Always inside...|She never knew the love of the Sky or the warmth of the Earth...

name: SueFaeSupportB
_source: speak;Fae;Can I ride on your horse sometime?
speak;Sue;My horse?|Of course. You can ride her now if you like...
speak;Fae;No, not now. Roy told me not to bug the others!
speak;Fae;There's a place I want to go on that horse!
speak;Fae;A place with lots of pretty flowers!|Or a place where the sun's shining and it's all nice and warm!

name: SueFaeSupportA
_source: speak;Fae;I want to go to lots of other places, too!|I want to learn more about the outside world.
speak;Sue;Yes...|Once this war is over, let's visit many different places.
speak;Sue;Of course.|There are many places nurtured by the Sky's love and the Earth's warmth.|We should see as many as we can.
speak;Fae;Hmmm...|I don't understand what you're saying.|Your words are too big.
speak;Sue;You'll understand once you get a little older.|I know you will.

name: ZelotTreckSupportC
_source: speak;Treck;Oww!|Wh...what the? Why does my head hurt?
speak;Zelot;Treck, you were sleeping on the job again.
speak;Treck;Yeah, you got me... Sorry, sir. I couldn't help it...|Yawn...
speak;Zelot;You never fail, do you?|You go right to sleep at any chance.|And what's more, you sleep with your eyes open.
speak;Zelot;I've been meaning to say this for a long time. You lack discipline.|I'll be checking on you regularly from now on.

name: ZelotTreckSupportB
_source: speak;Treck;Owww!|Uh... Commander Zelot?|Yawn... Good morning, sir.
speak;Zelot;Trec...|There are rumors about you going around.|They say that the Ilian knight Trec swings his sword in his sleep!
speak;Treck;I have yet to accomplish such a feat, sir.|...But that does sound pretty cool.
speak;Zelot;......|Trec, you've got talent. Why don't you do your job properly?

speak;Zelot;We are members of the proud Ilian mercenary knights.|This is a battle that will determine the fate of the world...|And there's even more.|The reputation of the Ilian mercenary knights will be affected by our actions.|It all depends upon how we fight in this battle.|It could have repercussions on the future of Ilia itself, and thus...

name: ZelotTreckSupportA
_source: speak;Zelot;You are? That's a pleasant surprise.
speak;Treck;Well, I have my moments, sir.
speak;Zelot;That you do.|Trec... You've done well.
speak;Zelot;We couldn't have come this far without you.|We all owe you our lives.|You can sleep as much as you like from now on.
speak;Zelot;How many times must I tell you?|You can't keep doing this...
speak;Treck;...Good morning to you, too, sir.

name: ZelotNoahSupportC
_source: speak;Zelot;Ah, Noah.|This is nothing. We are knights of Ilia.|We have more experience than the knights of any other nation.
speak;Noah;Yes, but I still have a lot to learn.
speak;Zelot;Humble. Good.|...Oh.|Noah, have you written your letter yet?
speak;Zelot;Surely you remember what you were told when you first enlisted.|There are pegasus knight messengers that fly with us.|Should you fall in battle, they will deliver our letters for us.
speak;Zelot;Neither of us will have peaceful deaths.|We need those letters.|Noah, don't you have anyone to send that letter to?
speak;Noah;Actually...not really.|I do recall the others writing letters, though.|They addressed them to their parents...or lovers.
speak;Zelot;You should do the same.|Why don't you get a girlfriend?

name: ZelotNoahSupportB
_source: speak;Zelot;Is this about the letter?|Have you changed your mind?
speak;Noah;Yes, I suppose even I have someone I want to send a letter to when I die.|It's you.
speak;Noah;Trec and I... And Grant and Sieks...|We've all made it this far thanks to you.|I want to express my gratitude to you when I die.
speak;Noah;Speaking of those two... I wonder where they are now.
speak;Zelot;I've no idea.|But I instructed them well. They won't die so easily.
speak;Noah;I've heard that some people we used to work with were hired by Bern...
speak;Zelot;Yes...|But such is the life of a mercenary.|We give our blood and get money in return.
speak;Noah;...Commander Zelot, what do you think of that?
speak;Noah;Nobles from other nations say that Ilia sells death for a living.|They say that we're vultures. That we prey on blood and decaying flesh.
speak;Zelot;It doesn't bother me.|We both know that Ilia couldn't survive without war.|We give our own blood to survive.

name: ZelotNoahSupportA
_source: speak;Zelot;Ah, Noah.|No... Nothing's wrong. Did I seem troubled?
speak;Noah;Not at all.|I just thought that something might have happened.
speak;Zelot;...A letter arrived today. It was your friend's...|Grant's.
speak;Zelot;Would you like to read it?

name: ZelotTheaSupportC
_source: speak;Thea;Commander Zelot, I'm sure you're aware, but my mission is complete.|Regardless, I wish to remain with this army.
speak;Zelot;Very well.|You know, fate works in strange ways.|We were hired by the Lycian Army, and you were hired by Etruria...|I never thought we would be fighting together.
speak;Thea;Yes, it is strange indeed.|Etruria didn't seem to view us highly, but Commander Klein was caring.
speak;Zelot;The important thing is that you're safe...|Juno was pretty worried about you and Shanna, you know.|Knowing you, I knew you'd be all right.|But you know Juno. She's a worrier.
speak;Thea;Yes, I know that all too well.|Juno often spoiled Shanna and me.|The day we left was a hectic one indeed.|Juno fretted over us so much.|Over our meals, and our clothes...

name: ZelotTheaSupportB
_source: speak;Zelot;I was wondering...|Juno's... Your parents... What were they like?
speak;Zelot;No, all I know is that they were soldiers.
speak;Thea;Yes, our mother was a pegasus knight.|Our parents were killed together on the battlefield when we were young.
speak;Thea;We had no other relatives to turn to...|So Juno became our mother when she was still a teenager...

speak;Thea;Ordinary girls her age concern themselves with romance, but Juno took on the role of mother.|She never complained, though...|She always looked after us... with a smile on her face.|That's why...|That's why I always wanted Juno to find happiness.

name: ZelotTheaSupportA
_source: speak;Zelot;...I have to thank you for helping us with the wedding.|You set up the location and made a wonderful feast...|Oh, and Juno was very pleased with the gift from you and Shanna.
speak;Thea;Really...?|I actually didn't want to give it...|But Shanna never listens once she's made up her mind.
speak;Zelot;Ha ha ha... It was an interesting gift.|But...I want to apologize to Juno.|If only I...|If only our nation had more to give...|She could have had a proper, elegant wedding...
speak;Thea;I doubt Juno feels that way at all.|I'm very grateful to you, Commander Zelot.|Your wedding...|I'd never seen Juno look happier.|I thank you for all you've done for her.

name: ZelotJunoSupportB
_source: speak;Zelot;I don't think it's good to leave our newborn baby with someone else.|You should go back home so you can take care of her.
speak;Juno;It's all right.|I trust my friend to take excellent care of her.
speak;Zelot;But she needs her mother's love.
speak;Juno;I fight precisely because I'm her mother.|I want her to grow up without war and conflict.
speak;Juno;I think I've told you before, but nowhere is safe until this war ends.
speak;Juno;So I think we should focus all our effort on ending this war.|Can you accept that, Zelot?

name: ZelotJunoSupportC
_source: speak;Juno;Yes, I'm sure she is.|I've entrusted her to a close friend.
speak;Zelot;No, it's just... What's she like?|Does she look like you? Does she have my nose?
speak;Juno;Oh, you haven't seen her yet, have you?
speak;Juno;Let's go see her together when the war ends.

name: ZelotJunoSupportA
_source: speak;Juno;You're coming back to Edessa once the war ends, aren't you?
speak;Juno;Will you stay with us after that?
speak;Zelot;I don't think that's possible...|I'll need to lead the mercenary knights to more work opportunities as before.|We can't support ourselves otherwise.
speak;Juno;But most of Ilia's land can grow food now.|With enough effort, we can produce enough food to get by...
speak;Zelot;Besides, who can guarantee a good harvest every single year?|Were our crops to fail, how would we get money?|How would we survive the winter if we're not prepared for failure?

speak;Zelot;I must lead the mercenary knights to make money,|at least until we can support ourselves even after a bad harvest.|I'll leave Edessa to you, so keep doing what you can to cultivate the land.
speak;Zelot;I have faith that there will come a time when Ilia will be self-sufficient.
speak;Juno;Yes, I think so, too.|I know that someday you won't have to leave us anymore.|That we'll finally be together as a family.

name: TreckJunoSupportC
_source: speak;Juno;Trec?|Oh... He was here just a minute ago...|Hm?|What's this paper...? Did he drop it?|It has a lot of writing on it...|Let's see...|"I was a horse."|"I tried running."|"I got tired."|...What is this?

name: TreckJunoSupportB
_source: speak;Juno;Oh Treck. I was looking for you.
speak;Juno;You look as sleepy as always.|Oh, right... Here.|Is this yours?
speak;Treck;Huh?|Ah... Yeah, it's mine.|I lost it the other day.
speak;Juno;I thought so.|I'm sorry, but I read a little bit of it...|What are you writing about?
speak;Treck;I write down the dreams I have.
speak;Treck;Yes. When I look at what I wrote, I remember all the kinds of dreams I've had.|It helps me sleep better.|Yawn...
speak;Juno;Oh, I see. That sounds interesting...|Maybe I should try it, too.

name: TreckJunoSupportA
_source: speak;Juno;Can you show me that paper with your dreams on it?|I'm very interested in it.
speak;Juno;Thank you.|"I was praised by Commander Zelot."|He shows up in your dreams, too?
speak;Juno;Let's see...|"The war ended."|"There was peace."|"Spring came to Ilia."|"Everyone slept happily ever after..."|......
speak;Juno;...No, I'm sorry.|......|Can you show me your dreams again sometime, Trec?
speak;Treck;Well...|It's a little embarrassing, to tell the truth.|But OK, you can see them.|I'll sleep as much as I can and show you all the latest ones.

name: TreckNoahSupportC
_source: speak;Treck;...Uh...|Oh, Noah... I didn't notice you there.
speak;Noah;Yeah, I've been standing here for a while now.|I'm used to it, so I don't mind you falling asleep every ten seconds.|But you know, don't you have anything else to do?
speak;Noah;Like practicing your swings or something.
speak;Treck;Yeah, well... What about you?|Have you been doing anything like that?
speak;Noah;Me? ...Not really.|...I guess I'm no different from you.|So, what did you do back in Ilia during our vacation?
speak;Treck;I didn't do... Oh, actually, I went fishing.|You know how the lakes freeze over in the winter?|You can punch a hole in the ice with your lance and lower some string inside.
speak;Noah;Sounds appropriate for you.|What did you catch.
speak;Treck;Nothing.|I had plenty of fun just sitting there staring into space holding the string.
speak;Noah;...You really live life to the fullest.

name: TreckNoahSupportB
_source: speak;Noah;You don't remember him?|He's the guy that forgot to bring his weapons to our first mission.

speak;Treck;Oh, right!|I remember Commander Zelot yelled at him even more than he yelled at me.|He even forgot to bring his horse, you know.|He was fighting on foot!|I couldn't believe there was someone dumber than me in our squad.
speak;Noah;Well, he's dead now.|He was hired by Bern... He fell somewhere nearby.
speak;Noah;Mercenaries are in high demand right now...|We could have ended up fighting him if we had been unlucky.
speak;Noah;I guess you're right...|I envy that carefree personality of yours sometimes...

name: TreckNoahSupportA
_source: speak;Noah;No...|I was just thinking some things over.
speak;Treck;Thinking things over? Don't bother.|Humans aren't meant to think deeply like that.
speak;Noah;...Maybe.|But you know, this war...|I mean, I never wanted to go out and save the world or anything,|but look how many battles we've been through.

speak;Noah;But no matter what we've done, Ilia's still the same.|Our children, and our children's children...|They'll be fighting to make a living, just like we do.|I was just wondering... Can't we do anything about that?
speak;Noah;Maybe it's useless for us to try and make a difference...
speak;Treck;Well... It doesn't really matter, does it?
speak;Treck;I mean, everyone goes through hard times. Isn't that just part of life?
speak;Noah;Take me along the next time you go fishing.

name: NoahKarelSupportC
_source: speak;Noah;...I've never heard of this place before.
speak;Karel;......|This is a land that people have long forgotten.|The years go by, but time doesn't seem to pass...|That is the best way to describe this place.
speak;Karel;No. I used to travel the world. I lived by the sword.
speak;Noah;Then...have you ever been to Ilia?

name: NoahKarelSupportB
_source: speak;Noah;The Sword Saint...|Does that name ring any bells?
speak;Noah;My mother used to tell me stories about him.|When I was very young, a group of bandits attacked our village.
speak;Noah;If the Sword Saint hadn't saved us, I wouldn't be here today.|Wherever he is, I hope he knows how much I appreciate him...
speak;Karel;...No. There's nothing to be grateful for.
speak;Noah;...What? Why do you say that?

name: NoahKarelSupportA
_source: speak;Karel;I suppose I should tell you the truth.|To cover my shame would be to go astray from the way of the sword.
speak;Karel;No. I never cared about saving the village.|I just wanted to kill.
speak;Karel;I was a demon back then...possessed by the sword.|I wandered aimlessly, looking to sate my bloodlust.|I didn't care who I cut. Who I killed.|...I'd have even killed you, I'm sure.
speak;Karel;You have no reason to thank me. They call me the Sword Saint...|But it is a false name.
speak;Noah;......|When I look at you, I can't even begin to believe what you're saying.|You are the Sword Saint I've always pictured in my mind.|What...happened...?
speak;Karel;...Some things we only realize after suffering a great loss.|By the time my foolishness had left me...it was already too late.

name: NoahFirSupportC
_source: speak;Fir;Sir Noah, I have something to ask of you...
speak;Fir;I want to spar with you.
speak;Fir;Yes. I must experience all forms of swordplay to master the art.|You taught me some things at that arena, and...|I would appreciate some additional training.
speak;Noah;Well, if that's what you want, then sure, no problem.
speak;Fir;Really? Thank you!|Let's start now, then...|Wha--!?
speak;Fir;Y-yes! I'm sorry!|I'm up, I'm up...
speak;Noah;It's not like you to trip like that.|Are you hurt? Let me see your knee...
speak;Fir;N-no... I-I'm fine! We must continue sparring!
speak;Noah;Are you really OK? You don't seem quite...well.

name: NoahFirSupportB
_source: speak;Noah;Are you OK?|You should tell me if you're not feeling well...
speak;Noah;You look like you have a fever...
speak;Fir;I said it's nothing!|I'm just in a little slump is all!
speak;Noah;Fir? Is something on your mind?|If you need someone to talk to, I'd be happy to...
speak;Fir;S-Sir Noah! I don't mean to be rude, but...|D-don't talk to me anymore!

name: NoahFirSupportA
_source: speak;Noah;Wait, Fir! Don't go.|I need to talk to you.
speak;Fir;I-I...|I swore to myself that I would live by the sword.|But...|I find my mind wandering. It's always focused on you!
speak;Noah;Do you remember the first time we met?
speak;Noah;Ever since then, I've wanted to tell you something.|But I could never muster up the courage to say it.|Even after we said our good-byes,|I always regretted not telling you how I felt.
speak;Noah;I believe fate brought us back together when we met again on the Isles.|I've been keeping it in all this time, but I can't any longer.|I have to tell you.

name: NoahJunoSupportC
_source: speak;Juno;You're worried about me?|That's a surprise.
speak;Noah;...I'm not that antisocial, Lady Juno...
speak;Juno;I was just kidding.|You seem uncaring, but I know you have a kind heart.|Are you holding up OK?|You've gone through many battles to make it here.
speak;Noah;Yes, I'm fine.|Commander Zelot helped us greatly.|It's thanks to him I'm still alive now.
speak;Juno;I see...|He always works himself too hard in battle...

name: NoahJunoSupportB
_source: speak;Noah;Yes, she ambushed us in the blizzard with her pegasus knights.
speak;Juno;I see...|Sigune and I used to be rivals, you know.|We were always competing against each other.|It all seems so...distant when I think about it now.
speak;Juno;Sigune always tried to act tough, but she was a kindhearted person inside.|I just wish it hadn't come to this...|War creates so much pain.

name: NoahJunoSupportA
_source: speak;Juno;You seem to avoid developing close relationships.|Is it because you don't want to suffer from loss?

speak;Noah;...I don't know.|It's just easier to avoid getting close with anyone.|The tighter the bond, the greater your suffering when that bond is broken.|...I think you know that better than any of us.
speak;Juno;Yes...|Perhaps in Ilia it's better to live the way you do.|But someday you'll realize relationships aren't so bad.|Maybe all you need is to fall in love.

name: TreckMeladySupportC
_source: speak;Melady;You must be one of Ilia's mercenary knights.
speak;Melady;I am Melady. Pleased to meet you.
speak;Melady;Yes... I am a wyvern rider from Bern, as you can probably tell.
speak;Melady;How...how do you feel about fighting alongside a knight from Bern?
speak;Treck;It's not like people from Bern have seven ears or anything.
speak;Melady;......|Well, no, I only have two.

name: TreckMeladySupportB
_source: speak;Treck;Well...|I was just sitting here watching you fight.
speak;Treck;Yeah. And the way you fight made me think...|Do you have any loved ones in Bern?|Like family or a lover or something?
speak;Melady;...N-no, I'm all alone. I live for Princess Guinivere...
speak;Treck;Oh, OK. Yeah, that figures.|I'm usually wrong.
speak;Treck;Oh well, guess I hurt my neck for nothing.

name: TreckMeladySupportA
_source: speak;Melady;...Melady.|Do you always forget people's names?
speak;Melady;......|You are an odd individual, Sir Trec.
speak;Treck;Do you think so?|I think I'm pretty normal.|Everyone always tells me I look so carefree.|But I have concerns too, you know.
speak;Treck;Well, the other day I dreamed of a horse.
speak;Treck;I think this dream has some kind of hidden meaning somewhere...|It's been keeping me up for some time now.|It's gotten to the point that I can only sleep at night.
speak;Melady;I feel a little better now.

name: AstolfoIgreneSupportC
_source: speak;Igrene;I can't believe my eyes...!|Could it...could it really be you?
speak;Astolfo;Sorry, what? I don't know what you're talking about.|I'm Astolfo. Just a petty thief.
speak;Igrene;...You look just like him...|You look so much like... my husband...
speak;Igrene;I lived with him in Arcadia.|...But one day he left without saying a word...
speak;Astolfo;Huh. And he looks exactly like me?|Well, they say everyone has an exact double somewhere out there.|Best you forget about it.
speak;Igrene;Wait! Let me see your leg.

speak;Igrene;I first found him collapsed in the desert.|The heat had gotten to him, and he'd lost his memory.|He had blade wounds all over his body, but he had a particularly bad injury on his leg.|It never fully healed, and it left a scar.
speak;Astolfo;Well, I'm not your man.|My legs are clean. I don't have any gross scars like that.|I really have to get going.

name: AstolfoIgreneSupportB
_source: speak;Igrene;Are you...are you really not him?
speak;Astolfo;No way. But hey, for what it's worth, I can't believe that guy.|Dumping a gorgeous gal like you. What a chump.
speak;Igrene;......|Please, let me tell you about him.

speak;Igrene;His name was Gorlois.|We started to live together as I nursed him back to health.|We lived happily for several years.|Slowly, his memory started returning.|I was happy, but also...scared.
speak;Igrene;One day, bandits attacked Arcadia.|Gorlois left to fight them off but he never came back.
speak;Igrene;The corpses of the bandits all sank into the quicksand.|I couldn't find Gorlois, so I assumed the same happened to him.
speak;Astolfo;Well, there you go. There's your story.
speak;Igrene;I couldn't help but think in the bottom of my heart that he might yet live.
speak;Igrene;But...if he were alive, he wouldn't have disappeared without a word...
speak;Astolfo;He's probably living a pretty miserable life now anyway.|I say you forget about him and move on.|Hey, I know.|I can give you a kiss in his place if it'll make you feel better...
speak;Astolfo;Ow. She didn't have to slap me... Sigh...

name: AstolfoIgreneSupportA
_source: speak;Astolfo;It's you. The rejected man will slink away now...
speak;Igrene;Please, look at this...|My husband had it when I first met him.
speak;Igrene;It's not a doodle.|It's a seal given to Lycian spies.|I also did some research on what kind of work they do...|And...now I understand...

speak;Igrene;Spies carry information dangerous to their enemies.|If a spy is caught, the enemy will exploit any weakness.|Family and loved ones are often taken hostage...|And the spy is tortured until he spills every bit of information.|That's why a spy must be alone...|He must have no family, friends, or loved ones...

speak;Astolfo;...I'm sorry, but... that guy is dead.|He was devoured by the quicksands of Nabata.|All this stuff about spies... It's just your imagination.|Or maybe the desert heat made you see things.
speak;Igrene;......|Yes... It must have been a dream...|A wonderful dream...

name: OgierLarumSupportC
_source: speak;Larum;Hmm... I need to work on my twirls more...
speak;Larum;Who's there?!|You! You saw my secret training!
speak;Larum;Irrelevant!|Now that you've seen me, I can't let you live.
speak;Larum;Wait, I feel like I didn't use that expression properly.|Oh well. Anyway, it's really embarrassing! That's what I meant.
speak;Ogier;I'm very sorry. I didn't know.
speak;Larum;Hmm... Well, I guess what's done is done.|Now that you've seen my dance, you might as well tell me what you think!|So what did you think?
speak;Ogier;Uhm... It was really pretty.|And very...stimulating.
speak;Larum;Do you think so?|I still haven't worked out the main part yet.|It gets really amazing towards the end.
speak;Larum;Hey!|Don't get any funny ideas about what that means!

name: OgierLarumSupportB
_source: speak;Larum;Huh?|Oh, you're that guy who was spying on me.
speak;Larum;Well, you praised my dancing, so I'll forgive you.
speak;Ogier;You really like to dance, don't you?
speak;Larum;I guess. It's fun.|I meet a lot of people when I travel around, and they all love my dancing. That's what I like.
speak;Larum;Hey, I know.|Do you want me to show you the rest of my dance from before?
speak;Larum;Do you want to see it? You do, don't you?|Tell me you want to see it.
speak;Ogier;I... I want to see it.
speak;Larum;Then sure, I guess I can show it to you!|This is the sixth of the seven dances I've mastered so far.|And it's called...
speak;Larum;Yeah, whatever!|Sorry, I changed my mind. I won't show you my dance anymore!

name: OgierLarumSupportA
_source: speak;Larum;What?|Oh, I know.|You just want to see that dance, right?
speak;Ogier;Your dancing...|I think I've seen it somewhere before.

speak;Ogier;Yeah.|A small band of entertainers stopped by my village once when I was younger.|I went to watch them...and a little girl was dancing in the center.|She tripped a few times, but I could tell she was trying really hard.|I was going through some tough times back then, but that girl's dancing really cheered me up.
speak;Ogier;I didn't think so. But it was really nice.|I'm sure you cheer people up with your dancing wherever you go.
speak;Larum;Oh, you're embarrassing me now! But thanks, Ogier.|Tell you what.|I'll show you one of my special dances some time.
speak;Larum;Hey!|You were getting funny ideas again, weren't you?

name: AstolfoGwendolynSupportC
_source: speak;Astolfo;Hm? Oh... You're Bors' younger sister.
speak;Gwendolyn;What are you doing back here?|You have light gear. You should be well ahead of us.
speak;Astolfo;Uh... Yeah, sorry.|This leg doesn't work the way it used to...
speak;Gwendolyn;...Sir Astolfo, just how old are you?|Perhaps you should retire if your body can't keep up.
speak;Astolfo;You're even more austere than your brother.|...And you have the same physical build, too.|A girl your age should really watch her weight.
speak;Gwendolyn;I don't have a weight problem! This is my armor!
speak;Astolfo;Ok, Ok, sure. Just calm down...
speak;Gwendolyn;I think you could learn a thing or two from my brother.

name: AstolfoGwendolynSupportB
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;...Sir Astolfo...|You can't sit here and rest like this...|This is a battlefield! It's serious!
speak;Astolfo;What's the point in getting fired up over nothing?|Relax. Why don't you join me? Take your shoes off.
speak;Gwendolyn;......|I won't let this slide.|You leave me no choice! I'll have to drag you to battle!
speak;Astolfo;Oh... This? It's just an old scar.|This leg is pretty useless because of it, though.
speak;Astolfo;Hmm... A long time ago.|I messed up on a reconnaissance mission in Castle Bern.|I did get away though, so it's like a trophy to me.
speak;Astolfo;Yeah, whatever. Don't worry about it...

name: AstolfoGwendolynSupportA
_source: speak;Astolfo;Ah, Gwendolyn. Come to grace me with your beauty?
speak;Gwendolyn;I will not be swayed by flattery. I know your leg slows you down.|But! You have other habits that are not excusable!|First, you imbibe far more than is acceptable...
speak;Gwendolyn;I will not let you laze about as you do.|You must behave like a proper Ostian knight!

name: AstolfoBartheSupportC
_source: speak;Barthe;It seems Bern was working behind the scenes even before the war started.
speak;Astolfo;Yeah. The traitors to the Lycian League, the rebellion at Ostia...|All according to their plan.|Of course, I'm to blame for that. I didn't realize soon enough.
speak;Barthe;The betrayals and Lord Hector's death...|We all share the blame. It wasn't just you.
speak;Astolfo;Nah, it was me.|The mistakes I made... They were just too egregious.
speak;Barthe;...We must keep our eyes sharp so that such a tragedy does not happen again.
speak;Astolfo;Yeah, traitors and spies could be anywhere.|Possibly even in this army.
speak;Barthe;What...?!|You know of a traitor in our ranks?!
speak;Astolfo;Well...no.|But if I learned anything from Lord Hector's death,|it's that we can't be too careful.

name: AstolfoBartheSupportB
_source: speak;Astolfo;No, not yet. I'm looking into it.
speak;Barthe;Once you think about who might be a traitor...|any number of soldiers could betray us for any number of reasons.
speak;Astolfo;Yeah, we've got people from just about everywhere.|I'll have to go through them individually, one by one...|It won't be easy, I can tell you that.
speak;Barthe;The most obvious suspect would be that princess...
speak;Astolfo;Guinivere, princess of Bern. There is something suspicious about her.
speak;Barthe;Lord Roy trusts her. I don't want to think that she...
speak;Barthe;Our comrades would lose all trust in us if they found out we suspect them of betrayal...
speak;Astolfo;......|It's rough, isn't it? But someone's got to do it.

name: AstolfoBartheSupportA
_source: speak;Astolfo;Yeah, about that.|It took a while, but I feel confident that there are no traitors.
speak;Astolfo;Princess Guinivere genuinely trusts Lord Roy. And so does everyone else.|This ragtag group has a stronger bond than you might think.
speak;Astolfo;Uh-huh. So that's taken care of.|I'll keep an eye on any new recruits who join up, too.
speak;Barthe;I'm sorry to make you do all the dirty work...
speak;Astolfo;Hey, don't let it bother you. It's what I do.

name: GwendolynBartheSupportC
_source: speak;Barthe;Of course.|Do you expect me to lose to weaklings like these?
speak;Barthe;Then I won't ask you how you're doing.|We knights of Ostia are always at our peak.
speak;Barthe;I appreciate your concern for me, but worry about yourself before you worry about others.

name: GwendolynBartheSupportB
_source: speak;Barthe;What's the matter, Gwendolyn? You're panting.|A knight of Ostia shouldn't be heaving after a light battle like that.
speak;Barthe;Remember our training, Gwendolyn!|Remember how we sprint-marched over that mountain.|This is nothing compared to that!
speak;Barthe;Show the enemy...why they should fear the knights of Ostia!

name: GwendolynBartheSupportA
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;Sir Barthe, how can I improve myself further?
speak;Barthe;You're a full-fledged knight of Ostia now, Gwendolyn.|I have no criticisms to offer you.
speak;Gwendolyn;Thank you, sir!|But...Sir Barthe...|Anything will do. Say anything.
speak;Gwendolyn;Uh...|I'm sure there is something I could improve in...
speak;Barthe;What's the matter? Why do you look so discouraged?
speak;Gwendolyn;I...I want you to teach me some more...
speak;Gwendolyn;I don't...want you to leave me, Sir Barthe...
speak;Barthe;What are you talking about?|We fight together as equals.|I won't leave you.
speak;Barthe;Of course.|...We can afford to waste no more time talking like this.|Let's move, Gwendolyn!

name: GwendolynOgierSupportC
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;For us knights, it's tough to get back up if we fall to the ground.|We have to build strong legs to ensure that we never fall.

name: GwendolynOgierSupportB
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;Ogier, are you practicing your sword swings?
speak;Ogier;That I am.|I can't let you get ahead of me, so I thought I'd practice the basics, too.
speak;Gwendolyn;That's good.|But it'll take a lot of work to beat me.
speak;Ogier;I suppose we've got a little competition going, then!

name: GwendolynOgierSupportA
_source: speak;Gwendolyn;Perfectly fine, of course.|A strong knight can't complain.
speak;Ogier;Me neither. Not if I want to be a powerful mercenary...
speak;Gwendolyn;Our competition has kept me working hard.|I'd have probably given up by now if not for you.
speak;Ogier;...I feel the same way.|I've been able to come so far thanks to you.|We're evenly matched.
speak;Gwendolyn;I agree.|But I'll never let you get ahead of me.

name: BartheOgierSupportC
_source: speak;Barthe;Have you been keeping up with your training?
speak;Barthe;...I've been wanting to ask you.|Why did you not become a knight?|Why did you become a mercenary?
speak;Ogier;Heavy armor doesn't really suit me.
speak;Barthe;That is simply because you don't train yourself hard enough.
speak;Ogier;But, I mean, I wasn't born with--
speak;Barthe;This is a perfect opportunity. I shall train you every day.|I will make a knight of you yet.

name: BartheOgierSupportB
_source: speak;Ogier;Sir Barthe... This training is just...crazy.
speak;Barthe;You'll get used to it soon enough. I do it every day.
speak;Ogier;Yes, but I don't have the build you do...
speak;Barthe;Was that a complaint I heard just now?
speak;Barthe;Then keep quiet and train harder.

name: BartheOgierSupportA
_source: speak;Barthe;Hm?|Are those practice swings I hear...?
speak;Ogier;Whew...|I wonder if I'm any closer to Sir Barthe by now.
speak;Ogier;Whoa!|Oh, Sir Barthe! You scared me.
speak;Barthe;You are doing well. Excellent.|Your body has gotten used to the training.
speak;Ogier;Yes, I feel uncomfortable if I'm not working my body.|I'd hate to fail for lack of training.
speak;Barthe;I see you have learned your lesson.|If you train yourself constantly, you will never tire in battle.|That holds true both for knights like me and mercenaries like you.
speak;Ogier;Mercenaries like me?|But I thought you wanted to make me a knight.
speak;Barthe;I only said that to make you train harder.|I know your build can't handle heavy armor.
speak;Ogier;Did it?|I'd say it made me suffer more than anything...

name: FirBartreSupportC
_source: speak;Fir;F-Father... You are much too loud.
speak;Bartre;Ah, there you are, Fir! It's good to see you safe!
speak;Bartre;I hadn't seen you for a while.|I was worried you'd disappeared forever.
speak;Fir;Don't be ridiculous, Father...|We were just sparring not long ago.
speak;Bartre;We don't have many chances to talk one-on-one, daughter and father.|Now is your chance, Fir.|Tell your father anything that's on your mind.
speak;Fir;F-Father...|I'm sorry, but I have orders from Lord Roy.
speak;Bartre;Do you? Then I shall accompany you.
speak;Fir;I'm grateful, but I need to do things on my own.|Otherwise, I won't improve the way I want to.|I'll see you again, Father.

name: FirBartreSupportB
_source: speak;Fir;F-Father...|There's no need to shout so loudly...
speak;Bartre;I've been hearing some troubling rumors, Fir.|I hear that another man in the army is secretly seeing you.
speak;Bartre;Is it true, my daughter? If so, fear not!|I will crush anyone who would hurt you!
speak;Fir;He's helping me with my training. That's all.
speak;Bartre;Oho, so you merely wanted a training partner.|Have no worries, my daughter. Your father is here to train you!|Now come, punch me as hard as you can!
speak;Fir;Um...|I appreciate it, but I need someone who can use a sword...
speak;Bartre;Hrmm...|Take care of yourself, my daughter.

name: FirBartreSupportA
_source: speak;Fir;Father! Enough is enough!|I'm quite fine on my own! don't need you to protect me!
speak;Bartre;Forgive me, my daughter...|I just wanted to make up for lost time.

speak;Bartre;Yes...|When you were still young, your mother and I were always training.|I regret now that I didn't give you the attention you needed.|You never knew the warmth and protection a parent can give...
speak;Bartre;You've grown into such a strong and confident young woman.|You did that all on your own.|I just wanted to help you in any way I could...
speak;Fir;Father... You were always kind and loving.|Whenever I was down, you held me in your strong arms and comforted me...
speak;Fir;F-Father!|This isn't the place to break down and cry!

name: FirShinSupportC
_source: speak;Fir;You joined this army too? What a coincidence.
speak;Fir;......|Um... Oh yeah.|Did you find the woman you were looking for?
speak;Fir;I-I'm sorry... Maybe I shouldn't have asked...
speak;Fir;Oh, you did? That's nice to hear.

name: FirShinSupportB
_source: speak;Shin;...I never asked you. Which clan are you from?
speak;Shin;Are you from Bulgar?|Or are you one of the Djute that betrayed us?
speak;Fir;N-no, it wasn't.|I lived alone with my parents so I don't know much about the clans...
speak;Fir;Um, you're from the Kutolah, right?|You said so before.
speak;Shin;That's right.|Our chieftain is the Silver Wolf, the strongest warrior in Sacae.|None can match his mastery of the sword and bow.
speak;Fir;Yes, I can tell by your eyes.{w} You're usually foreboding...|I-I mean, quiet...|But you look proud talking about him.

name: FirShinSupportA
_source: speak;Shin;Sacaen women rarely pick up weapons, and when they do, they choose the bow.|Rarely does one see a girl pick up a sword.
speak;Shin;Also...|Sacaen people worship the Sky and the Earth.|You don't pray, and you don't even belong to a clan...|I have never met a Sacaen like you before.
speak;Shin;I'm not accusing you. I actually respect it.|You've shown me...that people can live freely.
speak;Fir;I think you're exaggerating...|But it still feels nice to hear that.
speak;Shin;That must be because you look straight ahead to your dreams.|To mastering the sword.|I will pray for your dream to be granted one day.

name: FirKarelSupportC
_source: speak;Fir;Please let me stay with you so I can master the sword!
speak;Fir;Thank you! ...But...|It doesn't feel right to fight alongside you.|I'm still a novice, but you're the strongest fighter in our army!
speak;Fir;None of them know how strong you are!|Once they see the true strength of the Sword Saint, they'll...
speak;Fir;I...I respect you so much, so I just...
speak;Karel;Idolizing another is pointless.|One must not seek strength for admiration.

name: FirKarelSupportB
_source: speak;Fir;Please, teach me the way of the sword.
speak;Fir;I want to know how you gained your power.|I want to master the sword like you did.
speak;Karel;It is not something that can be taught, Fir.
speak;Karel;A sword is simply a sword. It is a weapon used to kill people.
speak;Karel;There's no strength to be found in this hunk of metal.|I have lived by the sword since my birth, but my blade never gained any power.
speak;Karel;True strength does not come from a weapon.|It is not something that can be seen or touched.|But it exists within all of us.|It exists within you, too, Fir.

name: FirKarelSupportA
_source: speak;Fir;What is true strength...? What is the right way...?|What must I do...?
speak;Karel;...Fir.|You have always followed in your mother's footsteps.
speak;Karel;Now that you've lost sight of your mother, you come to me for advice.
speak;Karel;But Fir.|You are not your mother. You are not me.|You cannot follow us to the path you seek.|It lies in front of you.|It is you who must cut that path for yourself.
speak;Karel;It isn't something that can be taught.|It is something you must discover on your own.

name: ShinZeissSupportC
_source: speak;Zeiss;What are you doing, shooting at me?! I'm on your side!
speak;Zeiss;What do you mean, "Oh, right"?!|A wyvern rider like me is finished if I'm hit with an arrow.|Just watch it, all right?
speak;Zeiss;He sees me as an enemy.|I can't really blame him after what Bern did to Sacae.|But we're allies... We can't be quarrelling...|I guess I should try to get to know him better.

name: ShinZeissSupportB
_source: speak;Zeiss;Hey, Shin! How are you doing?
speak;Zeiss;You're really great with your bow, huh? You hit almost all of your targets.|I wish I could hit like you, but I'm kinda... Whoa!!
speak;Zeiss;I thought I'd finished him already...|Sorry to make you clean up after my mistake...
speak;Shin;I moved on reflex. It was no trouble.
speak;Zeiss;That doesn't matter. You still saved my life.|Say, why don't you teach me to attack more accurately?
speak;Zeiss;......|...Oh well. He saved my life, so there's that, I guess...

name: ShinZeissSupportA
_source: speak;Zeiss;Are you all right?|I guess even you have some trouble when surrounded.
speak;Shin;You didn't have to do that.
speak;Zeiss;I couldn't help it. I acted without thinking.
speak;Zeiss;I'll be going now.|Just make sure you don't start shooting at me again!
speak;Zeiss;You sure did before!|...Well, we're in battle, so I don't blame you for making mistakes now and again.
speak;Shin;I'm not stupid enough to point my bow at an ally.|...I will never shoot you.
speak;Shin;I'll be right behind you. Leave the enemies you miss to me.

name: ShinDayanSupportC
_source: speak;Dayan;Shin...|I'm sorry I assigned you such a difficult task.|You have my thanks for locating my granddaughter.
speak;Dayan;It must have been a difficult journey. Where did you go after you left us?

speak;Shin;After we lost the battle, I crossed many lands in search of Sue.|I rode through Lycia and crossed the ocean to the Western Isles.|That is where I found her.|It was several months after you gave me the order.
speak;Dayan;I see...|Much time has passed since we lost that battle.
speak;Dayan;We lost many of our clansmen. ...Young ones, too.
speak;Shin;But you survived, Chieftain.|No matter how divided the clan may be you can unite us once more.

name: ShinDayanSupportB
_source: speak;Shin;The nations in the west, Lycia and Etruria, were very different from Sacae.|There were soldiers clad in heavy armor that would allow no arrows to pass.

speak;Dayan;So I would imagine.|In the vast plains of Sacae, horses are our livelihood.|But in more populated areas, key points are defended by soldiers such as the ones you speak of.|It is not surprising that our tactics fail on foreign ground.
speak;Dayan;Betrayal and trickery are simple tactics to them.|It is only us who think such methods dishonorable.|It is no surprise we lost with such a mindset.
speak;Dayan;You must accept the fact that people use them, though.|We must be prepared for them when they are used against us.

name: ShinDayanSupportA
_source: speak;Dayan;Our Father the Sky has brought us blessings in spite of our hardships.|I think you have been especially blessed.
speak;Dayan;The land isn't as it used to be.|We of Sacae must have broader perspectives.|We must think outside of the clans.

speak;Dayan;You seem to have learned much in your travels.|This old wolf is too old to learn new ways of thinking.|But you are young.|You are responsible for leading Sacae to a brighter future.|Consider this an order from your Chieftain, Shin.|It is the youth that will decide Sacae's fate.

name: EchidnaGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Echidna;Gonzalez? You're huge. And look at your muscles.|You must be able to pull trees right out of the ground.
speak;Echidna;Hm, this is quite a find.|There's no way that I'm letting you get away.

name: EchidnaGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Echidna;Wait, don't leave! I need a favor from you.
speak;Echidna;Yes, I need you.|I'm going to help build a new village in the Western Isles.
speak;Echidna;There are lots of people who lost their homes in the war.|Even many people in the resistance force are homeless now.
speak;Echidna;I'm going to build a village for those people.|But I can't do it on my own.|What I really need is big, strong men like you.|What do you say? You'll get free meals.
speak;Gonzalez;But...I ugly...|I not be with people. People hate me...
speak;Echidna;Ha ha, don't be ridiculous.|Help them out by carrying a couple logs and everyone'll love you.

name: EchidnaGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Echidna;Oh, right. I never told you, did I?|I'm--
speak;Gonzalez;No... I stupid. I not remember...|...And I ugly. Everyone stare at me... I ugly and stupid...
speak;Echidna;...Oh dear. Gonzalez, all you need is confidence.|Maybe you're not the most handsome guy, and maybe you're no genius.|But so what?
speak;Echidna;Look, Gonzalez. I'll be frank with you.|You've got a good heart, but you're ugly as sin.|That's why people make fun of you.
speak;Echidna;But that's no reason to give up.|Everyone has strong points and weak points.|Find something unique to you.

speak;Echidna;Right. Unique to you.|Once you do that, no one will make fun of you anymore.|You'll have no reason to think so lowly of yourself.|You can stand proud, with both your strong points and weak points.
speak;Gonzalez;...unique...?|......|I think later. My head hurt.
speak;Echidna;Ha ha ha... Take all the time you need.

name: BartreGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Bartre;So...you're Gonzalez.|I hear you've been quite a nuisance in the Isles.
speak;Gonzalez;I...I want fight with everyone.|But...I useless.|I become strong, everyone like me.|Become strong.
speak;Bartre;I see... Very well. I'll train you.|First, I want you to hit me as hard as you can.
speak;Bartre;You think your puny fists can hurt ME?! Now hit me!
speak;Bartre;Yeah... You're pretty strong.|But it's my turn now! After I sit down for a minute...

name: BartreGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Bartre;Gonzalez.|Are you keeping up with your training?
speak;Gonzalez;Look. I find this. I have money.
speak;Bartre;So you do. What of it?
speak;Gonzalez;I become strong. I buy armor.|I not get hurt.
speak;Bartre;Offense is everything!|If you beat your enemy in a single hit, he won't even have a chance to hit back!|Only puny worms wear armor!
speak;Gonzalez;O-OK... I wrong.|I beat enemy in one hit. I buy strong axe.

speak;Bartre;You think that a good weapon makes you strong?|A true warrior fights with the raw strength of his muscles!|Don't waste your time buying weapons! Build your muscles!|Build them up so big that you can crumble walls with a rusty iron axe!

name: BartreGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Bartre;You needn't say anything, Gonzalez. I can tell by looking in your eyes.|You've become strong.|You've come a long way from the little weakling you were when we first met.
speak;Bartre;I know what you're going to say, Gonzalez.|And you're welcome. It was my pleasure.
speak;Bartre;But you still have a long way to go.|The path to true warriorhood is hard and neverending.|Now come, Gonzalez.|Let us train until we can tear down the very sky above!

name: GarretGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Garret;I wasn't askin' your name. I guess you ain't an enemy, though.
speak;Garret;...How'd they letchoo into this army anyway?|You're like the exact opposite of me.
speak;Garret;I mean, look at what yer wearin'! You look like a total brigand.|People'll run at the first sight of ya.
speak;Garret;I think you could learn from me.
speak;Garret;...What? You got a problem with that?

name: GarretGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Gonzalez;Yeah... You that. Here. I give you.
speak;Garret;Hey! Guess you ain't so useless after all.
speak;Garret;Yeah, my mom used to pick these in the mountains when I was a kid.|The bittersweet seeds are the best part!
speak;Gonzalez;Mom... You have parents.|I not have...
speak;Garret;Not anymore I don't.|My mom was killed in a bandit attack when I was younger.
speak;Garret;I survived, though.|I hunted down every single one of those bandits and made them pay.
speak;Garret;It took me eight years.|And now...I got nothin' to show for it.|I just...got nothin' else to live for.
speak;Garret;Grr... Why am I tellin' this to you anyway?

name: GarretGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Gonzalez;Yeah... You that.|Here. I give you.
speak;Garret;Whoa, you kiddin'...?|You didn't have to bring the whole tree with you.
speak;Garret;Well, yeah, but this is goin' a little overboard...|Ah, who cares. Thanks. You want some?
speak;Gonzalez;No. I not eat strange things.
speak;Garret;...What's that supposed to mean?|Hm?|...Looks like we better get goin'. Come on, Gonzalez.|Let's go.

name: DayanGonzalezSupportC
_source: speak;Dayan;Hm?|Haven't you seen eastern bows before? This is a bow we use for training.
speak;Dayan;All right. Here. Try pulling the string.
speak;Dayan;You're incredibly strong.|A normal man wouldn't be able to pull it at all.
speak;Dayan;First, you put the arrow here...

name: DayanGonzalezSupportB
_source: speak;Dayan;Let me see your head. Yes... It looks better.
speak;Gonzalez;Uh... No more bow.|What that horse? Strange color.
speak;Dayan;Ah, it looks different from the horses in your home, doesn't it?|We use these horses as a way of life in Sacae.|We can also keep up with the mounts that western knights ride upon.
speak;Dayan;Gonzalez! Are you all right?|Horses are very sensitive to people standing behind them.|You have to be careful.

name: DayanGonzalezSupportA
_source: speak;Dayan;I'm sorry, Gonzalez.|It seems that you get hurt whenever you are with me.
speak;Dayan;Here, I'll give you this as an apology.
speak;Dayan;It's a headdress that we of the Kutolah clan wear.|It would suit a fine warrior like you nicely.
speak;Dayan;Take this as well.|It's a wine made from horse milk. We drink it at festivities.
speak;Dayan;Gonzalez! Can you get up?|This wine is very strong.|You shouldn't drink so much of it at once.

name: GeeseEchidnaSupportC
_source: speak;Echidna;You can sail a ship, right? I want to ask a favor of you.
speak;Echidna;Yeah. I'm planning on building a new village in the Western Isles.|What I want is for you to use your ship to carry people there. I'll pay you well.
speak;Echidna;What's the matter? You can sail one, can't you?
speak;Geese;...Yeah, that's no problem.|I was once the captain of a trading vessel.|There's no ocean I haven't seen.
speak;Echidna;...Then why did you become a pirate?
speak;Geese;I couldn't continue my trading business in this war.|We had no choice, so my mates and I turned to piracy.

speak;Geese;But we were just seafarers at heart.|We didn't like fighting or robbing or any of that stuff.|But anyway, the first time we set sail as pirates, everyone started complaining of stomachaches and seasickness.|They were all having second thoughts about the whole thing.
speak;Echidna;No gut for piracy, eh? I'm surprised you made it this far.
speak;Geese;Yeah, well, I sure wasn't doing it because I liked it...

name: GeeseEchidnaSupportB
_source: speak;Geese;We may have turned to piracy, but we had no idea what we were doing.|...We figured we'd go for easy targets first.|We picked a small trading ship for our first one.|We took over the ship without much of a fight, but...
speak;Geese;There were no valuables.|The captain of the ship told me he was in the same situation as us.|He said that he was thinking of resorting to piracy to get by, too...
speak;Geese;We let them go.|I couldn't rob them after hearing that.
speak;Echidna;A pirate with a heart of gold, eh? I can't imagine you made a good living.

speak;Geese;...Yeah, I doubted myself a lot after that.|But we kept with it and decided to go after a bigger ship next.|We figured we could steal from the rich and keep a clean conscience.|Not long after that, we were lucky and came across a large trading ship.
speak;Geese;We didn't have to hold back this time.|We charged the ship...|But when we got close, ballistae and archers flooded out from within.|It was one of Bern's warships.

speak;Geese;They fired at us mercilessly and chased us for three days and nights.|We got away somehow, but our ship was wrecked.|We hadn't made any money, either. Some of the boys broke down and cried.|Heck, even I felt like crying after that disaster.
speak;Geese;Well, like I said, I wasn't doing it because I liked it...

name: GeeseEchidnaSupportA
_source: speak;Geese;It's the one treasure I've gotten as a pirate.|I found it when we were battling another pirate crew.
speak;Geese;See the skull mark here?|It means buried treasure.
speak;Echidna;Have you dug it up yet?
speak;Geese;Not yet.|Once the war ends, I want to be a merchant again, but I have no money to get started.|If this map is right,|I can dig up the treasure and repair my ship.

speak;Geese;I have no money left.|I even went into debt to feed my mates.|If this map's a fake, then I'll have to let go of my ship forever.|...I can't help but feel a little scared when I think of that.
speak;Echidna;Sure.|But no amount of worrying will get you that treasure.|You have to take action.

speak;Echidna;Even if that map's a fake, there are other treasures out there.|Once you get your ship fixed up,|you'll help us out by carrying the residents to the new village, right?|I'm counting on you. Show me your ship sometime.
speak;Geese;You got it. I won't let you down.

name: GeeseCathSupportC
_source: speak;Geese;Uh, yeah... I guess.|That was your first thought, huh? Man...
speak;Geese;I used to be a seafaring merchant.
speak;Cath;Really? You must've made a lot of money, then. Lucky you.|Us poor folk gotta keep breaking our backs, I guess... See ya.
speak;Geese;What's my bag doing in your hand?
speak;Geese;Gee, thanks. Now give it back.
speak;Cath;Fine...|But there's no treasure I can't steal!|Be on your guard, for you never know when I'll strike!

name: GeeseCathSupportB
_source: speak;Cath;Oh, Geese...I can't keep it hidden any longer...
speak;Cath;I'm madly in love with you! Please hold me...
speak;Geese;Were you hit with a berserk staff or something?
speak;Geese;You're a lousy actor. Why are you even trying?
speak;Cath;What?!|You saw through my seduction skills?! I should have given you more credit!
speak;Geese;Gee, thanks.|But I'm not really the lovey-dovey type. That won't work on me.|You'll need to think of another way to rob me.
speak;Cath;I-I knew that! This was just a test!|But next time's for real. You won't know what hit ya!|Your stuff is mine!
speak;Geese;Sure it is. Good luck with that.

name: GeeseCathSupportA
_source: speak;Cath;Heh heh!|Guess you weren't so good after all!|There's no treasure I can't steal!
speak;Cath;Well, let's see now. What have we got in here?|............ ............|What...what the heck is this?!|It's nothing but worthless junk!
speak;Geese;It's not junk. Maps, compasses...|It's sailing equipment.
speak;Cath;But what about treasure?! Where's your treasure?!
speak;Geese;Ha ha ha, I never had any treasure!|I'm broke.|Drowning in debt, to tell the truth.|I've got nothing worth stealing!
speak;Cath;Grr... Wipe that smile  off your face!|Being broke is nothing to be proud of!

speak;Geese;It's OK. I've got a dream.|I'm gonna go back to being a trader and hit the jackpot. You'll see.|My ship'll be so full of riches it'll barely stay afloat.|Maybe then you'll have something to steal!
speak;Cath;......|Did...did I lose? Are you a big shot?|...Or just an idiot?

name: GeeseLarumSupportC
_source: speak;Larum;Help me, help me, help me!

speak;Larum;What? Why should I? Pirates are all the same.|You're just going to say, "Shut up!"|Or, "You'd better keep quiet if you want to live!" Or something like that.|Oh no! I'm looking death in the face!|But just you wait.|Soon Lord Roy'll come to my rescue on a shining white stallion...
speak;Geese;...Uh, are you done?|Listen. I'm not a pirate anymore.
speak;Larum;Hmph!|I know better than to listen to your honeyed words!|I know you just want to kidnap me because I'm so irresistible.
speak;Larum;What?! Are you saying I'm not cute enough to kidnap?!
speak;Geese;Look, you...|No... Forget it. See you around. Or not.

name: GeeseLarumSupportB
_source: speak;Larum;You're still trying to cover up the obvious truth?|Your hairstyle, your clothes...|Everything about you just screams, "Yo ho ho, I'm a pirate!"
speak;Larum;Aha! You admit it!|So? What's next?|You still want to kidnap me, right?
speak;Geese;Seriously...|Just listen to what I have to say...
speak;Larum;Oh no! I'm looking death in the face!|But just you wait.|Lord Roy could beat you down any day of the week!
speak;Larum;"Larum, I can't live without you."
speak;Larum;"Oh, me neither, milord..."|And then he moves in close and...

name: GeeseLarumSupportA
_source: speak;Larum;It's the pirate!|Are you still trying to--
speak;Larum;Oh...|I lost this ribbon the other day. Wait!|I get it.|You stole it, right?!
speak;Geese;Why would I return it if I stole it?!|I found it lying on the ground and I thought it might be yours.
speak;Larum;Oh.|Then why didn't you say so in the first place.
speak;Geese;I would have if you let me!|You just started screaming whenever we met!|You should stop and listen once in a while...
speak;Larum;You're not a bad guy then.|I had nothing to be scared of all along.
speak;Larum;Hold on there, buster.|I'll show you a special dance in return.|Hey, I said wait...|What?!|Are you saying you don't want to see my dance?!

name: GeeseGarretSupportC
_source: speak;Garret;D'you make a lotta money as a sailor?
speak;Geese;......|Well, I used to. But now...not so much.|I've had to stoop to piracy.
speak;Garret;I was hopin' you might hire me to work on your ship,|but what's the point of goin' from a bandit to a pirate?|I...don't wanna rob for a livin' anymore...
speak;Geese;Hey, not so fast. I'm gonna quit piracy.|It doesn't suit me anyway.|I'm going back to being a trader after the war ends.|I could hire you to do odd jobs around the ship if you want.

name: GeeseGarretSupportB
_source: speak;Geese;Hey, Garret.|Try spinning around a few times.
speak;Geese;Just think of it as a sailor's test.
speak;Geese;Yeah, you're gonna get seasick.|You'll have to fix that if you want to be a sailor.

speak;Geese;Age doesn't make any difference.|I've seen plenty of grown men puke their guts out.|The outer seas can be especially nasty.|We sometimes come across storms that could flip a ship over.|Well, everyone gets used to it after a month or so.
speak;Garret;A month?|I'm gonna be seasick for a whole month?|But it's not like we'll be at sea the whole time, right?
speak;Geese;Of course we will. The ocean's huge.|We sometimes don't even see land for an entire year.
speak;Garret;Whoa...|Maybe I don't wanna do this after all.

name: GeeseGarretSupportA
_source: speak;Garret;Fast cash isn't easy to find, is it?|Sailing sounds worse the more I hear about it.
speak;Geese;You think so? The sea's wonderful.
speak;Garret;But it's all water, right?|It's just blue, blue, blue wherever you look.
speak;Geese;No, the sea's not only blue. Sometimes it turns gold.
speak;Geese;It's true.|When the sun rises in the east... or when it sets in the west...|The whole ocean is illuminated into a beautiful gold...
speak;Geese;I prefer sunset over dawn personally, though.|There's nothing like sailing into the setting sun...
speak;Garret;But you can't make any money with a sunset.
speak;Geese;...You have no sense for majesty.|Tell you what. I'll let you on my ship sometime.|Once you see that beauty, you'll understand what it is to be a sailor.
speak;Garret;But it won't put bread on the table...

name: GeeseDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Douglas;I want to thank you for what you've done.|I understand that you safely escorted Pr--|I mean, Elffin to the Western Isles.
speak;Geese;Yeah, I did what I could.|That bard was an interesting guy.|The girl he came with was seasick the whole time, though.
speak;Douglas;I see... Geese, I must apologize.|I misjudged you.

speak;Douglas;The assassins were still after Elffin, so I couldn't put him on a large ship.|He would have been found immediately.|You were my only option.|But being a pirate, I didn't trust you completely.|Even so, you kept your word. For that, I thank you.
speak;Douglas;You could have turned him over to the revolutionaries for a hefty reward.|Why did you choose to help him?|It didn't make you much money.
speak;Geese;...Well, helping people makes me feel warm and fuzzy inside.|I sure can't say the same thing about piracy.

name: GeeseDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Douglas;Geese, I feel I must reward you somehow.
speak;Douglas;You saved our country.|I will give you anything you ask.
speak;Geese;Don't be ridiculous... I already got the payment you promised me.
speak;Douglas;No... That paltry sum doesn't suffice for what you've done.|You are a hero to the Etrurian people.
speak;Geese;I'm a hero? What are you on about? The guy's just a bard.|I mean, I guess he ended up liberating the Western Isles, but...
speak;Douglas;Geese... There is something you should know...|......|...Hmm...
speak;Douglas;...I'm sorry. I cannot tell you now.
speak;Geese;Yeesh... Way to leave me hanging.
speak;Douglas;In any case...|I hear that you helped the people living in the Isles as well.|Our king and prince had wished them to be free.|You did our nation a great service.
speak;Geese;Well, I hate to burst your bubble...|But I don't care about politics or nations or any of that in the least.|I just wanted to pay the villagers back for helping me out.

name: GeeseDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Geese;...You're just not gonna leave me be, aren't you?
speak;Douglas;Absolutely not. You have done me a great favor.|It would be a dishonor on my name if I didn't return it.
speak;Geese;You knights are so hard-headed.|I swear, if you found a coin lying in the street, you'd leave it out of honor or loyalty or some nonsense.

speak;Geese;Sigh... Fine, let me think...|...All right, here's what I want.|I want you and your king to run a good country.|Don't go around causing pointless wars.|And make sure people can travel and do business safely.|I'm gonna go bankrupt if you don't do that for me.
speak;Douglas;...Geese...|You deserve better than the life of a pirate.|I swear on my life that I will fulfill your requests!

name: KleinPercevalSupportC
_source: speak;Klein;General Perceval! It is good to see you again!
speak;Perceval;Klein. I am glad to see you well.|It appears you've adjusted well to the position of commander.
speak;Klein;Yes, I think I have.|Though I am one of the least experienced in the army...
speak;Perceval;From the way I see it, those serving under you are lucky.
speak;Perceval;...What do you think of all this?
speak;Perceval;What do you think about this army?
speak;Klein;Frankly, I feel more at home here than in the Etrurian army.|Perhaps it is because of General Roy...
speak;Klein;How do you feel, General Perceval?
speak;Perceval;I don't feel completely comfortable here.
speak;Perceval;I think what I seek from an army doesn't exist here.s
speak;Klein;You're saying you can't get used to this army?
speak;Perceval;...No, not quite.|It is simply that I am, and will always be, a knight of Etruria.|It is difficult for me to serve any master but my homeland.

name: KleinPercevalSupportB
_source: speak;Perceval;...How do you feel about the revolution in Etruria?

speak;Klein;...I understand Bern was pulling strings behind the scenes, but still...|I never could have imagined the court would divide so violently.|To tell the truth, it's still difficult for me to accept.|I...I never thought that greed ruled the minds of so many people...
speak;Perceval;Etruria had not known war for a very long time.|Thus, blinded by peace, we paid no heed to the scheming traitors.
speak;Klein;Yes... A conflict would have broken out even without Bern's help.
speak;Perceval;Once this war is over, I will devote my life to rebuilding Etruria.
speak;Klein;Of course, General Perceval.|I am prepared to give my life for that cause as well.
speak;Perceval;Klein, I want you to seek a different path.

speak;Perceval;Once I return to Etruria, I plan to dismiss all but a few.|The few I have absolute trust in to stay loyal to the king and country.|It is what must be done to maintain trust among the king's vassals.

speak;Klein;...Please, think on it a little more.|With your ability, you won't have to go to such extreme measures.|I've been holding this in because we are at war, but I will no longer.|I miss the days when I could look up to you as an older brother.|The days when we were more relaxed, and when we laughed together...
speak;Klein;Once this war ends, let us celebrate the prosperity of the new Kingdom of Etruria...|Together, and in laughter.

name: KleinPercevalSupportA
_source: speak;Klein;No, I just noticed you, so I thought I should say hello...
speak;Klein;But you know, I've been thinking...|Before the revolution, we never worked together like this.|But look at us now.|We fight together, not under the Etrurian banner, but General Roy.
speak;Perceval;Hm. Yes... Fate works in strange ways.
speak;Klein;Yes, indeed.|Oh, to change the subject...|Do you still like the same foods as before?
speak;Klein;It's just that the cook is a little worried.|He says that you are expressionless no matter what you eat.|He never knows what to give you.
speak;Klein;Yes, very much so, General Perceval.|Even when you drink wine, your expression stays the same.|If you stop expressing emotion, you'll forget how to.
speak;Perceval;That is not something that can be forgotten.
speak;Klein;I'm not so sure when it comes to you, General Perceval.
speak;Klein;Ha ha... It appears I need not worry after all.

name: KleinElffinSupportC
_source: speak;Elffin;That was a rough battle, milord.|Would you care to rest your tired heart?
speak;Klein;Oh, you're...|You're the bard that's always with General Roy.
speak;Klein;...Elffin, you look just like... No... That's impossible.|Forgive me. Never you mind.
speak;Elffin;...I look just like someone you know...|Is that it?
speak;Elffin;I stand before you, telling you myself, yet you still do not believe me.|Do my own vassals lack trust in me, Klein?
speak;Klein;Prince Myrddin! It is you!|Oh...!|It's such a joy to see you alive and well, Your Highness!
speak;Elffin;You seem to have grown while I was gone.
speak;Klein;Etruria has changed much in the year of your absence, Your Highness.
speak;Elffin;Yes, I know. I am sorry I put you through such trouble.
speak;Klein;I was stationed in the Western Isles so I wasn't affected too much.|...Amazing. You truly live...|The Etrurian people will welcome your return with jubilation!

name: KleinElffinSupportB
_source: speak;Klein;Pr--I mean, Lord Elffin!|There you are.
speak;Elffin;...Commander Klein, can you spare a moment?
speak;Elffin;...Someone is coming.|We shall continue this another day.

name: KleinElffinSupportA
_source: speak;Klein;Pr--Lord Elffin,|you wished to speak with me?|Is it about Etruria?
speak;Elffin;No. It is about what I said before.
speak;Klein;Oh...|When you said "Lord"? I still don't understand.
speak;Elffin;Don't you think it strange for an Etrurian noble to call a simple bard "Lord"?
speak;Klein;Oh...! Yes, you're right!|Forgive me.|I shall call you Sir Elffin instead...
speak;Klein;No, that will not do!|Even if you are in disguise, I cannot address my prince simply by name.
speak;Elffin;Do you remember how you used to come to the palace with your father?
speak;Klein;Yes... I spent much time there.
speak;Elffin;I had no siblings, so I found you so precious as a toddler.|I was still young and foolish, so I told your father,|"Your son shall be my brother. He is to live in the palace."
speak;Elffin;Yes, I know now that it was ridiculous.|Naturally, your father struggled to respond.|And then you spoke up.
speak;Elffin;Yes. You said those same words. "No, that will not do."
speak;Elffin;"I will be your knight, so that will not do."|Those were your exact words.|You also told me to find someone else to be my brother.
speak;Klein;...H-how impudent I was... I, uh... Forgive me, Your Highness...

speak;Elffin;Don't be absurd. I'm glad that you haven't changed.|...After I came back from the brink of death,|the world seemed so different.|It's relieving to see that some things are still the same.

name: KleinTheaSupportC
_source: speak;Klein;No, I'm fine. I just wanted to tell you something.
speak;Klein;Yes. When I hired you and your squad...|I was an Etrurian commander.
speak;Klein;Now that I'm no longer an Etrurian commander, you are free to do as you wish.
speak;Klein;Well, you don't seem to be taking advantage of that freedom.
speak;Thea;...Are you trying to say something?
speak;Klein;No, it's nothing. Don't concern yourself.

name: KleinTheaSupportB
_source: speak;Thea;It's about what you said before...
speak;Thea;You said that I don't seem to be taking advantage of my freedom...
speak;Thea;I'm not quite sure what you meant, so I wanted to ask you...
speak;Klein;Well, you're free to do what you want. You have no obligation to stay here.|That's all.
speak;Thea;!!|...Does that mean that you don't want me anymore?
speak;Klein;No, not at all.|Thea, you're a mercenary.|Staying with this army isn't making you much money.|If you only fight alongside us out of responsibility, there's no need for you to stay here.
speak;Thea;Yes, I know.|This army doesn't pay very well.|But I'm here by my own choice.|Please don't worry about it.
speak;Klein;Oh, all right, then. I'm sorry to be a bother.

name: KleinTheaSupportA
_source: speak;Klein;Thea, when the war ends, I'll help you find an army that pays well.
speak;Klein;I know you said that you're in this army by choice, but I still feel responsible.|You deserve further compensation...
speak;Thea;...I can do that on my own.|I appreciate the consideration, but don't worry about it.
speak;Thea;Or is my presence here a hindrance to you...
speak;Thea;Then why are you talking to me like that?!
speak;Klein;...What's the matter, Thea? Why are you so upset...?
speak;Thea;All you've talked about lately is getting me out of this army...|And away from you!
speak;Thea;I choose to stay by your side because I love you!|But you...you never even realized it!
speak;Klein;Erm, well... I'm sorry.|I...never noticed your feelings towards me...
speak;Klein;But, err...|You know, Thea, it's really your fault I haven't noticed!
speak;Klein;You keep calling me "Commander" Klein.|As if you want to keep your distance!|That's why I thought you were only here out of responsibility.
speak;Klein;Don't call me "Commander" anymore. Just Klein, OK?

name: TheaJunoSupportC
_source: speak;Juno;Oh?|Are you looking out for me, Thea?
speak;Thea;Well, you've been retired for a while now...|I'm sure you're not too rusty, but anything can happen.|I was a little worried.
speak;Juno;Thanks... But I'm fine.|How about you?|How is it leading a squad of pegasus knights?|I know you're responsible, but did you get along with your squad?
speak;Thea;I don't think I was anything special...|But I probably did all right.
speak;Juno;I'm sure you did fine, Thea.|Good job...
speak;Juno;Oh...|You don't like having your head pet anymore?|You used to love it.
speak;Thea;Th-that was a long time ago... I'm not...a kid anymore.
speak;Juno;So you don't like it anymore?
speak;Thea;It's not that I don't like it, but...you know...

name: TheaJunoSupportB
_source: speak;Thea;Nothing.|I was just wondering whether you're all right...
speak;Juno;Wait, Thea, before you go, let's chat a little.
speak;Juno;It's OK, Thea.|You can still act like a little sister when we're alone together.
speak;Juno;You're strong, but I know you get lonely...|Do you remember the time I first left for pegasus knight training?|You thought I was leaving forever, and you--
speak;Thea;D-don't bring that up...!|I was still a little girl...
speak;Juno;I was glad you cared so much about me, Thea.|You were always so blunt, so I sometimes thought you didn't like me.
speak;Juno;But...you cried so much when I left. "Don't leave us, Juno!"|I almost cried myself.
speak;Juno;Thea, if you ever feel down, come talk to me.|Because...I'll always be your big sister.

name: TheaJunoSupportA
_source: speak;Thea;I was thinking...|Maybe you should leave the rest of the battle to us and rest a bit.|I know you're a mother now, so...
speak;Juno;Oh? Are you saying I've lost my edge?
speak;Thea;N-no, that's not what I mean. I just...
speak;Juno;I know, Thea. Thank you.|But I'm fine. I am still a pegasus knight of Ilia.|I'm the one who taught you how to ride a pegasus in the first place.
speak;Thea;Yeah, I know, but...|......|If anything happens...|I'll be here for you, Juno.

name: LarumEchidnaSupportC
_source: speak;Echidna;Hey, Larum. What do you need?
speak;Larum;You know, the plan to build that village.
speak;Echidna;Oh, that plan.|I've been recruiting a lot of help.|Do you want to help out, too?
speak;Larum;Of course!|What do you need me to do?
speak;Echidna;Dance, of course.|Your dancing cheers everyone up.|It makes people want to get up and get back to work.
speak;Larum;Really?|Hmm... I can cook, too.|You know my special protein--
speak;Echidna;Ever since I founded the resistance, I've been eating your...|Well, I don't know what it is, but it's certainly not "food".
speak;Larum;Well, I never! I always worked so hard on it...
speak;Echidna;Look, Larum.|Good cooks don't burn the house down when making a proper meal.
speak;Larum;It wasn't a big loss considering how tasty it was.
speak;Echidna;The wails and moans of the resistance soldiers...|I can still hear them echoing in my ears.|Has Elffin ever eaten it?
speak;Larum;Yeah, and he didn't even cry. Or say anything, for that matter.

speak;Larum;See?|Everyone else just has something wrong with their taste buds.|My food was probably too high-class for them.|Actually...Lord Roy would appreciate my culinary skills.|Yes! I'm sorry, Echidna, but I'm going to prove you wrong.|I'll make Lord Roy try my cooking!
speak;Echidna;...May Lord Roy rest in peace...

name: LarumEchidnaSupportB
_source: speak;Echidna;Larum. Hey...|You said you were going to give that stuff to Roy, but...|Did you actually do it?
speak;Larum;What's that supposed to mean?! He praised me!|He said that it was really...|Uh... That it looked really good.
speak;Echidna;So he ate it, huh?|When's the funeral?
speak;Larum;Hmph!|I just wasn't doing too well that day!|My father always says my cooking is delicious.
speak;Echidna;Don't feel bad.|Even if your cooking stinks, your dancing is still the best around.|I wish I could do what you do. Make people enjoy life, I mean.
speak;Larum;You're always thinking about others.|You're even building a village so that people can live in peace.
speak;Larum;You're like one of those heroes in a bard's epic!|You appear, help the needy, and leave as suddenly as you came...|You're mysterious too since you never talk about yourself.
speak;Larum;I won't pry.|I am curious, but I'm sure there's a good reason you don't talk about it.

name: LarumEchidnaSupportA
_source: speak;Larum;I just had a really great idea!
speak;Larum;Do you want to hear it?
speak;Echidna;Yes, I'm positive. Come on, let's hear it.
speak;Larum;Ok.|I was thinking, when the village is done, let's make a statue.
speak;Larum;A statue of you!|It can have an engraving that says, "Here lies a great hero..."|Or something like that.
speak;Echidna;Hold on there, I don't plan on dying yet.
speak;Larum;Anyway, it's your village, so there has to be a statue of you somewhere.|Try to come up with a good pose for it.
speak;Echidna;She's an odd girl...|But I guess I knew that already.
speak;Larum;Don't you go disappearing on us! We all love you.|Don't you dare try and run off!

name: LarumPercevalSupportC
_source: speak;Larum;Well? How was it?|Did it grasp you?|I think this twirl really does the trick...|What do you think?

name: LarumPercevalSupportB
_source: speak;Larum;What did you think this time, General Perceval?
speak;Perceval;...Larum. I was wondering...|Why do you always show me your dancing?
speak;Larum;Don't you enjoy seeing me dance?
speak;Larum;You...|You cruel, cruel man! I never want to see you again!

name: LarumPercevalSupportA
_source: speak;Perceval;...... ......|...... ......|...... ......|...Odd...|She was nothing but a nuisance, but now that she's gone, I...
speak;Larum;Really? I knew it!|I knew you liked having me around!
speak;Larum;Don't lie.| You said you felt lonely without me.
speak;Perceval;...No, actually, I didn't say that.
speak;Larum;I knew it, I knew it!|Not even General Perceval can live without my dancing.|I'll come to your quarters and give you wake-up dances every morning!
