speak;Perceval;...You seem to be beyond my comprehension.

name: LarumGarretSupportC
_source: speak;Garret;Yep, I'm a bandit. I won't hurtcha though.|...Actually, I was wonderin'... Do performers make good money?
speak;Garret;I can't be a bandit forever.|I'm lookin' for a new line of work that'll put food on the table.
speak;Larum;Hmm...|I'm not sure I'd say we make GOOD money, but...
speak;Garret;D'you think there's any kinda performance I could do?
speak;Larum;Well, I don't know... All I know is dancing, really...|I might have a dance you could do, though...
speak;Larum;Well... All right.|Next time. See you!

name: LarumGarretSupportB
_source: speak;Larum;No, no! You've got it all wrong!
speak;Garret;W-what? It's like this, right?|Step like this, and then twirl...|Am I doin' somethin' wrong?
speak;Larum;Just doing the moves isn't enough. You have to have charm.|With an expression like that you'll send everyone running.
speak;Garret;Yeah, well, this is my face. I can't do anything about it!
speak;Larum;Oh...? Talking back, are we?|Fine, I guess you don't want me to teach you after all.
speak;Garret;Ergh... O-Ok, I got it... Charm, right?
speak;Larum;You have to smile constantly.|Come on, give it a try. Let's see a smile...
speak;Larum;Ok, let's see, what else...?|Oh, I know.|You need to use your hips more.
speak;Garret;M-my hips?! Look, I'm a big, scary guy.|Movin' my hips more'll just make me look stupid!
speak;Garret;All right, all right! I'll do it.|I'll do anything you say! Here... How's this?|Am I movin' my hips enough now?!
speak;Larum;Good! That's perfect.|Pfffha ha ha ha ha!
speak;Garret;...I swear, you're just playin' with me...

name: LarumGarretSupportA
_source: speak;Garret;You made a fool of me!|You were teachin' me how to dance, huh?|It was nothin' but a loada manure!|When I danced for the others like you showed me,|they all laughed at me like I was some kinda idiot!
speak;Larum;Look. A performer's job is to entertain.|No matter how well you dance, it's pointless if your audience is bored.

speak;Larum;If you want your audience to cry, you have to shed tears.|And if you want them to laugh, you might have to look stupid.|If the audience is having fun, I never hesitate to make a fool of myself.
speak;Garret;......|Slap me sideways. You got a point...|...I don't think dancin' is for me, though.|It's a lot harder than I thought.
speak;Larum;Ha ha ha...|I thought you were doing great.

name: LarumDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Douglas;Don't worry. We don't need to keep our relationship a secret from these people.|We don't have many chances to speak like this.|Just call me Father, as you always do.
speak;Larum;Yes, Father...|You don't look well.|Are you ok? Do you feel sick?
speak;Douglas;No, I'm not sick. I'm just a little tired.
speak;Larum;Can I help?|If there's anything at all, Father...
speak;Douglas;Larum... It's all right.|I feel better already after seeing your face.|You can go now... There's no need for concern.

name: LarumDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Larum;I brought you my special protein lunch to help keep up your energy.
speak;Larum;Tee hee... Go on! Eat up!
speak;Douglas;What, right here?|A general shouldn't sit down for a meal in the middle of a battle...
speak;Larum;Oh... I'm sorry!|O-of course... It's ok.|I should have known better... I'm...so stupid...
speak;Douglas;...Well, I'll make an exception for you.|I don't want it to go cold, after all.|I changed my mind. I'll eat it now.|...Mmm!|This looks good.
speak;Larum;I-it's ok, Father! Don't force yourself!
speak;Douglas;No, truly, it's delicious! Mmm... Yes!
speak;Douglas;I envy your future husband and children.|They'll get to eat your delicious food every day.

name: LarumDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Larum;I've finally found a way to really cheer you up!
speak;Douglas;Larum...|It's the thought that counts. Your consideration is enough.|Don't worry your little head over it.
speak;Larum;I'm not worrying!|It's just, if you look sad, then I feel down, too.|But if you laugh, then I feel happy!
speak;Douglas;Larum... You're a wonderful daughter.|I'm so proud of you.
speak;Larum;And who made me who I am? You, silly!|You took me up off the street and treated me like your own daughter.|I...|I've actually been happy with who I am since you adopted me.
speak;Larum;Oh!|Father, you're getting all teary-eyed again!
speak;Douglas;Oh dear, you're right... I must control my emotions.
speak;Larum;Ok, let me cheer you up with my latest dance!

name: ElffinCeciliaSupportC
_source: speak;Elffin;...You must have me mistaken for someone else.|I am Elffin... A simple bard.
speak;Cecilia;...He...|He looks just like him... ...He looks exactly like...

name: ElffinCeciliaSupportB
_source: speak;Elffin;...Can I help you, General Cecilia?
speak;Cecilia;Have you ever been to Etruria?
speak;Elffin;Not yet...|I traveled through the Western Isles before I joined this army.
speak;Cecilia;Then do you know of the three Etrurian Generals.
speak;Elffin;...Yes, I do.|There is you, the Mage General, and then there are the Knight General and the Great General.
speak;Elffin;It is my job as a bard to know such things.
speak;Cecilia;......|You insist on continuing this farce, don't you?|Then I have an idea.

speak;Cecilia;Show me your right shoulder that you are conveniently hiding with your hair.|If you are but a simple bard as you say,|then there won't be a scar from a magic attack.|May I have a look...?
speak;Cecilia;It is you, Prince Myrddin!|What happened?|Why did you not tell me that you were alive?
speak;Elffin;...I did not want you caught up in this.|But now it seems you're involved as well.

name: ElffinCeciliaSupportA
_source: speak;Elffin;Cecilia...|How much longer are you going to stay mad?
speak;Cecilia;I understand why you were hiding your identity from me, my prince.
speak;Cecilia;But Your Highness, you told General Douglas.|Did you lack trust in me?
speak;Cecilia;I'll let it go for now, Your Highness.|Though I expect an explanation after the war is over.
speak;Cecilia;In this situation, yes.|You have brought grief not just to me, but to your people as well.|Please show our people that you live, Your Highness.|Please...

name: ElffinPercevalSupportC
_source: speak;Elffin;Lord Perceval, if I may have a moment of your time...
speak;Perceval;Your Highness...!|You need not address me with a title...
speak;Elffin;Hush!|We can never know where enemies may be hiding.|Here, I am but a simple bard. Understood?
speak;Perceval;Yes, fully.|...What is it that you need, Elffin?
speak;Elffin;Prince Myrddin of Etruria passed away last year.|I'm curious about how the court has been acting since then.
speak;Perceval;...Very well. I will tell you what I know.|After Prince Myrddin passed away...

name: ElffinPercevalSupportB
_source: speak;Perceval;Your father is still alive. Have you seen him recently?
speak;Elffin;No, I have not seen him in over a year.
speak;Perceval;Have you no intention of seeing him at all?
speak;Perceval;Why?|Your father mourns for you, thinking you long dead.
speak;Elffin;If I let my father know of my safety, other people will find out as well.|My father may be happy for a brief moment, but he would soon suffer the grief of losing me again.
speak;Elffin;I must eliminate the root of that grief.|Only then will I go to see my father.

name: ElffinPercevalSupportA
_source: speak;Perceval;Elffin.|You were talking about songs for your future travels...
speak;Elffin;The songs about the state of Etruria since the passing of the Prince?
speak;Perceval;Yes, those.|Will you sing them all across the continent when the war ends?
speak;Elffin;That is my intention, yes.|I travel not only to sing, but to learn as well.
speak;Perceval;...Will you be visiting the Etrurian palace?
speak;Elffin;Yes, of course I will.|I expect my stay in Etruria to be the longest of all.
speak;Perceval;And where you will go after you visit the palace?
speak;Elffin;Nowhere...|I intend to stay and sing for the Kingdom of Etruria until my death.

name: ElffinDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Elffin;That voice... Is that you, Douglas?
speak;Douglas;You cannot see, Your Highness? I thought your eyes had recovered...
speak;Elffin;I still go blind for a while sometimes...|I will be fine once I rest.
speak;Douglas;...I heard that the poison rendered you blind for several months...|Forgive me, my prince...|If only I had been on guard, you would never have suffered this fate...
speak;Elffin;...I wonder how... my father is doing.|Is he any better?
speak;Douglas;I regret to say that he is not, Your Highness.|He does not know that you yet live.
speak;Douglas;But I am sure he will be rejuvenized once you return to the palace.|He will recover...and so will our nation.

name: ElffinDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Douglas;My prince, General Roy's tactics are upsetting the balance of power on the continent.
speak;Douglas;It will not be long before this army conquers the entirety of Elibe.|I believe that will be the ideal time to announce your return to the throne...
speak;Elffin;I have hesitations about returning to Etruria...
speak;Douglas;What are you saying?!|Everyone would be so delighted to see you safe...

speak;Elffin;Douglas.|I learned much in my time with the resistance in the Western Isles.|Too much, in fact.|I witnessed innocents treated like animals under corrupt Etrurian lords.|If not for the attempt on my life, I probably would never have known.
speak;Douglas;That is all the more reason to return. You can rid us of such atrocities...
speak;Elffin;I promise I will return to the palace someday.|But for now...|I want to be with the people. They need my protection.

name: ElffinDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Elffin;Don't call me that... I am but a simple bard here.|I am not your prince, and you are not my general.|You can accept that for the time being, can't you?
speak;Douglas;...If I must.|In that case, I pledge my loyalty not as your general, but as a dear friend.
speak;Elffin;...You are as unbending as ever.
speak;Douglas;My unwavering will is my strength.
speak;Elffin;...This war will end soon.|General Roy may be young, but he understands the people.|He will lead the whole continent to a gilded age of peace.
speak;Elffin;It's my duty to serve the people as well, however.|I don't intend to lax in my own duties.
speak;Douglas;I shall be at your side no matter where you go.

name: ElffinFaeSupportC
_source: speak;Fae;Uh! Ummm...|What's that thing? It makes pretty noises.
speak;Elffin;This is a harp. Do you like how it sounds?
speak;Fae;Yeah! I like it a lot!|Also...what's your name?
speak;Fae;I like your hair, too, Elffin!|It's pretty in the wind and it shines like gold in the light!|I like pretty things like that!
speak;Fae;Can I come and see you again?

name: ElffinFaeSupportB
_source: speak;Elffin;Ah, the little lady from earlier.|Hello.
speak;Elffin;Oh, pardon me. May I call you Miss Fae?
speak;Fae;My name's not Misfae either! It's Fae!
speak;Elffin;As you wish, Fae.|Fae... A unique name. Is it your full name?
speak;Fae;No, my real name is reeeeally long.|And they say it's a sound humans can't hear.|Fae's the only part that you can.
speak;Fae;But maybe you could hear it, Elffin!|You make so many pretty sounds, maybe you could hear my real name!
speak;Elffin;Why don't you try telling to me sometime?

name: ElffinFaeSupportA
_source: speak;Fae;I always wanted to ask you something.
speak;Elffin;What is it? I hope I can give you an answer.
speak;Fae;Ummmm...|Are you a boy or a girl?
speak;Fae;I thought you were a girl at first 'cause you're pretty and smell nice!|But the other day Roy called you "he".|Are you a boy?
speak;Elffin;Yes I am. Are you disappointed?
speak;Fae;Nope!|...Sooo, you're a boy... Hee hee...
speak;Fae;I'll be as pretty as you when I grow up.|So wait for then, OK? Promise!
speak;Elffin;Fae! Wait!|...I sincerely doubt I will still be alive by the time she grows up...|But I suppose I should let it go for now.

name: BartreKarelSupportC
_source: speak;Bartre;I...I'm so sorry about Karla.|I just wish it could have been me instead of her.
speak;Karel;Honestly, my sister's health was never particularly good.|I'm just glad she lived as long as she did.
speak;Karel;The one thing I am concerned about is Fir.|She lost her mother at such a young age...
speak;Bartre;Yes... Maybe...|Maybe the reason she left to train was to get her mind off her mother's death.
speak;Karel;She left to train?|Is Fir travelling across Elibe?
speak;Bartre;That she is.|She said she wanted to become a great swordmaster like her mother.

name: BartreKarelSupportB
_source: speak;Bartre;Ah, Karel.|...I was just thinking about Karla.

speak;Bartre;Yes, always.|I first met her in my travels around the world, when I was training.|I remember it like it was yesterday... We first met at that arena.|Her sword... I couldn't even see it.|...I suffered defeat for the first time in my life.
speak;Karel;...In our family, the sword was everything.|We were raised by the sword, and it was all we knew.|The sword was so central to our lives... that it blinded us to our own humanity.

speak;Bartre;Each time I lost, I challenged her to a rematch.|And then, the third time we fought, I somehow evaded her first strike.|I was knocked unconscious by her second strike, though...|But when I woke up... there she was.|It was the first time I'd seen her smile.|After that, we traveled together, training ourselves to be ever stronger.|I was never able to defeat her.
speak;Karel;I didn't see my sister smile very often...|She must have been very fond of you.

name: BartreKarelSupportA
_source: speak;Bartre;...After she fell sick, Karla told me about her family for the first time.|She talked about her heritage, about you, and...about herself.
speak;Karel;I'm sure my sister was happy to be with you in her time in this world.
speak;Bartre;That was around the time that I first met you as well...|You resembled Karla when I first met her.|You were inhumanly strong... Dangerous and quiet.
speak;Karel;...That sounds like me.|I remember leaving the two of you without a word.|You must have thought me a terrible brother.
speak;Bartre;No, not at all.|As she lay dying, Karla told me about her childhood with you...|She would tell me so many stories, all with a smile on her face.

name: BartreZeissSupportC
_source: speak;Bartre;Hmm...|So this is a wyvern. It has a face only a mother could love.
speak;Bartre;That I am.|Young man, do you mind if I touch this creature?
speak;Zeiss;Well, maybe now's not the best time...
speak;Bartre;Hm...? Hmm?!|Why you...|You want a fight, do you?!
speak;Zeiss;I'm sorry, he's been a little tense since training earlier...|Are you hurt?
speak;Bartre;No, I'm fine.|Say, young man, you have quite some talent.|You've managed to tame this beast at your young age.
speak;Zeiss;No, any wyvern rider can do that much...
speak;Bartre;Have some pride. You have talent.|Ah, yes, you said you were training earlier?
speak;Zeiss;Yes, I've been trying to get some speed in our offense.
speak;Bartre;You're already a powerful wyvern rider, yet you seek even more strength.|Now that's a real man. I wish you luck.

name: BartreZeissSupportB
_source: speak;Bartre;Ah, young man.|Have you been continuing your training?
speak;Bartre;Very good. Men must be strong in body.|Men are getting softer and softer as time passes.|Why, in battle I see grown men lagging behind little girls!|It's disgraceful.
speak;Zeiss;Er, yes...|We all must become stronger.
speak;Bartre;Yes, we think alike it seems...|My daughter left home recently.|I've been wondering if perhaps I didn't discipline her enough...|It's been bothering me for several days now.
speak;Zeiss;I, uh... I'm sorry to hear that.
speak;Bartre;Ah, it's good to talk with someone full of such insight!

name: BartreZeissSupportA
_source: speak;Bartre;We get along well.|I feel I am at my strongest when I fight beside you.
speak;Zeiss;Yes, when you're nearby I feel I have nothing to fear.|It's like...an unstoppable force is protecting me.
speak;Bartre;If I had a son, I would have raised him into a fine young man like you.|You are indeed the perfect match for my daughter.
speak;Bartre;From now on, think of me as your father. Feel free to tell me anything.|Is that clear, my son?
speak;Zeiss;Uh, yeah... Thank you, I think.

name: BartreCathSupportC
_source: speak;Cath;My name's Cath! You're Bartre, right?|Do you mind if we talk for a bit?
speak;Bartre;Sure, I don't see why not.
speak;Cath;Thanks.|You look a lot like my father, actually.
speak;Cath;Yeah. He's nothing like you, though.|He's a disgusting coward.
speak;Bartre;No, that's not like me at all.
speak;Cath;Talking with you  reminds me of him.|Bartre, do you think you can hug me like my father used to do?
speak;Cath;Yes, that's it, Bartre. Thank you.
speak;Cath;Heh... What an idiot.|Just like my father.

name: BartreCathSupportB
_source: speak;Cath;Yeah. And you see all this other stuff?|It's yours. I stole it from you.
speak;Cath;Yup, I'm a thief.|I trick people so I can steal their stuff.|Well? You gonna yell at me?
speak;Bartre;...Cath. Why are you telling me this?|You could have gotten away with it.
speak;Cath;...I don't know.|I don't even know why I stole from you in the first place.|I usually only steal from the rich.
speak;Bartre;Does it have something to do with your father?
speak;Cath;...Maybe. I hate my father.|He's such a coward... I hate his guts.

name: BartreCathSupportA
_source: speak;Cath;...My village was burned to the ground in the war.|A bunch of soldiers came and ordered us to set our houses on fire.|No one listened... I mean, who would? They were our homes.|The soldiers got impatient and drew their weapons...|That's when one of the villagers took a torch and lit everything on fire.That villager...was my father.

speak;Cath;All of our houses and crops were burned to the ground...|My father did nothing but stand there and watch...|I've hated him ever since.|I swore to myself that I would never mindlessly bow to power like him.|That's why I...
speak;Bartre;No one would burn their own village down by choice.|Your father...had something he felt he needed to protect.

speak;Bartre;Your father didn't have the strength to defeat the soldiers.|But he was fighting all the same.|He forced himself to burn his home and crops, all to protect something more important.|He was protecting you.
speak;Cath;......|...Ha...|Not likely. He's just a coward.|He's nothing like you.|But...maybe it's better to think he was protecting me...

name: RaighHughSupportC
_source: speak;Hugh;There you are!|I never thought I'd see you here.|I've been looking for you!
speak;Raigh;...Well, I sure wasn't looking for you.
speak;Hugh;You took advantage of my kindness...|Brats like you are why I hate kids.|Now give me back my Nosferatu tome.
speak;Hugh;...You haven't used it up already, have you?
speak;Raigh;...Calm down, I've got it. I was just borrowing it.|I was planning to give it back some day.
speak;Hugh;Y-you little thief...|I lent it to you because you said you wanted to see it.|I didn't expect you to run off with it!
speak;Raigh;Look, like I said, I'm borrowing it, not stealing it.
speak;Hugh;Then when are you going to return it?
speak;Raigh;Let's see...|I suppose I could give it back after I use it 20 times.
speak;Hugh;...Oh well, I guess I just gotta be patient...|Hey, wait a minute!|It'll be all used up after 20 times!

name: RaighHughSupportB
_source: speak;Hugh;I'm not letting you go this time! Give me back that Nosferatu tome now!
speak;Raigh;You're a mage.|What's the point in you having a Nosferatu tome anyway?
speak;Raigh;This powerful tome would be a waste in your hands.|It would be your fault if we lost the battle without it.
speak;Hugh;Er...|F-fine, I'll let you have it for now.|But I want it back with interest, you hear?!
speak;Raigh;...Heh, what an idiot. So gullible.|I can't even comprehend such bumbling foolery.
speak;Hugh;You little...! Give it back to me now!

name: RaighHughSupportA
_source: speak;Raigh;That's none of your business.|It's a fair trade for the spell tome.
speak;Raigh;Why not?|You can sell the gem to buy another Nosferatu tome.
speak;Hugh;This isn't about money. It's about pride.|...Let's see... I want to hear an apology.|Then you can have the spell tome for free.
speak;Raigh;Hah...|How can someone be so stubborn about something so stupid?
speak;Hugh;Hey, look at you.|All you have to do is say you're sorry.
speak;Raigh;I won't do it.|I've paid you back with the gemstone.
speak;Hugh;Well, I'm not taking it.|You owe me until you apologize!

name: RaighNiimeSupportC
_source: speak;Niime;I see you use dark magic.|Although you appear to be a beginner.
speak;Raigh;...Look, old lady. I'm busy.|I don't have time for geriatrics like you.
speak;Niime;Come now, there's no need to be so impatient.|Studying by yourself won't get you anywhere, anyway.
speak;Raigh;?!|How did you know I study on my own...?
speak;Niime;...I haven't lived this long for nothing, boy.|I know the darkness much better than you do.

name: RaighNiimeSupportB
_source: speak;Niime;Ah, it's that impetuous little chap again.
speak;Raigh;......|You... You're the Mountain Hermit.|The master of darkness.
speak;Niime;I'm more famous than I realized. What do you want?
speak;Raigh;...I...I want you to teach me dark magic.|Teach me everything!
speak;Niime;Hm...|Is that how you ask for a favor, boy?
speak;Raigh;...I can change my tone if it's not to your liking.|If you want me to grovel, I will.|Just please, teach me your dark magic!
speak;Niime;......|You're amusing...|...All right, try reading this to start.
speak;Niime;You don't know?|It's archaic writing used in the oldest spell tomes.
speak;Raigh;What...?|The ancient scrolls I know aren't written like this...
speak;Niime;Can you understand now how deep dark magic is?|You can have that. Good luck reading it.

name: RaighNiimeSupportA
_source: speak;Niime;Well? How are your studies going?

speak;Niime;Hm...|Don't even have the time to talk, do you?|You're a rude one, and you lack respect for your elders.|But you do seem to be serious about learning dark magic.|Why do you seek the power of darkness, boy?
speak;Raigh;...I don't have any grandiose reason or anything.|I use dark magic for my own purposes.|I want to protect those I hold dear and destroy all who oppose me.|That's the power I seek.
speak;Niime;This power... It's not to be taken lightly.|It can turn the whole planet upside down if used incorrectly.
speak;Raigh;Heh... So?|I don't mind blowing up a planet or two if I have to.
speak;Niime;...Good.|Well said, lad.|Now come... Come into the depths of darkness...|You can start by mastering that book I gave you.

name: RaighSophiaSupportC
_source: speak;Raigh;Hey! Are you deaf or are you just ignoring me?
speak;Raigh;Is there anyone else here? You're a real idiot, aren't you?
speak;Raigh;Anyway, I heard you use elder magic.|Is that true?
speak;Raigh;Let me see that spell tome. I've never see--
speak;Raigh;Ouch!|What the...?! Did you just hit me?
speak;Raigh;You've got guts, I'll give you that.
speak;Raigh;Whatever. You win.|But you better show me that spell tome next time!

name: RaighSophiaSupportB
_source: speak;Raigh;Whoa! Y-you again?!|I didn't even notice you...|S-so what do you want?! Come to hit me again?
speak;Raigh;This dark tome!|Some say it exists only in legend...
speak;Raigh;Of course I am!|I've been searching for this for so long!|So this is it...|Wow...I can feel its power...!
speak;Raigh;I can have it?! Are...are you sure?|Can't you use it? Why give it to me?

name: RaighSophiaSupportA
_source: speak;Raigh;Hey, you over there! You!|With the long hair dragging on the ground!
speak;Raigh;I'm giving this tome back to you.
speak;Raigh;I don't want charity. I'm not a beggar.
speak;Sophia;...Even so...I want you...to have it...
speak;Sophia;...You always act tough...|...But...you have a kind heart...so...you deserve it...
speak;Raigh;I have a kind heart?!|You're the first person other than my brother I've heard say that.
speak;Sophia;...I know you...better than you know yourself...
speak;Raigh;...Don't talk like that. It's creepy.
speak;Raigh;Well, it doesn't bother me though.

name: CathGarretSupportC
_source: speak;Garret;Hrngh? Yeah, I am.|And you... You're a thief? Hey, do thieves make decent--
speak;Cath;Shut up! Stay away from me?
speak;Cath;I hate bandits!|I wanna rip my eyes out whenever I see them!
speak;Garret;Oh yeah? D'you think I care?|Is that all you wanted to say? You must be bored outta your mind.
speak;Garret;...Huh. What was that all about?

name: CathGarretSupportB
_source: speak;Cath;Oh, great. A bandit. My day is ruined now.
speak;Garret;Heh.|Like you're any different from me. You steal too.|You ain't got any right to criticize me.
speak;Cath;Hah, I only steal from the rich.
speak;Garret;Oh, so we're playin' the the good thief, are we?|That doesn't justify--
speak;Cath;Maybe not. I steal. There's no denying that.|But...I'd never, ever burn down a village or hurt innocent people.

name: CathGarretSupportA
_source: speak;Garret;......|I'm a bandit. You're right.|I've plundered villages and hurt innocent people.|But...lemme say just one thing.
speak;Garret;I...I hate bandits, too...|And I hate myself for livin' like one.|That's all.
speak;Cath;......|...Maybe you're not such a bad guy after all.

name: CathHughSupportC
_source: speak;Hugh;One, two, three...|Yup, that's all of it.|Looks like I can trust Roy to give me a steady paycheck.|Time to show my worth...
speak;Cath;Where'd you get all that money? Are you a thief, too?
speak;Hugh;Do I look like a thief to you?|This is what they paid me when I joined.
speak;Cath;What?! That's not fair!|I've been working for nothing all this time!
speak;Hugh;Well, I guess you're not good enough to get paid.|You've got to show your worth if you want cash.
speak;Cath;...Hmm...|Sounds like a challenge!|I'll show you how great of a thief I am.|I'll steal that money from right under your nose!
speak;Hugh;Wait, what?!|Fine! Let's see you try!

name: CathHughSupportB
_source: speak;Cath;What are you getting all nervous about?|I'm just trying to be friendly here.|Do you really think I'd try to rob you in a place like this?
speak;Hugh;I don't trust you!|I'm gonna be on my guard whenever you're around.
speak;Cath;Hah, you're so petty.|You're getting all worked up over a couple thousand gold?
speak;Cath;Ok, I guess there's no getting past you when you're super alert like that.|You win for now.
speak;Hugh;Good! Give it up and go!
speak;Cath;All right. But remember, Hugh!|I'll be back!

name: CathHughSupportA
_source: speak;Hugh;You again?!|Get away from me. I'm not giving you my money.
speak;Cath;Are you still on about that? Talk about obsessive!
speak;Hugh;Then stop trying to take it!|I mean, you're a thief.|Don't you already have bags of money somewhere?
speak;Hugh;Yeah, right!|I see you running around looting chests all the time!
speak;Cath;I give it all to the poor.|I'm the Master Thief. I have my dignity.|I never keep a single coin of the money I steal.
speak;Hugh;Then...are you going to give my money to the poor as well?
speak;Hugh;......|Then hey...|You can have maybe a hundred...|No...|I can give you around half of this money...
speak;Cath;...No.|I'm the Master Thief. I have my dignity.|I don't take charity.
speak;Hugh;Look, I'm giving it to you. Just take it!
speak;Cath;I said no. I don't want it.|Besides...|I've already got your money.
speak;Hugh;What?!|Wh...what the heck?! When did you switch my...?

name: MeladyYoderSupportC
_source: speak;Yoder;Hm... So this is a wyvern.
speak;Melady;You are...Father Yoder of the St. Elimine Church.
speak;Yoder;Yes, it's a pleasure to finally meet you, Madam Melady.|She is so passive...|I imagined wyverns to be more ferocious creatures.
speak;Melady;Tryffin will spread her wings and bare her fangs at my command.|However, that is only because of her training by the Bern Army.|...Perhaps she wishes not to fight at all.
speak;Melady;Tryffin and I have trained together ever since we were both young.|We trained hard to be proud warriors in service to our country.
speak;Melady;I...|I don't regret leaving Bern with Princess Guinivere.|But Bern is still my home...|It is painful to fight against my former allies.
speak;Melady;But I must get used to it.|For Princess Guinivere... and for my country.

name: MeladyYoderSupportB
_source: speak;Melady;No... It's just that my home is in this area.
speak;Yoder;Ah... Do you have family here?

speak;Melady;My grandfather and my parents.|My father and his father used to tell stories of battles they fought in.|How elated they were when my brother and I were knighted as well...|I wonder what they're doing now...
speak;Yoder;...Madam Melady...|Your path has been a difficult one indeed.|Forgive me. I have little to offer you.
speak;Melady;Don't be...|Simply your ear is more helpful than you may realize...|I needed someone like you to listen to me.
speak;Yoder;I will be more than happy to listen to anything you have to say.|Don't forget, Madam Melady... You are not alone.

name: MeladyYoderSupportA
_source: speak;Melady;Father Yoder, I must thank you for helping me.|I no longer feel alienated in this army...
speak;Yoder;Of course... It is my pleasure.|Tryffin, your master is a very kind-hearted person.
speak;Melady;I've put her through a lot of difficulty.|I'm sure she never wanted to turn her back on Bern...|I dragged her along with me...
speak;Yoder;I hear that Bern's training instills absolute loyalty in its troops.|Both in the knights, and in the mounts.
speak;Yoder;If that is so, why do you think Tryffin follows you against Bern?

speak;Yoder;There are other wyvern riders of Bern in the enemy ranks we fight.|There are even high-ranking commanders and generals.|If this wyvern only followed the army's commands, she would not have stayed.
speak;Yoder;Do you understand what that means?|This wyvern has a will of her own.|She chose to be with you.|Just as you chose to be with Princess Guinivere.
speak;Melady;...She has a will of her own...
speak;Yoder;You are blessed, Madam Melady.|You have a close friend at your side.|I dare say you don't even need me.
speak;Melady;Yes, I think you're right...|Thank you...

name: MeladyZeissSupportC
_source: speak;Zeiss;...I'm sorry, Melady.|I was too focused on the enemies in front of me.
speak;Melady;Don't worry about it.|Galle often looked out for me like this, too.|If we can survive by helping each other out, then that's fine by me.
speak;Zeiss;But I need to learn to defend myself on my own...
speak;Melady;You're still inexperienced.|It's all right. I'll watch your back until you're strong enough.
speak;Zeiss;But no... I can't accept that.|I must become strong enough to protect her, too...!

name: MeladyZeissSupportB
_source: speak;Melady;Zeiss! Slow down!|You have to be more careful!
speak;Melady;...Don't rush like that!|You were lucky you defeated him...
speak;Zeiss;Yeah, well... The point is I beat him.|It's all right, Melady. I was fine.
speak;Melady;But who can say that you'll be so lucky next time?!
speak;Melady;Zeiss...|Just listen to your older sister.|I would never be able to forgive myself if I let something happen to you...
speak;Zeiss;...You don't trust me, do you?|Am I so weak that you can't even rely on me?
speak;Melady;Zeiss, I'm not saying that.|Stop being a child.

name: MeladyZeissSupportA
_source: speak;Melady;Zeiss!|What were you thinking, taking a blow for me like that?!
speak;Zeiss;...Even you forget to pay attention to the enemies around you sometimes.|Are you all right?
speak;Melady;I'm fine... What about you, Zeiss? Aren't you hurt?
speak;Zeiss;It's just a scratch. Melady, your arm is bleeding...|Hang on, I'll go get some vulneraries...
speak;Zeiss;You don't need to thank me.
speak;Melady;...Little Zeiss, coming to my rescue?|He's matured so quickly...|It's no wonder he got angry when I treated him like a child.

name: PercevalCeciliaSupportC
_source: speak;Perceval;Good.|...I'm sorry. I was there, but I couldn't come to your aid.
speak;Cecilia;You did what you were supposed to. Don't worry about it.
speak;Perceval;Thank you...|But it was a mistake to follow Bern.|I fight in this army to atone for that mistake.
speak;Cecilia;I'm sure you've done more than your share already.

name: PercevalCeciliaSupportB
_source: speak;Perceval;That village we just passed... It was in ruins.
speak;Perceval;Most of Elibe probably looks like that now thanks to the war.
speak;Perceval;We must put an end to this conflict...|We must defend those who cannot defend themselves...

name: PercevalCeciliaSupportA
_source: speak;Cecilia;Perceval...|I was just wondering what might become of Etruria after all this...
speak;Perceval;That is very much like you. Always dutiful and loyal.|...But I think there is only one answer to that question.
speak;Perceval;Etruria will regain its former glory.|It will become more prosperous than ever before.
speak;Perceval;Of course.|We will make it happen with our own hands.
speak;Perceval;You mustn't lose hope, Cecilia.|If the Etrurian Generals give up, then who will rebuild our country?

name: PercevalDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Douglas;Perceval. We fight together once more.|And yet I cannot erase the shame I brought upon myself.
speak;Perceval;Please, General Douglas.|It was your duty as a general.|You have nothing to be ashamed of.
speak;Perceval;I am honored to be able to fight by your side again.|I'm sure the other Etrurians with us feel the same way.
speak;Perceval;Let us fight for the future of Etruria!

name: PercevalDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Perceval;I've been better.|How about you, General Douglas?
speak;Douglas;I am fighting my hardest, but...|It seems I have lost the strength I once had.|I suppose no man can beat age.
speak;Perceval;Nonsense.|You more than live up to the title of Great General.|You have quite some fight in you yet.

name: PercevalDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Douglas;Perceval.|Perhaps it's a bit soon to say so, but...
speak;Douglas;I am considering stepping down as Great General after this war.
speak;Perceval;What?!|That would leave the highest position in the Etrurian military empty!
speak;Douglas;I think not... I want you to take my place.
speak;Perceval;I am still so young, General Douglas. I cannot assume such a position...
speak;Douglas;You think yourself young? What of our commander, Roy?|He is much younger than you, yet he leads all of us.

speak;Douglas;The youth will have no room to grow if the old hang onto their positions.|Perceval, you are brilliant, strong and a natural leader.|Once the prince returns, the king will abdicate the throne anyway.
speak;Perceval;General Douglas!|Those in service are forbidden to speak of the inheritance of the throne...
speak;Douglas;It is no matter.|I have served the king for decades. I know him better than any.|Once he learns of the prince's survival, I am certain he will give him the throne.
speak;Douglas;We must rebuild Etruria alongside our new king.|Etruria will be born again under the care of the youth.|I am counting on you, Perceval.

name: CeciliaDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Cecilia;I knew you were alive, but I never heard that you were here with us.|Why didn't you tell me?
speak;Cecilia;Nonsense! You are an asset to us all.|It is an honor to fight alongside you once again.|Together we can show everyone why the Etrurian Generals are so respected!
speak;Douglas;Hm...|It's not like you to be in such cheer, Cecilia.
speak;Cecilia;It's only because you're here fighting with me.|I've always idolized you, if you want to know the truth.

name: CeciliaDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Douglas;The former Mage General appointed you as his successor...|But many were opposed to you taking the position at first.
speak;Cecilia;Yes, that is true.|A female officer was enough to incite the rage of some.|I spent most of my earlier days fighting against prejudice.
speak;Douglas;To be honest, I doubted your abilities at first, too.
speak;Cecilia;Yes, I know.|Every time you told me I was too weak for the job, I would bury myself in spell tomes and work even harder.
speak;Douglas;That's just like you.|I expect you must have resented me quite a bit.
speak;Cecilia;Oh?|I never resented you, General.|Do you know why?
speak;Cecilia;The day I enlisted, the other young officers gave me a hard time for being a woman.|But you defended me. You said that I was stronger than any of them.
speak;Cecilia;That's all right. I remember it perfectly.

name: CeciliaDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Douglas;I must thank you.|You've given an old, decrepit soldier hope.
speak;Douglas;I can feel my age whenever I fight.|An elderly soldier is of no use. My time has come.|It is up to you to lead Etruria to a brighter tomorrow.
speak;Cecilia;......|I've never heard such foolish words from your mouth, General.

speak;Cecilia;A brighter tomorrow for Etruria? The war has yet to be won.|And even if we are victorious, we still have much to do.|We must rebuild our land and regain the trust of other nations.|Etruria's future comes after everything has been settled.
speak;Cecilia;And you're going to place that burden upon us as you retire?|I won't allow it, General.
speak;Douglas;......|...You really have grown more confident.
speak;Cecilia;It is thanks to you.|Now, why don't you find some use instead of moping about your age?
speak;Douglas;Hm... Very well.|You amateurs are no match for me as long as I still stand.
speak;Cecilia;Hm hm hm... That's better, General.

name: SophiaIgreneSupportC
_source: speak;Sophia;...Oh... Igrene... Yes...|I'm fine... I'm just a little dizzy...
speak;Igrene;Don't work yourself too hard if you're not feeling well.
speak;Sophia;Yes, I know...|The outside world... is so vast...|It's enough... to excite me a bit...
speak;Igrene;Yes, you've never seen civilization outside of Arcadia like this.|Ask me if you have any questions...|I know the outside world fairly well, so I can explain things for you.

name: SophiaIgreneSupportB
_source: speak;Sophia;Um... What is this? I found it...on the ground...
speak;Igrene;Let's see...|Oh, this is a quarrel.
speak;Igrene;Quarrels are large arrows used in ballistae.
speak;Sophia;They fire these...? They're so big....|But...it's strange...
speak;Sophia;The people living outside...|They make such amazing creations...and they are so advanced...|And yet...why do they continue to fight?
speak;Sophia;They're...much smarter than us, so...|one would think they would know...that war is pointless...|...It is puzzling...

name: SophiaIgreneSupportA
_source: speak;Igrene;Oh?|You seem to be in a good mood, Sophia.
speak;Sophia;Yes...|I was speaking...to the other people in the army...|The people living outside...are all so kind...
speak;Sophia;I would like...if we could be friends...with the outsiders...
speak;Igrene;Me too...|But the elder forbids contact with outsiders.

speak;Igrene;I can understand why, though...|The dragons' power could easily destroy entire countries.|If the outsiders learn of their existence, they will surely fight over them.|I've seen many conflicts like that in my life...
speak;Igrene;Maybe so...|If we in Arcadia can live together with dragons,|there's no reason outsiders can't learn to do the same...

name: SophiaFaeSupportC
_source: speak;Sophia;Fae? What are you looking at...?
speak;Fae;Yeah.|Why do I stay the same?!|You used to be as little as I am!
speak;Sophia;|I am half dragon...so I grow more slowly than humans...|But you...grow even slower than I...
speak;Fae;Why do I stay small? Why don't I grow up like you?
speak;Sophia;You are a full-blooded dragon...|A dragon's lifespan...is near eternity...|I am part human...so we grow at different speeds...|Do you understand...?
speak;Fae;When will I grow up? Soon?

name: SophiaFaeSupportB
_source: speak;Fae;Hmmmmm...|Sophia, when will I grow up?
speak;Fae;I'm not growing at all... I want to be a grown up!
speak;Sophia;Be happy... You will live...for eons...|Even when I grow old and die...you will live on...
speak;Fae;What?!|No! No, no, no! You won't die!|Nooooo!!
speak;Sophia;Fae...I'm sorry... Don't cry...|I feel the same way...|But...that is what it means... to live for an eternity...

name: SophiaFaeSupportA
_source: speak;Fae;I'm scared of when you grow up. Will you still play with me?|I never want you to leave me! I want to play tag and other games.
speak;Sophia;Fae...|Don't worry... I'll always...be your friend...|I'll always be with you...
speak;Sophia;Yes...|As long as I live... I will never leave you...

name: SophiaNiimeSupportC
_source: speak;Niime;So you're the shaman of Nabata?
speak;Niime;A shy one, are we?|I suppose you would be after spending your whole life in that place...|You remind me of me when I was your age.
speak;Niime;My name is Niime.|I want to know more about your village in Nabata.
speak;Niime;That's right.|But before that... Are you human? Or dragon?
speak;Sophia;......|I am human...|At least...my father was human...
speak;Niime;I see...|Sorry to be so intrusive. Don't worry about it.

name: SophiaNiimeSupportB
_source: speak;Sophia;Arcadia...lies within the sandstorms of the desert...|There aren't many pure dragons...|But there are many people...with dragon blood...in their veins...
speak;Niime;I know that you're a shaman, but what exactly do you do?|Rain dances and the like?
speak;Sophia;Yes... I can sometimes see...the future...
speak;Niime;...Really?|Is that because of the dragon blood in you?
speak;Niime;Hm...|Don't let anyone know about that power of yours.|It could be dangerous for our enemies.|Even just the next day's weather could decide a battle.
speak;Niime;Not all outsiders are nice people.|I heard you were held captive by Bern.|I'm sure you don't want to go through that again.
speak;Niime;......|...Don't worry.|Roy would never think of doing that to you.|You're safe here.

name: SophiaNiimeSupportA
_source: speak;Niime;What are dragons, anyway? Where do they come from?|What are they here for?
speak;Sophia;...I don't know...|I don't know...anything specific...
speak;Niime;Hm... Interesting.|You don't know anything about the dragons despite having their blood in your veins.
speak;Niime;If you were a normal girl, you could lead an ordinary life, not having to worry about people hunting you down for your power...
speak;Sophia;......|I...I'm happy with myself...|Even the dragon blood that flows within me... It makes me who I am...
speak;Niime;Yes... You're right.|You've a strong will.
speak;Niime;Yes, you're strong.|You really are just like me when I was your age.

name: IgreneFaeSupportC
_source: speak;Igrene;Fae, don't you have something to do?|Didn't Lord Roy give you orders?
speak;Igrene;Look, Fae.|You promised Roy you would do what he asked, didn't you?|If you make a promise, you have to keep it.|Ok?
speak;Igrene;There's a good girl.|Now, let's go.

name: IgreneFaeSupportB
_source: speak;Igrene;Come here, Fae. I'll braid your hair for you.
speak;Igrene;Do you like having your hair done, Fae?
speak;Fae;Yeah, I love it!|...Igrene, am I gonna be pretty?
speak;Igrene;Yes, I believe so. You have such lovely hair...|You'll be very, very beautiful when you grow up.
speak;Igrene;Oh, I'm sorry...|I was just remembering my daughter.|She was a lovely girl, much like you.
speak;Igrene;She's gone... She's far away now.

name: IgreneFaeSupportA
_source: speak;Fae;You were talking about your little girl before.
speak;Fae;She came to play with me.|When I was sad, she snuck in with Sophia to play with me.|She told me all about the outside world.
speak;Fae;She said her mom was the Desert Guardian.
speak;Fae;But she stopped coming to play with me.|I asked Sophia about her, but she wouldn't tell.|Is it my fault? Was I a bad girl to her?|Did I make her angry and leave?
speak;Igrene;No... Not at all. She was never mad at you, Fae.|She can't play with you anymore, but...|She'll always love you, Fae.

name: IgreneDouglasSupportC
_source: speak;Igrene;Excuse me.|Are you Lord Douglas of Etruria?
speak;Igrene;So you are the Great General?
speak;Douglas;I am but a simple soldier now.
speak;Igrene;Is that so...|I am Igrene, Guardian of Nabata.
speak;Igrene;Yes, I fend off invaders in the desert heat.
speak;Douglas;Quite a job you have.|Do you need something from me?
speak;Igrene;I want you to promise me that you will never attack Nabata.
speak;Douglas;I am a knight...|If the king orders an attack, I must obey.
speak;Igrene;Even if you know it is wrong?

name: IgreneDouglasSupportB
_source: speak;Igrene;Lord Douglas, about our conversation before...|Can you at least assure me that your nation has no reason to attack Nabata?
speak;Igrene;You already have so much wealth... Why is that so unreasonable?
speak;Douglas;...Attacks can be ordered even without the king.
speak;Douglas;Etruria is a large nation governed by various families of nobility.|Not all nobles are kind at heart.|If such nobles took over the court, there is nothing the king or I could do.
speak;Igrene;But what is there to gain from a desert like Nabata?

speak;Douglas;It is not about gold for such people... They simply enjoy showing their power.|They feel no worth unless they are stepping upon another.|I understand that the people in the Western Isles suffered such abuse.

name: IgreneDouglasSupportA
_source: speak;Douglas;......|I have already said this, but in my position, I cannot promise what you ask.

speak;Douglas;However, I will do my utmost to ensure the likelihood of an attack is minimized.|I shall spread word that a warrior of Nabata was among the heroes who rescued the king.|I will do all I can to persuade the nobles never to disturb your peace in Arcadia.
speak;Igrene;...I shall remember those words.|I suppose I can ask no more of you.

name: FaeNiimeSupportC
_source: speak;Niime;A dragon... Archenemy of mankind...|But something's...strange...|The dragons described in the old scrolls were nothing like that.|They were much more...inhuman.
speak;Niime;That's right...|Oh, I must be off. I have things to do.

name: FaeNiimeSupportB
_source: speak;Niime;Grandma, huh...?|You know, you're actually several hundred years older than I am.
speak;Niime;Never you mind.|Fae, take a look at this gemstone.

speak;Niime;Once upon a time, humans and...demons lived in this land.|The demons used their immense power to hurt the humans.|The weak humans could do nothing but watch as the bodies piled up...|And then one day...eight bright rays of light came.|They could be used to defeat the demons.
speak;Niime;Oh my, yes.|...The humans used the lights to fight against the demons.|After a long and difficult battle...the demons were finally defeated.|But that wasn't the end...
speak;Niime;So...this is the enemy of mankind, is it?|She doesn't seem to have a care in the world...|...In fact, she's adorable...

name: FaeNiimeSupportA
_source: speak;Niime;Well...|Do you remember the story I told you about men and demons?
speak;Niime;To tell you the truth... I always feared those demons.|After studying dark magic and the history of mankind...|only then did I discover just how terrifying the demons were.
speak;Niime;But after meeting you...my fear seems to have vanished completely.
speak;Niime;Pay it no mind.|My long stories must bore you.|Here, go play with this.

speak;Niime;What a fool I was...|I thought of doing such horrible things to that innocent girl...|Thinking it would protect the human race... Hah.|There's no point in peace obtained through such hideous measures.

name: HughNiimeSupportA
_source: speak;Hugh;Was my old man good at dark magic? I don't really remember.

speak;Hugh;Well, I really did try to study dark magic, but I couldn't seem to pick it up at all.|That kid I told you about was doing great, though.|I thought that maybe I don't have the talent, so I switched to anima magic.|But the thing is, how can I not have the talent for it when I have your blood?|That's why I wanna know if my old man had the talent or not.
speak;Niime;Your father had more talent for dark magic than you could ever hope for.
speak;Hugh;What? That makes no sense.|...Wait! I get it! Of course!
speak;Hugh;Yes! You're not really my grandmother, are you?!|O-ow! What did you do that for?!
speak;Niime;Your stupidity. I'm your grandmother, like it or not.|You would never have been born were it not for me.
speak;Hugh;But that's impossible!|This handsome face couldn't have come from those hideous wrinkles.
speak;Niime;I was a stunning beauty when I was your age.|I would court men like you and drop them once I'd milked all the money out of them.
speak;Niime;Your kindness comes from your father,|and your talent for anima magic comes from your mother.|Your stupidity... That's probably from your grandfather.
speak;Hugh;What? My mom wasn't a shaman?

speak;Niime;I was determined at first to make my son's wife a shaman.|But your mother was a fine young lady with a distinct talent for anima magic, so I caved...|...I was so proud of them both... And yet they died so young...
speak;Hugh;I'm sorry that all you have left is a pathetic failure of a grandson.

speak;Niime;......|Don't be.|How I missed yelling at you while you were gone.|Perhaps misbehaving children really are the most precious after all.|All I want for you is to live a long and fulfilling life, Hugh.

name: HughNiimeSupportB
_source: speak;Hugh;Huh? Oh, I'm just bracing myself.|For when you blast me with your magic and all that.
speak;Hugh;Don't say that! Come on, I'm your only grandson!
speak;Niime;Yes, most unfortunate, that.|But there's nothing to be done about it now, I'm afraid.|Anyway, I need something from you.
speak;Niime;Give me back that Nosferatu tome I lent you when I sent you out.|You have no use for it now.
speak;Niime;Hugh, those tomes are hard to find!|I sincerely hope you didn't pawn it...
speak;Hugh;Wait! No, no, no!|I didn't sell it! I gave it away!

speak;Hugh;No, but listen!|I met this kid who was studying dark magic, and I traveled with him for a while.|The kid was an orphan, so I felt kinda bad for him, I guess.|Anyway, one morning when I woke up, the kid was gone, and so was the tome!
speak;Niime;So you didn't give it away. A child stole it from you.
speak;Hugh;I suppose that's one way of putting it.
speak;Niime;That's the only way of putting it!
speak;Hugh;......|H-hey, Grandmother.|I'll leave if your head hurts again.
speak;Niime;...Yes, please do.|Your departed parents would never forgive me for reducing their only son to ash.
speak;Niime;He's just like his father was at that age...|He tries to be bad, but his heart is too kind.|Why couldn't he inherit his talent for dark magic as well?

name: HughNiimeSupportC
_source: speak;Niime;Hm...?|Who's that I see sneaking by without so much as a hello?|Whoever it is, he seems to have a death wish.
speak;Hugh;O-oh! H-hello there, Grandmother!|Fancy meeting you here!
speak;Niime;Don't give me that, boy!|You've been avoiding me, haven't you?|Are you shy, or just stupid?
speak;Hugh;Well, Grandmother, you seem to be keeping in good health...|Not planning on dying anytime soon, I hope?

speak;Niime;Harumph!|If I dropped dead who would keep my pathetically helpless grandson in line?|So tell me. It was three years ago I sent you out to study the darkness.|I hope you have a good excuse for using that putrid anima magic.
speak;Niime;...I must finally be going deaf. I thought I heard you say you became a mage.
speak;Hugh;Oh, sorry, I'll say it so you can hear.|I! USE! ANIMA! MAGIC! NOW!
speak;Niime;You...you blundering failure!|You dare show your face in front of me?!
speak;Hugh;Hey, where are you going, Grandmother?
speak;Niime;I always get a migraine when I talk to you.|I never want to see you again.
speak;Hugh;...I thought I was a dead man for sure.|Either she's gotten soft with age,|or she was dumbfounded at how handsome I've become.|Either way, lucky me!

name: ZeissKarelSupportC
_source: speak;Karel;......|...That's not what I prefer to be called.|Karel will do.
speak;Zeiss;Sir Karel, I am a wyvern rider of Bern.
speak;Zeiss;...You're not going to say anything?|My father said you fought against Bern in the past.|He saw you in a rain of blood,|slicing through all who crossed your path...
speak;Karel;...I am through caring about the goings-on of the world.|Bern, Etruria, Lycia... They are meaningless to me now.|I am only here now for my family.
speak;Zeiss;...I envy you. I wish I could be so unconcerned...|But I can't...|Not even now that Bern has fallen...

name: ZeissKarelSupportB
_source: speak;Zeiss;Before making it here... I fought my older brother.
speak;Zeiss;We weren't related by blood, but we truly were brothers...|His name was Galle.|He was a wyvern rider that easily rivaled the Wyvern Generals in skill.
speak;Zeiss;I always looked up to him. My sister was also very fond of him...|...I never thought he would end up as our enemy.|I never conceived that we would have to fight Galle...
speak;Karel;No, not at all.|A life story is never boring.

name: ZeissKarelSupportA
_source: speak;Karel;Why...?|Why did you tell me that story?
speak;Zeiss;...I thought you might have some guidance for me...|I thought you might help rid me of my unease...
speak;Karel;...I'm afraid I have no advice for you.|But...I will say this.|You must carve your own path.
speak;Karel;Zeiss...|I think you already know your answer.
speak;Zeiss;...Maybe.|Perhaps...I just wanted someone to tell me that my path is the correct one.
speak;Zeiss;Yes, I understand now.|I chose to turn against my country...and I don't regret that decision.

name: DayanYoderSupportC
_source: speak;Yoder;Are you Dayan the Silver Wolf?
speak;Dayan;You are not Sacaen, and yet you know my name...|How do you know of me?
speak;Yoder;I treated a wounded Sacaen once in the past.|It was then I heard of the unrivaled warrior of Sacae.|With a name like Silver Wolf,|I expected someone with white hair like mine.
speak;Dayan;The name Silver Wolf comes from our history.|Our legends say that our ancestors were wolves.
speak;Dayan;Do you need something from me?|If you come to preach, I already have deities I worship.
speak;Yoder;No, I did not come to preach.
speak;Dayan;...Are you sure? Don't you need to serve your gods?
speak;Yoder;Of course. My mission is to guide those in need of direction.|But you Sacaens already worship the Sky and the Earth.|The gods would not look fondly on me for pushing my beliefs upon you.

name: DayanYoderSupportB
_source: speak;Dayan;We Sacaens pray to the Sky and the Earth.|The light of day and the darkness of night that engulf the land...|They produce wind, lightning, fire, ice, and other affinities...|Every person in this world is protected by one of these elements.|According to my clan's beliefs, I am protected by the anima affinity.
speak;Yoder;The St. Elimine Church has similar beliefs.|When the creators made man, all mankind was blessed with an affinity.|However...those elements...
speak;Dayan;...Those elements hold no power on their own.
speak;Yoder;Yes. Perhaps...|Perhaps this is one of the grand truths of the world.

name: DayanYoderSupportA
_source: speak;Dayan;The seven affinities...|Their effects only appear through bonds with others.|When your heart is linked with someone else's...|That is when the elements reveal their true power.
speak;Yoder;Yes, precisely.|Saint Elimine said to cherish our relationships.
speak;Dayan;Hmm...|I wonder if our hearts have linked somehow.
speak;Yoder;I am sure of it.|Though who knows what effect that may have...

name: NiimeYoderSupportC
_source: speak;Yoder;Yes, hello. You seem to be doing well.
speak;Niime;Heh... You've become an old man since the last time I saw you.
speak;Yoder;Oh, yes, it's so embarrassing. But you're as youthful as ever I see.
speak;Yoder;Not at all.|...It truly has been a long time. How many years ago was it?
speak;Niime;Forty...no, fifty years? A long time...
speak;Niime;...I think I finally understand how you felt back then.
speak;Niime;But that was a long time ago... A time that will never return.|Our paths split that day. They'll never cross again.

name: NiimeYoderSupportB
_source: speak;Niime;...They killed your sister. She cried your name out as she died.|And still...you refuse to do a thing.

speak;Niime;You're telling me to forgive them? Hah, what will that accomplish?|If we let them live, they're sure to repeat their actions.|More innocent people will die by their hands.|Is that what you want? Answer me, Yoder!
speak;Niime;What were you doing? I almost thought you up and died.
speak;Yoder;No, I was reminiscing about the past.|If I just close my eyes, I can see it as if it were happening now...
speak;Niime;Heh... Finally going senile, are we?
speak;Yoder;Foul words still pour from your mouth as they always did...

name: NiimeYoderSupportA
_source: speak;Yoder;The end of this war...draws near.
speak;Yoder;What will you do after it ends?
speak;Niime;Who knows? I already told you our paths will never cross again.|We'll go our separate ways, as we did before.
speak;Yoder;......|Niime, you and I have changed.|Our paths may just cross again one day.|I will pray for it.
speak;Niime;......|...Well, no one can know the future.|A path that splits at one point...may join again further down the road...|Who can say...?

name: ReinforcementsWarning1
_source: speak;RedSoldier;Lord Arcardo! Additional reinforcements from the forts will soon be joining us!
speak;Arcardo;Oh? Yes, excellent!{w} They can take them by surprise and scatter their ranks...

name: LughChadTalk
_source: speak;Chad;Lugh?! What are you doing here?
speak;Chad;Oh...|Where's everybody else? Are they all right?
speak;Lugh;Yeah, the St. Elimine Church is going to watch over them.
speak;Chad;What?! Lugh you're not thinking of...
speak;Lugh;I can use some magic! Remember I borrowed that fire tome from Poppa's room?
speak;Chad;Lugh, you can't. You're incapable of harming others.
speak;Chad;I'm going to avenge Poppa. You stay with the others Lugh.

speak;Lugh;I'm not going to hide anymore! I'm tired of everyone leaving me...!|Poppa, you, and even Raigh...|I want to fight to protect the people that I care for. I can't let others die for me my whole life!
speak;Chad;Lugh...|Fine! Once we finish Bern we can go back and see everyone again!

name: DefeatBoss
_source: speak;Idunn;I...I...Gah...I...|I am alone...in the dark...|I am alone...in...darkness...

name: EndingTextCrawl
_source: #ending;;;And thus, the war known as "The Disturbance of Bern" was ended.|Following Bern's surrender, its government was dismantled with the indirect support of the Kingdom of Etruria.|With Roy's help. Guinivere inherited the throne and the New Kingdom of Bern was formally established.|And on the day of her ascension...

#speak;;And thus, the war known as 'The Disturbance of Bern' was ended.|{br}Following Bern's surrender, its government was dismantled with the indirect support of the Kingdom of Etruria.|{br}With Roy's help. Guinivere inherited the throne and the New Kingdom of Bern was formally established.|{br}And on the day of her ascension...;center;;cinematic;;;;None;5;false;;;;FLAG(no_sound)

name: OpeningTextCrawl
_source: #speak;;Man and Dragon once coexisted in harmony.{c:wait;700} However, Man shattered that harmony with a sudden onslaught.{c:wait;700}{br}{br}A great war now known as The Scouring was fought for dominion of the land.{c:wait;700} Losses were tremendous for both sides and this war rattled the very foundations of the continent on which they battled...{c:wait;700}{br}{br}Defeated and humbled, the Dragons disappeared from the realm. Mankind then began to rebuild and repopulate their newly won land.{c:wait;700}{br}{br}A millennium has passed since then...;center;;cinematic;;;;None;5;f;;;;FLAG(no_sound)

name: EpilogueIntro
_source: #this line shows an error because the base tilemap for this chapter does not have this layer. Ch22 does and since we've changed to the right tilemap, the command will work without a problem when it actually runs

name: BadEnding
_source: #if Roy/Lilina have A-support, show their convo;otherwise, Roy and Guinivere
speak;Lilina;Today is Princess Guinivere's crowning ceremony.
speak;Roy;I haven't seen her in her royal garments yet,|but I'm sure she is beautiful beyond description.|Even at our first meeting,|I had no words to describe her sheer beauty.
speak;Roy;But she has many struggles still to come.
speak;Roy;After she is crowned queen of Bern, even with Etruria's support,|I'm certain there will be great unrest and plots to overthrow her.
speak;Roy;Some may claim that she only joined Etruria to seize the throne.|It's an unfortunate reality, but to the ignorant, that is how it will appear.
speak;Lilina;...But I'm sure she will be fine.|Under her rule, Bern will prosper like never before...|She's too brilliant and strong to succumb to petty unrest...
speak;Lilina;...What about you? What will you do now?
speak;Roy;Me? I will return to Pherae.|I'm concerned about my father's illness,|and there is much reconstruction to be done.
speak;Lilina;Uh... Never mind.|But you're returning to Pherae... That's good.
speak;Roy;What about you? Will you go back to Ostia?
speak;Lilina;...Yes. I must take my father's place.
speak;Roy;I'm glad you're staying in Ostia.
speak;Roy;Because if you're in Ostia, then we can see one another any time.
speak;Roy;Lilina...|I don't know when, but some day...|I'll come for you.
speak;Lilina;...I...I have to prepare, too...|But...Roy... I've always...
speak;Roy;Oh!|The ceremony's starting. Come, Lilina!|Let's see Princess... No, Queen Guinivere!|This is the start of her reign as queen!
speak;Lilina;What I'm trying to say is... I've always... Wait, what?!|R-Roy, wait for me!
#Bern_Guard does not exist as an nid before compilation, but it still works
speak;Roy;Princess Guinivere, you have my congratulations on your ascension.
speak;Guinivere;I thank you...|But my battle is just beginning.
speak;Roy;I'm sorry...|I wish we didn't have to rely on Etruria.
speak;Guinivere;Not at all. I am grateful for their support.|There will be those, however,|who think I only joined Etruria to seize the throne.
speak;Guinivere;But the most important task at hand is Bern's reconstruction.|I must regain the people's trust through my efforts.|No matter how long it takes...
speak;Roy;If there is anything I can do to help, please don't hesitate to ask.
speak;Guinivere;Thank you again. Perhaps I will someday.|Roy, are you...
speak;Guinivere;What will you do?|Will you stay in the Etrurian Army?
speak;Roy;No, I must return to Pherae.|I am concerned about my father's illness,|and we must begin the reconstruction effort.
speak;Guinivere;You are returning home? I am sure that's for the best.|Still...|Someone of your ability could easily take a place in the Etrurian court.
speak;Roy;M-me?!|I don't think I deserve such a position!
speak;Guinivere;Pherae is blessed to have such a gifted heir as you.
speak;Guinivere;Please call me Guinivere. What is the matter?
speak;BlueSoldier;Yes, Lady Guinivere. The ceremony is about to begin!
speak;Guinivere;Thank you... I will be there shortly.
speak;Guinivere;Roy, will you come with me?
speak;Guinivere;You have helped me so much ever since I left Bern with the Fire Emblem in hand.|I want you to see the path Bern will take under my leadership.
speak;Roy;Of course.|If you will have me, then it is my pleasure to accompany you.
speak;Roy;Let us see a new Bern...|And the beginning of a new era.

name: GoodEnding
_source: #Best Ending, Roy defeats Idunn with Binding Blade
#Else Neutral Ending, Roy DOESN'T defeat Idunn with Binding Blade
speak;Roy;Oh no... The sanctuary is collapsing!|Everyone! Hurry outside!
speak;Roy;Oh no... The sanctuary is collapsing!|Everyone! Hurry outside!
for;player_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid!='Roy']
for;player_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_player_units() if u.nid!='Roy' and u.nid!='Fae']
speak;Merlinus;It was over a thousand years old.|A great deal of energy was released in the battle we fought.|The foundations probably couldn't withstand the pressure.
speak;Merlinus;Today marks the beginning of a new era.|...Who is that you are carrying on your back?
speak;Roy;Oh, yes.|Merlinus, I need to ask a favor of you...
speak;Merlinus;Well, Lord Roy, our struggle is over.
speak;Roy;No. It hasn't even started yet.|We must help rebuild the land from the damage caused by the war.|There is much to be done.|The real work is only just beginning!
#Go to Epilogue convo with Roy and Guinivere/Lilina

name: EpilogueTextScroll2
_source: speak;;Peace returned to the world, and the people slowly began to recover.{w}{br}{br}As stability returned, Elibe faced a new age of prosperity.{w}{br}{br}And thus, the story of the many people who mourned, wept, and laughed during this great conflict came to a close...;center;;cinematic;;;;None;3;f;;FLAG(no_sound)

name: BestEnding
_source: speak;VillagerOldMan3;Ah, Lord Roy. It has been far too long.
speak;Roy;Yes, it is good to see you.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Fae will be glad to see you as well.
speak;Roy;I saw her earlier.|She is even more energetic than I remember.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;We have allowed her outside more since her return.|Perhaps that is why.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;We succeeded in restoring her soul, and yet...
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Fae sometimes takes her outside,|but she will do nothing without first being told to.

speak;VillagerOldMan3;Lord Roy...|We had known for long that she had been captured.|I feared the consequences of leaving the village, however,|so I forbade any effort to rescue her.|Now, though, I wonder whether my judgment was correct...
speak;VillagerOldMan3;Perhaps the humans are changing the way I think.|I will do my best to restore Idunn's heart and soul.
speak;VillagerOldMan3;An expression of emotion would be a promising first step...|A laugh, for example...
speak;Fae;And that is called a tree!
speak;Fae;Right!|And this tree has tasty fruit!

speak;Fae;Yeah. {w}Can you see it?{w} It's up at the top.|And if you {w}shake the tree{w} like this...{c:bop_portrait;Fae (Fae)}{c:screen_shake;100}{c:sound;Select 1}{clear}Oww!{w}{clear}It fell on my head...
speak;Fae;Where's Roy?|{c:bop_portrait;Fae (Fae)}I have to tell Roy that you laughed!

name: WagnerFightDefault
_source: speak;Wagner;Useless guards! But very well. Witness my magic...and bow down before it's power!

name: VisitVillageC
_source: speak;VillagerUglyFatMan2;This whole area is basically pirate territory.|They take everything from us.|Resist, you say? It's of no use.|They can do whatever they want because of their numbers.|We can't fight against them like the resistance force.

name: BartreRoyRecruitment
_source: speak;Bartre;We fight for the people suffering under your tyranny! En garde!
speak;Roy;We're trying to capture it, actually.
speak;Roy;I am Roy, leader of the Lycian army.
speak;Bartre;Lycia? You've come a long way...
speak;Roy;We were sent by Etruria to rid the Isles of the bandits.
speak;Bartre;What's that?! So you are with Etruria!
speak;Roy;Please calm yourself!{w} We share the same goal. We want to bring peace to the Isles.
speak;Bartre;...You may end up against Etrurian nobility.
speak;Roy;...Our mission is to find and eliminate wrongdoers on the Isles.{w} Social status matters not.
speak;Bartre;You, my friend, are a man of conviction!{e} Very well! I think I'll join your little army!
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Fir']

name: ZeissJoins
_source: speak;Melady;Zeiss?! What are you doing here?
speak;Zeiss;...I've been accused of betraying Bern.
speak;Melady;Oh no...!|I feel...I am at fault for this...
speak;Zeiss;Sir Galle said that you had joined the enemy.|I couldn't believe it, but now I see it with my own eyes!|Why?! Why did you betray Bern?
speak;Melady;I never betrayed Bern. I have always served Princess Guinivere.
speak;Zeiss;You threw away everything... Your homeland, your family...|Even your beloved Galle...for the princess.|For that...obstinate princess who betrayed her own brother!
speak;Melady;Enough, Zeiss!|I will not tolerate you insulting Princess Guinivere!

speak;Melady;It is the princess, not the king, who works for the good of Bern.|At first I was angry and confused that she did not tell me more.|But now that I am again at her side, I understand...|She is not mistaken.
speak;Zeiss;He said that he wouldn't move until he heard your side.
speak;Zeiss;I'm not sure yet if I agree with you...but I know I can trust you.
speak;Zeiss;If the leader of the Lycian Army will allow it, I want to go with you.|I want to see the princess that moved you so.
for;fetched_unit;[u.nid for u in game.get_units_in_party() if u.nid=='Melady']

name: MurdockDeath
_source: speak;Murdock;Hngh...!{w} You...are strong...|Zephiel... My king...|I cannot protect you...any further...|Forgive me...!

name: GuerrillaReinforcements

name: MonkeFightDefault
_source: speak;Monke;Yes... That's it! Closer... Closer...|Right into our trap!

name: MonkeFightShin
_source: speak;Monke;...A survivor of the Kutolah Clan?

name: MonkeFightSue
_source: speak;Monke;You are the Silver Wolf's granddaughter...

name: MonkeDeath
_source: speak;Monke;Urkh...! How could you defeat us...?|My trap...was...perfect...
